K10divyav_u:4: 001.001. buddho bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme/
K10divyav_u:5: 001.001. asmāt parāntake vāsavagrāme balaseno nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
K10divyav_u:7: 001.003. sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
K10divyav_u:8: 001.004. so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīnāyācate ārāmedavatāṃ vanadevatāṃ śṛṅgāṭakadevatāṃ balipratigrāhikāṃ devatām/
K10divyav_u:10: 001.006. asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante/
K10divyav_u:15: 001.008. api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrāa jāyante duhitaraśca/
K10divyav_u:20: 001.010. eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraśca/
K10divyav_u:38: 001.018. sā āttamanāttamanāḥ svāmina ārocayati--diṣṭyā āryaputra vardhasva/
K10divyav_u:40: 001.019. yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati,
K10divyav_u:42: 001.019. so 'pi āttamanāttamanā udānam udānayati--apyevāhaṃ cirakālābhilaṣitaṃ putramukhaṃ paśyeyam/
K10divyav_u:48: 001.022. asmākaṃ cāpyatītakālagatānāmalpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni dattvā puṇyāni kṛtvā dakṣiṇāmādeśayiṣyati--idaṃ tayoryatratatropapannayorgacchatoranugacchatviti/
K10divyav_u:49: 001.024. āpannasattvāṃ ca tāṃ viditvā upariprasādatalagatāmayantritāṃ dhārayati śīte
K10divyav_u:55: 002.001. sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
K10divyav_u:57: 002.002. abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇaviśālalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūruttuṅganāso ratnapratyuptikayā karṇikayā āmuktayālaṃkṛtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:61: 002.005. dharmatā yasya na śakyate mūlyaṃ kartuṃ tasya koṭimūlyaṃ kriyate/
K10divyav_u:64: 002.007. tasya jñātayaḥ saṃgamya samāgamya trīṇi saptakāni ekaviṃśatidivasāni vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti--kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti/
K10divyav_u:65: 002.009. ayaṃ dārakaḥ koṭimūlyayā ratnapratyuptikayā āmuktayā jātaḥ,
K10divyav_u:67: 002.009. bhavatu dārakasya śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa iti nāma/
K10divyav_u:69: tasminneva divase balasenasya gṛhapaterdvau preṣyadārakau jātau/
K10divyav_u:72: 002.012. śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nupradatto dvābhyāmaṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ
K10divyav_u:73: 002.013. so 'ṣṭābhirdhātrībhirunnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiścottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
K10divyav_u:75: 002.016. sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttastadā lipyām upanyastaḥ,
K10divyav_u:76: saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāmuddhāre nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ ratnaparīkṣāyām/
K10divyav_u:77: 002.017. so 'ṣṭāsu parīkṣāsūdghaṭako vācakaḥ piṇḍataḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
K10divyav_u:78: 002.018. tasya pitrā trīṇi vāsagṛhāṇi māpitāni haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikam/
K10divyav_u:79: 002.018. trīṇi udyānāni māpitāni haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikam/
K10divyav_u:80: 002.019. trīṇi antaḥpurāṇi pratyupasthāpitāni jyeṣṭhakaṃ madhyamaṃ kanīyasam/
K10divyav_u:81: 002.020. sa upariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
K10divyav_u:83: 002.021. sa koṭikarṇastaṃ pitaraṃ paśyati nityaṃ kṛṣikarmānte--udyuktam/
K10divyav_u:87: yathā tvamupariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍasi ramasi paricārayasi,
K10divyav_u:96: tathāpi me ratnānāṃ parikṣayo na syāt/
K10divyav_u:100: 002.029. balasenena gṛhapatinā vāsavagrāmake ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtam--yo yuṣmākamutsahate śroṇena koṭikarṇena sārthavāhena sārdhamaśulkenātarapaṇyena
K10divyav_u:103: 002.032. balaseno nāma gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--<3>kīdṛśena yānena śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo yāsyati?
K10divyav_u:109: 003.003. sa pitrā āhūyoktah--putra na tvayā sārthasya purastād gantavyam,
K10divyav_u:116: 003.005. na ca te sārthavāhe hate sārtho vaktavyaḥ/
K10divyav_u:118: yuvābhyāṃ na kenacit prakāreṇa śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo moktavya iti//
K10divyav_u:119: 003.008. athāpareṇa samayena śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ kṛtakautukamaṅgalasvastyayano mātuḥ sakāśamupasaṃkramya pādayor nipatya kathayati--amba gacchāmi,
K10divyav_u:135: 003.015. apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
K10divyav_u:138: piṭakairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiḥ prabhūtaṃ samudragamanīyaṃ paṇyamāropya mahāsamudraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ /
K10divyav_u:140: 003.018. nipuṇataḥ sāmudram yānapātraṃ pratipādya mahāsamudramavatīrṇo dhanahārakaḥ/
K10divyav_u:142: 003.019. tena tatropaparīkṣyopaparīkṣya ratnānāṃ tad vahanaṃ pūritaṃ tadyathā tilataṇḍulakolakulatthānām/
K10divyav_u:145: 003.021. sau śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo 'pi sārthavāho dāsakapālakāvādāya sārthamadhyādekānte 'pakramya āyaṃ vyayaṃ ca tulayitumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:153: 003.026. sa sārthaḥ sarātrimeva sthorāṃ lardayitvā saṃprasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:167: 003.031. bhavantaḥ, na śobhanaṃ kṛtam yadasmābhiḥ sārthavāhaśchoritaḥ/
K10divyav_u:172: 004.001. āgacchata, kriyākāraṃ tāvat karmah--tāvanna kenacicchroṇasya koṭikarṇasya mātāpitṛbhyāmārocayitavyam yāvad bhāṇḍaṃ pratiśāmitaṃ bhavati/
K10divyav_u:174: 004.003. śroṇasya koṭikarṇasya mātāpitṛbhyāṃ śrutam--śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo 'bhyāgata iti/
K10divyav_u:179: 004.006. paścāt te kathayanti--amba vismṛto 'smābhiḥ sārthavāha iti/
K10divyav_u:180: 004.007. tābhyāmeka āgatya kathayati--ayaṃ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo 'bhyāgata iti/
K10divyav_u:181: 004.008. tasya tāvabhisāraṃ dattvā pratyudgatau na paśyataḥ/
K10divyav_u:185: 004.009. tasya tāvabhisāraṃ dattvā pratyudgatau na paśyataḥ/
K10divyav_u:187: 004.010. tābhyāmudyāneṣu svakasabhādevakuleṣu cchatrāṇi vyajanāni kalaśāni upānahāni cākṣarāṇi abhilikhitāni dattāni sthāpitāni--yadi tāvacchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo jīvati,
K10divyav_u:193: 004.014. śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ sārthavāho 'pi sūryāṃśubhiḥ spṛṣṭa ātāpitaḥ prativibuddho yāvat sārthaṃ na paśyati nānyatra gardabhayānameva/
K10divyav_u:195: 004.016. rātrau ca vātena pravāyatā vālukayā mārgo vyapoḍhaḥ pithitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:196: 004.016. te ca gardabhāḥ smṛtimanto gandhamāghrāyāghrāya śanairmandamandaṃ saṃprasthitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:197: 004.017. sārthavāhaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kasmādete śanairmandamandaṃ gacchantīti kṛtvā pratodayaṣṭyā tāḍitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:198: 004.018. te saṃbhrāntā ākulībhūtāḥ smṛtibhraṣṭā unmārgeṇa saṃprasthitāḥ,
K10divyav_u:200: 004.019. te tṛṣārtā vihvalavadanā jihvāṃ nirnāmayya gacchanti/
K10divyav_u:204: 004.021. ko 'sau nirghṛṇahṛdayastyaktaparalokaśca ya eṣāṃ pratodayaṣṭiṃ kāye nipātayiṣyati?
K10divyav_u:205: tena ta utsṛṣṭāh--adyāgreṇa acchinnāgrāṇi tṛṇāni bhakṣayata anavamarditāni,
K10divyav_u:209: 004.024. yāvat paśyati āyasaṃ nagaramuccaṃ ca pragṛhītaṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:210: 004.025. tatra dvāre puruṣastiṣṭhati kālo raudrāścaṇḍo lohitākṣa udviddhapiṇḍo lohalaguḍavyagrahastaḥ/
K10divyav_u:212: 004.026. upasaṃkramya taṃ puruṣaṃ pṛcchati--asti atra bhoḥ puruṣa pānīyamiti/
K10divyav_u:216: 004.028. tena sārthavāhena tatra praviśya pānīyaṃ pānīyam iti śabdo niścāritaḥ/
K10divyav_u:235: 005.005. ākrośakā roṣakā vayaṃ matsariṇaḥ kuṭukuñcakā vayam/
K10divyav_u:236: 005.006. dānaṃ ca na dattamaṇvapi yena vayaṃ pitṛlokamāgatāḥ//1//
K10divyav_u:239: 005.007. asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ pretanagaraṃ praviṣṭaḥ svastikṣemābhyāṃ nirgacchan?
K10divyav_u:240: sa saṃprasthito yāvat tenāsau puruṣo dṛṣṭaḥ/
K10divyav_u:242: aho bata tvayā mamārocitaṃ syāt yathedaṃ pretanagaramiti,
K10divyav_u:246: yena tvaṃ pretanagaraṃ praviśya svastikṣemābhyāṃ nirgataḥ/
K10divyav_u:248: 005.011. yāvadaparaṃ paśyati āyasaṃ nagaramuccaṃ ca pragṛhītaṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:249: 005.011. tatrāpi dvāre puruṣastiṣṭhati kālaścaṇḍo lohitākṣa udviddhapiṇḍo lohalaguḍavyagrahastaḥ/
K10divyav_u:257: 005.015. tena tatra praviśya pānīyaṃ pānīyam iti śabdaḥ kṛtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:276: 005.024. dānaṃ ca na dattamaṇvapi yena vayaṃ pitṛlokamāgatāḥ//2//
K10divyav_u:279: 005.025. asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ śrutaḥ sa pretanagaraṃ praviśya kvastikṣemābhyāṃ jīvannirgacchan?
K10divyav_u:283: aho bata yadi tvayā mamārocitaṃ syād yathedaṃ pretanagaramiti,
K10divyav_u:287: 005.028. asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā pretanagaraṃ praviśya svastikṣemābhyāṃ jīvan nirgacchan?
K10divyav_u:291: 005.030. ekaḥ puruṣo 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikah aṅgadakuṇḍalavicitramālyābharaṇānulepanastābhiḥ sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
K10divyav_u:296: sa saṃlakṣayati--nūnaṃ devo 'yaṃ vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā bhaviṣyati/
K10divyav_u:300: 006.002. sa tasmin vimāne tāvat sthito yāvat sūryasyābhyudgamanakālasamayaḥ/
K10divyav_u:307: 006.006. taistaṃ puruṣamavamūrdhakaṃ pātayitvā tāvat pṛṣṭavaṃśānutpāṭyotpāṭya bhikṣito yāvat sūryasyāstagamanakālasamayaḥ/
K10divyav_u:310: 006.008. sa ca puruṣastābhiḥ sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
K10divyav_u:318: 006.011. urabhrān praghātya praghātya māṃsaṃ vikrīya jīvikāṃ kalpayāmi/
K10divyav_u:328: kiṃ tvametānurabhrān divā praghātayasi āhosvidū rātrau?
K10divyav_u:335: tasya karmaṇo vipākena rātrāvevaṃvidhaṃ divyaṃ sukhaṃ pratyanubhavāmi/
K10divyav_u:337: tasya karmaṇo vipākena divā evaṃvidhaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavāmi/
K10divyav_u:343: 006.023. sa urabhrān praghātya praghātya jīvikāṃ kalpayati/
K10divyav_u:351: vaktavyastava pitā kathayati--asti sūnādhastāt suvarṇasya kalaśaḥ pūrayitvā sthāpitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:353: 006.028. āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya,
K10divyav_u:355: 006.029. apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
K10divyav_u:358: 006.031. tatra ekā apsarā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā,
K10divyav_u:359: ekaśca puruṣa abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikah aṅgadakuṇḍalavicitramālyābharaṇānulepanastayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate <7>paricārayati/
K10divyav_u:360: 007.001. sa taṃ dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā pratyavabhāṣitumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:364: sa saṃlakṣayati--nūnamayaṃ devo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā bhaviṣyati/
K10divyav_u:367: 007.003. sa tasmin vimāne tāvat sthito yāvat sūryasyāstaṃgamanakālasamayaḥ/
K10divyav_u:374: 007.006. tayā tasya puruṣasya kāyena kāyaṃ saptakṛtvo veṣṭayitvā tāvaduparimastiṣkaṃ bhakṣayantī sthitā,
K10divyav_u:378: 007.009. sa ca puruṣo 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikastayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
K10divyav_u:401: 007.018. yattanmayā āryasya kātyāyanasyāntikād divā śīlasamādānaṃ gṛhītam,
K10divyav_u:402: tasya karmaṇo vipākena divā evaṃvidhaṃ divyasukhaṃ pratyanubhavāmi/
K10divyav_u:404: tasya karmaṇo vipākena rātrāvevaṃvidhaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavāmi/
K10divyav_u:418: vaktavyah--tava pitrā agniṣṭomasyādhastāt suvarṇakalaśaḥ pūrayitvā sthāpitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:420: 007.028. āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya/
K10divyav_u:422: 007.029. apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
K10divyav_u:425: 007.030. tatraikā strī abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā aṅgadakuṇḍalavicitramālyābharaṇānulepanā/
K10divyav_u:427: 007.032. sā taṃ dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā pratyavabhāṣitumārabdhā--<8>śroṇa, svāgatam/
K10divyav_u:429: sa saṃlakṣayati--nūnaṃ devīyaṃ vā nāgī vā yakṣī vā bhaviṣyati/
K10divyav_u:435: mā dāsyasīti uktvā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ karmasvakaṭāṃ pratyakṣīkartukāmā vimānaṃ praviśyāvasthitā/
K10divyav_u:458: 008.014. cittamabhiprasannaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa mayā prasādajātayā piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ/
K10divyav_u:465: 008.017. sa ruṣito yāvad brāhmaṇānāṃ na dīyate,
K10divyav_u:468: so 'marṣajātaḥ kathayati--kasmāt sa muṇḍakaḥ śramaṇako busaplāvīṃ na bhakṣayatīti?
K10divyav_u:475: 008.021. so 'pi ruṣito yāvad brāhmaṇānāṃ na dīyate,
K10divyav_u:478: so 'pi amarṣajātaḥ kathayati--kasmāt sa muṇḍakaḥ śramaṇako 'yoguḍaṃ na bhakṣayatīti?
K10divyav_u:480: 008.024. nakṣatrarātryāṃ pratyupasthitāyāṃ mama jñātayaḥ praheṇakāni preṣayanti/
K10divyav_u:482: 008.025. sā praṇītāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayitvā mama lūhāni upanāmayati/
K10divyav_u:483: 008.026. ahaṃ teṣāṃ jñātīnāṃ saṃdiśāmi--kiṃ nu yūyaṃ durbhikṣe yathā lūhāni praheṇakāni preṣayata?
K10divyav_u:484: te mama saṃdiśanti--na vayaṃ lūhāni preṣayāmaḥ,
K10divyav_u:487: mā tvaṃ praṇītāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayitvāsmakaṃ lūhāni upanāmayasi?
K10divyav_u:488: sā kathayati--kiṃ svamāṃsaṃ na bhakṣayati yā tvadīyāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayatīti?
K10divyav_u:489: iyaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena svamāṃsāni bhakṣayati/
K10divyav_u:490: 008.032. nakṣatrarātryāṃ pratupasthitāyāṃ praṇītāni praheṇakāni dattvā jñātīnāṃ preṣayāmi/
K10divyav_u:491: 008.033. sā dārikā tāni praṇītāni praheṇakāni mārge 'ntarbhakṣayitvā teṣāṃ lūhāni upanāmayati/
K10divyav_u:492: 009.001. <9>te mama saṃdiśanti--kiṃ nu tvaṃ durbhikṣe yathā lūhāni asmākaṃ praheṇakāni preṣayasi?
K10divyav_u:496: mā tvaṃ praṇītāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayitvā teṣāṃ lūhāni upanāmayasi/
K10divyav_u:497: 009.004. sā kathayati--kiṃ nu pūyaśoṇitaṃ na bhakṣayati,
K10divyav_u:500: 009.005. mama buddhirutpannā--tatra pratisaṃdhiṃ gṛhṇīyām yatraitān sarvān svakaṃ svakaṃ karmaphalaṃ paribhuñjānān paśyeyamiti/
K10divyav_u:501: 009.006. yayā mayāryamahākātyāyanaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādya praṇīte trāyastriṃśe devanikāye upapattavyam,
K10divyav_u:505: 009.009. sā tvayā vaktavyā--dṛṣṭāste mayā pitā mātā bhrātā bhrāturjāyā dāsī/
K10divyav_u:511: vaktavyā--tava paurāṇe paitṛke vāsagṛhe catvāro lohasaṃghāṭāḥ suvarṇasya pūrṇāstiṣṭhanti,
K10divyav_u:514: āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya,
K10divyav_u:516: 009.015. apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
K10divyav_u:518: 009.016. evaṃ tasya paribhramato dvādaśa varṣā atikrāntāḥ//
K10divyav_u:524: śroṇaṃ koṭikarṇaṃ suptameva vāsavagrāmake paitṛke udyāne sthāpayitvā āgacchata/
K10divyav_u:526: 009.020. sa prativibuddho yāvat paśyati ghaṇṭāchatrāṇi vyajanāni,
K10divyav_u:531: 009.022. sa saṃlakṣayati--yadi ahaṃ mātāpitṛbhyāṃ mṛta eva gṛhītaḥ,
K10divyav_u:536: 009.025. dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ śroṇaṃ koṭikarṇamidamavocat--ehi śroṇa,
K10divyav_u:538: 009.026. dṛṣṭaste śroṇa ayaṃ lokaḥ paraśca lokah?
K10divyav_u:540: 009.027. labheyāhaṃ bhadanta mahākātyāyana svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
K10divyav_u:555: sa tava pitā kathayati--asti sūnādhastāt suvarṇasya kalaśaḥ/
K10divyav_u:557: 010.001. āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya,
K10divyav_u:559: 010.002. apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādāya gacchet/
K10divyav_u:572: adya mama piturdvādaśa varṣāṇi kālaṃ gatasya/
K10divyav_u:573: 010.007. asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ paralokaṃ gatvā punarāgacchan?
K10divyav_u:579: tava pitrā agniṣṭomasyādhastāt suvarṇasya kalaśaḥ pūrayitvā sthāpitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:581: āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya,
K10divyav_u:583: 010.011. apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
K10divyav_u:592: dṛṣṭāste mayā mātā pitā bhrātā bhrāturjāyā dāsī/
K10divyav_u:597: 010.017. asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ paralokaṃ gatvā punarāgacchan?
K10divyav_u:602: tava paurāṇe paitṛke vāsagṛhe catasro lohasaṃghāṭāḥ suvarṇapūrṇāstiṣṭhanti,
K10divyav_u:605: āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya,
K10divyav_u:607: 010.022. apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
K10divyav_u:614: 010.024. śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--sarvo 'yaṃ lokaḥ suvarṇasya śraddadhāti,
K10divyav_u:619: 010.026. syādāryaḥ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa eva te bhaginījanaḥ saṃjānate(?)/
K10divyav_u:635: 011.001. tau kathayatah--putra āvāṃ tvadīyena śokena rudantāvandhībhūtau/
K10divyav_u:647: 011.006. sa taṃ dhanajātaṃ dīnānāthakṛpaṇebhyo dattvā daridrānadaridrān kṛtvā yenāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:648: 011.007. upasaṃkramyāyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthāt/
K10divyav_u:649: 011.008. ekānte sthitaḥ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa āyuṣmantaṃ mahākātyāyanamidamavocat--labheyāhamāryamahākātyāyana svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām,
K10divyav_u:657: 011.012. dharmatā khalu yathā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dvau saṃnipātau bhavataḥ/
K10divyav_u:660: te tāṃstānuddeśayogamanasikārānudgṛhya paryavāpya tāsu grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu varṣāmupagacchanti/
K10divyav_u:663: uttare ca paripṛcchanti sūtrasya vinayasya mātṛkāyāḥ/
K10divyav_u:665: 011.017. atha ye āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya sārdhaṃvihāryantevāsikā bhikṣavas tāṃstānuddeśayogamanasikāraviśeṣān
K10divyav_u:666: gṛhya paryavāpya tāsu tāsu grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu varṣāmupagatāḥ,
K10divyav_u:667: te trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayāt kṛtacīvarā niṣṭhitacīvarāḥ samādāya pātracīvaram yenāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
K10divyav_u:668: 011.021. upasaṃkramyāyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
K10divyav_u:675: 011.023. arhan saṃvṛttas traidhātukavītarāgo yāvad abhivādyaśca saṃvṛttaḥ//
K10divyav_u:681: 011.027. draṣṭavyā eva paryupāsitavyā eva hi tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ/
K10divyav_u:682: 011.027. tena khalu punaḥ samayena śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇastasyāmeva parṣadi saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt saṃnipatitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:683: 011.029. athāyuṣmāñ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa utthāyāsanād ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ
K10divyav_u:684: jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yenāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastenāñjaliṃ kṛtvā praṇamyāyuṣmantaṃ
K10divyav_u:690: 012.001. durlabhadarśanā hi vatsa tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhās tadyathā audumbarapuṣpam/
K10divyav_u:691: 012.002. asmākaṃ ca vacanena bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandasva,
K10divyav_u:693: 012.003. pañca praśnāṃśca pṛccha--asmāt parāntakeṣu bhadanta janapadeṣu alpabhikṣukam/
K10divyav_u:697: 012.005. asmākamaparāntakeṣu janapadeṣu idamevamrūpamāstaraṇaṃ pratyāstaraṇaṃ tadyathā avicarma gocarma cchāgacarma/
K10divyav_u:698: 012.006. tadanyeṣu janapadeṣu idamevamrūpamāstaraṇaṃ pratyāstaraṇaṃ tadyathā erako merako jandurako mandurakaḥ/
K10divyav_u:699: 012.007. evamevāsmāt parāntakeṣu janapadeṣvidamevamrūpamāstaraṇaṃ pratyāstaraṇaṃ tadyathā avicarma pūrvavat/
K10divyav_u:701: 012.008. bhikṣurbhikṣoścīvarakāni preṣayati itaścyutāni tatrāsamprāptāni kasyaitāni naiḥsargikāni/
K10divyav_u:702: 012.009. adhivāsayati āyuṣmāñchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya tūṣṇībhāvena/
K10divyav_u:703: 012.010. athāyuṣmāñchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇas tasyā eva rātreratyayāt pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya vāsavagrāmakaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
K10divyav_u:705: 012.012. athāyuṣmāñchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratisāmayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:707: 012.014. tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma--gaccha ānanda tathāgatasya śroṇasya ca koṭikarṇasyaikavihāre mañcaṃ prajñāpaya/
K10divyav_u:708: 012.015. evaṃ bhadanteti āyuṣmānānandastathāgatasya śroṇasya ca koṭikarṇasya yāvat prajñāpya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:709: 012.016. upasaṃkramya bhagavantamidamavocat--prajñapto bhadanta tathāgatasya śroṇasya koṭikarṇasya vihārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ,
K10divyav_u:712: 012.019. athāyuṣmānapi śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo bahirvihārasya pādau prakṣālya vihāraṃ praviśya niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya yāvat pratimukhaṃ smṛtimupasthāpya/
K10divyav_u:713: 012.021. tāṃ khalu rātriṃ bhagavān āyuṣmāṃśca śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa āryeṇa tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsitavān/
K10divyav_u:714: 012.022. atha bhagavān rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye āyuṣmantaṃ śroṇaṃ koṭikarṇamāmantrayate sma--pratibhātu te śroṇa dharmo yo mayā svayamabhijñāyābhisambudhyākhyātaḥ/
K10divyav_u:715: 012.023. athāyuṣmāñ śroṇo bhagavatā kṛtāvakāśah asmāt parāntikayā guptikayā udānāt
K10divyav_u:716: pārāyaṇāt satyadṛṣṭaḥ śailagāthā munigāthā arthavargīyāṇi ca sūtrāṇi vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyaṃ karoti /
K10divyav_u:717: 012.025. atha bhagavāñchroṇasya koṭikarṇasya kathāparyavasānaṃ viditvā āyuṣmantaṃ śroṇaṃ koṭikarṇamidamavocat--sādhu sādhu śroṇa,
K10divyav_u:720: 012.028. athāyuṣmataḥ śroṇasya koṭikarṇasyaitadabhavat--ayaṃ me kālo bhagavata upādhyāyasya
K10divyav_u:724: 012.031. sa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandate alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛcchati yāvat sparśavihāratāṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:726: 012.032. atha bhagavāñcchroṇaṃ koṭikarṇamidamavocat<13>--akālaṃ te śroṇa praśnavyākaraṇāya/
K10divyav_u:727: 013.001. saṃghamelakas tatra kālo bhaviṣyati praśnasya vyākaraṇāya/
K10divyav_u:728: 013.002. atha bhagavān kālyamevotthāya purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:729: 013.003. athāyuṣmāñcchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte 'sthāt/
K10divyav_u:730: 013.004. ekāntasthito bhagavantamidamavocat--asmāt parāntakeṣu janapadeṣu vāsavagrāmake bhadantamahākāyāyanaḥ prativasati,
K10divyav_u:732: 013.005. sa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandate alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛcchati yāvat sparśavihāratāṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:733: 013.006. pañca ca praśnāti vistareṇoccārayitavyāni yathāpūrvamuktāni yāvat kasya naiḥsargikāni/
K10divyav_u:737: ekapalāśike upānahe dhārayitavye na dvipuṭāṃ na tripuṭām/
K10divyav_u:740: 013.010. bhikṣurbhikṣoścīvarakāni preṣayati itaścyutāni tatrāsamprāptāni na kasyacinnaiḥsargikāṇi/
K10divyav_u:741: 013.011. āyuṣmān upālī buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati--yaduktaṃ bhadanta bhagavatā pratyantimeṣu janapadeṣu vinayadharapañcamenopasampadam,
K10divyav_u:755: 013.017. kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā śroṇena koṭikarṇena karma kṛtamiti vistaraḥ/
K10divyav_u:756: 013.017. bhagavānāha--bhūtapūrvam yāvat kāśyapo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho bhagavāñ śāstā loka utpannaḥ/
K10divyav_u:757: 013.019. tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ dvau jāyāpatikau/
K10divyav_u:759: 013.020. yadā kāśyapaḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣu nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ,
K10divyav_u:760: tasya rājñā kṛkinā catūratnamayaṃ caityaṃ kāritaṃ samantādyojanamuccatvena/
K10divyav_u:761: 013.022. tena tatra khaṇḍasphuṭapratisaṃskaraṇāya ye pūrvanagaradvāre karapratyāyā uttiṣṭhante,
K10divyav_u:764: tasya putraḥ sujāto nāṃnā sa rājye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:776: vayaṃ tathā kariṣyāmo yathā svayameva te karapratyāyā notthāsyanti/
K10divyav_u:780: 013.032. tau jāyāpatī vṛddhībhūtau tatraiva stūpe parikarma kurvāṇau tiṣṭhataḥ/
K10divyav_u:784: 014.001. sa dṛṣṭvā pṛcchati--amba tāta kasyaiṣa stūpa iti/
K10divyav_u:788: 014.003. na tena rājñāsmin stūpe khaṇḍasphuṭapratisaṃskārakaraṇāya kiṃcit prajñāptam?
K10divyav_u:790: 014.004. ye pūrvanagaradvāre karapratyāyāste 'smin stūpe khaṇḍasphuṭapratisaṃskaraṇāya niryātitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:798: 014.008. amba tāta anayā karṇikayāsmin stūpe khaṇḍasphuṭapratisaṃskāraṃ kurutamiti/
K10divyav_u:801: 014.009. taistāṃ vikrīya tasmin stūpe khaṇḍasphuṭitapratisaṃskāraḥ kṛtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:803: 014.010. athāpareṇa samayena sārthavāhaḥ paṇyaṃ visarjayitvā āgataḥ/
K10divyav_u:806: 014.012. sa prasādajātaḥ pṛcchati--amba tāta yuṣmābhiḥ kiṃciduddhārikṛtam/
K10divyav_u:809: 014.014. tena prasādajātena yattatrāvaśiṣṭam aparaṃ ca dattvā mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ ca kṛtam--anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeyam/
K10divyav_u:814: 014.017. yadanena kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya stūpe kārāṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam,
K10divyav_u:815: tasya karmaṇo vipākenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ/
K10divyav_u:817: 014.019. ahamanena kāśyapena samyaksambuddhena sārdhaṃ samajavaḥ samabalaḥ samadhuraḥ samasāmānyaprāptaḥ śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:821: 014.022. tasmāttarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10divyav_u:824: 014.024. bhikṣava ūcuh--kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā śroṇena koṭikarṇena karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena dṛṣṭa eva dharme apāyā dṛṣṭāh?
K10divyav_u:826: tasya karmaṇo vipākena dṛṣṭa eva dharme apāyā dṛṣṭā iti//
K10divyav_u:833: 015.001. tena khalu samayena sūrpārake nagare nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito
K10divyav_u:835: 015.004. sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
K10divyav_u:836: 015.004. tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
K10divyav_u:837: 015.005. sā aṣṭānāṃ navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
K10divyav_u:839: 015.006. tasya trīṇi saptakāni ekaviṃśatidivasāni vistareṇa jātasya jātamahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate--kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti/
K10divyav_u:840: 015.007. jñātaya ūcuh--ayaṃ dārako bhavasya gṛhapateḥ putraḥ,
K10divyav_u:842: 015.008. bhūyo 'pyasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ/
K10divyav_u:846: 015.010. yāvadapareṇa samayena bhavo gṛhapatir glānaṃ saṃvṛttaḥ/
K10divyav_u:853: 015.013. na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yadahaṃ svāminamadhyupekṣeyamiti/
K10divyav_u:854: 015.014. sā vaidyasakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--ārya jānīṣe tvaṃ bhavaṃ gṛhapatim?
K10divyav_u:860: 015.016. sa kathayati--dārike tvameva kathayasi--sa patnyā putraiścāpyupekṣita iti/
K10divyav_u:877: bhavatu me tvayā sārdhaṃ samāgama iti/
K10divyav_u:880: yadi tu āryaputreṇa sārdhaṃ samāgamo bhavati,
K10divyav_u:882: 015.026. tenāvaśyaṃ nirbandhaṃ jñātvā abhihitā--yadā saṃvṛttā ṛtumatī tadā mamārocayiṣyasīti/
K10divyav_u:883: 015.026. sā apareṇa samayena kalyā saṃvṛttā ṛtumatī/
K10divyav_u:885: 015.027. tato bhavena gṛhapatinā tayā sārdhaṃ paricāritam/
K10divyav_u:887: 015.028. yameva divasamāpannasattvā saṃvṛttā tameva divasamupādāya bhavasya gṛhapateḥ sarvārthāḥ sarvakarmāntāśca paripūrṇāḥ/
K10divyav_u:888: 015.029. sā tvaṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
K10divyav_u:889: 015.030. dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśīrṣaḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūstuṅganāsaḥ/
K10divyav_u:891: tasminneva divase bhavasya gṛhapaterbhūyasyā mātrayā sarvārthāḥ sarvakarmāntāḥ paripūrṇāḥ/
K10divyav_u:892: 016.002. tasya jñātayaḥ saṃgamya samāgamya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasāni vistareṇa jātasya jātamahaṃ kṛtvā pūrvavat yāvatpūrṇeti nāmadheyaṃ
K10divyav_u:893: 016.003. pūrṇo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dvābhyāmaṃsadhātībhyāṃ datto vistareṇa yāvadāśu vardhate hradasthamiva paṅkajam/
K10divyav_u:895: tadā lipyāmupanyastaḥ saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāmuddhāre nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ ratnaparīkṣāyāṃ hastiparīkṣāyāmaśvaparīkṣāyāṃ kumāraparīkṣāyāṃ
K10divyav_u:896: 016.006. aṣṭāsu parīkṣāsūddhaṭako vācakaḥ paṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
K10divyav_u:897: 016.007. tato bhavena gṛhapatinā bhavilādīnāṃ putrāṇām yathānupūrvyā niveśāḥ kṛtāḥ/
K10divyav_u:898: 016.008. te patnībhiḥ sārdhamatīva saṃraktā nivṛttā maṇḍanaparamā vyavasthitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:899: 016.009. tato bhavo gṛhapatiḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:901: kasmāttvaṃ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthita iti/
K10divyav_u:903: na tāvanmayā niveśaḥ kṛto yāvatsuvarṇalakṣaḥ samudānīta iti/
K10divyav_u:904: 016.011. te yūyaṃ nirastavyāpārāḥ patnīṣvatyarthaṃ saṃraktā maṇḍanaparamā vyavasthitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:908: 016.013. sa tāmavatāryadārukarṇikāṃ pinahya pratijñāmārūḍhah--na tāvat ratnakarṇikāṃ pinahyāmi yāvat suvarṇalakṣaḥ samupārjita iti/
K10divyav_u:911: 016.015. teṣām yāstāḥ saṃjñā bhavilo bhavatrāto bhavanandīti tā antarhitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:923: 016.020. pūrṇenāpi tatraiva dharmeṇa nyāyena vyavahāritāḥ sātirekāḥ suvarṇalakṣāḥ samudānītāaḥ/
K10divyav_u:930: 016.023. kalitam yāvannyāyopārjitasya suvarṇasya mūlyaṃ varjayitvā sātiriktā lakṣāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
K10divyav_u:931: 016.024. bhavo gṛhapatiḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ saṃlakṣayati--puṇyamaheśākhyo 'yaṃ sattvo yenehaiva sthiteneyatsuvarṇaṃ samupārjitamiti/
K10divyav_u:950: 017.003. durnyasto bhidyate mantraḥ prītirbhidyate lobhataḥ//2// iti//
K10divyav_u:960: 017.008. tair nīlapītalohitāvadātairvastraiḥ śibikāmalaṃkṛtya mahatā saṃskāreṇa śmaśānaṃ nītvā dhmāpitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:961: 017.009. tataste śokavinodanaṃ kṛtvā kathayanti--yadā asmākaṃ pitā jīvati,
K10divyav_u:966: 017.011. yannu vayaṃ paṇyamādāya deśāntaraṃ gacchāma iti/
K10divyav_u:982: 017.019. bhavilapatnyā dārikā abhihitā--tvayā kālaṃ jñātvā gantavyamiti/
K10divyav_u:994: 017.023. tāḥ saṃjātāmarṣāḥ kathayanti--evaṃ hi teṣāṃ bhavati yeṣāṃ dāsīputrāḥ kulesvaiścaryaṃ vaśe vartayantīti/
K10divyav_u:995: 017.024. yāvadapareṇa samayena bhavilo bhavatrāto bhavanandī ca sahitāḥ samagrāḥ saṃmodamānā mahāsamudrāt saṃsiddhayānapātrā āgatāḥ/
K10divyav_u:999: 017.027. te anye 'pi svāmibhyāṃ pṛṣṭe kathayatah--evaṃ hi teṣāṃ bhavati,
K10divyav_u:1005: 017.030. anyābhyāṃ dṛṣṭvā svaputrāḥ preṣitā yāvat kāśikavastrāvārī ghaṭṭitā,
K10divyav_u:1009: 017.032. te dṛṣṭvā svāminoḥ kathayatah--dṛṣṭam yuvābhyāmapareṣāṃ kāśikavastrāṇi<18> dīyante,
K10divyav_u:1021: 018.004. tābhistaṃ dṛṣṭvā svāminau tathā tathā bhagnau yathā gṛhavibhāgaṃ kartumārabdhau/
K10divyav_u:1022: 018.005. tau parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kurutah--sarvathā vinaṣṭā vayam,
K10divyav_u:1030: 018.008. yadi jyeṣṭhataro gṛhagataṃ kṣetragataṃ ca grahīṣyati,
K10divyav_u:1033: tathāpi vayaṃ śknumo gṛhagatena kṣetragatena cātmānaṃ saṃdhārayitum,
K10divyav_u:1035: 018.011. tāvevaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kṛtvā bhavilasya sakāśaṃ gatau/
K10divyav_u:1052: 018.017. sa saṃlakṣayati--ahaṃ pitrā abhihitah--sarvasvamapi te parityajya pūrṇo grahītavya iti/
K10divyav_u:1053: 018.018. gṛhṇāmi pūrṇamiti viditvā kathayati--evaṃ bhavatu mama pūrṇaketi/
K10divyav_u:1055: sa tvaramāṇo gṛhaṃ gatvā kathayati--jyeṣṭhabhavike nirgaccha/
K10divyav_u:1061: so 'pi tvaramāṇa āvārīṃ gatvā kathayati--pūrṇaka avatareti/
K10divyav_u:1066: 018.023. yāvat bhavilapatnī pūrṇakena sārdhaṃ jñātigṛhaṃ saṃprasthitā/
K10divyav_u:1073: pūrṇaḥ kathayati--kimahaṃ jāne yuṣmākaṃ gṛhe īdṛśīyamavasthā bhaviṣyatīti/
K10divyav_u:1079: 018.029. anyatamaśca puruṣaḥ samudravelāpreritānāṃ kāṣṭhānāṃ bhāramādāya śītenābhidruto vepamāna āgacchati/
K10divyav_u:1091: 019.002. tena taṃ kāṣṭhabhāraṃ gṛhītvā tadgośīrṣacandanamapanīya vīthīṃ gatvā karapatrikayā catasraḥ khaṇḍikāḥ kṛtāḥ/
K10divyav_u:1094: 019.004. uktaṃ ca--enaṃ kāṣṭhabhārakamamuṣmin gṛhe bhavilapatnī tiṣṭhati tatra naya,
K10divyav_u:1107: 019.010. te pūrṇasya sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayanti--tavāsti gośīrṣacandanam? sa āha--asti/
K10divyav_u:1110: 019.012. taiḥ kārṣāpaṇasahasreṇa gṛhītvā rājñaḥ pralepo dattaḥ,
K10divyav_u:1112: 019.013. rājā saṃlakṣayati--kīdṛśo 'sau yasya gṛhe gośīrṣacandanaṃ nāsti/
K10divyav_u:1122: 019.017. sa gośīrṣacandanasya tisro gaṇḍikā vastreṇa pidhāyaikaṃ pāṇinā gṛhītvā rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:1138: 019.022. pūrṇaḥ kathayati--yadi me devaḥ parituṣṭo devasya vijate 'paribhūto vaseyamiti/
K10divyav_u:1140: adyāgreṇa kumārāṇāmājñā deyā na tvevaṃ pūrṇasyeti/
K10divyav_u:1141: 019.024. yāvanmahāsamudrāt pañcamātrāṇi vaṇikśatāni saṃsiddhayānapātrāṇi sūrpārakaṃ nagaramanuprāptāni/
K10divyav_u:1142: 019.025. vaṇiggrāmeṇa kriyākāraḥ kṛtah--na kenacidasmākaṃ samastānāṃ nirgatyaikākinā vaṇijāṃ sakāśamupasaṃkramitavyam/
K10divyav_u:1145: 019.027. anye kathayanti--kiṃ tasya kṛpaṇasyāsti yaḥ śabdāyata iti/
K10divyav_u:1147: 019.028. tena śrutaṃ mahāsamudrāt pañca vaṇikchatāni saṃsiddhayānapātrāṇi sūrpārakaṃ nagaramanuprāptānīti/
K10divyav_u:1161: 020.002. tato vaṇiggrāmeṇāvacarakāḥ puruṣāḥ preṣitāh--paśyata kiṃ dravyamiti/
K10divyav_u:1169: 020.005. te kathayanti--yattenāvadraṅge dattaṃ tad yūyaṃ mūlye 'pi na dāsyatha/
K10divyav_u:1177: 020.008. yātenāvadraṅge dattaṃ tadyūyaṃ mūlye 'pi na dāsyatha/
K10divyav_u:1181: 020.010. sa tairāhūyoktah--pūrṇa vaṇiggrāmeṇa kriyākāraḥ kṛtah--na kenacidekākinā grahītavyam/
K10divyav_u:1185: yadā yuṣmābhiḥ kriyākāraḥ kṛtastadā kimahaṃ na śabdito mama bhrātā vā?
K10divyav_u:1187: 020.013. tato vaṇiggrāmeṇa saṃjātāmarṣeṇa ṣaṣṭeḥ kārṣāpaṇānāmarthāyātape dhāritaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1195: te kathayanti--deva vaṇiggrāmeṇa kriyākāraḥ kṛto na kenacidekākinā paṇyaṃ grahītavyamiti/
K10divyav_u:1198: samanuyujyantām yadaibhiḥ kriyākāraḥ kṛtastadā kimahamebhiḥ śabdito mama bhrātā vā?
K10divyav_u:1212: 020.023. te vaṇiggrāmāḥ sarva eva saṃbhūya tasya niveśanaṃ gatvā dvāri sthitvā tairdūtaḥ preṣitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1219: 020.027. pañcadaśa lakṣāṇi teṣāṃ vaṇijyaṃ dattamavaśiṣṭaṃ svagṛhaṃ praveśitam/
K10divyav_u:1222: 020.029. tena sūrpārake nagare ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ saurpārakīyā vaṇijaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1224: 020.030. yo yuṣmākamutsahate pūrṇena sārthavāhena sārdhamaśulkenāgulmenātarapaṇyena mahāsamudramavatartuṃ sa mahāsamudragamanīyaṃ paṇyaṃ samudānayatviti/
K10divyav_u:1226: 020.032. tataḥ pūrṇaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kṛtakutūhalamaṅgalasvastyayanah<21> pañcavaṇikśataparivāro mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1231: 021.002. pūrṇaḥ ṣaṭkṛtvo mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ saṃsiddhayānapātraśca pratyāgata iti/
K10divyav_u:1232: 021.003. śrāvasteyā vaṇijaḥ paṇyamādāya sūrpārakaṃ nagaraṃ gatāḥ/
K10divyav_u:1233: 021.004. te mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya yena pūrṇaḥ sārthavāhastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
K10divyav_u:1236: asti kaścidyuṣmābhirdṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā ṣaṭkṛtvo mahāsamudrātsaṃsiddhayānapātrāgataḥ saptamaṃ vāramavataran?
K10divyav_u:1243: 021.009. te rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye udānāt pārāyaṇāt satyadṛśaḥ sthaviragāthāḥ śailagāthā munigāthā arthavargīyāṇi ca sūtrāṇi vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyaṃ kurvanti/
K10divyav_u:1249: 021.012. sa buddha ityaśrutapūrvaṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā sarvaromakūpāni āhṛṣṭāni/
K10divyav_u:1252: 021.013. te kathayanti--asti śramaṇo gautamaḥ śākyaputraḥ śākyakulātkeśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi ācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ
K10divyav_u:1258: 021.017. sa taṃ hṛdi kṛtvā taiḥ sārdhaṃ mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ saṃsiddhayānapātraśca pratyāgataḥ/
K10divyav_u:1262: kathaya katarasya dhaninaḥ sārthavāhasya vā tavārthāya duhitaraṃ prārthayāmīti/
K10divyav_u:1286: pūrṇaḥ sārthavāha udyāne tiṣṭhati gṛhapatiṃ draṣṭukāma iti/
K10divyav_u:1287: 021.028. anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--nūnaṃ jalayānena khinna idānīṃ sthalayānenāgataḥ/
K10divyav_u:1293: 021.030. anāthapiṇḍadaḥ saṃlakṣayati--na mama pratirūpam yadahaṃ pradhānapuruṣamasatkāreṇa praveśayeyamiti/
K10divyav_u:1294: 021.031. sa tena mahatā satkāreṇa praveśita udvartitaḥ snāpito bhojitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1297: apūrveṇa gṛhapate icchāmi svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvamiti/
K10divyav_u:1298: 022.002. tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ pūrvaṃ kāyamabhyunnamayya dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ prasāryodānamudānayati--aho buddhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1301: 022.003. yatredānīmīdṛśāḥ pradhānapuruṣā vistīrṇasvajanabandhuvargamapahāya sphītāni ca kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi ākāṅkṣanti svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ
K10divyav_u:1302: 022.005. tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛḥpatiḥ pūrṇaṃ sārthavāhamādāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1303: 022.006. tena khalu samayena bhagavānanekaśatāyā bhikṣupariṣadaḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ deśayati/
K10divyav_u:1305: 022.008. dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣa bhikṣavo 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ saprābhṛta āgacchati/
K10divyav_u:1306: 022.009. nāsti tathāgatasyaivaṃvidhaḥ prābhṛto yathā vaineyaprābhṛta iti/
K10divyav_u:1307: 022.010. tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatirbhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā pūrṇena sārthavāhena sārdhamekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1308: 022.011. ekāntaniṣaṇṇo 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatirbhagavantamidamavocat--ayaṃ bhadanta pūrṇaḥ sārthavāha ākāṅkṣati svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ
K10divyav_u:1311: 022.014. tato bhagavān pūrṇaṃ sārthavāhamāmantrayate--ehi bhikṣo cara brahmacaryamiti/
K10divyav_u:1312: 022.014. sa bhagavato vācāvasāne muṇḍaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ saṃghāṭiprāvṛtaḥ pātrakarakavyagrahastaḥ saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmaśrurvarṣaśatopasampannasya
K10divyav_u:1313: 022.017. ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaśca saṃghāṭiparītadehaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1314: 022.019. sadyaḥ praśāntendriya eva tasthau evaṃ sthito buddhamanorathena//4//
K10divyav_u:1317: 022.022. ekānte sthita āyuṣmān pūrṇo bhagavantamidamavocat--sādhu me bhagavāṃstathā
K10divyav_u:1318: saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ deśayatu yathāhaṃ bhagavato 'ntikāt saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ śrutvaiko
K10divyav_u:1320: 022.024. yadarthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇi avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi ācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajanti,
K10divyav_u:1322: pravrajayeyam--kṣīṇā me jātiruṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparamasmādbhavaṃ prajānāmīti /
K10divyav_u:1324: sādhu khalu tvaṃ pūrṇa yastvamevaṃ vadasi--sādhu me bhagavāṃstathā saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ deśayatu pūrvavadyāvannāparamasmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti/
K10divyav_u:1326: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye//
K10divyav_u:1327: 022.031. santi pūrṇa cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇīṣṭakāni kāntāni priyāṇi manāpāni kāmopasaṃhitāni rañjanīyāni/
K10divyav_u:1338: manovijñeyā dharmā iṣṭāḥ kāntāḥ priyā manāpāḥ kāmopasaṃhitā rañjanīyāḥ/
K10divyav_u:1340: 023.006. santi tu pūrṇa cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi iṣṭāni kāntāni priyāṇi manāpāni pūrvavad yavat śuklapakṣeṇāntike nirvāṇasyeti ucyate/
K10divyav_u:1341: 023.008. anena tvaṃ pūrṇa mayā saṃkṣiptenāvavādena coditaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1343: anenāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavatā saṃkṣiptenāvavādena codita icchāmi śroṇāparāntakeṣu janapadeṣu vastuṃ śroṇāparāntakeṣu janapadeṣu vāsaṃ kalpayitum/
K10divyav_u:1344: 023.010. caṇḍāḥ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntikā manuṣyā rabhasāḥ karkaśā ākrośakā roṣakāḥ paribhāṣakāḥ/
K10divyav_u:1345: 023.011. sacet tvāṃ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyā saṃmukhaṃ pāpikayā asatyayā paruṣayā vācā ākrokṣyanti roṣayiṣyanti paribhāṣiṣyante,
K10divyav_u:1347: sacenmāṃ bhadanta śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ saṃmukhaṃ pāpikayā asātyayā paruṣayā vācā ākrokṣyanti roṣayiṣyanti paribhāṣiṣyante,
K10divyav_u:1348: tasya mamaivaṃ bhaviṣyati--bhadrakā bata śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ,
K10divyav_u:1350: ye māṃ saṃmukhaṃ pāpikayā asatyayā paruṣayā
K10divyav_u:1352: 023.017. no tu pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā praharantīti/
K10divyav_u:1353: 023.017. caṇḍāḥ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ pūrvavat yāvat paribhāṣakāḥ/
K10divyav_u:1354: 023.018. sacet tvāṃ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā prahariṣyanti,
K10divyav_u:1356: sacenmāṃ bhadanta śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā prahariṣyanti,
K10divyav_u:1357: tasya mamaivaṃ bhaviṣyati--bhadrakā bata śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ,
K10divyav_u:1359: ye māṃ pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā praharanti,
K10divyav_u:1360: no tu daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā praharantīti/
K10divyav_u:1361: 023.022. caṇḍāḥ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ pūrvavad yāvat paribhāṣakāḥ/
K10divyav_u:1362: 023.023. sacet tvāṃ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyā daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā prahariṣyanti,
K10divyav_u:1364: sacenmāṃ bhadanta śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyā daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā prahariṣyanti,
K10divyav_u:1365: tasya mamaivaṃ bhaviṣyati--bhadrakā bata śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ,
K10divyav_u:1367: ye māṃ daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā praharanti,
K10divyav_u:1368: no tu sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayanti/
K10divyav_u:1369: 023.027. caṇḍāḥ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyā yāvat paribhāṣakāḥ/
K10divyav_u:1370: 023.027. sacet tvāṃ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayiṣyanti,
K10divyav_u:1372: sacenmāṃ bhadanta śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitād vyaparoyiṣyanti,
K10divyav_u:1373: tasya me evaṃ bhaviṣyati--santi bhagavataḥ śrāvakā ye anena pūtikāyenārdīyamānā jehrīyante,
K10divyav_u:1382: śakyastvaṃ pūrṇa anena kṣāntisaurabhyena samanvāgataḥ śroṇāparāntakeṣu janapadeṣu vastuṃ śroṇāparāntakeṣu vāsaṃ kalpayitum/
K10divyav_u:1388: 024.005. athāyuṣmān pūrṇo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1389: 024.006. athāyuṣmān pūrṇastasyā eva rātreratyayāt pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
K10divyav_u:1390: 024.007. śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātraḥ pratikrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1391: 024.008. yathāparibhuktaśayanāsanaṃ pratisamayya samādāya pātracīvaram yena śroṇāparāntakā janapadāstena cārikāṃ carañ śroṇāparāntakāñ janapadānanuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1392: 024.010. athāyuṣmān pūrṇaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śroṇāparāntakaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
K10divyav_u:1395: 024.011. sa saṃlakṣayati--amaṅgalo 'yaṃ muṇḍakaḥ śramaṇako mayā dṛṣṭa iti viditvā ā karṇād dhanuḥ pūrayitvā yenāyuṣmān pūrṇastena pradhāvitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1401: 024.015. yasyārthe gahane caranti vihagā gacchanti bandhaṃ mṛgāḥ saṃgrāme śaraśaktatomaradharā naśyantyajasraṃ narāḥ/
K10divyav_u:1402: 024.017. dīnā durdinacāriṇaśca kṛpaṇā matsyā grasantyāyasam asyārthe udarasya pāpakalile dūrādihābhyāgataḥ//5// iti//
K10divyav_u:1403: 024.019. sa saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ pravrajita īdṛśena kṣāntisaurabhyena samanvāgataḥ/
K10divyav_u:1410: 024.023. tasyaiva ca trimāsasyātyayāt tisro vidyāḥ kāyena sākṣātkṛtāḥ/
K10divyav_u:1412: 024.024. traidhātukavītarāgo yāvat sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaśca saṃvṛttaḥ//
K10divyav_u:1413: 024.025. yāvadapareṇa samayena dārukarṇibhrātrorbhogāstanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gatāḥ/
K10divyav_u:1425: 024.030. tau kathayatah--tena dāsīputreṇa mahāsamudramavatīryāvatīrya bhogāḥ samudānītā yena tvaṃ bhuñjāno vikatthase/
K10divyav_u:1434: 025.002. tena khalu samayena gośīrṣacandanavanaṃ maheśvarasya yakṣasya parigraho 'bhūt/
K10divyav_u:1437: 025.004. adrākṣīdapriyākhyo yo yakṣo gośīrṣacandanavane pañcamātrāṇi kuṭhāraśatāni vahataḥ/
K10divyav_u:1440: 025.006. upasaṃkramya maheśvaram yakṣamidamavocat--yat khalu grāmaṇīrjānīyā gośīrṣacandanavane pañcamātrāṇi kuṭhāraśatāni vahanti/
K10divyav_u:1441: 025.007. yatte kṛtyaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ vā tatkuruṣveti/
K10divyav_u:1442: 025.007. atha maheśvaro yakṣo yakṣāṇāṃ samitimasamitiṃ kṛtvā saṃjātāmarṣo mahāntaṃ kālikāvātabhayaṃ saṃjanya yena gośīrṣacandanavanaṃ tena saṃprasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1443: 025.009. karṇadhāreṇārocitam--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jāmbudvīpakā vaṇijah--yattat śrūyate mahākālikāvātabhayamiti, idaṃ tat/
K10divyav_u:1445: tataste vaṇijo bhītāstrastāḥ saṃvignā āhṛṣṭaromakūpā devatāyācanaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ/
K10divyav_u:1447: 025.014. vyasanamatibhayaṃ vayaṃ prapannā vigatabhayā hi bhavantu no 'dya nāthāḥ//6//
K10divyav_u:1465: 025.025. tairekasvareṇa sarvairevaṃ nādo muktah--namastasmai āryāya pūrṇāya,
K10divyav_u:1473: 025.029. tata āyuṣmān pūrṇastadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte śroṇāparāntake 'ntarhito mahāsamudre vahanasīmāyāṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā
K10divyav_u:1475: 025.031. atha maheśvaro yakṣaḥ saṃlakṣayati--pūrvam yat kiṃcidvahanaṃ kālikāvātena spṛśyate,
K10divyav_u:1477: 025.032. idānīṃ ko yogo yena kālikāvātah <26>sumerupratyāhata iva pratinivṛttah?
K10divyav_u:1478: sa itaścāmutaśca pratyavekṣitumārabdho yāvat paśyati āyuṣmantaṃ pūrṇaṃ vahanasīmāyāṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvāvasthitam/
K10divyav_u:1483: yadi mayedṛśā guṇagaṇā nādhigatāḥ syurbhrātā me tvayā nāmāvaśeṣaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt/
K10divyav_u:1484: 026.004. maheśvaro yakṣaḥ kathayati--ārya idaṃ gośīrṣacandanavanaṃ rājñaścakaravartino 'rthāya dhāryate/
K10divyav_u:1485: 026.005. kiṃ manyase grāmaṇīḥ kiṃ varaṃ rājā cakravartī uta tathagato 'rhan samyaksambuddha?
K10divyav_u:1486: kim ārya bhagavāṃl loka utpannah? utpannaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1488: 026.007. tataste vaṇijo gatapratyāgataprāṇā āyuṣmati pūrṇe cittamabhiprasādya tadvahanaṃ gośīrṣacandanasya pūrayitvā saṃprasthitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:1490: 026.010. tata āyuṣmān pūrṇo bhrātuḥ kathayati--yasya nāṃnā vahanaṃ saṃsiddhayānapātramāgacchati,
K10divyav_u:1493: 026.011. ahamanena gośīrṣacandanena bhagavato 'rthāya candanamālaṃ prāsādaṃ kārayāmīti/
K10divyav_u:1494: 026.012. tena teṣāṃ vaṇijāṃ ratnaiḥ saṃvibhāgaḥ kṛtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1495: 026.013. tata āyuṣmān pūrṇo gośīrṣacandanena prāsādaṃ māpayitumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1497: kiṃ divase divase pañca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni gṛhṇīdhvamāhosvit gośīrṣacandanacūrṇasya biḍālapadam?
K10divyav_u:1499: 026.015. yāvat alpīyasā kālena candanamālaḥ prāsādaḥ kṛtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1505: 026.018. te ca bhrātara parasparaṃ sarve kṣamitā uktāśca--buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamupanimantrya bhojayata/
K10divyav_u:1519: 026.022. tata āyuṣmān pūrṇaḥ śaraṇapṛṣṭhamabhiruhya jetavanābhimukhaṃ sthitvā ubhe
K10divyav_u:1520: jānumaṇḍale pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya puṣpāṇi kṣiptvā dhūpaṃ saṃcārya ārāmikena ca sauvarṇabhṛṅgāraṃ
K10divyav_u:1523: 026.027. anāthabhūtān prasamīkṣya sādho kṛtvā kṛpāmāgamanaṃ kuruṣva//8// iti/
K10divyav_u:1524: 026.029. tatastāni puṣpāṇi buddhānāṃ buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvenopari puṣpamaṇḍapaṃ kṛtvā jetavane gatvā sthitāni dūupo 'bhrakūṭavadudakaṃ
K10divyav_u:1526: 026.031. sa kṛtakarapuṭo bhagavantaṃ papraccha--kuto bhagavan nimantraṇamāgatam?
K10divyav_u:1531: bhikṣūnārocaya--yo yuṣmākamutsahate śvaḥ sūrpārakaṃ nagaraṃ gatvā bhoktum,
K10divyav_u:1533: 027.002. evaṃ bhadanteti āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya śalākāṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastāt sthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1536: 027.004. tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān pūrṇaḥ kuṇḍopadhānīyakaḥ sthaviraḥ prajñāvimuktas tasyāmeva pariṣadi saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt/
K10divyav_u:1543: 027.010. ṛddhibhiryatra gantavyaṃ tūṣṇī tvaṃ bhava pūrṇaka//10// iti//
K10divyav_u:1546: 027.011. tasyaitadabhavat--yena mayā sakalaṃ kleśagaṇaṃ vāntaṃ charditaṃ tyaktaṃ pratiniḥsṛṣṭam,
K10divyav_u:1548: 027.012. tena vīryamāsthāya ṛddhimutpādya yāvadāyuṣmānānandas tṛtīyasthavirasya śalākāṃ na dadāti,
K10divyav_u:1549: tāvat tena gajabhujasadṛśaṃ bāhumabhiprasārya śalākā gṛhītā/
K10divyav_u:1551: 027.015. vapuṣmattayā śrutena vā na balātkāraguṇaiśca gautama/
K10divyav_u:1554: 027.018. jarayā hi nipīḍitayauvanāḥ ṣaḍabhijñā hi bhavanti madvidhāḥ//12// iti//
K10divyav_u:1555: 027.019. tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ caityaśalākāgrahaṇe/
K10divyav_u:1556: 027.020. tatprathamataḥ śalākāṃ gṛhṇatām yaduta pūrṇaḥ kuṇḍopadhānīyakaḥ sthaviraḥ/
K10divyav_u:1558: 027.021. kiṃ cāpi uktaṃ mayā--praticchannakalyāṇairvo bhikṣavo vihartavyaṃ vivṛtapāpairiti,
K10divyav_u:1561: tena tayā tatra sūrpārakaṃ nagaraṃ gatvā bhoktavyamiti/
K10divyav_u:1562: 027.023. evaṃ bhadanteti āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣūṇāmārocayati--āyuṣmantaḥ,
K10divyav_u:1563: bhagavānevamāha--kiṃ cāpi uktaṃ mayā praticchannakalyāṇairvo bhikṣavo vihartavyamiti pūrvavat yāvat gatvā bhoktavyamiti/
K10divyav_u:1569: 027.029. pratyekamekaikasmin dvāre paramayā vibhūtyā rājaputrā vyavasthitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:1570: 027.029. mūladvāre ca mahatā rājānubhāvena sūrpārakādhipatī rājā āyuṣmān pūrṇo dārukarṇī stavakarṇī trapukarṇī ca vyavasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1580: api tu khalu sthavirasthavirā eva te bhikṣava iti/
K10divyav_u:1583: 028.007. anye toyadharā ivāmbaratale vidyullatālaṃkṛtā ṛddhyā devapurīmiva pramuditā gantuṃ samabhyudyatāḥ//13//
K10divyav_u:1585: 028.010. āsane nirmitāścaike paśya ṛddhimatāṃ balam//14// iti//
K10divyav_u:1586: 028.011. tato bhagavān bahirvihārasya pādau prakṣālya vihāraṃ praviśya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtimupasthāpya prajñapta evāsane
K10divyav_u:1587: 028.012. yāvad bhagavatā gandhakuṭyāṃ sābhisaṃskāraṃ pādo nyastaḥ,
K10divyav_u:1588: ṣaḍvikāraḥ pṛthivīkampo jātah--iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī calati saṃcalati saṃpracalati/
K10divyav_u:1602: 028.016. rājā āyuṣmantaṃ pūrṇaṃ pṛcchati--ārya pūrṇa, kimetat?
K10divyav_u:1606: 028.018. tato bhagavatā kanakamarīcivarṇaprabhā utsṛṣṭā yayā jambudvīpo vilīnakanakāvabhāsaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1607: 028.019. punarapi rājā vismayotphullalocanaḥ pṛcchati--ārya pūrṇa, idaṃ kim?
K10divyav_u:1609: 028.021. tato bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāraḥ pañcabhirarhacchāntaiḥ sārdhaṃ sūrpārakābhimukhaḥ saṃprasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1611: sā bakulaśākhāṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataśchāyāṃ kurvantī pṛṣṭataḥ saṃprasthitā/
K10divyav_u:1612: 028.023. tasyā bhagavatā āśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhakī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10divyav_u:1613: yāṃ śrutvā tayā devatayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā śrotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
K10divyav_u:1616: vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamamiva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam /
K10divyav_u:1618: 028.029. dharmataiṣā--na tathā dvādaśavarṣābhyastaḥ śamathaścittasya kalyatāṃ janayati
K10divyav_u:1619: aputrasya ca putralābho daridrasya vā nidhidarśanaṃ rājyābhinandino vā rājyābhiṣeko
K10divyav_u:1621: 028.031. tato bhagavāṃstāsāṃ vinayakālamavekṣya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya <29>prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1622: 029.001. tā api bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
K10divyav_u:1623: 029.001. tato bhagavatā tāsāmāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā yāvat srotāapattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
K10divyav_u:1624: 029.003. tā dṛṣṭasatyās trirudānamudānayanti--idamasmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ
K10divyav_u:1625: na pitrā kṛtaṃ na rājñā neṣṭasvajanabandhuvargeṇa na devatābhir na pūrvapretair na
K10divyav_u:1631: 029.006. etā vayaṃ bhagavataṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmo dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:1633: 029.007. tata utthāyāsanāt yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocan--aho bata bhagavānasmākaṃ kiṃcidatra prayacchet yatra vayaṃ kārāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1636: 029.010. tatastayā jetavananivāsinyā tasmin stūpe yaṣṭyāṃ sā bakulaśākhāropitā/
K10divyav_u:1646: 029.015. te tena madena mattā na kiṃcinmanyante/
K10divyav_u:1651: 029.017. tataste ṛṣayaḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparā vyavasthitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:1654: 029.018. te kathayanti--bhagavaṃstvaṃ dvipādakaṃ puṇyakṣetramiha praviṣṭo 'smākaṃ cedṛśī samavasthā/
K10divyav_u:1662: 029.022. tato bhagavatā teṣāmāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10divyav_u:1665: 029.024. tato yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocan--labhema vayaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
K10divyav_u:1667: 029.026. tataste bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā ābhāṣitāh--eta bhikṣavaścarata brahmacaryamiti/
K10divyav_u:1668: 029.027. bhagavato vācāvasāne muṇḍāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ saṃghāṭiprāvṛtāḥ pātrakaravyagrahastāḥ saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmaśravo varṣaśatopasampannasya bhikṣorīryāpathena
K10divyav_u:1669: 029.029. ehīti coktā hi tathāgatena muṇḍāśca saṃghāṭiparītadehāḥ/
K10divyav_u:1670: 029.031. sadyaḥ praśāntendriyā eva tasthurevaṃ sthitā buddhamanorathena//15//
K10divyav_u:1675: 030.003. tato bhagavān pañcabhirṛṣiśataiḥ pūrvakaiśca pañcabhirbhikṣuḥśatairardhacandrākāropagūḍhastat eva ṛddhyā upari vihāyasā prakrānto 'nupūrveṇa musalakaṃ parvatamanuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1676: 030.005. tena khalu samayena musalake parvate vakkalī nāma ṛṣiḥ prativasati/
K10divyav_u:1677: 030.006. adrākṣīt sa ṛṣirbhagavantaṃ dūrādeva dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ pūrvavat yāvat samantato bhadrakam/
K10divyav_u:1685: 030.010. tato 'sya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10divyav_u:1688: 030.012. tato bhagavantamidamavocat--labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ
K10divyav_u:1689: bhikṣubhāvaṃ pūrvavat yāvat bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā pravrājito yāvadevaṃ sthito buddhamanorathena //
K10divyav_u:1690: 030.014. tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śraddhādhimuktānām yaduta vakkalī bhikṣuriti/
K10divyav_u:1691: 030.015. tato bhagavān bhikṣusahasraparivṛto vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi kurvan sūrpārakaṃ nagaramanuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1695: 030.017. tata ṛddhyā upari vihāyasā madhye sūrpārakasya nagarasyāvatīrṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1696: 030.018. tataḥ sūrpārakādhipatī rājā āyuṣmān pūrṇo dārukarṇī stavakarṇī trapukarṇī te ca saptadaśa putrāḥ svakasvakena parivāreṇa yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ,
K10divyav_u:1698: 030.020. tato bhagavānanekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasrairanugamyamāno yena candanamālaḥ prāsādas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1700: 030.022. sa janakāyo bhagavantamapaśyaṃś candanamālaṃ prāsādaṃ bhettumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1705: 030.024. tato bhagavatā tasyāḥ pariṣad āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10divyav_u:1716: 030.030. yadbhūyasā sā parṣad buddhaniṃnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthāpitā//
K10divyav_u:1717: 030.031. atha dārukarṇī stavakarṇī trapukarṇī ca praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ samudānīya āsanāni prajñāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayanti--samayo
K10divyav_u:1718: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālam <31>manyata iti/
K10divyav_u:1719: 031.001. tena khalu samayena kṛṣṇagautamakau nāgarājau mahāsamudre prativasataḥ/
K10divyav_u:1720: 031.001. tau saṃlakṣayatah--bhagavān sūrpārake nagare dharmaṃ deśayati/
K10divyav_u:1722: 031.002. tatastau pañcanāgaśataparivārau pañcanadīśatāni saṃjanya sūrpārakaṃ nagaraṃ saṃprasthitau/
K10divyav_u:1724: 031.004. bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--imau kṛṣṇagautamau nāgarājau yadi sūrpārakaṃ nagaramāgamiṣyataḥ,
K10divyav_u:1732: 031.008. atha bhagavān maudgalyāyanasahāyo yena kṛṣṇagautamakau nāgarājau tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:1734: 031.010. tau kathayatah--tādṛśena bhadanta prasādena vayamāgatā yanna śakyamasmābhiḥ kuntapipīlikasyāpi prāṇinaḥ pīḍāmutpādayituṃ prāgeva sūrpārakanagaranivāsino

K10divyav_u:2155: 039.020. anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ samatarpya saṃpravārya
