K10divyav_u:2401: 047.002. sa ca rūpayauvanaśrutamanuprāpto na mamāsti kaścit tulya ityatīva vikatthate/
K10divyav_u:2402: 047.003. bhagavāṃścānyatamasmin pradeśe purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ deśayati/
K10divyav_u:2403: 047.004. aśrauṣīdindro nāma brāhmaṇah--śramaṇo gautamaḥ śrughnāmanuprāpta iti/
K10divyav_u:2404: 047.005. tasyaitadabhavat--śramaṇo gautamaḥ śrūyate 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādika iti/
K10divyav_u:2406: 047.007. sa nirgato yāvat paśyati bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtamaśītyā
K10divyav_u:2409: 047.009. dṛṣṭvā ca punarasyaitadabhavat--kiṃ cāpi śramaṇo gautamo mamāntikādabhirūpataraḥ,
K10divyav_u:2418: 047.013. api tu na tvayā śrutaṃ sasurāsurajagadanavalokitamūrdhāno buddhā bhagavanta iti?
K10divyav_u:2419: api tu yadīpsasi tathāgatasya śarīrapramāṇaṃ draṣṭum,
K10divyav_u:2423: 047.015. indro brāhmaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--etadasyāścaryaṃ na kadācinmayā śrutam,
K10divyav_u:2431: 047.019. upasaṃkramya bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisārya ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:2432: 047.020. tato bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10divyav_u:2433: yathaindreṇa brāhmaṇena viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāapattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
K10divyav_u:2436: 047.023. eṣo 'haṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:2437: 047.023. upāsakaṃ ca māṃ dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatam/
K10divyav_u:2438: 047.024. abhiprasanno 'thendro brāhmaṇa utthāyāsanāt ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--yadi
K10divyav_u:2443: 047.028. anyairapi brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhiḥ kuśalamadhiṣṭhānāya bhavatviti viditvā kulā baddhā(?)/
K10divyav_u:2444: 047.029. indreṇa brāhmaṇena yaṣṭyā mahaḥ prajñapita iti indramaha indramaha iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā//
K10divyav_u:2449: 047.032. athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaih <48>samalaṃkṛtamaśītyā
K10divyav_u:2456: 048.003. tat ko 'sau upāyaḥ syāt yena me karmaparihāṇir na syānnāpi puṇyaparihāṇiriti/
K10divyav_u:2459: 048.006. tena yathāgṛhītayaiva pratodayaṣṭyā tatrasthenaivābhivādanaṃ kṛtam--abhivādaye buddhaṃ bhagavantamiti/
K10divyav_u:2463: evamanena dvābhyāṃ samyaksambuddhābhyāṃ vandanā kṛtā bhavet/
K10divyav_u:2466: 048.011. athāyuṣmānānando laghuladhveva caturguṇamuttarāsaṅgaṃ prajñapya bhagavantamidamavocat--niṣīdatu bhagavān prajñapta evāsane/
K10divyav_u:2467: 048.012. evamayaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo dvābhyāṃ samyaksambuddhābhyāṃ paribhukto bhaviṣyati,
K10divyav_u:2473: yaṃ bhagavān bhikṣūṇāṃ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasyāvikopitaṃ śarīrasaṃghātamupadarśayet/
K10divyav_u:2476: 048.017. dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavanto laukikaṃ cittamutpādayanti,
K10divyav_u:2477: tasmin samaye kuntapipīlikā api prāṇino bhagavataścetasā cittamājānanti/
K10divyav_u:2481: 048.021. tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--udgṛhṇīta bhikṣavo nimittam/
K10divyav_u:2484: 048.023. rājñā prasenajitā śrutaṃ bhagavatā śrāvakāṇāṃ darśanāyāvikopitaṃ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śarīrasaṃghātaṃ samucchritamiti/
K10divyav_u:2485: 048.024. śrutvā ca punaḥ kutūhalajātaḥ sahāntaḥpureṇa kumārairamātyairbhaṭabalāgrair naigamajānapadaiśca draṣṭuṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:2490: anekāni ca prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi kutūhalajātāni draṣṭuṃ saṃprasthitāni pūrvakaiśca kuśalamūlaiḥ saṃcodyamānāni/
K10divyav_u:2492: 048.027. taiḥ śrutam--anatarhito 'sau bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śarīrasaṃghāturavikopita iti/
K10divyav_u:2493: 048.029. śrutvā ca punasteṣāṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyamutpannam--vṛthā asmākamāgamanaṃ jātamiti/
K10divyav_u:2495: 048.030. evaṃ ca cetasā cittamabhisaṃskṛtam--asmānme padāvihārāt kiyat puṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti/
K10divyav_u:2496: 048.031. atha bhagavāṃstasya mahājanakāyasyāvipratisārasaṃjananārthaṃ tasya copāsakasya cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
K10divyav_u:2498: 049.003. yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacittaḥ padāvihāraṃ prakaroti vidvān//1//
K10divyav_u:2499: 049.005. anyatamena upāsakena tasmin pradeśe mṛttikāpiṇḍo dattaḥ/
K10divyav_u:2500: 049.005. evaṃ ca cittamabhisaṃskṛtam--padāvihārasya tāvadiyat puṇyamākhyātaṃ bhagavatā anyatra/
K10divyav_u:2503: 049.008. śataṃsahasrāṇi suvarṇaniṣkā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
K10divyav_u:2507: evaṃ ca cittamabhisaṃskṛtam--padāvihārasya mṛttikāpiṇḍasya ceyat puṇyamuktaṃ bhagavatā,
K10divyav_u:2508: asmākaṃ tu muktapuṣpāṇāṃ kiyat puṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti?
K10divyav_u:2509: atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
K10divyav_u:2510: 049.016. śataṃsahasrāṇi suvarṇaniṣkā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
K10divyav_u:2515: atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
K10divyav_u:2516: 049.023. śataṃsahasrāṇi suvarṇavāhā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
K10divyav_u:2517: 049.025. yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacitto mālāvihāraṃ prakaroti vidvān//4//
K10divyav_u:2521: atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
K10divyav_u:2523: 050.003. yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacittaḥ pradīpadānaṃ prakaroti vidvān//5//
K10divyav_u:2525: 050.005. evaṃ cetasā cittamabhisaṃskṛtam--pradīpasya bhagavatā iyat puṇyamuktam/
K10divyav_u:2527: atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
K10divyav_u:2528: 050.008. śataṃsahasrāṇi suvarṇarāśayo jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
K10divyav_u:2529: 050.010. yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacitto gandhābhiṣekaṃ prakaroti vidvān//6//
K10divyav_u:2531: 050.012. evaṃ ca ... cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
K10divyav_u:2538: 050.019. tato bhagavatā tasya mahājanakāyasya tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10divyav_u:2562: 051.002. atha bhagavān kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ carañ śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:2564: 051.003. aśrauṣīdanāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatih--bhagavān kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ carañ śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:2567: 051.005. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:2568: 051.006. ekāntaniṣaṇṇamanāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
K10divyav_u:2569: 051.007. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
K10divyav_u:2570: 051.008. anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatih utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ
K10divyav_u:2571: praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu me bhagavāñ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhuktena sārdhaṃ
K10divyav_u:2575: bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrānto
K10divyav_u:2577: 051.013. upasaṃkramya dauvārikaṃ puruṣamāmantrayate--na tāvadbhoḥ puruṣa tīrthyānāṃ praveśo dātavyo yāvad buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena bhuktaṃ
K10divyav_u:2580: 051.016. anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatistāmeva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīyaṃ
K10divyav_u:2581: kālyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayati--samayo bhadanta,
K10divyav_u:2582: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
K10divyav_u:2583: 051.018. atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapaterbhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:2585: 051.020. atha anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati/
K10divyav_u:2586: 051.022. anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya
K10divyav_u:2587: saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ
K10divyav_u:2600: anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā ājñā dattā--mā tāvat tīrthyānāṃ praveśaṃ dāsyasi,
K10divyav_u:2603: 051.031. athāyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ saṃlakṣayati--tasya me lābhāḥ sulabdhāḥ,
K10divyav_u:2604: yanmāṃ śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ śramaṇaśākyaputrīya<52> iti na jānante/
K10divyav_u:2605: 052.001. gacchāmi, kṛpaṇajanasyānugrahaṃ karomīti viditvā udyānaṃ gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:2606: 052.001. sa saṃlakṣayati--adya mayā kasyānugrahaḥ kartavya iti/
K10divyav_u:2607: 052.002. yāvadanyatamā nagarāvalambikā kuṣṭhābhidrutā sarujārtā pakvagātrā bhikṣāmaṭati/
K10divyav_u:2610: 052.004. tayā āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo dṛṣṭaḥ kāyaprāsādikaścittaprāsādikaḥ śāntena īryāpathena/
K10divyav_u:2611: 052.005. sā saṃlakṣayati--nūnaṃ mayā evaṃvidhe dakṣiṇīye kārā kṛtā,
K10divyav_u:2613: 052.005. yadi āryo mahākāśyapo mamāntikādanukampāmupādāya ācāmaṃ pratigṛhṇīyāt,
K10divyav_u:2615: 052.007. tata āyuṣmatā mahākāśyapena tasyāścetasā cittamājñāya pātramupanāmitam--yadi te bhagini parityaktam,
K10divyav_u:2621: 052.009. saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ cāpyāryeṇa mama cittānurakṣayā na cchoritaḥ,
K10divyav_u:2623: 052.010. athāyuṣmatā mahākāśyapena tasyāścetasā cittamājñāya tasyā eva pratyakṣamanyatamaṃ kuḍyamūlaṃ niśritya paribhuktam/
K10divyav_u:2624: 052.012. sa saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ cāpi āryeṇa mama cittānurakṣayā paribhuktam,
K10divyav_u:2628: 052.014. tasyā atīva audbilyamutpannam--mamāryeṇa mahākāśyapena piṇḍapātaḥ pratigṛhīta iti/
K10divyav_u:2629: 052.015. tata āyuṣmatī mahākāśyape cittamabhiprasādya kālaṃ gatā tuṣite devanikāye upapannā/
K10divyav_u:2630: 052.016. sā śakreṇa devendreṇa dṛṣṭā ācāmaṃ pratipādayantī cittamabhiprasādayantī kālaṃ ca kurvāṇā/
K10divyav_u:2633: tiryak ca pretaṃ ca manuṣyāṃścāturmahārājikān devāṃstrāyastriṃśān yāvanna paśyati/
K10divyav_u:2634: 052.019. tathā hyadhastāddevānāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate no tūpariṣṭāt/
K10divyav_u:2642: 052.027. atha śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhavat--ime ca tāvanmanuṣyāḥ puṇyāpuṇyānāmapratyakṣadarśino dānāni dadati,
K10divyav_u:2644: 052.028. ahaṃ pratyakṣadarśanena puṇyānāṃ svapuṇyaphale vyavasthitaḥ kasmāt dānāni na dadāmi,
K10divyav_u:2649: 052.031. avacīravicīrakaṃ kākābhilīnakaṃ nātiparamarūpaṃ kuvindaṃ cātmānamabhinimārya udūḍhaśiraskaḥ saṇaśāṭikānivāsitaḥ sphaṭitapāṇipādo vastraṃ
K10divyav_u:2650: 053.001. śacī api devakanyā kuvindanaryā veśadhāriṇī tasarikāṃ kartumārabdhā/
K10divyav_u:2651: 053.001. pārśve cāsyā divyā sudhā sajjīkṛtā tiṣṭhati/
K10divyav_u:2653: 053.003. duḥkhitako 'yamiti kṛtvā dvāre sthitena pātraṃ prasāditam/
K10divyav_u:2657: 053.007. suviruddhamiti kṛtvā jāto me hṛdi saṃśayaḥ//3// iti//
K10divyav_u:2658: 053.008. dharmatā hyeṣā--asamanvāhṛtya arhatāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ na pravartate/
K10divyav_u:2663: yasya te bhagavatā dīrgharātrānugato vicikitsākathaṃkathāśalyaḥ samūla ārūḍho yathāpi tattathāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena/
K10divyav_u:2665: ime tāvat manuṣyāḥ puṇyānāmapratyakṣadarśino dānāni dadati puṇyāni kurvanti/
K10divyav_u:2666: 053.012. ahaṃ pratyakṣadarśī eva puṇyānāṃ kathaṃ dānāni na dadāmi?
K10divyav_u:2670: 053.016. tataḥ prabhṛti āyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ samanvāhṛtya kulāni piṇḍapātaṃ praveṣṭumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:2671: 053.017. atha śakro devendra ākāśasthaścāyuṣmato mahākāśyapasya piṇḍapātaṃ carato divyayā sudhayā pātraṃ pūrayati/
K10divyav_u:2676: 053.021. sāmantakena śabdo visṛtah--amukayā nagarāvalambikayā āryo mahākāśyapa ācāmena pratipāditaḥ,
K10divyav_u:2677: sā ca tuṣite devanikāye upapannā iti/
K10divyav_u:2678: 053.022. rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena śrutam--amukayā nagarāvalambikayā āryo mahākāśyapa ācāmena pratipāditaḥ/
K10divyav_u:2681: 053.024. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:2682: 053.025. ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati,
K10divyav_u:2683: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
K10divyav_u:2684: 053.027. atha rājā prasenajit kauśala utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena
K10divyav_u:2688: 053.030. atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:2689: 053.031. atha rājā prasenajit kauśalastāmeva rātriṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ
K10divyav_u:2690: samudānīyaṃ kālyamevotthāya āsanāni <54>prajñāpya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato
K10divyav_u:2692: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
K10divyav_u:2693: 054.002. atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya bhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:2695: 054.004. atha rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati/
K10divyav_u:2696: 054.006. anyatamaśca kroḍamallako vṛddhānte cittamabhiprasādayaṃstiṣṭhati--ayaṃ rājā pratyakṣadarśīm eva puṇyānāṃ sve puṇyaphale pratiṣṭhāpito 'tṛpta eva puṇyairdānāni dadāti,
K10divyav_u:2698: 054.008. atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo 'nekaparyāyeṇa buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ
K10divyav_u:2699: śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ
K10divyav_u:2700: bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ
K10divyav_u:2704: kiṃ tava, āhosvidyena tavāntikāt prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasūtamiti?
K10divyav_u:2706: 054.013. ko 'nyo mamāntikāt prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyatīti viditvā kathayati--bhagavan yena mamāntikāt prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasūtaṃ tasya bhagavān nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādiśatu iti/
K10divyav_u:2707: 054.014. tato bhagavatā kroḍamallakasya nāṃnā dakṣiṇā ādiṣṭā/
K10divyav_u:2709: 054.015. tato 'nyadivase rājā kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitah--mama bhagavān piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṅkte,
K10divyav_u:2712: 054.017. te kathayanti--kimarthaṃ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthita iti?
K10divyav_u:2715: yatredānīṃ sa bhagavān mama piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṅkte,
K10divyav_u:2718: 054.020. vayaṃ tathā kariṣyāmo yathā śvo bhagavān devasyaiva nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādiśatīti/
K10divyav_u:2719: 054.021. taiḥ pauruṣeyāṇāmājñā dattā yataḥ śvo bhavadbhiḥ praṇīta āhāraḥ sajjīkartavyaḥ prabhūtaścaiva samudānayitavyo yathopārdhaṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pātre patati upārdhaṃ bhūmau iti/
K10divyav_u:2720: 054.023. amātyairaparasmin divase prabhūta āhāraḥ sajjīkṛtaḥ praṇītaśca/
K10divyav_u:2724: 054.025. tataḥ kroḍamallakāḥ pradhāvitāh--bhūmau nipatitaṃ gṛhṇīma iti/
K10divyav_u:2731: 054.027. tasya kroḍamallakasya cittavikṣepo jātah--na śakyaṃ tena tathā cittaṃ prasādayitum yathā pūrvam/
K10divyav_u:2732: 054.028. tato rājā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣuasaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā na mama nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādiśatīti viditvā dakṣiṇāmaśrutvaiva praviṣṭaḥ/
K10divyav_u:2733: 054.030. tato bhagavatā rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya nāṃnā dakṣiṇā ādiṣṭā--
K10divyav_u:2735: 054.032. paśyasi(?) phalaṃ hi rūṣkikāyā alavaṇikāyāḥ kulmāṣapiṇḍikāyāḥ//5//
K10divyav_u:2736: 055.001. <55>athāyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat--bahuśo bahuśo bhadanta bhagavatā rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya niveśane bhuktvā nāṃnā
K10divyav_u:2738: 055.003. bhagavānāha--icchasi tvamānanda rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasyālavaṇikāṃ kulmāṣapiṇḍakāmārabhya karmaplotiṃ śrotum?
K10divyav_u:2741: 055.005. ayaṃ bhagavān rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasyālavaṇikāṃ kulmāṣapiṇḍakāmārabhya karmaplotiṃ varṇayet,
K10divyav_u:2746: 055.008. sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
K10divyav_u:2747: 055.008. tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ/
K10divyav_u:2760: 055.013. tena tasya dārakasya mātā abhihitā--ayaṃ tava putraḥ kṣetraṃ rakṣatu,
K10divyav_u:2764: 055.015. sa tasya sukhaṃ bhaktakena yogodvahanaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:2766: 055.016. tasya dārakasya mātā saṃlakṣayati--adya gṛhapatipatnī suhṛtsambandhibāndhavāḥ saha śramaṇabrāhmaṇabhojanena vyagrā bhaviṣyati/
K10divyav_u:2767: 055.017. gacchāmi sānukālaṃ tasya dārakasya bhaktaṃ nayāmi iti/
K10divyav_u:2768: 055.018. sā sānukālaṃ gatvā gṛhapatipatnyā etamarthaṃ niveśayati/
K10divyav_u:2769: 055.018. sā ruṣitā kathayati--na tāvacchramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo dadāmi jñātīnāṃ vā,
K10divyav_u:2773: 055.020. tatastasya dārakasya mātā saṃlakṣayati--mā me putro bubhukṣitakaḥ sthāsyatīti/
K10divyav_u:2786: 055.026. asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prantaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
K10divyav_u:2789: 055.028. sa saṃlakṣayati--nūnaṃ mayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūte dakṣiṇīye kārā na kṛtā,
K10divyav_u:2793: 055.030. tato 'sau pratyekabuddhastasya daridrapuruṣasya cetasā cittamājñāya pātraṃ prasāritavān--bhadramukha,
K10divyav_u:2796: 055.032. tatastena tīvreṇa prasādena sā alavaṇikā kulmāṣapiṇḍakā tasmai pratyekabuddhāya pratipāditā//
K10divyav_u:2798: eṣa evāsau rājā prasenajit kauśalastena kālena tena samayena/
K10divyav_u:2800: tena karmaṇā ṣaṭkṛtvo deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kāritavān,
K10divyav_u:2802: tenaiva ca karmaṇā avaśeṣeṇa etarhi rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhnābhiṣiktaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
K10divyav_u:2805: 056.007. paśyasi phalaṃ hi rūkṣikāyā alavaṇikāyā kulmāṣapiṇḍakāyāḥ// iti/
K10divyav_u:2806: 056.008. sāmantakena śabdo visṛtah--bhagavatā rājñaḥ prasenajito 'lavaṇikāṃ kulmāṣapiṇḍakāmārabhya karmaplotirvyākṛtā iti/
K10divyav_u:2809: 056.010. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:2810: 056.010. ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdaraśyati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
K10divyav_u:2811: 056.012. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
K10divyav_u:2812: 056.012. atha rājā prasenajit kauśala utthāyāsanādekāṃsamutterāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā bhagavantamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu
K10divyav_u:2815: 056.015. adhivāsayati bhagavān rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya tūṣṇībhāvena/
K10divyav_u:2816: 056.015. tato rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena buddhamukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya traimāsyaṃ śatarasaṃ bhojanaṃ dattam/
K10divyav_u:2818: 056.017. tailasya ca kumbhakoṭiṃ samudānīya dīpamālā abhyudyato dātum/
K10divyav_u:2819: 056.018. tatra bhakte pūjāyāṃ ca mahān kolāhalo jātaḥ/
K10divyav_u:2824: 056.020. aparaiḥ samākhyātam--rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena buddhapramukho bhikṣuasṃghastraimāsyaṃ bhojitaḥ,
K10divyav_u:2826: tailasya kumbhakoṭiṃ ca samudānīya dīpamālā abhyudyato dātumiti/
K10divyav_u:2827: 056.022. tatastasyā nagarāvalambikāyā etadabhavat--ayaṃ tāvadrājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ puṇyairatṛpto 'dyāpi dānāni dadāti,
K10divyav_u:2829: 056.024. yannvahamapi kutaścit samudānīya bhagavataḥ pradīpaṃ dadyāmiti/
K10divyav_u:2830: 056.024. tayā khaṇḍamallake tailasya stokam yācayitvā pradīpaṃ prajvālya bhagavataścaṅkrame dattaḥ/
K10divyav_u:2831: 056.025. pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam--anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yathāyaṃ bhagavāñ śākyamunirvarṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma śāstā loka
K10divyav_u:2832: evamahamapi varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunireva śāstā bhaveyam/
K10divyav_u:2841: 056.031. dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatām--na tāvadupasthāyakāḥ pratisamlīyante na yāvadbuddhā bhagavantaḥ pratisamlīnā iti/
K10divyav_u:2842: 056.032. athāyuṣmānānandaḥ saṃlakṣayati--asthānamanavakāśo yadbuddhā bhagavanta āloke śayyāṃ kalpayanti/
K10divyav_u:2850: mama buddhirutpanā--asthānamanavakāśo yadbuddhā bhagavanta āloke śayyāṃ kalpayanti/
K10divyav_u:2858: te 'pi na śaknuyur nirvāpayituṃ prāgeva hastagataścīvarakarṇiko vyajanaṃ vā/
K10divyav_u:2859: 057.007. tathā hi--ayaṃ pradīpastayā dārikayā mahatā cittābhisaṃskāreṇa prajvalitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:2860: 057.008. api tu ānanda bhaviṣyatyasau dārikā varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:2873: 058.002. buddho bhavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme satkṛto
K10divyav_u:2874: gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrairdhanibhiḥ paurairbrāhmaṇairgṛhapatibhiḥ
K10divyav_u:2877: 058.005. tatra khalu varṣāvāsaṃ bhagavānupagto jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme/
K10divyav_u:2878: 058.006. atha tadaiva pravāraṇāyāṃ pratyupasthitāyāṃ saṃbahulāḥ śrtāvastīnivāsino vaṇijo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
K10divyav_u:2879: 058.007. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānto niṣaṇṇāh
K10divyav_u:2880: 058.008. ekāntaniṣaṇṇān saṃbahulāñ śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇijo bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
K10divyav_u:2881: 058.010. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
K10divyav_u:2883: 058.011. śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇijo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakāntāḥ,
K10divyav_u:2885: 058.012. upasaṃkramyāyuṣmata ānandasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
K10divyav_u:2886: 058.013. saṃbahulāñ śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇija āyuṣmānānando dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
K10divyav_u:2887: 058.015. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
K10divyav_u:2888: 058.016. atha te vaṇija utthāyāsanebhyah ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yenāyuṣmānānandastenānñjaliṃ
K10divyav_u:2889: praṇamya āyuṣmantamānandamidamavocan -- kiṃcitte āryānanda śrutaṃ varṣoṣito bhagavān
K10divyav_u:2892: dharmatā caiṣā ṣaṇmahānagaranivāsino vaṇijo yasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavanto gantukāmā bhavanti,
K10divyav_u:2894: 058.020. sa kathayati -- buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ kiṃ na pṛcchatha ?
K10divyav_u:2897: 058.021. mamāpi bhavanto durāsadā hi buddhā bhagavanto duṣprasahāḥ/
K10divyav_u:2899: 058.022. yadi bhadantānandasyāpi durāsadā buddhā bhagavanto duṣprasahāḥ,
K10divyav_u:2900: kathaṃ bhadantānando jānīte 'mukāṃ diśaṃ bhagavān gamiṣyatīti ?
K10divyav_u:2914: nāgnibhyaṃ nodakabhyaṃ na siṃhabhyaṃ na vyāghrabhyaṃ na dvīpitarakṣuparacakrabhyaṃ na caurabhayaṃ na gulmatarapaṇyātiyātrābhyaṃ na manuṣyāmanuṣyabhayam/
K10divyav_u:2915: 058.030. kālena ca kālaṃ divyāni rūpāṇi dṛśyante,
K10divyav_u:2921: 059.001. <059>atha saṃbahulāḥ śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇijah āyuṣmatah ānandasya bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya āyuṣmata ānandasya pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntāḥ/
K10divyav_u:2922: 059.003. dhartā khalu buddhā bhagavanto jīvanto dhriyanto yāpayanto mahākaruṇayā saṃcodyamānāḥ parānugrahapravṛttāḥ kālena kālamaraṇyacārikāṃ
K10divyav_u:2923: nadīcārikāṃ parvatacārikāṃ śmaśānacārikāṃ janapada cārikāṃ caranti/
K10divyav_u:2924: 059.005. asmiṃstvarthe buddho bhagavān magadheṣu janapadacārikāṃ cartukāmastadeva pravāraṇāṃ pravārayitvā āyuṣmantamānadāmāmantrayate sma -- gaccha ānanda,
K10divyav_u:2925: bhikṣūṇāmārocaya itaḥ saptame divase tathāgato magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cāriṣyati/
K10divyav_u:2926: 059.007. yo yuṣmākam utsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ janapadacārikāṃ cartum,
K10divyav_u:2928: 059.008. evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣūṇāmārocayati -- bhagavānāyuṣyanta itaḥ saptame divase magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cariṣyati/
K10divyav_u:2929: 059.009. yo yuṣmākamutsahate bhagavatā sārdhaṃ magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cartum,
K10divyav_u:2931: 059.011. atha bhagavān bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtaḥ saṃbahulaiśca śrāvastīnivāsibhirvaṇigbrāhmaṇagṛhapatibhiḥ sārdhaṃ magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ//
K10divyav_u:2932: 059.013. atha saṃbahulāśca śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇijo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
K10divyav_u:2933: 059.013. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantamidamavocan -- adhivāsayatvasmākaṃ bhagavān yāvacca śrāvastī yāvacca rājagṛham,
K10divyav_u:2935: 059.016. adhivāsayati bhagavān saṃbahulānāṃ śrāvastīnivāsināṃ vaṇijāṃ tūṣṇībhāvena/
K10divyav_u:2936: 059.017. atha saṃbahulāḥ śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇijo bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntāḥ//
K10divyav_u:2937: 059.019. atha saṃprasthite buddhe bhagavati antarā ca śrāvastīmantarā ca rājagṛham,
K10divyav_u:2940: 059.021. dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ parasparaṃ kathayanti -- gaccatu bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ/
K10divyav_u:2942: 059.022. ityanuvicintya sarve javena prasṛtā yena sārthaḥ/
K10divyav_u:2944: caurāḥ kathayanti -- vayaṃ smo bhadanta caurā aṭavīcarāḥ/
K10divyav_u:2945: 059.023. nāsamākaṃ kṛṣir na vāṇijyā na gaurakṣyam/
K10divyav_u:2950: 059.025. api tu sakalasya sārthasya parigaṇayya suvarṇaṃ gṛhṇīdhvam/
K10divyav_u:2952: 059.026. asmin sārthe ye upāsakā viṇijastaiḥ kṛtsnasya sārthasya mūlyaṃ gaṇayya caurāṇāṃ niveditam iyanti śatāni sahasrāṇi ceti/
K10divyav_u:2953: 059.028. tatasteṣāṃ caurāṇāṃ sārthaniṣkrayārthaṃ bhagavatā nidhānaṃ darśitam/
K10divyav_u:2958: 059.031. punarapi bhagavān sārthaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃgha puraskṛto rājagṛhāt śrāvastīṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:2960: 060.001. <60>evaṃ dvitricatuṣpanñcaṣaḍvārāṃśca cairasahasrasakāśādāgamanagamanena sārthaḥ paritrāto mūlyaṃ cānupradattam/
K10divyav_u:2961: 060.002. saptaṃ tu cāraṃ bhagavān sārtharahito bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtaḥ śāvastyā rājagṛhaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:2963: 060.003. dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ parasparaṃ saṃlapanti -- bhagavān gacchatu,
K10divyav_u:2970: 060.006. caurāḥ kathayanti -- jānāsyeva bhagavān -- vayaṃ caurā aṭavīcarāḥ/
K10divyav_u:2971: 060.007. nāsmākaṃ kṛṣir na vaṇijyā na gaurakṣyam/
K10divyav_u:2978: 060.010. atha bhagavāṃstaccaurasahasram yāvadāptaṃ dhanena saṃtarpayitvā tato 'nupūrveṇa rājagṛhamanuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:2979: 060.011. tatasteṣāṃ caurāṇāṃ buddhirutpannā -- yā kācidasmākaṃ śrīsaubhāgyasampat,
K10divyav_u:2981: 060.012. yannu vayaṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghamasmin pradeśe bhojayema iti/
K10divyav_u:2990: daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣtānāṃ trīrātrestrirdivasasya ṣaṭkṛtvo rātriṃdivasena buddhacakṣuṣā lokam
K10divyav_u:3001: kamahamapāyād vyutthāpya svarge mokṣaphale ca pratiṣṭhāpayāmi,
K10divyav_u:3008: 060.029. yathā hi mātā priyamekaputrakaṃ hyavekṣate rakṣati cāsya jīvitam/
K10divyav_u:3009: 060.031. tathaiva vaineyajanaṃ tathagato hyavekṣate rakṣati cāsya saṃtatim//2//
K10divyav_u:3011: 061.003. vaineyavatsān bhavaduḥkhanaṣṭān vatsān praṇaṣṭaniva vatsalā gauḥ//3//
K10divyav_u:3012: 061.005. tato bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ caurāṇāṃ vaineyakālamapekṣya rājagṛhādanupūrveṇa bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto
K10divyav_u:3014: mukto muktaparivāra āśvasta āśvastaparivāraḥ pūrvavat yāvanmahākaruṇayā samanvāgatas
K10divyav_u:3018: 061.009. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya bhagavantamidamavodcan -- adhivāsayatu asmākaṃ bhagavāñ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena/
K10divyav_u:3020: 061.011. atha caurasahasraṃ bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato'ntikān prakrāntam//
K10divyav_u:3021: 061.013. atha taccaurasahasraṃ tāmeva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñnapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya,
K10divyav_u:3023: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyase/
K10divyav_u:3024: 061.015. atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena tasya caurasahasrasya bhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3025: 061.017. atha taccaurasahasraṃ buddhapramukhasya bhikṣusaṃghasya candanodakena pādau prakṣālayāmāsa/
K10divyav_u:3026: 061.018. atha bhagavān prakṣālitapāṇipādaḥ purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñnapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3027: 061.019. niṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena
K10divyav_u:3028: svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ
K10divyav_u:3030: 061.019. atha bhagavatā teṣāmāśayānuśayaṃ viditvā dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñnātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10divyav_u:3031: yāṃ śrutvā tena caurasahasreṇa tasminnevāsane niṣaṇṇena viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñnānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
K10divyav_u:3032: 061.024. dṛṣṭasatyāśca kathayanti -- idamasmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā
K10divyav_u:3033: kṛtaṃ na rājñnā na devatābhir na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair neṣṭair na svajanabandhuvargeṇa
K10divyav_u:3041: 061.027. labhema vayaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
K10divyav_u:3043: 061.028. tato bhagavatā brahmeṇa svareṇābhihitāh -- eta vatsāḥ,
K10divyav_u:3048: 061.031. sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyā abhivādyāśca saṃvṛttāḥ//
K10divyav_u:3050: -- paśya bhadanta bhagavatā idaṃ caurasahasraṃ saptavāraṃ dhanena saṃtarpayitvā atyantaniṣṭhe
K10divyav_u:3053: yathā atīte 'pyadhvani mayā asyaiva caurasahasrasya sakāśādanekabhāṇḍasahasraḥ sārtho niṣkrītaḥ,
K10divyav_u:3056: duradhigamāṃ badaradvīpayātrāṃ varṣaśatena sādhayitvā etadeva caurasahasramārabhya
K10divyav_u:3059: 062.007. tacchruṇuta -- bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminneva jambudvīpe vārāṇasyāṃ
K10divyav_u:3060: nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati sma ṛddhaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ
K10divyav_u:3063: 062.010. tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ priyaseno nāma sārthavāhaḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
K10divyav_u:3065: 062.012. sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍate ramate paricārayati/
K10divyav_u:3066: 062.013. atha anyatama udārapuṇyamaheśākhyaḥ sattvo 'nyatamasmāt praṇītāddevanikāyāccayutvā tasyāḥ prajāpatyāḥ kukṣimavakrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3078: 062.018. sā āttamanāḥ svāmina ārocayati -- diṣṭyā āryaputra vardhasva,
K10divyav_u:3080: 062.019. yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati,
K10divyav_u:3082: 062.020. so 'pyāttamanāttamanā udānamudānayati -- apyevāhaṃ cirakālābhilaṣitaṃ putramukhaṃ paśyeyam/
K10divyav_u:3088: 062.022. asmākaṃ cāpyatītakālagatānāmuddiśya dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādiśet -- idaṃ tayoryatratatropapannayorgacchatoranugacchatviti/
K10divyav_u:3090: uṣṇa uṣṇopakaraṇaiḥ śīte śītopakaraṇairvaidyaprajñnaptairāhārair nātiśītair nātyuṣṇair
K10divyav_u:3094: 062.028. sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
K10divyav_u:3095: 062.029. dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūstuṅganāso dṛḍhakaṭhinaśarīro
K10divyav_u:3096: 062.031. tasya jñnātayaḥ saṃgamya samāgamya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatirātriṃdivasāni tasya jātasya jāto mahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti -- kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāma?
K10divyav_u:3099: 063.001. supriyo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhya upanyasto dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāmaṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ
K10divyav_u:3100: 063.003. so 'ṣṭābhirdhātrībhurunnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍena anyaiṣcottaptottapairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
K10divyav_u:3104: 063.006. nikṣepe hastiparīkṣāyāmaśvaparīkṣāyāṃ ratnaparīkṣāyāṃ dāruparīkṣāyāṃ vastraparīkṣāyāṃ puruṣaparīkṣāyāṃ strīparīkṣāyām/
K10divyav_u:3106: sarvabhūtarutajñnaḥ sarvagatigatijñnah uddhaṭṭako vācakaḥ paṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ paramatīkṣṇaniśitabuddhiḥ
K10divyav_u:3108: 063.009. sa yāni tāni rājñnāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhnābhiṣiktānāṃ janapadaiśvaryasthāmavīryamanuprāptānāṃ
K10divyav_u:3110: tadyathā hastigrīvāyām aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe tsarudhanuḥṣu upayāne niryāṇe 'ṅkuśagrahe
K10divyav_u:3111: tomaragrahe chedye bhedye muṣṭibandhe padabandhe dūravedhe śabdavedhe'kṣuṇṇavedhe
K10divyav_u:3114: 063.013. dharmatā caiṣā -- na tāvat putrasya nāma nirgacchati yāvat pitā dhriyate/
K10divyav_u:3120: 063.018. kālagate priyasene sārthavāhe brahmadattena kāśirājñnā supriyo mahāsārthavāhatve 'bhiṣiktaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3121: 063.019. tena sārthavāhabhūtena iyamevamrūpā mahāpratijñnā kṛtā -- sarvattvā mayā dhanena saṃtarpayitavyāḥ/
K10divyav_u:3124: 063.021. atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ saṃlakṣayati -- alpaṃ ca deyaṃ bahavaśca yācakāḥ/
K10divyav_u:3126: 063.022. yannvahaṃ sāmudram yānapātraṃ samudānīya mahāsamudramavatareyaṃ dhanahārikaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3127: 063.023. tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ sāmudrayānapātraṃ samudānīya pañcamātrairvaṇikśataiḥ sārdhaṃ mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3128: 063.024. tato 'nupūrveṇa ratnadvīpaṃ gatvā ratnasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā svastikṣemābhyāṃ mahāsamudrāduttīrya sthalajairvahitrairbhāṇḍamāropya vārāṇasyabhimukhaḥ
K10divyav_u:3135: 063.028. sārthavāhaḥ kathayati mamaiṣa bhavantaḥ sārthaḥ saṃniśritaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3137: evamuktāścaurāḥ kathayanti -- vayaṃ smaḥ sārthavāhacaurā aṭavīcarāḥ/
K10divyav_u:3138: 063.030. nāsmākaṃ kṛṣir na vāṇijyā na gaurakṣyam/
K10divyav_u:3140: 063.031. teṣāṃ supriyaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- sārthasya mūlyaṃ bhavanto gaṇyatām/
K10divyav_u:3142: 063.032. tataste vaṇijaḥ parasparaṃ mūlyaṃ gaṇayitvā caurāṇāṃ nivedayanti<64> -- iyanti śatāni sahasrāṇi ceti/
K10divyav_u:3143: 064.001. tataḥ supriyeṇa sārthavāhena bhāṇḍaniṣkrayārthe svaṃ dravyamanupradattam/
K10divyav_u:3145: 064.002. evaṃ dvistriścatuḥpanñcaṣaḍvārāṃs tasyaiva caurasahasrasya sakāśāt supriyeṇa sārthavāhena sārthaḥ paritrāto mūlyaṃ cānupradattam/
K10divyav_u:3146: 064.003. yāvat saptaṃ tu vāraṃ supriyaḥ sārthavāho mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3149: 064.006. supriyeṇa ca sārthavāhenāvalokyābhihitāh -- supriyo 'haṃ bhavantaḥ sārthavāhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3150: 064.006. caurāḥ kathayanti -- jānāsyeva mahāsārthavāha vayaṃ caurā aṭavīcarāḥ/
K10divyav_u:3151: 064.007. nāsmākaṃ kṛṣir na vāṇijyaṃ na gaurakṣyam/
K10divyav_u:3153: 064.008. tataḥ supriyeṇa sārthavāhena pūrvikāṃ pratijñnāmanusmṛtya dṛḍhapratijñnena tasya caurasahasrasya bhāṇḍamanupradattam/
K10divyav_u:3154: 064.009. supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ saṃlakṣayati -- ime caurā labdhaṃ labdhamarthajātasaṃnicayaṃ kurvanti/
K10divyav_u:3155: 064.010. mayā ca mahatī pratijñnā kṛtā sarvasattvā dhanena mayā saṃtarpayitavyā iti/
K10divyav_u:3156: 064.011. so 'hamimaṃ caurasahasraṃ na śaknomi dhanena saṃtarpayitum/
K10divyav_u:3157: 064.011. kathaṃ punaḥ sarvasattvān dhanena saṃtarpayiṣyāmīti cintāparo middhamavakrāntaḥ//
K10divyav_u:3159: lokahitārthamabhyudgatasya anyatarā maheśākhyā devatā upasaṃkramya samāśvāsayati
K10divyav_u:3162: 064.015. asti khalu mahāsārthavāha asminneva jambudvīpe badaradvīpo nāma mahāpattano 'manuṣyāvacarito maheśākhyamanuṣyādhiṣṭhitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3163: 064.016. santi tasmin badaradvīpe pradhānāni ratnāni sarvasattvavicitramanorathaparipūrakāṇi/
K10divyav_u:3169: 064.019. na ca śakitā supriyeṇa mahāsārthavāhena sā devatā praṣṭum -- katarasyāṃ diśi badaradvīipaḥ kathaṃ vā tatra gamyata iti/
K10divyav_u:3170: 064.021. atha supriyasya sātrthavāhasya suptapratibuddhasya etadabhavat -- aho bata me sā devatā punarapi darśayet,
K10divyav_u:3171: diśaṃ copāyaṃ ca vyapadiśed badaradvīpamahāpattanasya gamanāyeti cintāparo middhamavakrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3172: 064.023. atha sā devatā tasya mahātmana udārapuṇyamaheśākhyasya dṛḍhodārapratijñnasyodāravīryaparākramanāmanikṣiptotsāhatāṃ
K10divyav_u:3173: viditvā upasaṃkramya evamāha -- mā tvaṃ sārthavāha khedamāpadyasva /
K10divyav_u:3174: 064.025. asti khalu mahāsārthavāha paścime digbhāge panñcāntaradvīpaśatāni samatikramya sapta mahāparvatāḥ,
K10divyav_u:3177: śaṅkhanābhī ca nīlodastārakākṣaśca parvatau nīlagrīva eva ca vairambhā tāmrāṭavī
K10divyav_u:3178: vemṇugulmaḥ sapta parvatāḥ sakaṇṭakāḥ kṣāranadī triśaṅkuh ayaskilamaṣṭādaśavakro
K10divyav_u:3179: nadīślakṣṇa eva ca dhūmanetramudakaṃ saptaśīviṣaparvatā nadī bhavati paścimā /
K10divyav_u:3181: 064.030. anulomapratilome mahāsamudre manuṣyānavacarite anulomapratilomā vāyavo vānti/
K10divyav_u:3182: 064.031. tatra yo 'sau puruṣo bhavati maheśākhyo maheśākhyadevatāparigṛhītaḥ,
K10divyav_u:3183: sa mahatā puṇyabalena vīryabalena cittabalena mahāntaṃ plavamāsthāya anulomapratilomamahāsamudramavatarati<65>/
K10divyav_u:3191: 065.003. anulomapratilomaṃ mahāsamudraṃ samatikramya anulomapratilomo nāma parvataḥ/
K10divyav_u:3194: 065.005. sa vīryabalenātmānaṃ saṃdhārya tasmādeva mahāparvatādamoghāṃ nāmauṣadhīṃ
K10divyav_u:3195: samanviṣya gṛhītvā netre anñjayitvā śirasi baddhvā samālabhya anulomapratilomaṃ nāma
K10divyav_u:3200: 065.008. sacedevaṃ vidhiṃ vā nānutiṣṭhati auṣadhīṃ vā na labhate,
K10divyav_u:3205: 065.010. anulomapratilomaṃ mahāparvataṃ samatikramya āvarto nāma mahāsamudraḥ/
K10divyav_u:3206: 065.011. tatra vairambhakā vāyavo vānti yaistadudakaṃ bhrāmyate/
K10divyav_u:3208: sa mahatā puṇyabalena vīryabalena cittabalena kāyabalena mahāntaṃ plavamāsthāya āvartaṃ mahāsamudramavarati/
K10divyav_u:3212: 065.015. evaṃ dvitīye tṛtīye caturthe panñcame ṣaṣṭhe āvarte saptakṛtvo bhrāmayitvā nirudhyate,
K10divyav_u:3216: 065.018. tatra śaṅkho nāma rākṣasaḥ prativasati raudraḥ paraprāṇaharo mahābalo mahākāyaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3217: 065.019. tasyopariṣṭādyojanamātre śaṅkhanābhī nāmauṣadhī divā dhūmāyate rātrau prajvalati/
K10divyav_u:3219: 065.020. sa khalu nāgo divā svapiti rātrau carati/
K10divyav_u:3220: 065.020. tatra tena puruṣeṇa divā sukhasuptasya nāgasya ātmānaṃ samanurakṣatā nāgaśarīramaviheṭhayatā auṣadhibalena mantrabalena puṇyabalena śaṅkhanābhī auṣadhī grahītavyā/
K10divyav_u:3221: 065.022. gṛhītvā netre anñjayitvā śirasi baddhvā samālabhya āvartaḥ parvato 'dhiroḍhavyaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3230: 065.026. nīlode mahāsamudre tārākṣo nāma rākṣasaḥ prativasati raktanetraḥ pradīptaśiroruho vikṛtacaraṇadaśananayanaḥ parvatāyatakukṣiḥ/
K10divyav_u:3234: 065.028. audārikāścāsya āśvāsapraśvāsā gurugurukāḥ pravartante yathā meghasya garjato 'śanyāṃ ca sphūrjatyāṃ śabdaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3237: 065.030. tatra tena puruṣeṇa tasmādeva samudrakūlānmahāmakarināmauṣadhīṃ samanviṣya
K10divyav_u:3238: gṛhya netre anñjayitvā śirasi baddhvā samālabhya mahānataṃ plavamāsthāya suptaṃ tārākṣaṃ
K10divyav_u:3244: tamenaṃ tārākṣo dakarākṣasa ojaṃ vā ghaṭṭayati,
K10divyav_u:3247: 066.003. nīlodaṃ mahāsamudraṃ samatikramya nīlodo nāma mahāparvataḥ/
K10divyav_u:3248: 066.003. tatra nīlagrīvo nāma rākṣasaḥ prativasati panñcaśataparivāra ugratejā raudraḥ paraprāṇaharaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3254: 066.007. sa khalu nāgo dṛṣṭiviṣo 'pi śvāsaviṣo 'pi sparśaviṣo 'pi daṃṣṭrāviṣo 'pi/
K10divyav_u:3257: 066.008. yaḥ khalu tena dhūmena mṛgo vā pakṣī vā spṛśyate,
K10divyav_u:3259: 066.009. tatra tena puruṣeṇa śiraḥsnātenopoṣitena maitrāyatā karuṇāyatā avyāpannena cittenātmānaṃ samanurakṣatā nāgaśarīramaviheṭhayatā auṣadhī
K10divyav_u:3260: 066.010. netre anñjayitvā śirasi baddhvā samālabhya anena vidhinā jānatānuṣṭhitena nīlodaḥ parvato 'bhiroḍhavyaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3268: 066.014. nīlodaṃ parvataṃ samatikramya vairambho nāma mahāsamudraḥ/
K10divyav_u:3269: 066.014. vairambhe mahāsamudre vairambhā nāma vāyavo vānti yaistadudakaṃ kṣobhyate,
K10divyav_u:3271: 066.016. tamutsṛjya uttareṇa vairambhasya mahāsamudrasya mahatī tāmrāṭavī anekayojanāyāmavistārā/
K10divyav_u:3273: 066.018. tatra tāmrākṣo nāma ajagaraḥ prativasati raudraḥ paraprāṇaharaḥ paramadurgandhaḥ panñcayojanāyāmaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3276: tadā asya yojanaṃ sāmantakena lālāsya spharitvā/
K10divyav_u:3284: 066.022. tāṃ gṛhītvā netre anñjayitvā śirasi baddhvā samālabhya suptaṃ tāmrākṣamajagaraṃ viditvā auṣadhībalena mantrabalena vā ajagarabhavanasamīpena
K10divyav_u:3286: svastikṣemābhyāmatikramya aviheṭhitastāmrākṣeṇājagareṇa tataḥ paścānmūlaphalāni bhakṣayatā gantavyam/
K10divyav_u:3288: 066.026. tatra tena puruṣeṇa tāmrapaṭṭaiḥ pādau baddhvā tān parvatān vīryabalena laṅghayitvā sapta kṣāranadyaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3290: 066.027. tataḥ śālmalīphalakaiḥ plavaṃ baddhvā abhiruhyātikramitavyā aspṛśatā pānīyam/
K10divyav_u:3293: 066.028. sapta kṣāranadīḥ samatikramya triśaṅkur nāma parvataḥ/
K10divyav_u:3294: 066.029. triśaṅkau parvate triśaṅkavo nāma kaṇṭakāstīkṣṇāḥ sutīkṣṇāḥ/
K10divyav_u:3295: 066.030. tatastena puruṣeṇa tāmrapaṭṭairvetrapāśaiḥ pādau baddhvā atikaramitavyam/
K10divyav_u:3298: 066.031. tatra tena puruṣeṇa śālmalīphalakaiḥ plavaṃ baddhvā atikramitavyamaspṛśatā pānīyam/
K10divyav_u:3306: 067.003. asya na kiṃcit nistaraṇamanyatra vṛkṣāgrād vṛkṣamadhiruhya gantavyam/
K10divyav_u:3307: 067.004. aṣṭādaśavakraṃ parvatamatikramya aṣṭādaśavakrikā nāma nādī grāhamakarākulā saṃvṛtā ca/
K10divyav_u:3315: 067.007. ślakṣṇaṃ parvatamatikramya ślakṣṇā nāma nadī grāhamakarākulā/
K10divyav_u:3320: 067.009. ślakṣṇāṃ nadīmatikramya dhūmanetro nāma parvato dhūmāyate saṃdhūmāyate/
K10divyav_u:3321: 067.010. yena khalu tena dhūmena mṛgā vā pakṣiṇo vā spṛśyante,
K10divyav_u:3325: 067.012. guhāṃ samanviṣya tenātra guhādvāramauṣadhibalena mantrabalena ca moktavyam /
K10divyav_u:3326: 067.012. sā ca khalu guhā āśīviṣaparipūrṇā tiṣṭhati/
K10divyav_u:3332: 067.015. tasyāṃ guhāyāṃ saṃjīvanī nāmauṣadhī jyotīrasaśca maṇirdīpaprabhāsaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3333: 067.016. tāmauṣadhīṃ gṛhītvā saśīrṣapādaṃ samālabhya tāṃ cauṣadhīṃ gṛhītvā guhā praveṣṭavyā/
K10divyav_u:3334: 067.016. auṣadhībalena mantrabalena auṣadhīprabhāvāccāśīviṣāḥ kāye na kramiṣyanti/
K10divyav_u:3342: 067.021. tataḥ śālmalīphalakaiḥ plavaṃ baddhvā māṃsapeśyā ātmānamācchādya adhiroḍhavyam/
K10divyav_u:3343: 067.022. tatastā āśīviṣā māṃsagandhena pārāt pāraṃ gamiṣyanti/
K10divyav_u:3346: 067.023. so 'dhiroḍhavyas tatra drakṣyasi mahāntaṃ sauvarṇabhūmiṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ puṣpaphalacchāyāvṛkṣopaśobhitam/
K10divyav_u:3347: 067.024. rohitakāñ janapadān ṛddhāṃśca kṣemāṃśca subhikṣāṃśca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṃśca/
K10divyav_u:3348: 067.025. rohitakaṃ ca mahānagaraṃ dvādaśayojanāyāmaṃ saptayojanavistṛtaṃ saptaprākāraparikṣiptaṃ
K10divyav_u:3350: 067.027. vīṇā vallikā mahatī sughoṣakaiḥ śrotrābhirāmaiśca gītadhvanibhiranuparataprayogaṃ
K10divyav_u:3353: 067.030. yatra maghaḥ sārthavāhaḥ prativasati abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paṇḍito
K10divyav_u:3354: vyakto medhāvī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito
K10divyav_u:3361: 068.002. evaṃ mahāsārthavāha paramaduṣkarakāraka imāṃ sumerumalayamandarasadṛśīṃ dṛḍhāṃ pratijñnāṃ nistariṣyasi/
K10divyav_u:3365: 068.005. atha supriyaḥ sārthavāhaḥ suptapratibuddho devatāvacanaṃ śrutvā paramavismayamāpannaścintayati
K10divyav_u:3382: 068.012. kasmādahaṃ na sādhayiṣyāmītyanuvicintya supriyo mahāsārthavāho dṛḍhapratijñno dṛḍhavīryaparākramo 'nikṣiptotsāha udārapuṇyavipākamaheśākhyo/
K10divyav_u:3384: samanusmṛtya mahatā vīryabalena ekākī advitīyavyavasāyo yathopadiṣṭāni panñcāntaradvīpaśatāni samatikrāmati /
K10divyav_u:3386: sapta mahānadyo vistareṇa sarvāṇi saṃkaṭāni yathoktena vidhinā mūlakandaphalāhāro guṇavati phalake baddhvā paripūrṇairdvādaśabhirvarṣai rohitakaṃ
K10divyav_u:3387: 068.018. udyāne sthitvā anyatamaṃ puruṣamāmantrayate -- kaścidbhoḥ puruṣa asmin rohitake mahānagare magho nāma sārthavāhaḥ prarivasati?
K10divyav_u:3391: 068.020. atha supriyasya mahāsārthavāhasyaitadabhavat -- mā haiva magho mahāsārthavāho 'dṛṣṭa eva kālaṃ kuryāt/
K10divyav_u:3392: 068.021. ko me vyapadeśaṃ kariṣyati tasya badaradvīpamahāpattanasya gamanāyeti viditvā tvaritatvaritam yena maghasya sārthavāhasya niveśanaṃ
K10divyav_u:3395: 068.024. dharmatā khalu kuśalā bodhisattvāsteṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu/
K10divyav_u:3398: sārthavāhaḥ ṣaḍbhirmāsaiḥ kālaṃ kariṣyatīti viditvā supriyo mahāsārtahvāho 'dhītya
K10divyav_u:3405: 068.029. dākṣyadākṣiṇyacāturyamādhuryopetamupasthānakarmaṇi satputra iva pitaraṃ bhaktyā gauraveṇa śuśrūṣate/
K10divyav_u:3406: 068.030. tato maghasya sārthavāhasya kṣemaṇīyataraṃ cābhūdyāpanīyataraṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:3408: 068.031. atha magho mahāsārthavāhaḥ pratilabdhasaṃjñnaḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhamidamavocat
K10divyav_u:3409: -- kuto bhavāñ jñnānavijñnānasampanno 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paṇḍito vyakto
K10divyav_u:3415: evamūktaḥ supriyaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- sādhu sādhu mahāsārthavāha/
K10divyav_u:3417: 069.004. atha supriyo mahāsārthavāho maghāya sārthavāhāya jātikulagotrāgamanaprayojanaṃ vistareṇārocayati sma,
K10divyav_u:3418: paraṃ cainaṃ vijñnāpayati -- sārvāhānubhāvādahaṃ badaradvīpamahāpattanaṃ paśyeyam/
K10divyav_u:3420: 069.007. atha magho mahāsārthavāhaḥ supriyasya mahāsārthavāhasyāśrutapūrvāṃ parahitārthamabhyudyatāṃ
K10divyav_u:3421: dṛḍhapratijñnāṃ śrutvā paramavismayajāto 'nimiṣadṛṣṭiḥ suciraṃ nirīkṣya supriyaṃ
K10divyav_u:3424: yo nāma bhavāñ jambudvīpādamanuṣyāvacaritaṃ parvatasamudranadyottaraṇaṃ kṛtvā ihāgataḥ,
K10divyav_u:3427: 069.011. devaṃ tadbhavantaṃ paśyāmi devānyatamaṃ vā manuṣyaveṣadhāriṇam/
K10divyav_u:3429: 069.012. api tu ahaṃ mahāvyādhinā grasto mumūrṣuḥ/
K10divyav_u:3431: 069.013. api tu ko bhavato 'rthe parahitārthe 'bhyudyatasyātmaparityāgamapi na kuryāt?
K10divyav_u:3432: tena hi vatsa kṣipraṃ maṅgalapotaṃ samudānaya,
K10divyav_u:3435: 069.014. evaṃ sārthavāheti supriyo mahāsārthavāho maghāya mahāsārthavāhāya pratiśrutya maṅgalapotaṃ samudānīya saṃvaraṃ cāropya yena magho mahāsārthavāhastenaopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3436: 069.016. upasaṃkramya maghaṃ sārthavāhamidamavocat -- deva samudānīto maṅgalapotaḥ,
K10divyav_u:3440: sabhṛtyavargeṇa ca rohitakarājñnā ca nivāryamāṇo 'pi guṇavati phalake baddhvā āśu
K10divyav_u:3442: 069.020. atha magho mahāsārthavāhaḥ supriyasya mahāsārthavāhasya kathayati -- ahaṃ bāḍhaglāno na śakyāmi sthiyo gantum/
K10divyav_u:3444: 069.022. api tu asmin mahāsamudre yāvadevaṃvidhāni nimittāni bhavanti udakasya varṇasaṃsthānāni ca mama nivedayitavyāni/
K10divyav_u:3445: 069.023. yathā anekāni yojanaśatāni gatvā adrākṣīt supriyo mahāsārthavāha ekapāṇḍaraṃ pānīyam/
K10divyav_u:3446: 069.024. dṛṣṭvā punarmaghāya sārthavahāyārocayati -- yatkhalu mahāsārthavāha jānīyāḥ,
K10divyav_u:3448: 069.025. evamukte maghaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- naitanmahāsārthavāha ekapāṇḍaraṃ pānīyam/
K10divyav_u:3449: 069.026. api tu paśyasi tvaṃ dakṣiṇakena mahatsudhāparvatam yadidaṃ tasyaitadanubhāvena pānīyaṃ ranñjitam/
K10divyav_u:3454: 069.029. punarapi gacchan paśyati supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ śastravarṇaṃ pānīyam/
K10divyav_u:3455: 069.030. dṛṣṭvā ca punarmaghāya sārthavāhāyārocayati -- yat khalu mahāsārthavāha jānīyāh -- śastravarṇaṃ pānīyaṃ dṛśyate/
K10divyav_u:3463: 070.003. evaṃ lohaparvatāstāmraparvatā rūpyaparvatāḥ suvarṇaparvatāḥ sphaṭikaparvatā vaidūryaparvatāḥ/
K10divyav_u:3466: 070.005. dṛṣṭvā ca punarmaghāya sārthavāhāyārocayati -- yatkhalu mahāsārthavāha jānīyāh -- nīlapītalohitāvadātaṃ pānīyaṃ dṛśyate,
K10divyav_u:3468: 070.007. evemukte magho mahāsārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- naitanmahāsārthavāha nīlapītalohitāvadātaṃ pānīyam,
K10divyav_u:3478: 070.012. api tu mahāsārthavāha iyantyevāhaṃ badaradvīpamahāpattanasya daśa nimittāni jāne gamanaṃ prati,
K10divyav_u:3480: 070.013. evamukte supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- kadā badaradvīpamahāpattanasya gamanāyānto bhaviṣyati?
K10divyav_u:3481: evamukte maghaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- mayāpi supriya badaradvīpamahāpattanaṃ kārtsyena na dṛṣṭam/
K10divyav_u:3482: 070.015. api tu mayā śrutaṃ paurāṇānāṃ mahāsārthavāhānāmantikājjīrṇānāṃ vṛddhānāṃ mahallakānām -- ito jalamapahāya paścimāṃ diśaṃ sthalena gamyate/
K10divyav_u:3485: 070.017. tataḥ supriyāya mahāsārthavāhāya kathayati -- maraṇāntikā me vedanāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ/
K10divyav_u:3486: 070.018. etattvaṃ maṅgalapotaṃ tīramupanīya vetrapāśaṃ baddhvā maccharīre śarīrapūjāṃ kuruṣva/
K10divyav_u:3487: 070.019. tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhastaṃ maṅgalapotaṃ tīramupanīya vetrapāśaṃ badhnāti/
K10divyav_u:3489: 070.021. atha supriyo mahāsārthavāho maghaṃ sārthavāhaṃ kālagataṃ viditvā sthale utthāpya śarīre śarīrapūjaṃ kṛtvā cintayati -- maṅgalapotamāruhya
K10divyav_u:3490: 070.022. sa ca poto vāyunā vetrapāśaṃ chittvā apahṛtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3491: 070.023. tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhaścatūratnamayasya parvatasya dakṣiṇena pārśvenāṭavyāṃ sthalena saṃprasthito mūlaphalāni bhakṣayamāṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3494: 070.025. tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāho madhunā pādau pralipyābhirūḍhaśca,
K10divyav_u:3497: 070.027. sa tatra paśyati mahāntaṃ parvatamuccaṃ ca pragṛhītaṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:3501: 070.028. tatra ca parvate nīlādo nāma yakṣaḥ prativasati/
K10divyav_u:3502: 070.029. sa saṃlakṣayati -- ayaṃ bodhisattvo lokahitārthamudyataḥ parikliśyate,
K10divyav_u:3504: 070.030. idamanucintya supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhamidamavocat -- ito mahāsārthavāha pūrveṇa yojanaṃ gatvā trīṇi parvataśṛṅgāṇyanupūrvaniṃnānyanupūrvapravaṇānyanupūrvaprāgbhārāṇi/
K10divyav_u:3507: 070.032. atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ suptaprabuddho vetraśiṭām <71>baddhvā tāni parvataśṛṅgāṇyatikrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3508: 071.001. bhūyaḥ saṃprasthito 'drākṣīt supriyo mahāsāthavāhaḥ sphaṭikaparvataṃ ślakṣṇaṃ nirālambamagamyaṃ manuṣyamātrasya/
K10divyav_u:3509: 071.002. na cāsyopāyaṃ paśyati taṃ parvatamabhirohaṇāyeti viditvā cintāparo 'horātramavasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3510: 071.003. tasmiṃśca parvate candraprabho nāma yakṣaḥ prativasati/
K10divyav_u:3511: 071.004. sa cintāparaṃ sārthavāhaṃ viditvā lokahitārthamabhyudyataṃ mahāyānasamprasthitaṃ prasannacittaṃ copetyāśvāsayati -- na khalu mahāsārthavahena viṣādaḥ karaṇīya iti/
K10divyav_u:3516: 071.007. tayā gṛhītayā nāsya kāye śastraṃ kramiṣyati,
K10divyav_u:3523: 071.010. tatra te na śocitavyaṃ na kranditavyaṃ na paridevitavyam/
K10divyav_u:3524: 071.011. atha candraprabho yakṣaḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ samanuśāsya tatraivāntarhitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3525: 071.012. atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhaścandraprabheṇa mahāyakṣeṇa samāśvāsya ādeśitamārgo yathoktena vidhinā sphaṭikaparvatamatikrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3527: 071.014. bhūyaḥ saṃprasthito 'drākṣīt supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ sauvarṇaṃ mahānagaramārāmasampannaṃ puṣkariṇīsampannam/
K10divyav_u:3530: 071.016. dṛṣṭvā ca punarudyānaṃ gatvā cintayati -- yadyapyahaṃ nagaramadrākṣam,
K10divyav_u:3532: 071.017. kadā badaradvīpasya mahāpattanasyāgamanāyādhvā bhaviṣyatīti viditvā śayitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3533: 071.017. atha sā pūrvadevatā supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ durmanasaṃ viditvā rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaya uṣasaṃkramya samāśvāsya utkarṣayati -- sādhu sādhu mahāsārthavāha,
K10divyav_u:3540: 071.022. tataścatasraḥ kinnarakanyā nirgamiṣyanti abhirūpā darśanīyāḥ prasādikāścāturyamādhuryasampannāḥ
K10divyav_u:3546: apatikānāṃ patiralayanānāṃ layano 'dvīpānāṃ dvīpo 'trāṇānāṃ trāṇo 'śaraṇānāṃ śaraṇamaparāyaṇānāṃ parāyaṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3547: 071.027. imāni ca te 'nnagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi śayanagṛhāṇyārāmaramaṇīyāni,
K10divyav_u:3551: 071.030. tvaṃ cāsmābhiḥ sārdhaṃ krīḍasva ramasva paricārayasva/
K10divyav_u:3560: tatastvayā nipuṇaṃ praṣṭavyāh -- asya ratnasya bhaginyaḥ ko 'nubhāva iti/
K10divyav_u:3570: 072.009. atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ pramuditamanāḥ sukhapratibuddhaḥ kālyamevo 'tthāya sauvarṇaṃ kinnaranagaramanuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3572: 072.010. tataḥ supriyeṇa mahāsārthavāhena trikoṭite dvāre catasraḥ kinnarakanyā nirgatā
K10divyav_u:3578: apatīnāṃ patiralayanānāṃ layano 'dvīpānāṃ dvīpo 'śaraṇānāṃ śaraṇo 'trāṇānāṃ trāṇo 'parāyaṇānāṃ parāyaṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3579: 072.015. imāni ca te 'nnagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi śayanagṛhāṇyārāmaramaṇīyāni vanaramaṇīyāni puṣkariṇīramaṇīyāni ca/
K10divyav_u:3581: tadyathāmaṇayo muktā vaidūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālarajatajātarūpamaśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitikā dakṣiṇāvartāh etāni ca/
K10divyav_u:3582: 072.018. tvaṃ cāsmābhiḥ sārdhaṃ krīḍasva ramasva paricārayasva/
K10divyav_u:3583: 072.018. atha supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ sūpasthitasmṛtiṃ tāḥ kinnarakanyāḥ sarvāṅgairanuparigṛhya sauvarṇaṃ kinnaranagaraṃ praveśya prāsādamabhiropya prajñnapta evāsane niṣādayanti/
K10divyav_u:3584: 072.020. niṣaṇṇaḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāho daśākuśalān karmapathān vigarhati,
K10divyav_u:3587: 072.022. tuṣṭāśca tāḥ kinnarakanyāḥ kathayanti -- āścaryam yatredānīṃ daharaśca bhavān dharmakāmaśca/
K10divyav_u:3588: 072.023. na ca kāmeṣu sajjase vā badhyase vā/
K10divyav_u:3591: 072.024. tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhastasya ratnasya prabhāvānveṣī kathayati -- asya ratnasya bhaginyaḥ ko 'nubhāva iti/
K10divyav_u:3592: 072.025. tāḥ kathayanti -- yatkhalu sārthavāha jānīyāh -- tadeva poṣadhe panñcadaśyāṃ
K10divyav_u:3593: śiraḥsnāta upoṣadhoṣita idaṃ maṇiratnaṃ dhvajāgre āropya yojanasahasraṃ sāmantakena
K10divyav_u:3594: yo yenārthī bhavati hiraṇyena vā suvarṇena vā annena vā vastreṇa vā pānena vā alaṃkāraviśeṣeṇa
K10divyav_u:3595: vā dvipādena vā catuṣpādena vā yānena vā vāhanena vā dhanena vā dhānyena vā,
K10divyav_u:3600: 072.030. atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhastāḥ kinnarakanyā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya
K10divyav_u:3601: samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya mātṛbhaginīduhitṛvat pratisaṃmodya sauvarṇāt kinnaranagarāt pratiniṣkrāntaḥ /
K10divyav_u:3602: 072.032. adrākṣīt supriyo <73>mahāsārthavāho rūpyamayaṃ kinnaranagaramārāmasampannaṃ vanasampannaṃ puṣkariṇīsampannam/
K10divyav_u:3603: 073.001. tatrāpi supriyeṇa sārthavāhena trikoṭite dvāre'ṣṭau kinnarakanyā nirgatāḥ/
K10divyav_u:3608: 073.004. tatrāpi supriyo mahāsārthavāhastāḥ kinnarakanyā dharmyayā kthayā saṃdarśya
K10divyav_u:3609: samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya mātṛbhaginīduhitṛvat pratisaṃmodya rūpyamayāt kinnaranagarāt
K10divyav_u:3611: 073.007. tatrāpi supriyeṇa sārthavāhena trikoṭite dvāre ṣoḍaśa kinnarakanyā nirgatāḥ,
K10divyav_u:3613: 073.008. tā api dharmadeśanāvarjitāstata eva viśiṣṭataraṃ saubhāsinikaṃ trisāhasrayojanikaṃ ratnamanuprayacchanti/
K10divyav_u:3614: 073.009. tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhastasya ratnasya prabhāvānveṣī kathayati -- asya ratnasya bhaginyaḥ ko'nubhāva iti?
K10divyav_u:3616: 073.011. supriyo mahāsārthavāhastāḥ kinnarakanyā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya
K10divyav_u:3617: samuttejya saṃpraharṣya mātṛbhaginīduhitṛvat pratisaṃmodya tṛtīyāt kinnaranagarāt pratiniṣkrāntaḥ /
K10divyav_u:3621: 073.015. tataḥ supriyeṇa sārthavāhena trirākoṭite dvāre dvātriṃśat kinnarakanyā nirgatāḥ,
K10divyav_u:3626: apatīnāṃ patiralayanānāṃ layano 'dvīpānāṃ dvīpo 'śaraṇānāṃ śaraṇo 'trāṇānāṃ traṇo 'parāyaṇānāṃ parāyaṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3627: 073.020. imāni ca te 'nnagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi śayanagṛhāṇyārāmaramaṇīyāni vanaramaṇīyāni puṣkariṇīramaṇīyāni/
K10divyav_u:3629: tadyathā -- maṇayo muktā vaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālarajataṃ jātarūpamaśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitikā dakṣiṇāvartāḥ/
K10divyav_u:3632: 073.023. tatrāpi supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ sūpasthitasmṛtistāḥ kinnarakanyā vividhairdharmapadavyanñjanaiḥ paritoṣayāmāsa/
K10divyav_u:3633: 073.025. tuṣṭāśca tāḥ kinnarakanyāḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ sarvāṅgairanuparigṛhya catūratnamayaṃ kinnaranagaramanupraveśya prāsādamabhiropya prajñnapta evāsane niṣādayanti/
K10divyav_u:3634: 073.026. niṣaṇṇaḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāho daśākuśalān karmapathān vigarhati,
K10divyav_u:3637: 073.028. tuṣṭāśca tāḥ kinnarakanyāḥ kathayanti -- āścaryam yatredānīṃ daharaśca bhavān dharmakāmaśca/
K10divyav_u:3638: 073.029. na ca kāmeṣu sajjase vā badhyase vā/
K10divyav_u:3640: 073.030. tā api dharmadeśanāvarjitāḥ saubhāsinikaṃ jāmbudvīpapradhānamanarghyeyamūlyamanantaguṇaprabhāvaṃ badaradvīpamāpattane sarvasvabhūtaṃ
K10divyav_u:3641: 073.031. evaṃ ca kathayanti -- idamasmākaṃ mahāsārthavāha maṇiratnaṃ badareṇa bhrātrā kinnararājñnā anupradattam,
K10divyav_u:3643: 074.001. tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- asya ratnasya ko 'nubhāva iti?
K10divyav_u:3644: tāḥ kathayanti -- yatkhalu mahāsārthavāha jānīyāh -- idaṃ maṇiratnaṃ tadeva poṣadhoṣito
K10divyav_u:3645: dhvajāgre baddhvā āropya kṛtsne jambudvīpe ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ karaṇīyam -- śṛṇvantu
K10divyav_u:3647: yuṣmākam yo yenarthī upakaraṇaviśeṣeṇa hiraṇyena vā subarṇena vā ratnena vā annena
K10divyav_u:3648: vā pānena vā vastreṇa vā bhojanena vā alaṃkāraviśeṣeṇa vā dvipadena vā catuṣpadena
K10divyav_u:3649: vā vāhanena vā yānena vā dhanena vā dhānyena vā sa cittamutpādayatu,
K10divyav_u:3652: 074.008. ayaṃ tu prativiśeṣah -- yāni cāsya lokasya bhavanti mahābhayāni,
K10divyav_u:3653: tadyathā -- rājato vā cairato vā agnito vā udako vā manuṣyato vā amiṣyato vā siṃhato vā vyāghrato vā dvīpatarakṣuto vā yakṣyarākṣasapretapiśācakumbhāṇḍapūtanakaṭapūtanato
K10divyav_u:3657: asminnucchrite ratnaviśeṣe ima īrayopadravā na bhaviṣyanti/
K10divyav_u:3658: 074.012. iryuktvā tāḥ kinnarakanyāḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ saṃrādhayāmāsuh --- sādhu sādhu mahāsārthavāha,
K10divyav_u:3668: 074.016. anyadeva vayaṃ sanmārgaṃ vyapadekṣyāmaḥ kṣipraṃ vārāṇasīgamanāya/
K10divyav_u:3670: bhāṣiṣyāmah -- itaḥ paścime digbhāge sapta pratānatikramya mahāparvata uccaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3671: 074.018. tasmin parvate lohitākṣo nāma rākṣasaḥ prativasati raudraḥ paraprāṇaharaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3672: 074.019. sa ca parvato 'manuṣyavacaritaḥ kṛṣṇamandhakāraṃ savisphuliṅgaṃ vāyuṃ mokṣayati/
K10divyav_u:3673: 074.020. tatra te etadeva ratnaṃ dhvajāgre 'varopayitvā gantavyam/
K10divyav_u:3677: 074.022. sa tava gandhamāghrāya sapta rātriṃdivasānyaśaniṃ pātayiṣyati/
K10divyav_u:3681: 074.023. tatra drakṣyasi samaṃ bhūmipradeśamakṛṣṭoptaṃ ca taṇḍulaphalaśālimakaṇakamatuṣaṃ śuciṃ niṣphuṭigandhikaṃ caturaṅgulaparyavanaddham/
K10divyav_u:3682: 074.025. yastamaṣṭamyāṃ panñcadaśyāṃ vā bālāho'śvarājaḥ paribhujya sukhī arogo balavān prīṇitendriyaḥ pūrvakāyamabhyunnamayyodānamudānayati -- kaḥ pāragāmī,
K10divyav_u:3686: sa tvayopasaṃkramya idaṃ syādvacanīyam -- ahaṃ pāragāmī,
K10divyav_u:3689: 074.028. atha sa supriyo mahāsārthavāhastāḥ kinnarakanyā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya
K10divyav_u:3690: samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya mātṛduhitṛvat pratisamodya yathoddiṣṭena mārgeṇa
K10divyav_u:3698: pratiṣṭhāpya yena bālāho 'śvarājastenānñjaliṃ praṇamya bālāhamaśvarājamidavocat -- ahaṃ pāragāmī,
K10divyav_u:3701: 075.003. evamukte bālāho 'śvarājaḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhamidamavocat -- na te mahāsārthavāha mama pṛṣṭhādhirūḍhena diśo nāvalokayitavyāḥ,
K10divyav_u:3704: 075.005. atha supriyo mahāsārthavāho bālāhasyāśvarājasya pṛṣṭhamadhiruhya yathānuśiṣṭo 'lpaiśca kṣaṇalavamuhūrtairvārāṇasīmanuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3706: 075.007. avatīrya supriyo mahāsārthavāho bālāhāśvarājapṛṣṭhādbālāhāśvarājaṃ tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya pādābhivandanaṃ karoti/
K10divyav_u:3707: 075.008. tato bālāho 'śvarājaḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ saṃrādhayāmāsa -- sādhu sādhu mahāsārthavāha/
K10divyav_u:3716: 075.012. athāciraprakrānte bālāhe 'śvarājani supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ svagṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3717: 075.013. aśrauṣurvārāṇasīnivāsinaḥ paurā brahmadattaśca kāśirājah -- supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ pūrṇena varṣaśatena saṃsiddhayātraḥ pūrṇamanorathaḥ svagṛhamanuprāpta iti/
K10divyav_u:3720: 075.016. aśrauṣīt tat pūrvakaṃ caurasahasramanyaśca jano dhanārthī -- supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ saṃsiddhayātraḥ paripūrṇamanoratha āgata iti/
K10divyav_u:3721: 075.017. srutvā ca punarupasaṃkramya supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhamidamavocan -- parikṣīṇadhanāḥ sma iti/
K10divyav_u:3722: 075.018. evamukte mahāsārthavāhastān sarvān maitreṇa cakṣuṣā vyavalokya vijñnāpayati -- gacchatu bhavantaḥ svakasvakeṣu vijiteṣu/
K10divyav_u:3727: 075.020. atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhastadeva poṣadhe panñcadaśyāṃ śiraḥsnāta upoṣadhoṣito yattatprathamalabdhaṃ maṇiratnaṃ dhvajāgre āropya vācaṃ ca niścārayati,
K10divyav_u:3729: sahābhidhānacca yo yenārthī tasya tadvarṣaṃ bhavati/
K10divyav_u:3731: 075.024. taccaurasahasraṃ supriyeṇa mahāsārthavāhena daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ//
K10divyav_u:3732: 075.025. atrāntarāt kālagate brahmadatte kāśirājani paurāmātyaiḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāho rājābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3733: 075.026. mahābhiṣiktena supriyeṇa mahārājñnā dvitīyaṃ maṇiratnaṃ dhvajāgre āropya
K10divyav_u:3736: 075.028. tṛtīyena maṇiratnena yathoktena vidhinā dhvajāgrocchritena yathepsitopakaraṇaviśeṣavarṣaṇāni saṃpannāni/
K10divyav_u:3738: 075.030. tato 'nupūrveṇa jambudvīpaiśvaryabhūtena supriyeṇa mahārājñnā tadeva poṣadhe
K10divyav_u:3739: panñcadaśyāṃ śiraḥsnātenopoṣadhoṣitena kṛtsne jambudvīpe ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā upakaraṇotpannābhilāṣiṇāṃ
K10divyav_u:3742: 076.001. samanantaraṃ dhvajāgrāvaropite tasmiñ jambudvīpapradhānamaṇiratne kṛtsno jambudvīpanivāsī mahājanakāyo yathepsitairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ
K10divyav_u:3743: 076.003. upakaraṇasaṃtarpitaśca jambudvīpanivāsī janakāyaḥ supriyeṇa rājñnā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3744: 076.004. tato jyeṣṭhaṃ kumāraṃ rājyaiśvaryādhipatye partiṣṭhāpya rājarṣibrahmacaryaṃ
K10divyav_u:3745: caritvā caturo brahmān vihārān bhāvayitvā kāmeṣu kāmacchandaṃ prahāya tadbahulavihārī
K10divyav_u:3747: 076.007. bhagavanāha -- kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau supriyo nāma mahāsārthavāhaḥ,
K10divyav_u:3748: ahameva tena kālena tena samayena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ vartitavān/
K10divyav_u:3752: kāśyapaḥ samyaksambuddho bodhisattvabhūtaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena/
K10divyav_u:3754: eṣa eva śāriputro bhukṣuḥ sa tena kā
K10divyav_u:3757: eṣa evānando bhikṣustena kālena tena samayena/
K10divyav_u:3759: eṣa evāniruddho bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena/
K10divyav_u:3761: sa eṣa eva devadattastena kalena tena samayena/
K10divyav_u:3763: eṣa eva māraḥ pāpīyān sa tena kalena tena samayena/
K10divyav_u:3766: 076.015. tadā tāvanmayā bhikṣavo dṛḍhapratijñnena pratijñnāpūraṇārthaṃ saptavārāṃścaurasahasrāt sārthaḥ paritrātaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3769: caurasahasrapramukhaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jambudvīpaṃ dhanena saṃtarpayitvā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ /
K10divyav_u:3770: 076.019. idānīmapi mayā anekairduṣkaraśatasahasrairanuttaraṃ jñnānamadhigamya maitrāyatā karuṇayā saptakṛtvaścaurasahasrasakāśāt sārthaḥ paritrātaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3771: 076.020. aparituṣṭaṃ ca caurasahasraṃ viditvā yāvadāptaṃ dhanena saṃtarpayitvā atyantaniṣṭhe 'nuttare yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:3779: 077.002. tena khalu samayena bhadraṃkare nagare ṣaḍ janā mahāpuṇyāḥ prativasanti--meṇḍhako gṛhapatir meṇḍhakapatnī meṇḍhakaputro meṇḍhakasnuṣā meṇḍhakadāso meṇḍhakadāsī/
K10divyav_u:3790: 077.007. sa yadi śataṃ sahasraṃ vā parityajati,
K10divyav_u:3808: 077.013. dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ
K10divyav_u:3812: trī rātrestrirdivasasya ṣaṭkṛtvo rātriṃdivasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ
K10divyav_u:3835: 077.031. bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ meṇḍhako gṛhapatiḥ saparivāro bhadraṃkare nagare prativasati/
K10divyav_u:3839: bhikṣūṇāmārocaya--tathāgato bhikṣavo bhadraṃkareṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cariṣyati/
K10divyav_u:3840: 078.002. yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ bhadraṃkareṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cartum,
K10divyav_u:3842: 078.003. evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣūṇāmārocayati--tathāgata āyuṣmanto bhadraṃkareṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cariṣyati/
K10divyav_u:3843: 078.005. yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ bhadraṃkareṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caritum,
K10divyav_u:3845: 078.006. evamāyuṣmanniti te bhiṣava āyuṣmata ānandasya pratiśrutya pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā gacchanti//
K10divyav_u:3846: 078.008. atha bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāro mukto muktaparivāra
K10divyav_u:3847: āśvasta āśvastaparivāro vinīto vinītaparivāro 'rhannarhatparivāro vītarāgo vītarāgaparivāraḥ
K10divyav_u:3864: virūḍhaka iva kumbhāṇḍagaṇaparivṛto virūpākṣa iva nāgagaṇaparivṛtaḥ,
K10divyav_u:3874: 078.019. evamanekaguṇagaṇasamanvāgato buddho bhagavāñ janapadacārikayā bhadraṃkaraṃ nagaraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3881: 078.023. śrutvā ca punarvyathitāste parasparaṃ kathayanti--pūrvaṃ tāvadvayaṃ śramaṇena gautamena madhyadeśānnirvāsitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:3892: 078.028. bhavantaḥ, śramaṇo gautamaḥ kṣurāśaniṃ pātayannanekā aputrikā apatikāśca kurvannāgacchati/
K10divyav_u:3894: yasminneva kāle sthātavyaṃ tasminneva kāle 'smākaṃ parityāgas triyate/
K10divyav_u:3899: 078.031. te kathayanti--bhadraṃkarasāmantakena sarvajanakāyamudvāsya bhadraṃkaraṃ nagaraṃ pravāsayata/
K10divyav_u:3908: 079.001. tatastairbhadraṃkaranagarasāmantakena sarvo janakāya udvāsya bhadraṃkaraṃ nagaraṃ pravāsitaḥ,
K10divyav_u:3913: 079.003. tataḥ śakro devendraḥ saṃlakṣayati--na mama pratirūpam yadahaṃ bhagavato 'satkāramadhyupekṣeyam/
K10divyav_u:3914: 079.004. yena nāma bhagavatā tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyairanekair duṣkaraśatasahasraiḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūryānuttarajñānamadhigatam,
K10divyav_u:3915: sa nāma bhagavān sarvalokaprativiśiṣṭaḥ sarvavādavijayī śūnye janapade cārikaṃ cariṣyati/
K10divyav_u:3920: 079.009. cāturmahārājikā devā uktāh--yūyaṃ bhadraṃkarāṇāṃ janapadānāṃ vāsayateti/
K10divyav_u:3925: 079.013. tīrthyair nagarajanakāyasametairavacarakāḥ preṣitāh--gatvā paśyata kīdṛśā janapadā iti/
K10divyav_u:3926: 079.014. te gatāḥ paśyantyatiśayena janapadān ṛddhān sphītān/
K10divyav_u:3928: na kadācidasmābhirevamrūpā janapadā ṛddhāḥ sphītā dṛṣṭapūrvā iti/
K10divyav_u:3942: tīrthyāḥ kathayanti--samayena tiṣṭhāmo yadi yūyaṃ kriyākāraṃ kuruta--na kenacicchramaṇaṃ gautamaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramitavyam/
K10divyav_u:3948: 079.023. ten khalu samayena kapilavastuno brāhmaṇadārikā bhadraṃkare nagare pariṇītā/
K10divyav_u:3950: 079.024. sā saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ bhagavāñ śākyakulanandanaḥ śākyakulādrājyamapahāya pravrajitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3954: 079.026. tato bhagavatā tasyāścetasā cittamājñāya sopānaṃ nirmitam/
K10divyav_u:3955: 079.027. tato hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditā pradīpamādāya sopānenāvatīrya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntā/
K10divyav_u:3956: 079.027. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ purastāt pradīpaṃ sthāpayitvā pādau śirasā vanditvā niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya/
K10divyav_u:3957: 079.028. tato bhagavatā tasyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī catruāryasatyasamprativedhikī pūrvavadyāvaccharaṇagatāmabhiprasannāmiti/
K10divyav_u:3958: 079.030. atha bhagavāṃstāṃ dārikāmidamavocat--ehi tvaṃ dārike yena meṇḍhako gṛhapatistenopasaṃkrama,
K10divyav_u:3965: vaktavyah--tava putrasya pañcaśatiko nakulakaḥ kaṭyāṃ baddhastiṣṭhati/
K10divyav_u:3966: 080.002. sa yadi śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā vyayīkaroti,
K10divyav_u:3970: evaṃ bhadanteti sā dārikā bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya saṃprasthitā/
K10divyav_u:3971: 080.004. yathāparijñātaiva kenacideva meṇḍakasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gatā/
K10divyav_u:3976: 080.007. yuktametadevamatitheḥ pratipattum yathā tvaṃ pratipanna iti?
K10divyav_u:3978: gaṇena kriyākāraḥ kṛtah--na kenacicchramaṇaṃ gautamaṃ darśanāya upasaṃkramitavyam/
K10divyav_u:3981: 080.009. gṛhapate, bhagavān kathayati--tava putrasya pañcaśatiko nakulakaḥ kaṭyāṃ baddhastiṣṭhati/
K10divyav_u:3982: 080.010. sa yadi śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā vyayīkaroti,
K10divyav_u:3985: 080.011. na śaknoṣi tvaṃ ṣaṣṭikārṣāpaṇaṃ datvā āgantumiti?
K10divyav_u:3989: 080.012. sa ṣaṣṭikārṣāpaṇān dvāre sthāpayitvā brāhmaṇadārikopadiṣṭena sopānenāvatīrya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3990: 080.013. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya/
K10divyav_u:3991: 080.014. tato bhagavatā meṇḍhakasya gṛhapaterāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10divyav_u:3992: yāṃ śrutvā meṇḍhakena gṛhapatinā yāvacchrotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
K10divyav_u:3994: kimeṣo 'pi bhadraṃkaranagaranivāsī janakāya evaṃvidhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhīte?
K10divyav_u:3996: tvāmāgamya bhūyasā sarva eva janakāyo lābhīte/
K10divyav_u:3997: 080.018. tato meṇḍhako gṛhapatirbhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:3998: 080.019. svagṛhaṃ gatvā nagaramadhye kārṣāpaṇānāṃ rāśiṃ vyavasthāpya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
K10divyav_u:3999: 080.021. yo draṣṭumicchati jinaṃ jitarāgadoṣaṃ nirbandhamapratisamaṃ karuṇāvadātam/
K10divyav_u:4000: 080.023. so 'niścareṇa hṛdayena suniścitena kṣipraṃ prayātu dhanamasya mayā pradeyam//3// iti//
K10divyav_u:4005: gaṇenaivaṃ kriyākāraḥ kṛto gaṇa eva udghāṭayatu/
K10divyav_u:4008: 080.027. tataḥ parasparaṃ saṃghaṭṭanena na śaknuvanti nirgantumiti vajrapāṇinā yakṣeṇa vineyajanānukampayā vajraḥ kṣiptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4013: 080.030. te gatvā bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purato niṣaṇṇāḥ/
K10divyav_u:4015: 080.031. atha baghavāṃstāṃ parṣadamabhyavagāhya purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣadyānekasattvasaṃtānakuśalamūlasamāropikāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ
K10divyav_u:4025: 081.004. tato meṇḍhakena gṛhapatinā śilpina āhūya uktāh--bhagavato 'kālakhādyakāni śīghraṃ sajjīkuruteti/
K10divyav_u:4027: 081.006. tato meṇḍhakena gṛhapatinā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho 'kālakhādyakairakālapānakaiśca saṃtarpitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4028: 081.007. tato bhagavān meṇḍhakaṃ gṛhapatiṃ saparivāraṃ satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ karvaṭanivāsinaṃ janakāyam yathābhavyatayā vinīya prakrāntaḥ//
K10divyav_u:4034: 082.002. bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ
K10divyav_u:4035: bhadanta meṇḍhakena meṇḍhakapatnyā meṇḍhakaputreṇa meṇḍhakasnuṣayā meṇḍhakadāsena
K10divyav_u:4036: meṇḍhakadāsyā karma kṛtam yena ṣaḍabhijñātā mahāpuṇyāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ,
K10divyav_u:4039: bhagavānāha--ebhireva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavatpratyupasthitānyavaśyambhāvīni/
K10divyav_u:4042: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10divyav_u:4046: api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
K10divyav_u:4048: 082.011. sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//1//
K10divyav_u:4049: 082.012. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma
K10divyav_u:4050: rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ
K10divyav_u:4053: 082.015. tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ naimittikairdvādaśavarṣikā anāvṛṣṭirvyākṛtā/
K10divyav_u:4054: 082.016. trividhaṃ durbhikṣaṃ bhaviṣyati--cañcu śvetāsthi śalākāvṛtti ca/
K10divyav_u:4055: 082.016. tatra cañcu ucyate--samudgake tasmin manuṣyā bījāni prakṣipya anāgate sattvāpekṣayā sathāpayanti/
K10divyav_u:4056: 082.017. mṛtā nāma anena te bījakāyaṃ kariṣyantīti/
K10divyav_u:4058: 082.018. śvetāsthi nāma durbhikṣam--tasmin kāle manuṣyā asthīnyupasaṃhṛtya tāvat kvāthayanti,
K10divyav_u:4062: 082.020. śalākāvṛttir nāma--tasmin kāle manuṣyāḥ khalu bilebhyo dhānyaguḍakāni śalākayā ākṛṣya bahudakasthālyāṃ kvāthayitvā pibanti/
K10divyav_u:4064: 082.022. tato rājñā brahmadattena vārāṇasyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--śṛṇvantu bhavanto vārāṇasīnivāsinaḥ paurāḥ/
K10divyav_u:4065: 082.023. naimittikairdvādaśavarṣikā anāvṛṣṭirvyākṛtā śalākāvṛtti durbhikṣaṃ cañcu śvetāsthi ca/
K10divyav_u:4071: 082.026. tasminśca samaye vārāṇasyāmanyatamo gṛhapatirāḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaparivāraḥ/
K10divyav_u:4073: bhaviṣyati me saparivārāṇāṃ me saparivārāṇāṃ dvādaśa varṣāṇi bhaktamiti?
K10divyav_u:4080: 082.030. tatastena gṛhapatinā kośakoṣṭhāgarāṇi śodhayitvā dhānyaprastha upasaṃhṛtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4082: 082.031. asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
K10divyav_u:4084: 083.001. sa pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya vārāṇasīṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4086: 083.002. sa ca pratyekabuddho 'nupūrveṇa piṇḍapātamaṭaṃs tasya gṛhapatir niveśanamanuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4088: 083.004. dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ saṃlakṣayati--etadapyahaṃ parityajya niyataṃ prāṇairviyokṣye/
K10divyav_u:4096: 083.007. evaṃ putreṇa snuṣayā dāsena dāsyā ca vicārya svasvapratyaṃśāḥ parityaktāḥ/
K10divyav_u:4097: 083.008. tatastaiḥ sarvaiḥ saṃbhūya pratyekabuddhaḥ piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4098: 083.009. kāyikī teṣāṃ mahātmanāṃ dharmadeśanā, na vācikī/
K10divyav_u:4099: 083.009. sa vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarāja upari vihāyasamudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kartumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4101: 083.011. te mūlanikṛttā iva drumāḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ/
K10divyav_u:4102: 083.012. gṛhapatiḥ praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
K10divyav_u:4103: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yadi riktakāni kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi sahadarśanānme pūrṇāni syuh--evaṃvidhānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ lābhī syām,
K10divyav_u:4105: 083.014. patnī praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhā--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
K10divyav_u:4113: 083.018. putraḥ praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
K10divyav_u:4115: yadi ca śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā tato vyayaṃ kuryāt,
K10divyav_u:4117: mā parikṣayaṃ gacchet--evaṃvidhānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ lābhī syām,
K10divyav_u:4119: 083.022. snuṣā praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhā--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
K10divyav_u:4122: taṃ na ca parikṣayaṃ gaccheyuryāvanmayā apratipraśrabdham--evaṃvidhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ labhinī syām,
K10divyav_u:4124: 083.025. dāsaḥ praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
K10divyav_u:4126: sapta sīrāḥ kṛṣṭāḥ syuh--evaṃvidhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ ca lābhī syām,
K10divyav_u:4128: 083.028. dāsī praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhā--evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
K10divyav_u:4130: sapta mātrāḥ saṃpadyeran--evaṃvidhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ ca labhinī syām,
K10divyav_u:4133: 083.031. sa ca mahātmā pratyekabuddhasteṣāmanukampayā ṛddhyā upari vihāyasā rājakulasyopariṣṭāt saṃprasthitaḥ//
K10divyav_u:4135: 084.001. tasya ṛddhyā gacchato rājño brahmadattasyopari cchāyā nipatitā/
K10divyav_u:4140: 084.004. tato 'sau gṛhapatiḥ kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi pratyavekṣitumārabdho yāvatpūrṇāni paśyati/
K10divyav_u:4147: 084.008. tathaiva putrasya snuṣāyā dāsasya praṇidhiḥ siddhā/
K10divyav_u:4148: 084.009. tato gṛhapatinā ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritaṃ vārāṇasyām--yo bhavanto 'nnenārthī,
K10divyav_u:4155: 084.012. rājā tamāhūya kathayati--yadā eva lokaḥ kālagataḥ,
K10divyav_u:4158: api tu adyaiva me bījamuptamadyaiva phaladāyakamiti/
K10divyav_u:4167: 084.019. kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau gṛhapatirgṛhapatipatnī gṛhapatiputro gṛhapatisnuṣā gṛhapatidāso gṛhapatidāsī,
K10divyav_u:4168: ayameva meṇḍhako gṛḥpatir meṇḍhakapatnī meṇḍhakaputro meṇḍhakasnuṣā meṇḍhakadāso meṇḍhakadāsī ca/
K10divyav_u:4169: 084.021. yadebhiḥ pratyekabuddhe kārān kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam,
K10divyav_u:4170: tasya karmaṇo vipākena ṣaḍ mahāpuṇyā jātāḥ,
K10divyav_u:4172: 084.022. ahaṃ caibhiḥ pratyekabuddhakoṭiśatasahasrebhyaḥ prativiśiṣṭaḥ śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4173: 084.023. iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10divyav_u:4186: 085.002. ekasmin samaye bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrairdhanibhiḥ
K10divyav_u:4191: 085.006. tena khalu samayena vaiśālikā licchavaya idamevamrūpaṃ kriyākāramakārṣuh--pañcadaśyāṃ
K10divyav_u:4192: bhavantaḥ pakṣasya aṣṭamyāaṃ caturdaśyāṃ ca prāṇino hantavyā yatkāraṇameyurmanuṣyā
K10divyav_u:4194: 085.008. tena khalu samayena anyatamo goghātako mahāntaṃ vṛṣabhamādāya nagarānniṣkramati praghātayitum/
K10divyav_u:4195: 085.009. tamenaṃ mahājanakāyaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddho māṃsārthī kathayati--śīghramenaṃ vṛṣaṃ ghātaya,
K10divyav_u:4199: 085.011. tato vṛṣa īdṛśamanāryaṃ vaco duruktaṃ śrutvā bhītastrastaḥ saṃvignah āhṛṣṭaromakūpa itaścāmutaśca saṃbhrānto nirīkṣate,
K10divyav_u:4202: 085.014. bhagavāṃśca pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya prāviśat/
K10divyav_u:4203: 085.015. athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtamaśītyānuvyañjanairvirājitagātraṃ
K10divyav_u:4204: vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamamiva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakamam /
K10divyav_u:4209: 085.019. atha sa vṛṣo bhagavatyavekṣāvān pratibaddhacittah eṣo me śaraṇamiti sahasaiva tāni dṛḍhāni varatrakāṇi bandhanāni cchittvā pradhāvan yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4210: 085.021. upasaṃkramyobhābhyāṃ jānubhyāṃ bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya pādau jihvayā nileḍhumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4211: 085.022. sa cāsya raudrakarmā goghātakaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddha eva śastravyagrahastaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4212: 085.022. tato bhagavāṃstaṃ raudrakarmāṇaṃ goghātakamidamavocat--kuruṣva tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa anena govṛṣabheṇa sārdhaṃ sātmyam/
K10divyav_u:4221: 085.026. atha bhagavāmllaukikacittamutpādayati--aho bata śakro devendrastrīṇi kārṣāpaṇasahasrāṇyādāyāgacchediti/
K10divyav_u:4222: 085.028. sahacittotpādādbhagavataḥ śakro devendraḥ kārṣāpaṇasahasratrayamādāya bhagavataḥ purastādasthāt/
K10divyav_u:4223: 085.029. atha bhagavāñ śakraṃ devendramidamavocat--anuprayaccha kauśika asya goghātakasya triguṇaṃ mūlyam/
K10divyav_u:4225: 085.030. atha goghātakaḥ kārṣāpaṇasahasrayaṃ vṛṣamūlyaṃ gṛhītvā hṛṣṭastuṣṭaḥ pramudito bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā taṃ govṛṣaṃ bandhanānmuktvā
K10divyav_u:4226: 085.032. śakro devendro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā tatraivāntarhitaḥ//
K10divyav_u:4228: bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddho bhagavato mukhaṃ
K10divyav_u:4231: 086.003. dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti,
K10divyav_u:4236: tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanamavīcimarbudaṃ nirarbudamaṭaṭaṃ
K10divyav_u:4237: hahavaṃ huhuvamutpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaparyantān narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakāsteṣu
K10divyav_u:4241: 086.009. teṣāmevaṃ bhavati--kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ,
K10divyav_u:4244: 086.010. teṣāṃ nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ bhavati--na hyeva vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ,
K10divyav_u:4248: 086.012. te nirmite cittamabhiprasādya tannarakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhir gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti/
K10divyav_u:4259: 086.022. atha tā arciṣastrisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātumanvāhiṇḍya bhagavantameva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti/
K10divyav_u:4284: 086.031. atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūrṇāyāmantarhitāḥ//
K10divyav_u:4291: 087.008. tatkālaṃ svayamadhigamya dhīra buddhyā śrotṛrṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām/
K10divyav_u:4294: 087.014. yasyārthe smitamupadarśayanti dhīrā staṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ//6// iti//
K10divyav_u:4296: 087.016. nāhetvapratyayamānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti/
K10divyav_u:4299: 087.017. eṣa ānanda govṛṣastathāgatasyāntike prasannacittaḥ saptame divase kālaṃ kṛtvā cātrumahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapatsyate/
K10divyav_u:4311: 087.023. tadanayā saṃtatyā navanavatikalpasahasrāṇi vinipātaṃ na gamiṣyati/
K10divyav_u:4312: 087.024. tataḥ kāmāvacareṣu deveṣu divyaṃ sukhamanubhūya paścime bhave paścime nikete
K10divyav_u:4313: samucchraye paścime ātmabhāvapratilambhe manuṣyatvaṃ pratilabhya rājā bhaviṣyati
K10divyav_u:4314: aśokavarṇo nāma cakravartī caturarṇavāntavijetā dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ /
K10divyav_u:4316: 087.027. tadyathā--cakraratnaṃ hastiratnamaśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnameva saptamam/
K10divyav_u:4317: 087.028. pūrṇaṃ cāsya bhaviṣyati sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇā parasainyapramardakānām/
K10divyav_u:4319: 087.031. so 'pareṇa samayena dānāni datvā cakravartirājyamapahāya keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya
K10divyav_u:4320: kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi ...ṣamyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajya pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ sākṣātkariṣyati,
K10divyav_u:4322: 087.033. athāyuṣmānānandaḥ kṛtakarapuṭo bhagavantaṃ papraccha--kiṃ bhadanta anena govṛṣeṇa karma kṛtam yena tiryagyonāvupapannaḥ,
K10divyav_u:4323: kiṃ karma kṛtam yena divyamānuṣasukhamanubhūya <88>pratyekāṃ bodhimadhigamiṣyati?
K10divyav_u:4324: bhagavānāha--anenaiva ānanda govṛṣeṇa karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavatpratyupasthitānyavaśyambhāvīni/
K10divyav_u:4327: na hyānanda karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10divyav_u:4331: api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāśubhāni ca/
K10divyav_u:4333: 088.007. sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//7//
K10divyav_u:4334: 088.008. bhūtapūrvamānanda atīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksambuddho
K10divyav_u:4335: loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
K10divyav_u:4340: 088.011. sarve ca vītarāgā vigatadveṣā vigatamohā yāvat pañcamātrāṇi dhūrtakaśatāni tena tenāhiṇḍyamānāni taṃ pradeśamanuprāptāni/
K10divyav_u:4341: 088.013. teṣāmetadabhavat--ete hi pravrajitā mahātmānah īdṛśeṣu sthāneṣvabhiramante/
K10divyav_u:4343: na bhūya etasmin pradeśe svasthairvihartavyaṃ bhaviṣyati/
K10divyav_u:4350: 088.017. sa kathayati--aghātayitvā etān kutaḥ kṣema iti?
K10divyav_u:4353: 088.019. yadbhūyasā tu narakeṣu tiryagyonau upapannāśca santo nityaṃ śastreṇa praghātitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:4356: 088.020. tasya karmaṇo vipākena iyantaṃ kālaṃ na kadācit sugatau upapannaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4358: tasya karmaṇo vipākena divyaṃ mānuṣaṃ sukhamanubhūya pratyekāṃ bodhimadhigamiṣyati/
K10divyav_u:4361: 088.024. tasmāttarhi ānanda evaṃ śikṣitavyam yatstokastokaṃ muhūrtamuhūrtamantato 'cchaṭāsaṃghātamātramapi tathāgatamākārataḥ samanusmariṣyāmītyevaṃ te ānanda śikṣitavyam//
K10divyav_u:4362: 088.026. athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyānandyānumodya bhikṣūṇāṃ purastādgāthā bhāṣate--
K10divyav_u:4365: 088.029. āpanno hi paraṃ kṛcchraṃ govṛṣo yena mocitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4366: 088.030. vyākṛtaśca bhave divye pratyekaśca jino hyasau//9// iti//
K10divyav_u:4372: 089.002. sa bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe satkṛto gurukṛto
K10divyav_u:4373: mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrairdhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhairdevair
K10divyav_u:4376: saśrāvakasaṃgho divyānāṃ mānuṣyāṇāṃ ca bhagavānanupalipto viharati padmapatramivāmbhasā //
K10divyav_u:4377: 089.007. tena khalu samayena rājagṛhe nagare ṣaṭ pūrṇādyāḥ śāstāro 'sarvajñāḥ sarvajñamāninaḥ prativasanti sma/

K10divyav_u:4392: 089.017. asmākaṃ ca lābhasatkāraḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ samucchinnaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4395: 089.018. arhati jñāvādī jñānavādinā sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum/
