K10divyav_u:4471: 090.031. evamukte rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisārastāṃstīrthikaparivrājakānidamavocat--yadyevaṃ trirapyetamarthaṃ vijñāpayiṣyatha,
K10divyav_u:4473: 090.032. atha tīrthyānāmetadabhavat--ayaṃ rājā <91>māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ śramaṇasya gautamasya śrāvakaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4477: tatra vayaṃ gatvā śramaṇaṃ gautamamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihārye āhvayiṣyāmaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4479: 091.004. atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro 'nyatamaṃ puruṣamāmantrayate--gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa kṣipram/
K10divyav_u:4482: 091.006. evaṃ deveti sa puruṣo rājño māgadhasya śreṇyasya bimbisārasya pratiśrutya kṣipraṃ bhadraṃ yānaṃ yojayitvā yena rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo
K10divyav_u:4483: 091.007. upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ śreṇyaṃ bimbisāramidamavocat--yuktaṃ devasya bhadraṃ yānaṃ yasyedānīṃ devaḥ kālaṃ manyata iti/
K10divyav_u:4484: 091.008. atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhadraṃ yānamabhiruhya rājagṛhānniryāti bhagavato 'ntikaṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramituṃ paryupāsanāya/

K10divyav_u:4487: 091.012. tadantarā pañca kakudānyapanīya tadyathā--uṣṇīṣaṃ chatraṃ khaḍgamaṇiṃ vālavyajanaṃ citre copānahau,
K10divyav_u:4489: 091.013. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4490: 091.014. ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ viditvā rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ śreṇyaṃ bimbisāraṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
K10divyav_u:4491: 091.015. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
K10divyav_u:4492: 091.016. atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhagavantamabhyānandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ//
K10divyav_u:4493: 091.019. atha bhagavata etadabhavat--kutra pūrvakaiḥ samyaksambuddhairmahāprātihāryaṃ vidarśitaṃ hitāya prāṇinām?

K10divyav_u:4505: 091.028. atha bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāro mukto muktaparivāra
K10divyav_u:4506: āśvasta āśvastaparivāro vinīto vinītaparivāro 'rhannarhatparivāro vītarāgo vītarāgaparivāraḥ
K10divyav_u:4507: prāsādikaḥ prāsādikaparivāro vṛṣabha iva gogaṇaparivṛto gaja iva kalabhagaṇaparivṛtaḥ
K10divyav_u:4508: siṃha iva daṃṣṭṭagaṇaparivṛto rājahaṃsa iva haṃsagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suparṇīva pakṣigaṇaparivṛto
K10divyav_u:4509: vipra iva śiṣyagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suvaidya ivāturagaṇaparivṛtaḥ śūra iva yodhagaṇaparivṛto<92>
K10divyav_u:4510: deśika ivādhvagaṇaparivṛtaḥ sārthavāha iva vaṇiggaṇaparivṛtaḥ śreṣṭhīva pauragaṇaparivṛtaḥ
K10divyav_u:4512: nakṣatragaṇaparivṛtaḥ sūrya iva raśmisahasraparivṛto virūḍhaka iva kumbhāṇḍagaṇaparivṛto
K10divyav_u:4513: virūpākṣa iva nāgagaṇaparivṛto dhanada iva yakṣagaṇaparivṛto dhṛtarāṣṭra iva gandharvagaṇaparivṛto

K10divyav_u:4515: brahmakāyikagaṇaparivṛtaḥ stimiva iva jalanidhiḥ sajala iva jaladharo vimada iva
K10divyav_u:4517: bhikṣusaṃghena ca puraskṛto yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ /

K10divyav_u:4523: 092.013. arhati jñānavādī jñānavādinā sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum/

K10divyav_u:4533: vayaṃ taddviguṇaṃ tattriguṇamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4536: 092.018. tatrāsmākaṃ bhavatu śramaṇena gautamena sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
K10divyav_u:4537: 092.019. evamukte rājā prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat--āgamayantu tāvadbhavanto yāvadahaṃ bhagavantamavalokayāmi/
K10divyav_u:4538: 092.020. atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo 'nyatamaṃ puruṣamāmantrayate--gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa/
K10divyav_u:4541: 092.022. evaṃ deveti sa puruṣo rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya pratiśrutya kṣipraṃ bhadraṃ yānaṃ yojayitvā yena rājā prasenajit kauśalastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4542: 092.024. upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamidamavocat--yuktaṃ devasya bhadraṃ yānaṃ yasyedānīṃ devaḥ kālaṃ manyate/
K10divyav_u:4543: 092.025. atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhadraṃ yānamabhiruhya śrāvastyā niryāti bhagavato 'ntikaṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya upasaṃkramituṃ paryupāsanāya/
K10divyav_u:4544: 092.027. tasya yāvatī yānasya bhūmistāvadyānena gatvā yānādavatārya pādābhyāmeva ārāmaṃ praviśya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4545: 092.028. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4546: 092.029. ekānte niṣaṇṇo rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavantamidamavocat--ime bhadanta tīrthyā bhagavantamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryeṇāhvayante/
K10divyav_u:4547: 092.030. vidarśayatu bhagavānuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ hitāya prāṇinām/
K10divyav_u:4551: 092.032. evamukte bhagavān rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamidamavocat--nāhaṃ mahārāja
K10divyav_u:4552: <93>evaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi evam yūyaṃ bhikṣava āgatāgatānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāmuttare
K10divyav_u:4554: 093.002. api tu ahamevaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi--praticchannakalyāṇā bhikṣavo viharata vivṛtapāpā iti/
K10divyav_u:4555: 093.003. dvirapi trirapi rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavantamidamavocat--vidarśayatu bhagavānuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ hitāya prāṇinām/
K10divyav_u:4559: 093.005. dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ jīvatāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyamāṇānām yāpayatām yaduta daśāvaśyakariṇīyāni bhavanti/
K10divyav_u:4560: 093.007. na tāvadbuddhā bhagavantaḥ parinirvānti yāvanna buddho buddhaṃ vyākaroti,
K10divyav_u:4561: yāvanna dvitīyena sattvenāparivartyamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittamutpāditaṃ bhavati,
K10divyav_u:4567: anavatapte mahāsarasi śrāvakaiḥ sārdhaṃ pūrvikā karmaplotirvyākṛtā bhavati,
K10divyav_u:4570: 093.012. atha bhagavata etadabhavat--avaśyakaraṇīyametattathāgateneti viditvā rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamāmantrayate--gaccha tvaṃ mahārāja/
K10divyav_u:4571: 093.013. itaḥ saptame divase tathāgato mahājanapratyakṣamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati hitāya prāṇinām/
K10divyav_u:4572: 093.014. atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavantamidamavocat--yadi bhagavānanujānīyāt,
K10divyav_u:4574: 093.016. atha bhagavata etadabhavat--katarasmin pradeśe pūrvakaiḥ samyaksambuddhairmahāprātihāryaṃ vidarśitaṃ hitāya prāṇināmiti?
K10divyav_u:4575: devatā bhagavata ārocayanti--antarā bhadanta śrāvastīmantarā ca jetavanamatrāntarāt pūrvakaiḥ samyaksambuddhermahāprātihāryaṃ vidarśitaṃ hitāya
K10divyav_u:4576: 093.019. bhagavato 'pi jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate--antarā ca śrāvastīmantarā ca jetavanamatrāntarāt pūrvakaiḥ samyaksambuddhairmahāprātihāryaṃ vidarśitaṃ hitāya prāṇinām/
K10divyav_u:4577: 093.020. adhivāsayati bhagavān rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya tūṣṇībhāvena/
K10divyav_u:4578: 093.021. atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavantamidamavocat--katamasmin bhadanta pradeśe prātihāryamaṇḍapaṃ
K10divyav_u:4579: antarā ca mahārāja śrāvastīmantarā ca jetavanam/
K10divyav_u:4580: 093.023. atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ//
K10divyav_u:4581: 093.026. atha rājā prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat--yatkhalu bhavanto jānīran--itaḥ saptame divase bhagavānuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ
K10divyav_u:4589: 093.031. iti viditvā raktākṣo nāma parivrājaka indrajālābhijñaḥ sa āhūtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4591: evaṃ cāhuh--<94>yatkhalu raktākṣa jānīyāh--śramaṇo gautamo 'smābhiriddhyā āhūtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4592: 094.001. sa kathayati--itaḥ saptame divase uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmīti/
K10divyav_u:4598: evaṃ cāha--yatkhalu bhavanto jānīran--śramaṇo gautamo 'smābhiriddhyā āhūtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4599: 094.006. sa kathayati--itaḥ saptame divase uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśāyiṣyāmīti/

K10divyav_u:4641: 095.003. anyatamayā cāvaruddhikayā prāsādatalagatayā rājakumāraṃ dṛṣṭvā sragdāmaṃ kṣiptam/
K10divyav_u:4644: 095.004. tai rājñe niveditam--yatkhalu deva jānīthāḥ--kālena devasyāntaḥpuraṃ prārthitam/
K10divyav_u:4648: 095.007. evaṃ deveti pauruṣeyai rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya pratiśrutya kālasya vīthīmadhye hastapādāśchinnāḥ/
K10divyav_u:4650: duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāmamanāpāṃ devanāṃ vedayate/
K10divyav_u:4653: 095.010. kālasya jñātibhirabhihitam--etamāryāḥ kālaṃ rājakumāraṃ satyābhiyācanayā yathāpaurāṇaṃ kurudhvamiti/
K10divyav_u:4656: 095.012. atha kālasya rājakumārasyaitadabhavat--kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasambādhaprāptaṃ māṃ bhagavān na samanvāharatīti viditvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
K10divyav_u:4657: 095.014. imāmavasthāṃ mama lokanātho na vetti saṃbādhagatasya kasmāt/
K10divyav_u:4660: 095.018. tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma--gaccha tvamānanda saṃghāṭimādāya anyatamena bhikṣuṇā paścācchramaṇena yena kālo rājabhrātā
K10divyav_u:4661: 095.020. upasaṃkramya kālasya rājakumārasya hastapādān yathāsthāne sthāpayitvā evaṃ
K10divyav_u:4662: vada--ye kecit sattvā apadā vā dvipadā vā bahupadā vā arūpiṇo vā rūpiṇo vā saṃjñino
K10divyav_u:4663: vā asaṃjñino vā naivasaṃjñino vā nāsaṃjñinaḥ,
K10divyav_u:4665: 095.023. ye kecid dharmā asaṃskṛtā vā saṃskṛtā vā,
K10divyav_u:4667: 095.025. anena satyena satyavākyena tava śarīram yathāpaurāṇaṃ syāt/
K10divyav_u:4668: 095.025. evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya saṃghāṭīmādāyānyatamena bhikṣuṇā paścācchramaṇena yena rājabhrātā kālastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4669: 095.027. upasaṃkramya kālasya rājakumārasya hastapādān yathāsthāne sthāpayitvā evamāha--ye kecit sattvā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuṣpadā vā bahupadā vā yāvannaivasaṃjñino nāsaṃjñinaḥ,
K10divyav_u:4671: 095.029. ye keciddharmāḥ saṃkṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā,
K10divyav_u:4673: 095.030. ye kecit saṃghā vā gaṇā vā pūgā vā parṣado vā,
K10divyav_u:4675: 095.031. anena satyena satyavākyena tava śarīram yathāpaurāṇaṃ bhavatu/
K10divyav_u:4676: 095.032. sahābhidhānāt kālasya rājakumārasya śarīram yathāpaurāṇaṃ saṃvṛttam,
K10divyav_u:4677: <96>yathāpi tatra buddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena/
K10divyav_u:4678: 096.001. kālena kumāreṇa tenaiva saṃvegena anāgāmiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam ṛddhiścāpi nirhṛtā/
K10divyav_u:4681: 096.003. yatrāsya śarīraṃ gaṇḍagaṇḍaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya gaṇḍaka ārāmika iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
K10divyav_u:4682: 096.004. atha rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena sarvopakaraṇaiḥ sa pravāritaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4685: 096.006. rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena antarā ca śrāvastīmantarā ca jetavanamatrāntarādbhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapaḥ kāritaḥ śatasahasrahastah .... caturṇāṃ maṇḍapo vitataḥ/
K10divyav_u:4688: 096.009. rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena saptame divase yāvajjetavanaṃ yāvacca bhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapo 'ntarāt sarvo 'sau pradeśo 'pagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhalyo
K10divyav_u:4692: 096.013. atha bhagavān saptame divase pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
K10divyav_u:4693: 096.014. śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratiśrāmya bahirvihārasya pādau prakṣālya vihāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ pratisaṃlayanāya/
K10divyav_u:4694: 096.015. atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo 'nekaśataparivāro 'nekasahasraparivāro 'nekaśatasahasraparivāro yena bhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4698: 096.019. niṣadya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamidamavocan--yatkhalu deva jānīyāh--ete vayamāgatāḥ/
K10divyav_u:4702: 096.021. atha rājā prasenajit kauśala uttaraṃ māṇavamāmantrayate--ehi tvamuttara,
K10divyav_u:4704: 096.023. upasaṃkramyāsmākaṃ vacanena bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛccha,
K10divyav_u:4705: alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca anavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:4706: 096.024. evaṃ ca vada--rājā bhadanta prasenajit kauśala evamāha--ime bhadanta tīrthyā āgatā yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyate/
K10divyav_u:4707: 096.025. evaṃ devetyuttaro māṇavo rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya pratiśrutya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4708: 096.026. upasaṃkramya bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisārya ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4709: 096.027. ekāntaniṣaṇṇa uttaro māṇavo bhagavantamidamavocat--rājā bhadanta prasenajit kauśalo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandate,
K10divyav_u:4710: alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛcchati alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātraṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca anavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:4711: 096.030. sukhī bhavatu māṇava rājā prasenajit kauśalastvaṃ ca/

K10divyav_u:4716: 097.002. adrākṣīdrājā prasenajit kauśala uttaraṃ māṇavakamupari vihāyasā āgacchatam/
K10divyav_u:4717: 097.002. dṛṣṭvā ca punastīrthyānidamavocat--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/

K10divyav_u:4721: atha bhagavāṃstadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte 'rgaḍacchidreṇārciṣo nirgatya bhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍape nipatitāḥ,
K10divyav_u:4724: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamidamavocan--eṣa idānīṃ mahārāja śramaṇasya gautamasya prātihāryamaṇḍapaḥ prajvalitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4726: 097.009. atha so 'gniraspṛṣṭa eva vāriṇā sarvaprātihāryamaṇḍapamadagdhvā svayameva nirvṛto yathāpi tadbuddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca
K10divyav_u:4727: 097.010. atha rājā prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
K10divyav_u:4730: 097.013. kiṃ tvaṃ jñāsyasi kena etadvidarśitamasmābhirvā śramaṇena gautamena?
K10divyav_u:4734: 097.015. dṛṣṭvā ca punastīrthyānāmantrayate--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
K10divyav_u:4737: 097.017. kiṃ tvaṃ jñāsyasi kena etadvidarśitamasmābhirvā śramaṇena gautamena?
K10divyav_u:4738: bhagavatā kanakamarīcikāvabhāsā utsṛṣṭā yena sarvaloka udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭo 'bhūt/
K10divyav_u:4740: 097.019. dṛṣṭvā ca punastīrthyānāmantrayate--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/

K10divyav_u:4745: 097.023. ratnakenāpyārāmikena gandhamādanādaśokavṛkṣamānīya bhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapasya pṛṣṭhataḥ sthāpitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4746: 097.024. atha rājā prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
K10divyav_u:4749: 097.026. kiṃ tvaṃ jñāsyasi kena etadvidarśitamasmābhirvā śramaṇena gautamena?
K10divyav_u:4752: 097.028. ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī ṣaḍvikāraṃ kampati prakampati saṃprakampati/

K10divyav_u:4767: 098.005. atha teṣām ṛṣīṇāmetadabhavat--kimarthaṃ mahāpṛthivīcālaḥ saṃvṛtta iti/

K10divyav_u:4770: 098.008. adrākṣuste ṛṣayo bhagavantaṃ dūrādeva dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ

K10divyav_u:4774: 098.010. dṛṣṭvā ca punar na tathā dvādaśavarṣe 'bhyastaśamatho yogācārasya cittasya kalyatāṃ janayati,
K10divyav_u:4775: aputrasya vā putraḥ pratilambho daridrasya vā nidhidarśanaṃ rājyābhinandino vā rājyābhiṣeko yathā tatprathamatapūrvabuddhāropitakuśalamūlānāṃ tatprathamato buddhadarśanam/

K10divyav_u:4780: 098.016. te bhagavatā brāhmeṇa svareṇāhūtāḥ--eta bhikṣavaścarata brahmacaryam/
K10divyav_u:4781: 098.017. sahābhidhānānmuṇḍāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ saṃghāṭīprāvṛtāḥ pātrakaravyagrahastāḥ saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmaśravo varṣaśatopasaṃpannasya bhikṣorīryāpathenāvasthitāḥ/

K10divyav_u:4784: 098.023. atha bhagavān divyamānuṣyeṇa pūjāsatkāreṇa satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito
K10divyav_u:4785: 'rhannarhatparivāro saptabhiśca nikāyaiḥ saṃpuraskṛto mahatā ca janaughena yena prātihāryamaṇḍapastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10divyav_u:4787: 098.025. bhagavataḥ kāyādraśmayo nirgatya sarvaṃ prātihāryamaṇḍapaṃ suvarṇavarṇāvabhāsaṃ kṛtavatyaḥ/

K10divyav_u:4812: 099.008. api tu na tvaṃ tīrthyair riddhyā āhūtaḥ/

K10divyav_u:4819: 099.011. tatra bhagavān rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamāmantrayate--ko mahārāja tathāgatamadhyeṣate uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ hitāya
K10divyav_u:4820: atha rājā prasenajit kauśala utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
K10divyav_u:4821: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat--ahaṃ
K10divyav_u:4822: bhadanta bhagavantamadhyeṣe uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum /

K10divyav_u:4831: 099.020. tejodhātusamāpannasya buddhasya bhagavato vividhānyarcīṃṣi kāyānniścaranti tadyathā nīlapītāni lohitānyavadātāni mañjiṣṭhāni sphaṭikavarṇāni/
K10divyav_u:4835: 099.023. yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśīti caturdiśaṃ caturvidham ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśya tān ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān pratiprasrabhya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4836: 099.024. niṣadya bhagavān rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamidamavocat--iyaṃ mahārāja tathāgatasya sarvaśrāvakasādhāraṇā ṛddhiḥ/
K10divyav_u:4837: 099.026. tatra bhagavān dvirapi rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamāmantrayate--ko mahārāja
K10divyav_u:4838: tathāgatamadhyeṣate 'sādhāraṇāyām ṛddhyāmuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ hitāya prāṇinām?

K10divyav_u:4846: 099.032. dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatām yadi laukikaṃ cittamutpādayanti,
K10divyav_u:4847: antaśaḥ kuntapipīliko 'pi prāṇī bhagavatah cetasi cittamājānanti/
K10divyav_u:4851: atha śakrabrahmādīnāṃ devānāmetadabhavat--kimarthaṃ bhagavatā laukikaṃ cittamutpāditam?
K10divyav_u:4853: 100.004. atha śakrabrahmādayo devā anekāni ca devatāśatasahasrāṇi bhagavataścetasā cittamājñāya tadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṃkuñcitaṃ vā bāhuṃ
K10divyav_u:4855: evameva śakrabrahmādayo devā anekāni ca devatāśatasahasrāṇi ca devaloke 'ntarhitāni,
K10divyav_u:4857: 100.006. atha brahmādayo devā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvaṃ niśritya niṣaṇṇāḥ/
K10divyav_u:4858: 100.008. śakrādayo devā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīktya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā vāmaṃ pārśvaṃ niśritya niṣaṇṇāḥ/
K10divyav_u:4859: 100.009. nandopanandābhyāṃ nāgarājābhyāṃ bhagavata upanāmitaṃ nirmitaṃ sahasrapatraṃ śakaṭacakramātraṃ sarvasauvarṇaṃ ratnadaṇḍaṃ padmam/
K10divyav_u:4860: 100.010. bhagavāṃśca padmakarṇikāyāṃ niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtimupasthāpya/
K10divyav_u:4864: 100.012. evaṃ bhagavatā buddhapiṇḍī nirmitā yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanamupādāya buddhā bhagavanto parṣannirmitam(?)/
K10divyav_u:4878: 100.021. bhagavatā tathā adhiṣṭhitam yathā sarvaloko 'nāvṛtamadrākṣīdbuddhāvataṃsakaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanamupādāya antato bāladārakā api,
K10divyav_u:4879: yathāpi tadbuddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena//
K10divyav_u:4880: 100.024. tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--tāvat pratigṛhṇīta bhikṣavo 'nupūrve sthitāyā buddhapiṇḍyā nimittam/
K10divyav_u:4883: 100.025. atha bhagavāṃstam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāraṃ pratiprasrabhya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4889: 100.031. saṃbuddhāvabhāsite tu loke na tārkiko bhāsate na cāsya śrāvakaḥ//6//
K10divyav_u:4890: 100.032. atha rājā prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatā uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
K10divyav_u:4893: 101.001. dvirapi prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatā uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
K10divyav_u:4895: 101.002. evamukte tīrthyā anyonyaṃ vighaṭṭayanta evāhuḥ--tvamuttiṣṭha tvamuttiṣṭheti/
K10divyav_u:4897: 101.004. tena khalu punaḥ samayena pāñciko mahāsenāpatistasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatito 'bhūt saṃnipatitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4898: 101.005. atha pāñcikasya yakṣasenāpateretadabhavat--ciramapi te ime mohapuruṣā bhagavantaṃ
K10divyav_u:4899: viheṭhayiṣyanti bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ceti viditvā tumulaṃ vātavarṣaṃ saṃjanayya mahāntamutsṛṣṭavān /
K10divyav_u:4900: 101.006. tumulena vātavarṣeṇa tīrthyāṇāṃ maṇḍapā adarśanapathe kṣiptāḥ/
K10divyav_u:4901: 101.007. tīrthyā hyaśanivarṣeṇa bādhyamānā diśo digbhyo vicalanti/
K10divyav_u:4903: 101.009. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāni/
K10divyav_u:4904: 101.009. bhagavatā tathā adhiṣṭhitam yathā tasyāṃ parṣadyekavāribindur na patitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4909: 101.012. pāñcikena yakṣasenāpatinā tīrthyā abhihitāh--ete yūyaṃ mohapuruṣā bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchadhvaṃ dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:4910: 101.013. te niṣpalāyamānāḥ kathayanti--ete vayaṃ parvataṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmaḥ,
K10divyav_u:4913: 101.016. bahavaḥ śaraṇam yānti parvatāṃśca vanāni ca/
K10divyav_u:4917: 101.020. yastu buddhaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca śaraṇaṃ gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:4924: 101.026. iti viditvā niṣpalāyan kathayati--aham yuṣmākaṃ śāsanasarvasvaṃ kathayiṣyāmi/
K10divyav_u:4931: 101.029. te kalahajātā viharanti bhaṇḍanajātā vigṛhītā vivādamāpannāḥ/
K10divyav_u:4938: 102.006. gamanāya me samayaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ kāyasya me balavīryam {na?} kiṃcit/
K10divyav_u:4939: 102.008. spṛṣṭāśca bhāvāḥ sukhaduḥkhate me anāvṛtaṃ jñānamihārhatām//12//
K10divyav_u:4941: 102.012. ācakṣva me dūṣika etamarthaṃ śītodakā kutra sā puṣkiriṇī//13//
K10divyav_u:4943: 102.015. eṣā khalu śītā puṣkiriṇī nalinī ca virājati toyadhārā/
K10divyav_u:4944: 102.017. śramaṇādhama hīnāsatpuruṣa tvamimāṃ nanu paśyasi puṣkariṇīm//14//
K10divyav_u:4946: 102.020. na tvaṃ naro nāpi ca nārikā tvaṃ śmaśrūṇi ca te nāsti na ca stanau tava/
K10divyav_u:4947: 102.022. bhinnasvaro 'si na ca cakravākah evaṃ bhavān vātahato nirucyate//15//
K10divyav_u:4948: 102.024. atha pūraṇo nirgrantho vālukāghaṭaṃ kaṇṭhe baddhvā śītikāyāṃ puṣkiriṇyāṃ patitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4950: 102.026. atha te nirgranthāḥ pūraṇaṃ mṛgayamāṇāḥ pratimārge gaṇikāṃ dṛṣṭvā pṛcchanti--bhadre,
K10divyav_u:4958: 102.033. kathaṃ sa buddhimān bhavati puruṣo vyañjanānvitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4959: 102.034. lokasya paśyato yo 'yaṃ grāme carati nagnakaḥ//18//
K10divyav_u:4962: 103.003. atha te nirgranthā yena śītikā puṣkiriṇī tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
K10divyav_u:4963: 103.003. adrākṣuste nirgranthāḥ pūraṇaṃ kāśyapaṃ puṣkiriṇyāṃ mṛtam/
K10divyav_u:4964: 103.004. kālagataṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ puṣkiriṇyā uddhṛtya ekānte chorayitvā prakrāntāḥ//
K10divyav_u:4965: 103.006. bhagavatā buddhanirmāṇo nirmito dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgato muṇḍaḥ saṃghāṭīprāvṛtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:4966: 103.007. dharmatā khalu buddhā bhagavanto nirmitena sārdhaṃ niścayaṃ kurvanti/
K10divyav_u:4976: 103.014. bhagavatā tasya mahājanakāyasya tathā abhiprasannasya āśayaṃ cānuśayaṃ ca dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhakī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10divyav_u:4983: 103.019. yadbhūyasā sā parṣad buddhaniṃnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā/
K10divyav_u:4984: 103.020. atha bhagavāṃstāṃ parṣadaṃ buddhaniṃnāṃ dharmapravaṇāṃ saṃghaprāgbhārāṃ vyavasthāpyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ//
K10divyav_u:4985: 103.022. dhanyāste puruṣā loke ye buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ/
K10divyav_u:4994: 104.002. buddho bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme/
K10divyav_u:4995: 104.002. tena khalu punaḥ samayena śiśumāragirau bodho nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati
K10divyav_u:4996: āḍhyo mahādhāno mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
K10divyav_u:4998: 104.005. sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
K10divyav_u:4999: 104.005. tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
K10divyav_u:5002: vaidyaprajñaptaiścāhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair nātilavaṇair nātimadhurair nātikaṭukair nātikaṣāyaistiktāmlalavaṇamadhurakaṭukakaṣāyavivarjitairāhāraiḥ/
K10divyav_u:5003: 104.008. hārārdhahārabhūṣitagātrā apsareva nandanavanacāriṇī mañcānmañcaṃ pīṭhātpīṭhamanavatarantī adharimāṃ bhūmim/
K10divyav_u:5004: 104.010. na cāsyāḥ kiṃcidamanojñaśabdaśravaṇam yāvadeva garbhasya paripākāya/
K10divyav_u:5005: 104.010. sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
K10divyav_u:5006: 104.011. dārikā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prādādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā/
K10divyav_u:5007: 104.012. tasyāstrīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātimahaṃ kṛtvā varṇasaṃsthānaviśeṣānurūpaṃ nāmadheyaṃ vyapasthāpitam/
K10divyav_u:5008: 104.013. sā dhātryaṅkagatā unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā saripimaṇḍenānyaiśca cottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
K10divyav_u:5011: tadā rūpiṇī yauvanānurūpayā ācāravihāraceṣṭayā devakanyeva tadgṛhamavabhāsamānā sugṛtsambandhibāndhavānāmantarjanasya ca prītimutpādayati/
K10divyav_u:5012: 104.016. tasyāstādṛśīṃ vibhūtiṃ śrutvā nānādeśanivāsrājaputrā amātyaputrā gṛhapatiputrā dhaninaḥ śreṣṭhiputrāḥ sārthavāhaputrāśca bhāryārtham yācanakān preṣayanti/
K10divyav_u:5014: tathā tathā bodho gṛhapatiḥ sutarāṃ prītimutpādayati/
K10divyav_u:5018: kiṃ tu yo mama kulaśīlena vā dhanena vā sadṛśo bhavati,
K10divyav_u:5021: 104.021. anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā śrutam yathā śiśumāragirau bodho gṛhapatistasya duhitā evaṃ rūpayauvanasamuditā,
K10divyav_u:5022: sā nānādeśanivāsināṃ rājāmātyagṛhapatidhanināṃ śreṣṭhisārthavāhaputrāṇāmarthāya prārthyata iti/
K10divyav_u:5023: 104.023. śrutvā ca punarasyaitadabhavat--ahamapi tāvat tāṃ putrasyārthāya prārthayāmi/
K10divyav_u:5024: 104.024. kadācid bodho gṛhapatirdadyāditi viditvā tasyā yācanakāḥ preṣitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:5025: 104.024. bodhena gṛhapatinā anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapateḥ samudācāradhanasampadaṃ ca vicārya dattā/
K10divyav_u:5026: 104.025. anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā mahatā śrīsamudayena putrasya pariṇītā/
K10divyav_u:5027: 104.026. yāvat punarapi bodhasya gṛhapateḥ patnyā sārdhaṃ krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
K10divyav_u:5036: 104.031. iti śrutvā bodho gṛhapatiḥ paraṃ viṣādamāpannaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5044: udyānaṃ gatvā tiṣṭhāmīti viditvā tena pauruṣeyā uktāh--yadi me kaścinmahānanartha utpadyate,
K10divyav_u:5045: sa śrāvayitavyo nānya ityuktvā udyānaṃ gatvā avasthito yāvadasyāsau patnī prasūtā/
K10divyav_u:5047: 105.005. anyatamaḥ puruṣastvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ bodhasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:5059: 105.009. tadanantarameva dvitīyapuruṣastathaiva tvaritatvaritamaśruparyākulekṣaṇo bodhasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:5069: 105.014. atha tasya jñātayo lokadharmānuvṛttyā avajñāpūrvakena nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpayitumārabdhāh--kiṃ bhavatu dāraksya nāmeti/
K10divyav_u:5071: 105.015. apare kathayanti--yena bodhasya gṛhapateḥ kukṣigatenaivānekadhanasamuditaṃ gṛhaṃ nidhanamupanītam,
K10divyav_u:5073: api tu ayaṃ pitrā jātamātraḥ svāgatavādena samudācaritaḥ,
K10divyav_u:5074: tasmādasya svāgata iti nāma bhavatu iti/
K10divyav_u:5077: tathā tathā bodhasya gṛhapaterdhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇadāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyāstanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti/
K10divyav_u:5081: 105.022. ye 'pyasya pauruṣeyāḥ paṇyamādāya deśāntaragatā mahāsamudram yāvattīrṇāḥ,
K10divyav_u:5088: 105.026. kecidbodhasya gṛhapateḥ prāṇaviyogaṃ śrutvā tatraiva avasthitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:5091: kecit tatraivāvasthitāḥ svāgatasya vācamapi na prayacchanti/
K10divyav_u:5094: kecidanyāśrayeṇa tatraivāvasthitāḥ santaḥ svāgatasya nāmāpi na gṛhṇanti/
K10divyav_u:5095: 105.030. kiṃ tu bodhasyaikā purāṇavṛddhā dāsī kṛtajñatayā svāgatasyopasthānaṃ kurvantī tiṣṭhati/
K10divyav_u:5097: 105.031. sā saṃlakṣayati--bodhasya gṛhapatergṛhamanekadhanasamuditaṃ vistīrṇasvajanabandhuvargaṃ prabhūtadāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyam<106> paryādānaṃ
K10divyav_u:5101: 106.002. tayā svāgatasya nāṃnā sthālyāṃ taṇḍulān prakṣipya bhaktārtham yojitā vinaṣṭāḥ/
K10divyav_u:5105: 106.004. etamāgamya bodhasya gṛhapatergṛhamanekadhanasamuditaṃ vistīrṇasvajanabandhuvargaṃ prabhūtadāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ
K10divyav_u:5108: atra prāptakālaṃ sarvathā yāvat prāṇaviyogo na bhavati tāvanniṣpalāyeyem/
K10divyav_u:5111: 106.008. tasmiñ śūnye gṛhe śvānaḥ praviśya kalahaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ/
K10divyav_u:5113: 106.009. sa śvānakalahaṃ śrutvā saṃlakṣayati--bodhasya gṛhapatergṛhe śvānaḥ kaliṃ kurvanti/
K10divyav_u:5116: 106.010. sa tatra praviṣṭo yāvat paśyati śūnyam/
K10divyav_u:5119: 106.012. tataḥ svāgato bhojanavelāṃ jñātvā lekhaśālāyāḥ svagṛhamāgato bhoktumiti yāvat paśyati śūnyam/
K10divyav_u:5126: 106.015. sa teṣāṃ sakāśaṃ gato yāvattatra kaliḥ prādurbhūtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5127: 106.016. te kalahaṃ kṛtvā vyupaśāntāḥ parasparaṃ kathayanti--bhavantaḥ,
K10divyav_u:5138: 106.021. tasmādapi niṣkāsito yāvat kroḍamallānāṃ madhye praviṣṭaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5143: vayaṃ pūrve yatra yatra gacchāmastataḥ pūrṇahastāḥ pūrṇamallakā āgacchāmaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5144: 106.024. idānīṃ ko yogo yena vayaṃ riktahastakā riktamallakā nairāśyamāpannā ihāgatā iti?
K10divyav_u:5145: tatraike kathayanti--nūnaṃ ko 'pi mandabhāgyo 'smākaṃ madhye praviṣṭo yena vayaṃ riktahastā riktamallakā ihāgatā iti/
K10divyav_u:5149: 106.028. tatra yeṣāṃ madhye svāgataste tathaiva nirbhartsitā niṣkāsitāśca nairāśyamāpannā riktahastā riktamallāśca yathānilayamāgatāḥ/
K10divyav_u:5151: 106.030. ye te riktahastakā riktapātrā āgatāste bhūyo dvidhā bhūtvā praviṣṭāḥ/
K10divyav_u:5152: 106.030. tatra teṣāmapi yeṣāṃ madhye svāgataste tathaiva riktahastā riktamallakāścāgatāḥ/
K10divyav_u:5153: 106.031. te bhūyo dvidhā bhūtā evam yāvat svāgatakroḍamallakau praviṣṭau riktahastau riktamallakau āgatau/
K10divyav_u:5155: 107.001. tataste kroḍamallakāḥ sarve saṃbhūya saṃkalpaṃ kartumārabdhāh--bhavantaḥ,
K10divyav_u:5156: ayaṃ mandabhāgyo 'smākaṃ madhye praviṣṭho yena vayaṃ riktahastā rikmallakāścāgatāḥ/
K10divyav_u:5158: 107.003. sa taiḥ prabhūtān prahārān dattvā śirasi ca mallakaṃ bhaṅktvā niṣkāsitaḥ//
K10divyav_u:5159: 107.004. atrāntare yāvacchrāvasteyo vaṇijo bodhasya gṛhapatervayasyaḥ paṇyamādāya śiśumāragirimanuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5160: 107.005. tena svāgato mallakena hastagatena pīṭhīṃ gato mukhabimbakena pratyabhijñāta uktaśca--putra tvaṃ bodhagṛhapateḥ putra iti?
K10divyav_u:5163: 107.006. sa muhūrtaṃ tūṣṇīṃ sthitvā aśruparyākulekṣaṇaḥ kathayati--putra,
K10divyav_u:5166: sa āha--teṣāmapi kecit kālagatāḥ kecidihaiva tiṣṭhanto vācamapi na prayacchanti/
K10divyav_u:5172: 107.011. ye vaṇikpauruṣeyāḥ paṇyaṃ gṛhītvā dhanārthino deśāntaraṃ mahāsamudraṃ cāvatīrṇāḥ,
K10divyav_u:5179: 107.015. sa dīrghamuṣṇaṃ ca niśvasya kathayati--putra śrāvastīṃ kiṃ na gacchasi?
K10divyav_u:5191: 107.019. tena tau kārṣāpaṇau khustavastrānte baddhvā sthāpitau,
K10divyav_u:5195: 107.021. yāvadasau vaṇik paṇyaṃ visarjayitvā pratipaṇyamādāya svāgataṃ vaismṛtya saṃprasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5203: 107.024. te taṃ khaṭucapeṭādibhistāḍayitvā ardhacandrakāreṇa grīvāyāṃ gṛhītvā niṣkāsitumārabdhāḥ/
K10divyav_u:5212: yamāgamya bodhasya gṛhapateranekadhanasamuditaṃ sasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavaṃ gṛhaṃ vinaṣṭam,
K10divyav_u:5222: 107.031. sa mātāpitṛviyogapratispardhinā pūrvakarmāparādhaprabhāveṇa duḥkhadaurmanasyena saṃtāpitamanāḥ sāśrukaṇṭhastūṣṇīmavasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5225: 108.001. sa sārthavāhastasyāhāraṃ patrapuṭake baddhvā kiṃcidbhūmau pāṃśunā praticchādya sthāpayati,
K10divyav_u:5232: 108.004. asthānamanavakāśo yaccaramabhavikaḥ sattvo 'samprāpte viśeṣādhigame so 'ntarā kālaṃ kuryāt/
K10divyav_u:5235: 108.006. yāvat tasya bhaginyāḥ santikā preṣyadārikā udakārthinī kumbhamādāya gatā/
K10divyav_u:5238: tvaṃ bodhasya gṛhapateḥ śuśumāragirīyakasya putra iti?
K10divyav_u:5239: sa kathayati--evaṃ māṃ bhaginījanaḥ saṃjānīta iti/
K10divyav_u:5240: 108.009. sā aśruparyākulekṣaṇā bāṣpoparudhyamānakaṇṭhā urasi prahāraṃ dattvā karuṇādīnavilambitākṣaraṃ praṣṭumārabdhā/
K10divyav_u:5245: kecit tatraiva tiṣṭhanto vācamapi na prayacchanti/
K10divyav_u:5251: kiṃcidanyapauruṣeyā gṛhītvā dhanārthino deśāntaraṃ mahāsamudraṃ cāvatīrṇāḥ/
K10divyav_u:5259: 108.019. sā dīrghamuṣṇaṃ ca niśvasya kathayati--ihaiva tiṣṭha yāvatte bhaginyāḥ kathayāmīti/
K10divyav_u:5265: 108.021. kārṣāpaṇāṃśca dattvā uktā ca--sa vaktavyo yadi te bhāgineyo vā bhāgineyikā vā upasaṃkrāmati,
K10divyav_u:5268: 108.023. sā vastrāṇyādāya kārṣāpaṇāṃśca tasya sakāśaṃ gatā kathayati--imāni te vastrāṇi kārṣāpaṇāśca bhaginyā preṣitāni,
K10divyav_u:5269: kathayati ca--yadi te bhāgineyo vā bhāgineyikā vā upasaṃkrāmati,
K10divyav_u:5279: 108.029. sa ca mārgapariśramakhinnena kṣudhārtena na śakyate kartum/
K10divyav_u:5287: na tvayā śrutam yathā śrāvastyāmudyānamoṣakāḥ puruṣāḥ pratidinamanvāhiṇḍyante?
K10divyav_u:5294: 109.003. sa vigatamadyamadaḥ pratibuddho yāvat paśyati tānyevānantakāni(?)
K10divyav_u:5301: 109.006. sā gatā yāvat paśyati muṣitakaṃ tenaiva veṣeṇāvasthitam/
K10divyav_u:5304: 109.008. sā saṃlakṣayati--yamāgamya bodhasya gṛhapateranekadhanasamuditaṃ sasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavaṃ gṛhaṃ vinaṣṭam,
K10divyav_u:5312: tatra tatra nirbhatsyante ca niṣkāsyante ca/
K10divyav_u:5315: vayaṃ pūrvam yatra yatra gacchāmastataḥ pūrṇahastāḥ pūrṇamallakā gacchāmaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5316: 109.014. idānīṃ ko yogo yena vayaṃ riktahastā riktamallakā nairāśyamāpannā ihāgatā iti?
K10divyav_u:5317: tatraike kathayanti--nūnaṃ ko 'pi mandabhāgyo 'smākaṃ madhye praviṣṭo yena vayaṃ riktahastā riktamallakā ihāgatā iti/
K10divyav_u:5321: te tathaiva nirbhartsitā niṣkāsitāśca nairāśyamāpannā riktahastā riktamallakāścāgatāḥ/
K10divyav_u:5327: 109.020. te bhūyo dvidhā bhūtā evam yāvat svāgato 'nyaśca kroḍamallakaḥ praviṣṭaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5330: 109.022. te kroḍamallakāḥ sarve saṃbhūya saṃjalpaṃ kartumārabdhāh--bhavantaḥ,
K10divyav_u:5331: ayaṃ mandabhāgyasattvo 'smākaṃ madhye praviṣṭo yena vayaṃ riktahastā riktamallakāścāgatāḥ/
K10divyav_u:5333: 109.024. sa taiḥ prabhūtān prahārān dattvā śirasi ca mallakaṃ bhaṅktvā niṣkāsitaḥ//
K10divyav_u:5335: 109.026. tena dauvārikāṇāmājñā dattā--na tāvat kasyacit kroḍamallakasya praveśo dātavyo yāvadbuddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena bhuktam/
K10divyav_u:5337: 109.027. kroḍamallakā ye tasya gṛhaṃ pratiśaraṇabhūtāste sarve saṃnipatitāḥ praveṣṭumārabdhāḥ/
K10divyav_u:5340: asmākameva nāṃnā ayaṃ gṛhapatiḥ prajñāyate anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiriti/
K10divyav_u:5342: sa kathayati--gṛhapatinā ājñādattā--na tāvat kasyacit kroḍamallakasya praveśo dātavyo yāvadbuddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena bhuktam/
K10divyav_u:5346: 110.001. taṃ paśyata mā atrāryā durāgata āgato bhavediti/
K10divyav_u:5347: 110.001. te samanveṣṭitumārabdhā yāvat paśyantyekasmin pradeśe nilīyāvasthitam/
K10divyav_u:5348: 110.002. tatastaiḥ kolāhalaśabdaḥ kṛtah--ayaṃ bhavantaḥ sa durāgato nilīnastiṣṭhatīti/
K10divyav_u:5349: 110.003. sa taiḥ prabhūtān prahārān datvā niṣkāsitastīvreṇa ca paryavasthānena śirasi mallakena prahāro dattaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5352: 110.005. tatastairhastapādeṣu gṛhītvā saṃkārakūṭe kṣiptah--durāgata atra tiṣṭheti/
K10divyav_u:5354: 110.006. yāvadbhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yenānāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5356: kṛśamalpasthānaṃ malinajīrṇavāsonivasitaṃ śirasā bhagnena rudhireṇa pragharatā anyaiśca vraṇaiścākīrṇaiḥ,
K10divyav_u:5358: 110.010. dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--tṛpyata bhikṣavaḥ sarvabhavopapattibhyaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5361: 110.011. tatra bhagavāṃs taṃ svāgatamāmantrayate--ākāṅkṣase vatsa pātraśeṣam? bhagavan/
K10divyav_u:5366: 110.016. anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā
K10divyav_u:5367: praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastena saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ
K10divyav_u:5368: viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10divyav_u:5372: 110.020. āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pātraṃ gṛhītumārabdho yāvat paśyati tatra pātraśeṣaṃ na saṃsthāpitam/
K10divyav_u:5377: 110.022. sa kathayati--na mayā bhadanta bhagavataḥ kadācidājñā pratyūḍhapūrveti/
K10divyav_u:5378: 110.023. kiṃ kṛtam? svāgatasya pātraśeṣaṃ na sthāpitamiti/
K10divyav_u:5380: api tu svāgatasyaiva tāni karmāṇi labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayānyoghavatpratyupasthitānyavaśyabhāvīni yena tava vismṛtam/
K10divyav_u:5385: 110.027. svāgatasya tadapi vismṛtam yadbhagavatā pratijñātam--tava pātraśeṣaṃ sthāpayiṣyāmīti/
K10divyav_u:5386: 110.028. sa saṃlakṣayati--ko 'pyayaṃ puṇyakarmā bhagavatā trailokyaguruṇā samanvāhṛtaḥ śabdata iti/
K10divyav_u:5388: 110.029. bhagavan svāgata ityuktvā anekaiḥ prativacanaṃ dattam/
K10divyav_u:5391: gatvā kathaya--yo bodhasya gṛhapateḥ śuśumāragirīyasya putraḥ svāgataḥ,
K10divyav_u:5393: 110.031. āyuṣmatā ānandena gatvoccaiḥ śabdairuktah--yo bodhasya gṛhapateḥ śuśumāragirīyakasya putraḥ svāgataḥ,
K10divyav_u:5399: 111.003. teṣāṃ sarvajña nātho 'si ye hi tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ/
K10divyav_u:5400: 111.004. teṣāṃ svāgatamāryāṇām ye ca te śāsane ratāḥ//2//
K10divyav_u:5402: 111.006. śocyaḥ kaṣṭāṃ daśāṃ prāptaḥ śokaśalyasamarpitaḥ//3// iti/
K10divyav_u:5408: 111.009. sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃlakṣayati--yadyapyahaṃ bhagavatā trailokyaguruṇā daivāt samanvāhṛtaḥ,
K10divyav_u:5412: yadi tvaṃ sumerumātraiḥ piṇḍaiḥ samudrasadṛśena kuṣkiṇā paribhokṣyase,
K10divyav_u:5415: 111.013. tena tāvad bhuktam yāvat tṛpta iti/
K10divyav_u:5424: 111.016. caramabhavikaḥ sa sattvo bhagavantaṃ pṛṣṭataḥ pṛṣṭataḥ samanubaddhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5425: 111.017. yāvadbhagavān vihāraṃ gatvā purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5426: 111.017. so 'pi bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5434: 111.020. vastrāntaṃ nirīkṣitumārabdho yāvat paśyati dvau kārṣāpaṇau/
K10divyav_u:5446: 111.025. nīlotpalairasti kāryaṃ me tathānyair nāpi paṅkajaiḥ/
K10divyav_u:5450: 111.028. ehyehi yadi dūto 'si tasya śāntātmano muneḥ/
K10divyav_u:5467: 112.003. sa vṛddhānte sthitvā tāni puṣpāṇi dṛṣṭvā sutarāṃ nirīkṣitumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5473: 112.006. tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idameva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
K10divyav_u:5479: 112.011. so 'rhattvaṃ prāpto vimuktisukhapratisaṃvedī tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
K10divyav_u:5483: 112.015. āgato 'smi purā nātha śrutvā vākyaṃ tavottamam//7//
K10divyav_u:5486: 112.018. ratnāni pratilebhe hi svargaṃ mokṣaṃ ca kāṅkṣatām/
K10divyav_u:5487: 112.019. śreṣṭhā kalyāṇamitrāṇāṃ sadā sevā hitaiṣiṇām//9// iti/
K10divyav_u:5488: 112.020. yadā āyuṣmān svāgataḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitaḥ,
K10divyav_u:5489: tadā sāmantakena śabdo visṛtah--śramaṇena gautamenāsau durāgataḥ kroḍamallakaḥ pravrajitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5491: 112.021. te 'vadhyāyanti kṣipanti vivādayanti--śramaṇo bhavanto gautama evamāha--sāmantaprāsādikaṃ me śāsanamiti/
K10divyav_u:5492: 112.023. atra kiṃ sāmantaprāsādikamityasya yatredānīṃ durāgataprabhṛtayo 'pi kroḍamallakāḥ pravrajantīti?
K10divyav_u:5494: 112.024. bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--sumeruprakhyo mahāśrāvake mahājanakāyaḥ prasādaṃ pravedayate/
K10divyav_u:5498: 112.026. iti jñātvā ānandamāmantrayate sma--gaccha ānanda bhikṣūṇāmārocaya--tathāgato bhikṣavo bhargeṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cariṣyati/
K10divyav_u:5499: 112.027. yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ bhargeṣu cārikāṃ cartum,
K10divyav_u:5501: 112.028. evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣūṇāmārocayati--bhagavānāyuṣmanto bhargeṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cariṣyati/
K10divyav_u:5502: 112.029. yo yuṣmākamutsahate bhagavatā sārdhaṃ bhargeṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caritum,
K10divyav_u:5504: 112.031. atha bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāro mukto muktaparivāra
K10divyav_u:5505: āśvasta āśvastaparivāro vinīto vinītaparivāro 'rhannarhatparivāro vītarāgo vītarāgaparivāraḥ
K10divyav_u:5506: prāsādikah <113>prasādikaparivāro vṛṣabha iva gogaṇaparivṛto gaja iva kalabhaparivṛtaḥ
K10divyav_u:5507: siṃha iva daṃṣṭṛgaṇaparivṛto haṃsarāja iva haṃsagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suparṇīva pakṣigaṇaparivṛto
K10divyav_u:5508: vipra iva śiṣyagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suvaidya ivāturagaṇaparivṛtaḥ śūra iva yodhagaṇaparivṛto
K10divyav_u:5509: deśika ivādhvagagaṇaparivṛtaḥ sārthavāha iva vaṇiggaṇaparivṛtaḥ śreṣṭhīva pauragaṇaparivṛtaḥ
K10divyav_u:5510: koṭṭarāja iva mantrigaṇaparivṛtaścakravartīva putrasahasraparivṛtaścandra iva nakṣatragaṇaparivṛtaḥ
K10divyav_u:5511: sūrya iva raśmisahasraparivṛto dhṛtarāṣṭra iva gandharvagaṇaparivṛto virūḍhaka iva
K10divyav_u:5512: kumbhāṇḍagaṇaparivṛto virūpakṣa iva nāgagaṇaparivṛto dhanada iva yakṣagaṇaparivṛto
K10divyav_u:5514: brahmakāyikagaṇaparivṛtaḥ stimati iva jalanidhiḥ sajala iva jaladharo vimada iva
K10divyav_u:5517: jaṅgama iva ratnaparvataḥ samantato bhadrako daśabhirbalaiścaturbhir vaiśāradyaistribhirāveṇikaiḥ
K10divyav_u:5519: parivṛto 'nyena ca mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena yena śuśumāragiristenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10divyav_u:5522: 113.014. aśrauṣuḥ śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayah--bhagavān bhargeṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ carañ śuśumāragirimanuprāptaḥ śuśumāragirau viharati bhīṣaṇikāvane mṛgadāva iti/
K10divyav_u:5523: 113.016. śrutvā ca punaḥ saṃghāt saṃghaṃ pūgātpūgaṃ saṃgamya śuśumāragirer niṣkramya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
K10divyav_u:5524: 113.017. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
K10divyav_u:5525: 113.018. śuśumāragirīyakān brāhamaṇagṛhapatīn dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
K10divyav_u:5526: 113.019. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
K10divyav_u:5532: viditvā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato
K10divyav_u:5534: 113.025. atha śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayastāmeva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ
K10divyav_u:5535: samudānīya kālyamevotthāya āsanakāni prajñapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato
K10divyav_u:5537: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
K10divyav_u:5538: 113.028. atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena śuśumāragirīyakānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ
K10divyav_u:5540: 113.030. śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastena saṃtarpayanti saṃpravārayanti/
K10divyav_u:5541: 113.032. anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena <114>bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya
K10divyav_u:5542: saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ
K10divyav_u:5544: 114.002. atha bhagavāñ śuśumāragirīyakān brāhmaṇagṛhapatīn dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
K10divyav_u:5545: 114.004. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm//
K10divyav_u:5546: 114.005. atha śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo bhagavantamidamavocat--bhagavatā bhadanta nānādeśeṣu nānādhiṣṭhāneṣu te te duṣṭanāgā duṣṭayakṣāśca
K10divyav_u:5547: 114.006. ayaṃ bhadanta aśvatīrthiko nāgo 'smākamavairāṇāṃ vairī asapatnānāṃ sapatno 'drugdhānāṃ drugdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5553: 114.010. atha bhagavāñ śuśumāragirīyakānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5554: 114.011. atha bhagavān vihāraṃ gatvā purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5557: śalākāṃ cāraya--yo yuṣmākamutsahate aśvatīrthikaṃ nāgaṃ vinetum,
K10divyav_u:5559: 114.014. evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣusaṃghasyārocayitvā buddhapramukhe bhikṣusaṃghe śalākāṃ cārayitumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5561: 114.015. sthavirā bhikṣavaḥ samanvāhartuṃ saṃvṛttāh--kimarthaṃ bhagavatā śalākā na gṛhītā iti?
K10divyav_u:5564: 114.017. āyuṣmān svāgataḥ samanvāhartuṃ pravṛttah--kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavatā śalākā na gṛhītā sthavirasthaviraiśca bhikṣubhiriti?
K10divyav_u:5568: 114.019. tenārdhāsanaṃ muktvā gajabhujasadṛśaṃ bāhumabhiprasārya śalākā gṛhītā/
K10divyav_u:5570: 114.021. pṛcchati buddho bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandam--katareṇānanda bhikṣuṇā śalākā gṛhīteti?
K10divyav_u:5575: 114.023. evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yenāyuṣmān svāgatastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5582: tathāpi me te romāpi neñjayituṃ samarthāḥ syuḥ,
K10divyav_u:5585: 114.029. athāyuṣmān svāgatastasyā eva rātreratyayātpūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śuśumāragiriṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
K10divyav_u:5586: 114.030. śuśumāragiriṃ piṇḍāya caritvā yenāśvatīrthikasya nāgasya bhavanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5588: 114.031. dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kimanene śramaṇakena mama mṛtipravṛttir yena me bhavanamāgacchatīti?
K10divyav_u:5591: 115.001. athāyuṣmān svāgatastasya hradaṃ gatvā pātracīvaramekāntamupasaṃkṣipya pādau
K10divyav_u:5592: prakṣālya hastau nirmādya pānīyaṃ parisrāvya jīrṇaparṇakāni samudānīya niṣadya bhaktakṛtyaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ /
K10divyav_u:5596: 115.004. tena pātraṃ pakṣālya tatpātrodakaṃ tasmin hrade prakṣiptam/
K10divyav_u:5602: 115.007. uparivihāyasamabhyudgamya āyuṣmataḥ svāgatasyopari cakrakaṇapaparaśubhindipālādīni praharaṇāni kṣeptumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5606: 115.010. tadapi divyāni puṣpāṇi māndārakāṇi bhūtvā kāye nipatitumārabdham/
K10divyav_u:5613: 115.015. iti tatrāśvatīrthikasya nāgasya krodhasyānubhāvenāyuṣmataḥ svāgatasya ṛddhyanubhāvena
K10divyav_u:5614: mahānavabhāsaḥ prādurbhūto yaṃ dṛṣṭvā śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ saṃbhrāntāh
K10divyav_u:5620: 115.019. tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāmabhīkṣṇaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpadyamānānām yaduta svāgato
K10divyav_u:5624: 115.022. aśvatīrthako nāgo yām yāṃ diśaṃ gacchati,
K10divyav_u:5625: tāṃ tāṃ diśamādīptāṃ pradīptāṃ saṃprajvalitāmekajvālībhūtāṃ paśyati/
K10divyav_u:5626: 115.023. sa itaścāmutaśca nairmāṇikenāgninā paryākulīkṛto 'trāṇaḥ sarvamaśāntaṃ paśyati nānyatrāyuṣmata eva svāgatasya samīpaṃ śāntaṃ śītibhūtam/
K10divyav_u:5632: 115.027. yadi mayā evaṃvidhā guṇagaṇā nādhigatā abhaviṣyan,
K10divyav_u:5643: 115.031. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5644: 115.032. ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān svāgato bhagavantamidamavocat--ayaṃ so 'śvatīrthiko<116> nāga iti/
K10divyav_u:5647: 116.002. sa tvametarhi hataprahataniviṣṭaḥ paraprāṇaharaḥ paraprāṇoparodhena jīvikāṃ kalpayasi/
K10divyav_u:5659: 116.008. atha śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ prabhūtamabhisāraṃ gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
K10divyav_u:5660: 116.009. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
K10divyav_u:5661: 116.009. ekāntaniṣaṇṇāḥ śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo bhagavantamidamavocat--bhagavatā bhadanta aśvatīrthiko nāgo vinītah?
K10divyav_u:5672: bhagavān bhadantasvāgatamāgamya bhaktaṃ saptāhena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti /
K10divyav_u:5674: 116.018. atha śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt
K10divyav_u:5675: 116.020. śuśumāragirau anyatamo brāhmaṇa ahituṇḍiko bodhasya gṛhapatervayasyaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5677: 116.021. sa rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena hastimadhyasyopari viśvāsikaḥ sthāpitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5679: 116.022. tena śrutam yathā svāgatena bhikṣuṇā bodhasya gṛhapateḥ putreṇāśvatīrthiko nāgo vinīta iti/
K10divyav_u:5681: 116.024. upasaṃkramyāyuṣmataḥ svāgatasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5682: 116.025. sa brāhmaṇa āyuṣmantaṃ svāgatamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu me āryasvāgata śvo 'ntargṛhe bhakteneti/
K10divyav_u:5689: tadā mama gṛhe tatprathamataḥ piṇḍapātaḥ paribhoktavya iti/
K10divyav_u:5692: 116.030. atha bhagavān yathābhiramyaṃ śuśumāragirau vihṛtya yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5695: 116.032. aśrauṣīdanāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatirbhagavān bhargeṣu janapadacārikām<117> carañ śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ,
K10divyav_u:5697: 117.001. śrutvā ca punaḥ śrāvastyā niṣkramya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5698: 117.002. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5699: 117.003. ekāntaniṣaṇṇamanāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
K10divyav_u:5700: 117.004. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
K10divyav_u:5702: praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu me bhagavāñ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti /
K10divyav_u:5704: 117.008. athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatirbhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5705: 117.010. aśrauṣīt sa brāhmaṇo bhagavān bhargeṣu janapadacārikāṃ carannihānuprāpta ihaiva viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāma iti/
K10divyav_u:5707: 117.011. upasaṃkramyāyuṣmantaṃ svāgatamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu me āryaḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhakteneti/
K10divyav_u:5709: 117.013. atha sa brāhmaṇa āyuṣmantaḥ svāgatasya tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5710: 117.014. athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatistāmeva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ
K10divyav_u:5711: samudānīya kālyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena
K10divyav_u:5713: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
K10divyav_u:5714: 117.017. atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yenānāthapiṇḍadasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5715: 117.018. tenāpi brāhmaṇenāyuṣmataḥ svāgatasya praṇīta āhāraḥ sajjīkṛtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5716: 117.019. āyuṣmānapi svāgataḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya yena tasya brāhmaṇasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5718: 117.021. ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān svāgatastena brāhmaṇena praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5719: 117.021. sa brāhmaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--āryeṇa svāgatena praṇīta āhāraḥ paribhuktaḥ,
K10divyav_u:5731: 117.026. tato dakṣiṇādeśanāṃ kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ śrāvastīvīthīṃ kiliñjacchannām/
K10divyav_u:5732: 117.027. sa tāmatikrānta ātapena spṛṣṭo madyakṣiptaḥ pṛthivyāṃ nipatitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5734: 117.028. bhagavatā suparṇikā kuṭir nirmitā--maitaṃ kaścid dṛṣṭvā śāsane 'prasādaṃ pravedayiṣyatīti/
K10divyav_u:5735: 117.029. anāthapiṇḍadaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena svahastena saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati/
K10divyav_u:5736: 117.030. anekaparyāyeṇa svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ
K10divyav_u:5737: viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10divyav_u:5738: 117.032. atha bhagavānanāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ dharmyayā kathayā <118>saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5740: 118.002. atha bhagavāṃstān ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān pratiprasrabhya bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--ayaṃ sa bhikṣavaḥ svāgato bhikṣuryenāśvatrīrthiko nāgastāvaccaṇḍo
K10divyav_u:5744: 118.004. tasmānna bhikṣuṇā madyaṃ pātavyaṃ dātavyaṃ vā/
K10divyav_u:5745: 118.005. atha bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ svāgataṃ madyavaśāt suptamutthāpyedamavocat--svāgata, kimidam?
K10divyav_u:5748: 118.006. tato bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ svāgatamādāya vihāraṃ gatvā purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5749: 118.007. niṣadya bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--māṃ bho bhikṣavaḥ śāstāramuddiśya bhavadbhirmadyamapeyamadeyamantataḥ kuśāgreṇāpi//
K10divyav_u:5750: 118.009. bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā svāgatena karma kṛtam yenāḍhye kule mahādhane mahābhoge jātah?
K10divyav_u:5751: kiṃ karma kṛtam yena kroḍamallako jātaḥ,
K10divyav_u:5753: kiṃ karma kṛtam yena bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam,
K10divyav_u:5755: bhagavānāha--svāgatenaiva bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavatpratyupasthitānyavaśyabhāvīni/
K10divyav_u:5758: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10divyav_u:5762: api tu upātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
K10divyav_u:5764: 118.019. sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//10//
K10divyav_u:5765: 118.020. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasmin karvaṭake gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
K10divyav_u:5767: 118.022. asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
K10divyav_u:5774: 118.027. tena gṛhapatinā bhūyasā paryavasthitena sa mahātmāa svayameva grīvāyāṃ gṛhītvā niṣkāsitaḥ,
K10divyav_u:5781: 118.031. sa mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati--avatarāvatara mahādakṣiṇīya,
K10divyav_u:5784: 118.032. tena tasya <119>pūjāsatkāraṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye 'pakāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
K10divyav_u:5787: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeyam,
K10divyav_u:5790: 119.005. bhagavānāha--kiṃ kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau gṛhapatireva,
K10divyav_u:5791: asau svāgato bhikṣustena kālena tena samayena/
K10divyav_u:5798: tena mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
K10divyav_u:5799: 119.009. ahamanena pratyekabuddhakoṭiśatasahasrebhyaḥ prativiśiṣṭataraḥ śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5800: 119.010. bhūyo 'pi kāśyape bhagavati samyaksambuddhe pravrajito babhūva/
K10divyav_u:5802: sa bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksambuddhenābhīkṣṇaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpadyamānānāmagro nirdiṣṭaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5805: 119.013. sa maraṇasamaye praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā bhagavati kāśyape samyaksambuddhe 'nuttare dakṣiṇīye yādavāyurbrahmacaryaṃ caritam,
K10divyav_u:5807: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksambuddhenottaro māṇavo vyākṛtah--bhaviṣyasi
K10divyav_u:5808: tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddha iti,
K10divyav_u:5810: 119.017. yathā mām upādhyāyo bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksambuddhenābhīkṣṇaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpadyamānānāmagro nirdiṣṭaḥ,
K10divyav_u:5811: evaṃ māmapi sa bhagavāñ śākyamuniḥ śākyādhirājo 'bhīkṣṇaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpadyamānānāmagraṃ nirdiśediti/
K10divyav_u:5813: 119.020. iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10divyav_u:5816: 119.022. tasmāttarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmaṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10divyav_u:5824: 120.002. dharmatā khalu cyavanadharmaṇo devaputraysa pañca pūrvanimittāni prādurbhavanti--akliṣṭāni vāsāṃsi kliśyanti,
K10divyav_u:5828: cyavanadharmā devaputraḥ sva āsane dhṛtiṃ na labhate/
K10divyav_u:5844: 120.009. upasaṃkramya taṃ devaputramidamavocat--hā kasmāt tvaṃ mārṣa atyarthaṃ pṛthivyāmāvartase,
K10divyav_u:5857: evamukte devaputraḥ śakraṃ devānāmindramidamavocat--eṣo 'haṃ kauśika divyaṃ sukhamanubhūya itaḥ saptame divase rājagṛhe nagare sūkaryāḥ kukṣau
K10divyav_u:5858: 120.014. tatra mayā bahūni varṣāṇyuccāraprasrāvaḥ paribhoktavya iti/
K10divyav_u:5859: 120.014. atha śakro devānāmindraḥ kāruṇyatayā taṃ devaputramidamavocat--ehi tvaṃ mārṣa,
K10divyav_u:5863: 120.016. atha sa devaputrastiryagyonyupapattibhayabhīto maraṇabhayabhītaśca śakraṃ devānāmindramidamavocat--eṣo 'haṃ kauśika buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dvipadānāmagryam,
K10divyav_u:5866: 120.019. atha sa devaputrastriśaraṇaparigṛhīto bhūtvā cyutaḥ kālagatastuṣite devanikāye upapannaḥ//
K10divyav_u:5867: 120.021. dharmatā khalu adhastāddevānāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate nordhvam/
K10divyav_u:5868: 120.021. atha śakro devānāmindrastaṃ devaputramavalokayati--kimasau devaputraḥ sūkarikāyāḥ kukṣau upapanno na veti/
K10divyav_u:5876: 120.025. atha śakro devānāmindraḥ kutūhalajāto yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5877: 120.026. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5891: 120.029. tamenamevaṃ vadāmi--kasmāt tvaṃ mārṣa atyarthaṃ śocasi paridevase krandasi urasi tāḍayasi saṃmohāpadyasa iti?
K10divyav_u:5892: sa evamāha--eṣo 'haṃ kauśika divyaṃ sukhamapahāya itaḥ saptame divase rājagṛhe nagare sūkarikāyāḥ kukṣau upapatsyāmi/
K10divyav_u:5893: 120.031. tatra mayā <121>bahūni varṣāṇi uccāraprasrāvaḥ paribhoktavyaṃ bhaviṣyati/
K10divyav_u:5894: 121.001. tamenamevaṃ vadāmi--ehi tvaṃ mārṣa buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccha dvipadānāmagryam,
K10divyav_u:5897: 121.003. sa evamāha--eṣo 'haṃ kauśika buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dvipadānāmagryam,
K10divyav_u:5904: 121.006. atha śakro devānāmindra āttamānāstasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
K10divyav_u:5905: 121.008. ye buddhaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
K10divyav_u:5907: 121.010. ye dharmaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
K10divyav_u:5909: 121.012. ye saṃghaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
K10divyav_u:5911: 121.014. atha bhagavāñ śakrasya devānāmindrasya bhāṣitamanusaṃvarṇayannevamāha--evametat kauśika, evametat/
K10divyav_u:5912: 121.016. ye buddhaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
K10divyav_u:5914: 121.018. ye dharmaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
K10divyav_u:5916: 121.020. ye saṃghaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
K10divyav_u:5918: 121.022. atha śakro devānāmindro bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau
K10divyav_u:5919: śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya prāñjalikṛtasampuṭo bhagavantaṃ
K10divyav_u:5927: 122.002. dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ jīvatāṃ dhriyamāṇānām yāpayatāṃ keśanakhastūpā bhavanti/
K10divyav_u:5929: tadā bhikṣavaḥ keśanakhastūpe pujāṃ kṛtvā kecit puṇḍāya praviśanti,
K10divyav_u:5931: 122.005. tena khalu samayena buddho bhagavāṃs tathāgatamākārataḥ samanusmaraṃścittamabhiprasādayati--ityapi
K10divyav_u:5932: sa bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
K10divyav_u:5934: 122.009. atha bhagavān sāyāhṇe pratisamlayanādvyutthāya purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5935: 122.010. adrākṣīdbhagavāṃstaṃ bhikṣuṃ keśanakhastūpe sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya cittamabhiprasādayantam/
K10divyav_u:5936: 122.011. dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--paśyata yūyaṃ bhikṣava etaṃ bhikṣuṃ keśanakhastūpe sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya cittamabhiprasādayantam?
K10divyav_u:5938: 122.012. anena bhikṣuṇā yāvatī bhūmirākrāntā adho 'śītiyojanasahasrāṇi yāvat kāñcanacakramityatrāntarā
K10divyav_u:5940: 122.014. atha teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāmetadabhavat--puruṣamātrāyām yāvadgartāyāṃ na śakyate vālukā gaṇayitum,
K10divyav_u:5943: 122.016. atha te bhikṣavo na bhūyaḥ keśanakhastūpe kārāṃ kartumārabdhāḥ/
K10divyav_u:5944: 122.017. atha bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ cetasā cittamājñāya bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--anavarāgro
K10divyav_u:5948: 122.020. āyuṣmānupālī buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papraccha--yaduktaṃ bhagavatā asya bhikṣoriyatpuṇyaskandha iti,
K10divyav_u:5949: kutra bhadanta iyatpuṇyaskandhastanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gamiṣyati?
K10divyav_u:5950: nāhamupālinn ito bahiḥ samanupaśyāmyeva kṣatiṃ copahatiṃ ca yathā sabrahmacārī sabrahmacāriṇo 'ntike/
K10divyav_u:5951: 122.023. tatropālinn imāni mahānti kuśalamūlāni tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti/
K10divyav_u:5961: 123.002. tena khalu samayena anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhaptinā dvau śukaśāvakau pratilabdhau/
K10divyav_u:5962: 123.003. tena niveśanaṃ nītvā ālāpitau poṣitau saṃvardhitau mānuṣālāpaṃ ca śikṣāpitau/
K10divyav_u:5963: 123.004. tayoścāyuṣmānānando 'bhīkṣṇamāgatya caturāryasatyasamprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ karoti--yaduta idaṃ duḥkham,
K10divyav_u:5968: 123.007. teṣāṃ kālānukālamupasaṃkrāmatāṃ tābhyāṃ śukaśāvakābhyāṃ nāmāni parijñātāni/
K10divyav_u:5971: 123.009. dṛṣṭvā antarjanamāmantrayatah--eṣa bhadantaḥ sthaviraḥ śāriputra āgacchati,
K10divyav_u:5973: 123.010. evamāyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanaṃ kāśyapaṃ raivatamāyuṣmantamānandaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayatah--eṣo 'smākamācāryānanda āgacchati,
K10divyav_u:5976: 123.012. adrāṣṭāṃ tau śukaśāvakau bhagavantaṃ dūrādevāgacchantaṃ prāsādikaṃ prasādanīyaṃ
K10divyav_u:5977: śāntendriyaṃ śāntamānasaṃ parameṇa cittamatyupaśamena samanvāgataṃ suvarṇayūpamiva śriyā jvalantam /
K10divyav_u:5980: 123.016. atha bhagavāṃstayoranugrahārthaṃ praviśya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5981: 123.016. niṣadya bhagavatā śukaśāvakau caturāryasatyasamprativedhikayā dharmadeśanayā śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitau/
K10divyav_u:5982: 123.018. atha bhagavāñ śukaśāvakau antarjanaṃ ca dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:5983: 123.019. tau cāntarjanasya viharataḥ pramādavihāriṇau biḍālena prāṇinā gṛhītau/
K10divyav_u:5984: 123.020. vihvalavadanau cchidyamāneṣu marmasu mucyamāneṣu saṃdhiṣu namo buddhāya,
K10divyav_u:5989: 123.023. dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhagavantamidamavocat--nāhetupratyayaṃ bhadanta tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti/
K10divyav_u:5990: 123.024. ko bhadanta hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prāviṣkaraṇe?
K10divyav_u:5992: 123.025. nāhetupratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti/
K10divyav_u:5995: 123.026. tau ānanda śukaśāvakau mama samanantaraprakrāntasya biḍālena prāṇinā jīvitād vyaparopitau/
K10divyav_u:5996: 123.027. tau buddhadharmasaṃghāvalambanayā smṛtyā kālagatau cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣūpapannau//
K10divyav_u:5997: 123.029. atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣan/
K10divyav_u:5998: 123.030. aśrauṣuḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya pracaranto 'nāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapater niveśane śukaśāvakau--namo buddhāya,
K10divyav_u:6000: namaḥ saṃghāyeti biḍālena prāṇinā vyaparopitau<124> iti/
K10divyav_u:6001: 124.001. śrutvā ca punaḥ śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyāḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntāḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratisāmayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6002: 124.002. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6003: 124.003. ekāntaniṣaṇṇāḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavo bhagavantamidamavocan--iha vayaṃ bhadanta
K10divyav_u:6004: saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvavad yāvadanāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapater niveśane dvau śukaśāvakau--namo buddhāya,
K10divyav_u:6006: namaḥ saṃghāyeti kurvāṇau biḍālena prāṇinā jīvitādvyaparopitau iti/
K10divyav_u:6010: bhagavānāha--tau bhikṣavaḥ śukaśāvakau tasya śaraṇagamanasya vipākena ṣaṭtriṃśatkṛtvaścāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣūpapatsyete,
K10divyav_u:6016: 124.009 tatastāvat ṣaṭsu kāmāvacareṣu deveṣu sattvā vyapasaṃsṛtya paścime bhave paścime
K10divyav_u:6017: nikete paścime ātmabhāvapratilambhe manuṣyapratilābhaṃ labdhvā pratyekāṃ bodhimabhisambhotsyete,
K10divyav_u:6019: 124.011. evaṃ hi bhikṣavo mahāphalaṃ dharmaśravaṇaṃ mahānuśaṃsakam,
K10divyav_u:6021: 124.012. tasmāttarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyam yanno dharmaśravaṇābhiratā bhaviṣyāmaḥ/
K10divyav_u:6029: 125.002. ekasmin samaye bhagavān vaiśālyāṃ viharati markaṭahradatīre kūṭāgāraśālāyām/
K10divyav_u:6030: 125.003. atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
K10divyav_u:6031: 125.004. vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratisamayya yena cāpālacaityaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:6034: saptāmrakam {bahupatrakam} gautamanyagrodhaḥ śālavanaṃ dhurānikṣepanaṃ mallānāṃ makuṭabandhanaṃ caityam /
K10divyav_u:6037: 125.008. yasya kasyacidānanda catvāra ṛddhipādā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ,
K10divyav_u:6038: ākāṅkṣan sa kalpaṃ vā tiṣṭhet kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā/
K10divyav_u:6039: 125.010. tathāgatasya ānanda catvāra ṛddhipādā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6040: 125.011. ākāṅkṣamāṇastathāgataḥ kalpaṃ vā tiṣṭhet kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā/
K10divyav_u:6043: vṛjibhūmiścāpālaṃ caityaṃ saptāmrakaṃ bahupatrakaṃ gautamanyagrodhaḥ śālavanaṃ dhuranikṣepanaṃ
K10divyav_u:6047: 125.014. yasya kasyacidānanda catvāra ṛddhipādā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ,
K10divyav_u:6048: ākāṅkṣan sa kalpaṃ vā tiṣṭhet kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā/
K10divyav_u:6049: 125.016. tathāgatasya ānanda catvāra ṛddhipādā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6050: 125.016. ākāṅkṣamāṇastathāgataḥ kalpaṃ vā tiṣṭhet kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā/
K10divyav_u:6053: yatredānīm yāvat trirapi audārike avabhāsanimitte prāviṣkriyamāṇe na śaknoti tannimittamājñātum
K10divyav_u:6058: 125.021. evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagvataḥ pratiśrutya anyatamavṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya niṣaṇṇo divāvihārāya/
K10divyav_u:6062: 125.024. kasmāt tvaṃ pāpīyann evaṃ vadasi--parinirvātu bhagavān,
K10divyav_u:6064: eko 'yaṃ bhadanta samayah--bhagavānurubilvāyāṃ viharati nadyā nairañjanāyāstīre bodhimūle 'cirābhisambuddhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:6069: yāvanna me śrāvakāḥ piṇḍatā bhaviṣyanti vyaktā vinītā viśāradāḥ,
K10divyav_u:6071: alaṃ svasya vādasya paryavadāpayitāro bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇya upāsakā uapāsikāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6072: 125.030. vaistārikaṃ ca te brahmacaryaṃ cariṣyanti bāhujanyaṃ pṛthubhūtam yāvaddevamanuṣyebhyaḥ samyaksamprakāśitam/
K10divyav_u:6073: 125.031. etarhi bhadanta bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ paṇḍitā vyaktā vinītā viśāradā alamutpannotpannānāṃ parapravāditāṃ sahadharmeṇa <126>nigrahītāraḥ,
K10divyav_u:6074: svasya vādasya paryavadāpayitāro bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇya upāsakā upāsikāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6075: 126.002. vaistārikaṃ ca te brahmacaryaṃ bāhujanyaṃ pṛthubhūtam yāvaddevamanuṣyebhyaḥ samyaksamprakāśitam/
K10divyav_u:6079: 126.004. nicirasyedānīṃ tathāgatasya trayāṇāṃ varṣikāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayānnirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati/
K10divyav_u:6080: 126.005. atha mārasya pāpīyasa etadabhavat--parinirvāsyate bata śramaṇo gautamaḥ//
K10divyav_u:6081: 126.006. iti viditvā hṛṣṭastuṣṭaḥ pramudita udagraḥ prītisaumanasyajātastatraivāntarhitaḥ//
K10divyav_u:6084: 126.008. tayostrayāṇāṃ varṣikāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayādindriyaparipāko bhaviṣyati sukhādhiṣṭhānaṃ vā/
K10divyav_u:6085: 126.009. śakyaṃ śrāvakavaineyastathāgatena vinayituṃ na tu tathāgatavaineyaḥ śrāvakeṇa//
K10divyav_u:6086: 126.010. atha bhagavata etadabhavat--yannvahaṃ tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyeyam yathā samāhite citte jīvitasaṃskārānadhiṣṭhāya āyuḥsaṃskārānutsṛjeyam/
K10divyav_u:6087: 126.011. atha bhagavāṃstadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte jīvitasaṃskārānadhiṣṭhāya āyuḥsaṃskārānutsraṣṭumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:6090: 126.014. samanantarotsṛṣṭeṣvāyuḥsaṃskāreṣu kāmāvacareṣu deveṣu ṣaṇnimittāni prādurbhūtānipuṣpavṛkṣaḥ śīrṇāḥ,
K10divyav_u:6096: 126.016. atha bhagavāṃstasmāt samādhervyutthāya tasyā velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
K10divyav_u:6099: 126.020. samanantarotsṛṣṭeṣvāyuḥsaṃskāreṣu ṣaṭ kāmāvacarā devāḥ kriyākāraṃ kṛtvā bhagavato 'ntikaṃ prakrāntā darśanāya vandanāya/
K10divyav_u:6100: 126.021. bhagavatā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā yadanekairdevatāśatasahasraiḥ satyāni dṛṣṭāni,
K10divyav_u:6105: 126.024. samanantarotsṛṣṭeṣvāyuḥsaṃskāroṣvanekā nāgayakṣagandharvakinnaramahoragā bhagavataḥ sakāśamupasaṃkrāntā bhagavato darśanāya/
K10divyav_u:6106: 126.026. bhagavatā teṣāmevaṃvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā yadanekair nāgayakṣagandharvakinnarairmahoragaiḥ śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadāni gṛhītāni yāvat
K10divyav_u:6108: 126.028. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthād/
K10divyav_u:6109: 126.029. ekāntasthita āyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat--ko bhadanta hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya?
K10divyav_u:6110: aṣṭau ime ānanda aṣṭau pratyayā mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya/
K10divyav_u:6115: 126.032. bhavatyānanda samayo yadākāśe yadākāśe viṣamā <127>vāyavo vānti,
K10divyav_u:6118: 127.001. ayamānanda prathamo hetuḥ prathamaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya/
K10divyav_u:6124: 127.005. ayaṃ dvitīyo heturdvitīyaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya/
K10divyav_u:6129: 127.008. yā lokasya lokāntarikā andhāstamaso 'ndhakāratamisrā yatrāmū sūryācandramasau evaṃmaharddhikau evaṃmahānubhāvau ābhayā ābhāṃ na pratyanubhavataḥ,
K10divyav_u:6130: tā api tasmin samaye udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā bhavanti/
K10divyav_u:6132: te tayā anyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃjānante--anye 'pīha bhavantaḥ sattvā upapannāḥ,
K10divyav_u:6134: 127.012. ayamānanda tṛtīyo hetustṛtīyaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya/
K10divyav_u:6135: 127.013. punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣer niṣkrāmati,
K10divyav_u:6136: atha tasmin samaye mahāpṛthivīcālo bhavati sarvaścāyaṃ loka udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭo bhavati/
K10divyav_u:6137: 127.014. yā api tā lokasya lokāntarikā andhāstamaso 'ndhakāratamisrā yatremau sūryācandramasau evaṃmahānubhāvau ābhayā ābhāṃ na pratyanubhavataḥ,
K10divyav_u:6138: tā api tasmin samaye udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā bhavanti/
K10divyav_u:6140: te tayā ābhayā anyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃjānanti--anye 'pīha bhavantaḥ sattvā upapannāḥ,
K10divyav_u:6142: 127.018. ayamānanda caturtho hetuścaturthaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya/
K10divyav_u:6146: 127.020. yā api tā lokasya lokāntarikā andhāstamaso 'ndhakāratamisrā yatremau sūryācandramasau evaṃmaharddhikau evaṃmahānubhāvau ābhayā ābhāṃ na pratyanubhavataḥ,
K10divyav_u:6147: tā pi tasmin samaye udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā bhavanti/
K10divyav_u:6149: te tayābhayā anyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃjānanti--anye 'pīha bhavantaḥ sattvā upapannāḥ,
K10divyav_u:6151: 127.024. ayamānanda pañcamo hetuḥ pañcamaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya/
K10divyav_u:6152: 127.025. punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye tathāgatastriparivartadvādaśākāraṃ dharmacakraṃ parivartayati,
K10divyav_u:6155: 127.027. yā api tā lokasya lokāntarikā andhāstamaso 'ndhakāratamisrā yatremau sūryācandramasau evaṃmaharddhikau evaṃmahānubhāvau ābhayā ābhāṃ na pratyanubhavataḥ,
K10divyav_u:6156: tā api tasmin samaye udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā bhavanti/
K10divyav_u:6158: te tayābhayā anyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃjānanti--anye 'pīha bhavantaḥ sattvā upapannāḥ,
K10divyav_u:6160: 127.031. ayamānanda ṣaṣṭho hetuḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya/
K10divyav_u:6162: atyarthaṃ tasmin samaye mahāpṛthivīcālo bhavati ulkāpātā diśodāhāḥ,
K10divyav_u:6165: 128.003. yā api tā lokasya lokāntarikā andhāstamaso 'ndhakāratamisrā yatremau sūryācandramasau evaṃmaharddhikau evaṃmahānubhāvau ābhayāa ābhāṃ na pratyanubhavataḥ,
K10divyav_u:6166: tā api tasmin samaye udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā bhavanti/
K10divyav_u:6168: te tayābhayā anyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃjānanti--anye 'pīha bhavantaḥ sattvā upapannāḥ,
K10divyav_u:6170: 128.006. ayamānanda saptamo hetuḥ saptamaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya/
K10divyav_u:6171: 128.007. punaraparamānanda nacirasyedānīṃ tathāgatasya nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati/
K10divyav_u:6172: 128.008. atha tasmin samaye mahāpṛthivīcālo bhavati ulkāpātā diśodāhāḥ,
K10divyav_u:6174: sarvaścāyaṃ loka udāreṇāvabhāsena yatremau sūryacandramasau evaṃmaharddhikau evaṃmahānubhāvau ābhayā ābhāṃ na pratyanubhavataḥ,
K10divyav_u:6175: tā api tasmin samaye udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā bhavanti/
K10divyav_u:6178: te tayā ābhayā anyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃjānanti--anye 'pīha bhavantaḥ sattvā upapannāḥ,
K10divyav_u:6180: 128.014. ayamānanda aṣṭamo heturaṣṭamaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya//
K10divyav_u:6181: 128.015. athāyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat--yathā khalvahaṃ bhadanta bhagavatā bhāsitasyārthamājānāmi,
K10divyav_u:6182: ihaiva bhagavatā jīvitasaṃskārānadhiṣṭhāya āyuhasaṃskārā utsṛṣṭā bhaviṣyanti/
K10divyav_u:6184: 128.017. etarhi ānanda tathāgatena jīvitasaṃskārānadhiṣṭhāya āyuḥsaṃskārā utsṛṣṭāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6185: 128.018. saṃmukhaṃ me bhadanta bhagavato 'ntikācchrutaṃ saṃmukhamudgṛhītam--yasya kasyaciccatvāra ṛddhipādā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ,
K10divyav_u:6188: 128.020. bhagavatā bhadanta catvāra ṛddhipādā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6189: 128.021. ākāṅkṣamāṇastathāgataḥ kalpaṃ vā tiṣṭhet kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā/
K10divyav_u:6192: 128.022. tavaivānanda aparādhastavaiva duṣkṛtam yastvaṃ tathāyatasya yāvat trirapyaudāre avabhāsanimitte prāviṣkṛte na śaknoṣi tannimittaṃ pratiśrāvayitum,
K10divyav_u:6194: 128.024. kimanyasya ānanda bhāṣeta tathāgatastāṃ vācam yā syād dvidhā?
K10divyav_u:6197: asthānametadānanda anavakāśo yat tathāgatastāṃ vācaṃ bhāṣeta yā syāddvidhā/
K10divyav_u:6202: 128.027. āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yāvanto bhikṣavaścāpālaṃ caityamupaniśritya viharanti,
K10divyav_u:6204: 128.029. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthāt/
K10divyav_u:6205: 128.030. ekāntasthita āyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat--yāvanto bhadanta bhikṣavaścāpālaṃ caityamupaniśritya viharanti,
K10divyav_u:6210: 129.001. niṣadya bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--anityā bhikṣavaḥ sarvasaṃskārā adhruvā anāśvāsikā vipariṇāmadharmāṇo yāvadalameva bhikṣavaḥ sarvasaṃskārān saṃskaritumalam/
K10divyav_u:6212: 129.003. etarhi vā me 'tyayādye te dharmā dṛṣṭadharmahitāya saṃvartante dṛṣṭadharmasukhāya,
K10divyav_u:6214: te bhikṣubhirudgṛhya paryavāpya tathā tathā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā grāhayitavyā
K10divyav_u:6215: yathaiva tatra brahmacaryaṃ virasthitikaṃ syādbahujanyaṃ pṛthubhūtam yāvaddevamanuṣyebhyaḥ
K10divyav_u:6217: 129.006. etarhi bhikṣavo dharmā dṛṣṭadharmahitāya saṃvartante dṛṣṭadharmasukhāya,
K10divyav_u:6219: ye bhikṣubhirudgṛhya paryavāpay tathā tathā dhārayitavyā grāhayitavyā vācayitavyā
K10divyav_u:6229: 129.011. ime te bhikṣavo dharmā dṛṣṭadharmahitāya saṃvartante dṛṣṭadharmasukhāya,
K10divyav_u:6231: bhikṣubhirudgṛhya paryavāpya tathā tathā dhārayitavyā grāhayitavyā vācayitavyā yathaitadbrahmacaryaṃ
K10divyav_u:6235: 129.014. bhagavān vaiśālīvanamabhisaran dakṣiṇena sarvakāyena nāgāvalokitena vyavalokayati/
K10divyav_u:6236: 129.015. athāyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat--nāhetvapratyayaṃ bhadanta tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhā dakṣiṇena nāgāvalokitamavalokayanti/
K10divyav_u:6240: 129.018. nāhetvapratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhā dakṣiṇena sarvakāyena nāgāvalokitena vyavalokayanti/
K10divyav_u:6248: 129.024. yadā ha bhagavatā vāg bhāṣitā idamapaścimakaṃ vaiśālyā darśanam,
K10divyav_u:6255: 129.029. devatānāṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā anekāni vaiśālikāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bhagavatsakāśamupasaṃkrāntāni/
K10divyav_u:6256: 129.030. bhagavatā teṣāmāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā evaṃvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10divyav_u:6264: 130.002. yadbhūyasā sā parṣadbuddhaniṃnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā/
K10divyav_u:6265: 130.003. sthavirānandaḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhagavantamidamavocat--paśya bhadanta yāvat tvam/
K10divyav_u:6266: 130.004. bhagavatā parinirvāṇāya prasthitenānekāni devatāśatasahasrāṇi satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni/
K10divyav_u:6277: 130.010. atra ānanda kimāścaryaṃ mayā etarhi sarvajñena sarvākārajñenānuttarajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena
K10divyav_u:6281: yanmayā maraṇāntikayā vedanayā spṛṣṭena evaṃvidhā parikarmakathā kṛtā,
K10divyav_u:6283: ṛṣayaḥ pravrajitvā catvāro brahmavihārān bhāvayitvā kalpavṛndaṃ prahāya tadbahulavihāriṇo brahmalokasabhāgatāyāmupapannāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6286: 130.017. upoṣadhasya rājño mūrdhni piṭṭako jāto mṛduḥ sumṛduḥ,
K10divyav_u:6290: 130.019. kumāro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ/
K10divyav_u:6294: 130.020. mūrdhato jāto mūrdhāta iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
K10divyav_u:6295: 130.021. māṃ dhaya māṃ dhaya māndhāta iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
K10divyav_u:6297: 130.022. māndhātasya kumārasya kumārakrīḍāyāṃ krīḍataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6306: 130.026. tairamātyaiḥ punaḥ saṃdeśo visarjitah--pitā te kāladharmaṇā samyuktaḥ/
K10divyav_u:6312: 130.028. sa kathayati--yadi mama dharmeṇa rājyaṃ prāpsyate,
K10divyav_u:6314: 130.029. tataste amātyaiḥ kathayanti--ratnaśilayā deva prayojanaṃ bhavati/
K10divyav_u:6315: 130.030. tasya ca divaukaso nāma yakṣaḥ purojavaḥ/
K10divyav_u:6318: tataste amātyā bhūyaḥ kathayanti--deva śrīparyaṅkenātra prayojanaṃ bhavati/
K10divyav_u:6321: 131.001. sa kathayati--yadi mama dharmeṇa rājyaṃ prāpsyate,
K10divyav_u:6332: tadyathā--cakraratnaṃ hastiratnamaśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnameva saptamam/
K10divyav_u:6333: 131.007. pūrṇaṃ cāsya sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarupiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
K10divyav_u:6336: 131.009. tatra vanakhaṇḍe prabhūtāḥ pakṣiṇo mṛgāśca prativasanti/
K10divyav_u:6338: 131.010. te ca pakṣiṇo 'vatīryamāṇā avatīryamāṇāḥ śabdaṃ kurvanti/
K10divyav_u:6344: 131.012. sa ca rājā janapadānanusaṃsārya paśyati pādoddhārakeṇa gacchataḥ/
K10divyav_u:6347: śabdakaṇṭakāni dhyānānīti eteṣām ṛṣikopena pakṣāṇi śīrṇāni/
K10divyav_u:6348: 131.014. tato rājñā abhihitam--evaṃvidhā api ṛṣayo bhavanti,
K10divyav_u:6351: ṛṣīṇāmevaṃ vadantu--tatra gacchata yatrāhaṃ na vasayā(sā?)mīti/
K10divyav_u:6359: 131.020. cintayitvā tulayitvopaparīkṣya pṛthak pṛthagutkāḥ śilpasthānakarmasthānāni māpayitum/
K10divyav_u:6360: 131.021. cintakā ime tulakā upaparīkṣakā iti mantrajā mantrajā iti saṃjñā/
K10divyav_u:6362: 131.022. yataḥ sa rājā paśyati janapadānanusaṃsāryākṛṣyān karmāntān kurvataḥ/
K10divyav_u:6364: tatastairamātyai rājā abhihitah--ete deva manuṣyāḥ śāsyādīni kṛṣanti,
K10divyav_u:6366: 131.025. yataśca sa rājā kathayati--mama rājye manuṣyāḥ kṛṣiṣyanti?
K10divyav_u:6372: bhūyo 'pi ca rājñā mūrdhātena janapadānanusaṃsārya tena pṛṣṭāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6379: 131.031. tato rājñā tenoktam--mama rājye manuṣyāḥ karpāsavātān māpayiṣyantīti karpāsameva devo varṣatu/
K10divyav_u:6380: 131.032. sahacittotpādādeva<132> rājño mūrdhātasya karpāsāneva devo vṛṣṭaḥ/
K10divyav_u:6387: 132.004. tato rājñā abhihitam--mama rājye manuṣyāḥ kartiṣyanti?
K10divyav_u:6389: 132.004. sahacittotpādādeva rājño māndhātasya sūtrameva devo vṛṣṭaḥ/
K10divyav_u:6397: 132.008. yato rājā saṃlakṣayati--mama rājye manuṣyā vastrāṇi vāpayiṣyante?
K10divyav_u:6399: 132.009. sahacittotpādādeva rājño māndhātasya vastrāṇyeva devo vṛṣṭaḥ/
K10divyav_u:6402: 132.010. yataḥ sa rājā saṃlakṣayati--manuṣyā mama puṇyānāṃ prabhāvaṃ na jānanti/
K10divyav_u:6404: 132.011. asti me jambudvīpa ṛddhaśca sphītaśca kṣemaśca subhikṣaśca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaśca/
K10divyav_u:6406: tadyathā cakraratnaṃ hastiratnamaśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnameva saptamam/
K10divyav_u:6407: 132.014. pūrṇaṃ ca me sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
K10divyav_u:6408: 132.015. aho bata me 'ntaḥpure saptāhaṃ hiraṇyavarṣaṃ patet,
K10divyav_u:6410: 132.015. sahacittotpādādeva rājño māndhātasyāntaḥpure saptāhaṃ hiraṇyavarṣaṃ vṛṣṭam/
K10divyav_u:6411: 132.016. ekakārṣāpaṇo 'pi bahir na nipatito yathāpi tanmaharddhikasya sattvasya mahānubhāvasya kṛtapuṇyasya kṛtakuśalasya svakaṃ puṇyaphalaṃ
K10divyav_u:6414: 132.019. yato rājā sa rājā kathayati--kṣuṇṇā bhavanto yadi yuṣmābhiḥ pūrvamevābhihitamabhaviṣyaddevasya puṇyānīti,
K10divyav_u:6418: 132.022. tasya tatra mūrdhātasya rājño mahārājyaṃ kārayataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6420: 132.023. sa rājñā mūrdhātenoktah--asti kiṃcidanyadvīpe nājñāpitam yadvayamājñāpayema?
K10divyav_u:6421: yataḥ paścāddivaukasenābhihitah--asti deva pūrvavideho nāma dvīpaḥ,
K10divyav_u:6424: 132.025. atha rājño mūrdhātasyaitadabhavat--asti me jambudvīpa ṛddhaśca sphītaśca kṣemaśca subhikṣaśca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaśca/
K10divyav_u:6425: 132.027. asti me sapta ratnāni tadyathā cakraratnaṃ hastiratnamaśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnameva saptamam/
K10divyav_u:6426: 132.028. pūrṇaṃ ca me sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
K10divyav_u:6428: 132.029. śrūyate atha khalu pūrvavideho nāma dvīpaḥ/
K10divyav_u:6430: 132.030. sahacittotpādādeva rājā māndhāta uparivihāyasamabhyudgataḥ sārdhamaṣṭādaśabhirbhaṭabalāgrakoṭibhiḥ putrasahasraparivṛtaḥ saptaratnapurojavaḥ/
K10divyav_u:6435: 133.001. bhūyaḥ sa rājā divaukasam yakṣamāmantrayati--asti divaukasaṃ kiṃcidanyadvīpe nājñāpitam?
K10divyav_u:6436: divaukasa āha--asti deva aparagodānīyaṃ nāma dvīpam ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:6438: 133.004. atha rājño mūrdhātasyaitadabhavat--asti me jambudīpa ṛddhaśca sphītaśca kṣemaśca subhikṣaśca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaśca/
K10divyav_u:6440: 133.005. pūrṇaṃ ca me sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
K10divyav_u:6441: 133.006. vṛṣṭaṃ me saptāhamantaḥpure hiraṇyavarṣam yathāpi tanmaharddhikasya sattvasya mahānubhāvasya kṛtakuśalasya svapuṇyaphalaṃ pratyanubhavataḥ/
K10divyav_u:6442: 133.008. śrūyate aparagodānīyaṃ nāma dvīpam ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:6444: 133.009. sahacittopādādeva rājā māndhātā uparivihāyasamabhyudgataḥ sārdhamaṣṭādaśabhirbhaṭabalāgrakoṭibhiḥ putrasahasraparivṛtaḥ saptaratnapurojavaḥ/
K10divyav_u:6448: 133.012. yataḥ sa rājā māndhātā divaukasam yakṣaṃ pṛcchati--asti kaścidanyadvīpo nājñāpitah?
K10divyav_u:6451: 133.014. kiṃ cāpi te manuṣyā amamā aparigrahāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6452: 133.014. yannu devo gatvā svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāset/
K10divyav_u:6453: 133.015. atha rājño māndhātasyaitadabhavat--asti me jambudvīpam ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:6455: 133.016. pūrṇaṃ ca me sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
K10divyav_u:6459: 133.018. yannvahaṃ tatrāpi gatvā svaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāseyam/
K10divyav_u:6460: 133.019. sahacittotpādādeva rājā māndhātā sārdhamaṣṭādaśabhirbhaṭabalāgrakoṭibhiḥ putrasahasraparivṛtaḥ saptaratnapurojava uparivihāyasenābhyudgataḥ/
K10divyav_u:6462: 133.021. dṛṣṭvā ca punardivaukasam yakṣamāmantrayate sma--kimetaddivaukasa citropacitrān vṛkṣānāpīḍakajātān/
K10divyav_u:6466: 133.024. śrutvā ca punā rājā māndhātā amātyānāmantrayate--paśyatha yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaścitropacitrān vṛkṣānāpīḍakajātān? evaṃ deva/
K10divyav_u:6467: 133.026. ete grāmaṇya uttarakauravāṇāṃ mānuṣyāṇāṃ kalpadūṣyavṛkṣā yata uttarakauravā manuṣyāḥ kalpadūṣyāṇi prāvaranti/
K10divyav_u:6470: etaddeva uttarakauravakāṇāṃ manuṣyāṇāmakṛṣṭoptaṃ taṇḍulaphalaśālim yata uttarakauravakā manuṣyā akṛṣṭoptaṃ taṇḍulaphalaśāliṃ paribhuñjanti/
K10divyav_u:6474: 133.032. samanuśāsti rājā māndhātā uttarakurau dvīpe svakam <134>bhaṭabalāgram/
K10divyav_u:6475: 134.001. tasya tatra svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6476: 134.001. atha rājā māndhātā divaukasam yakṣamāmantrayate--asti kiṃcidanyadvīpamanājñāpitamiti? nāsti deva/
K10divyav_u:6477: 134.002. śrūyante devāstrāyastriṃśā dīrghāyuṣo varṇavantaḥ sukhabahulā ucceṣu vimāneṣu cirasthitikāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6480: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:6482: 134.006. pūrṇaṃ ca me sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
K10divyav_u:6486: 134.008. śrūyante devāstrāyaṃstriśā dīrghāyuṣo varṇavantaḥ sukhabahulā ucceṣu vimāneṣu cirasthitikāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6488: 134.010. sahacittotpādādeva rājā māndhātā uparivihāyasamabhyudgataḥ sārdhamaṣṭādaśabhirbhaṭabalāgrakoṭibhiḥ saptaratnapurojavaḥ putrasahasraparivṛtaḥ/
