K10divyav_u:6490: 134.012. atha rājā nimiṃdhare parvate pratyaṣṭhāt kāñcanamaye/
K10divyav_u:6491: 134.012. tasya tatra svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6492: 134.013. nimiṃdharāt parvatāt vinatake parvate pratyaṣṭhāt kāñcanamaye/
K10divyav_u:6493: 134.013. tasya tatra svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6495: 134.015. tasya tatra svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6496: 134.015. aśvakarṇagirerapi parvatāt sudarśane parvate pratyaṣṭhāt kāñcanamaye/
K10divyav_u:6497: 134.016. tasya tatra svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6498: 134.017. sudarśanāt parvatāt khadirake parvate pratyaṣṭhāt kāñcanamaye/
K10divyav_u:6499: 134.017. tasya tatra svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6501: 134.018. tasya tatra svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6503: 134.020. tasya tatra svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6515: 134.027. atha rājā tasmiñ śāsane 'bhyāgataḥ kathayati--kenaitadviṣkambhitaṃ bhaṭabalāgram?
K10divyav_u:6517: 134.028. paścād rājñā abhihitam--kimeṣām ṛṣīṇāṃ sarvaṃ priyamiti?
K10divyav_u:6523: 134.031. sumeruḥ parvatarājā aśītiyojanasahasrāṇyadhastāt kāñcanamayyāṃ bhūmau pratiṣṭhito
K10divyav_u:6528: 135.003. tasya mūrdhni devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sudarśanaṃ nāma nagaram/
K10divyav_u:6529: 135.003. devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ pañca rakṣāḥ sthāpitāh--udakaniśritā nāgāḥ,
K10divyav_u:6540: tena hyudakaniśritā eva me nāgāḥ purojavā bhavantu/
K10divyav_u:6543: 135.009. yato nāgaistaiḥ karoṭapāṇibhirdevaiḥ sārdhaṃ miśribhāvaṃ gatvā punastadbalāgraṃ stambhitam/
K10divyav_u:6548: 135.012. rājā mūdhātaḥ kathayati--ete 'pyeva me karoṭapāṇayo devāḥ purojavā bhavantu/
K10divyav_u:6550: 135.013. paścāt teṣāṃ nāgaiḥ sārdhaṃ dhāvatāṃ mālādhārā devāḥ saṃprāptāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6558: 135.016. rājā kathayati--mālādhārā devāḥ purojavā me bhavantu/
K10divyav_u:6559: 135.017. yato mālādhārā devāstair nāgairdevaiśca sārdhaṃ mūrdhātasyāgrataḥ pradhāvitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6562: tair nāgaiḥ karoṭapāṇyādibhiśca devairabhihitāh--eṣa manuṣyarājā āgacchati/
K10divyav_u:6563: 135.019. yato bhūyaḥ sadāmattairdevaiḥ karoṭapāṇyādibhiśca devair nāgaiḥ sārdhaṃ miśrībhāvaṃ kṛtvā bhaṭabalāgraṃ viṣkambhitam/
K10divyav_u:6567: 135.022. rājñā abhihitam--sadāmattā eva me devāḥ purojavā bhavantu/
K10divyav_u:6568: 135.022. yataḥ sadāmattā devāstaiḥ sārdhaṃ devair nāgaiścāgrataḥ pradhāvitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6581: 135.029. dṛṣṭvā ca punardivaukasam yakṣamāmantrayate--kimetaddivaukasa nīlanīlā vanarājirmegharājirivonnatā?
K10divyav_u:6582: eṣā deva devānāṃ pārijātako nāma kovidāro yatra devāstrāyastriṃśāścaturo vārṣikān māsān divyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitāḥ samanvaṅgībhūtās trīḍanti ramante paricārayanti/
K10divyav_u:6583: 135.032. devo 'pyatra gatvā divyaih <136>pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtas trīḍatu ramatāṃ paricārayatu/
K10divyav_u:6584: 136.001. śrutvā ca punā rājā mūrdhāto 'mātyānāmantrayate--paśyatha yūyaṃ nīlanīlāṃ vanarājiṃ megharājimivonnatām? evaṃ deva/
K10divyav_u:6585: 136.003. eṣa devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ pārijātakaḥ kovidāro yatra devāstrāyastriṃśāścaturo
K10divyav_u:6586: vārṣikān māsān divyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitāḥ samanvaṅgībhūtāḥ krīḍanti
K10divyav_u:6588: 136.005. yūyamapi grāmaṇyo 'tra gatvā divyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitāḥ samanvaṅgībhūtāḥ krīḍata ramata paricārayata/
K10divyav_u:6591: eṣā deva devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sudharmā nāma devasabhā,
K10divyav_u:6592: yatra devāstrāyastriṃśāścatvāraśca mahārājānaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇāḥ saṃnipatitā devānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ cārthaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca cintayanti tulayanti upaparīkṣyanti/
K10divyav_u:6594: 136.010. śrutvā ca punaramātyānāmantrayate--paśyatha yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaḥ śvetaśvetamabhrakūṭamivonnatam? evaṃ deva/
K10divyav_u:6595: 136.011. eṣā trāyastriṃśānāṃ sudharmā nāma devasabhā yatra devāstrāyastriṃśāścatvāraśca
K10divyav_u:6596: mahārājānaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇāḥ saṃnipatitā devānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ cārthaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca cintayanti
K10divyav_u:6599: 136.014. devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sudarśanaṃ nāma nagaramardhatṛtīyāni yojanasahasrāṇyāyāmena
K10divyav_u:6600: ardhatṛtīyāni yojanasahasrāṇi vistareṇa samantataḥ parikṣepeṇa daśayojanasahasrāṇi
K10divyav_u:6604: ḍakā māpitāḥ suvarṇamayā rūpyamayā vaiḍūryamayā sphaṭikamayāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6606: 136.018. sudarśananagare 'bhyantare bhūmibhāgo 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaścitraḥ sucitra ekaikacitradhātuśatena mṛduḥ sumṛdus tadyathā tulapicurvā/
K10divyav_u:6608: 136.020. prakṣipte pāde avanamatyutkṣipte pāde unnamati divyairmandāravaiḥ puṣpairjānumātreṇa oghena saṃstīrṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:6612: 136.022. dvāre dvāre pañcaśatāni nīlavāsasām yakṣāṇāṃ sthāpitāni saṃnaddhāni santi citrakalāpāni yāvadeva devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāmārakṣaṇārthamatyarthaṃ
K10divyav_u:6613: 136.024. sudarśanasya nagarasya vīthyah ardhatṛtīyāni yojanasahasrāṇyāyāmena vistareṇa
K10divyav_u:6614: dvādaśa yojanānyabhirūpā darśanīyāḥ prāsādikāḥ kanakavālukāstīrṇāścandanavāripariṣiktā hemajālāvanaddhāḥ /
K10divyav_u:6619: 136.028. tāḥ puṣkiriṇyaḥ pūrṇāḥ śītalena vāriṇā kṣaudrakalpenāmbunā utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkasaṃchannā
K10divyav_u:6621: 136.030. sāmantake vividhāḥ puṣpavṛkṣāḥ phalavṛkṣāḥ sujātāḥ susaṃsthitā āpīḍakajātāḥ,
K10divyav_u:6622: tadyathā dakṣeṇa mālākāreṇa vā mālākārāntevāsinā vā mālā vā agrasthitāvataṃsakāni vā suracitāni/
K10divyav_u:6624: 137.001. sudarśane nagare caturvidhāḥ kalpadūṣyavṛkṣā nīlāḥ pītā lohitā avadātāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6629: 137.004. caturvidhā ābharaṇavṛkṣā hastopagāḥ pādopagā guhyāḥ prakāśitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6640: 137.009. gṛhāḥ kūṭāgārā harmyāḥ prāsādā svāsanakā avalokanakā saṃkramaṇakāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6644: 137.011. devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sudharmā devasabhā trīṇi yojanaśatānyāyāmena trīṇi
K10divyav_u:6645: yojanaśatāni vistareṇa samantaparikṣepeṇa navayojanaśatāni abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sphaṭikamayī,
K10divyav_u:6650: 137.015. teṣāmeva devānāṃ sarvānte mūrdhātasya rājña āsanaṃ prajñaptam/
K10divyav_u:6652: 137.017. tatra ye puṇyamaheśākhyāḥ sattvā anupūrveṇa praviṣṭāh avaśiṣṭā bahiḥ sthitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6653: 137.017. yataḥ sa rājā mūrdhātaḥ saṃlakṣayati--yānyetānyāsanāni prajñaptakāni,
K10divyav_u:6656: 137.019. atha rājño mūrdhātasyaitadabhavat--aho bata me śakro devānāmindro 'rdhāsanenopanimantrayate/
K10divyav_u:6659: 137.021. na khalu rājño mūrdhātasya śakrasya devānāmindrasyaikāsane niṣaṇṇayoḥ kaścidviśeṣo vā,
K10divyav_u:6663: 137.024. rājño mūrdhātasya deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu tiṣṭhataḥ ṣaṭtriṃśāścakrāścyutāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6664: 137.024. tatra ca teṣāṃ devānāṃ devāsurasaṃgrāmaṃ bhavati/
K10divyav_u:6670: 137.027. yato rājñā mūrdhātena trāyastriṃśānāmuktam--kimetadbhavanto 'tīva saṃbhramajātā devāh?
K10divyav_u:6682: 137.032. paścādrājā mūrdhāto nirgatastasmādevanagarāt <138>teṣāṃ devānāmasurairbhagnakānāṃ svaṃ ca kāyaṃ saṃnahya/
K10divyav_u:6683: 138.001. dharmatā ca punareṣāṃ devāsurāṇām yudhyatāṃ rathā vaihāyasena tiṣṭhanti/
K10divyav_u:6684: 138.002. teṣāmanyonyaṃ na kasyacidadhiko vā hīno vā/
K10divyav_u:6688: 138.004. paścāt te saṃlakṣayanti--puṇyavipākamaheśākhyo 'yaṃ sattvo yasyāsmākamuparivaihāyasaṃ ratho gacchati/
K10divyav_u:6689: 138.005. jitā bhagnāḥ parājitāḥ parāpṛṣṭhīkṛtā āsurīṃ purīṃ praviṣṭāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6692: 138.007. sa rājā saṃlakṣayati--ahameva devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sakāśādabhyadhikaḥ/
K10divyav_u:6703: 138.012. aho batāhaṃ śakraṃ devānāmindramasmāt sthānāccyāvayitvā svayameva devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayeyam/
K10divyav_u:6704: 138.013. sahacittotpādādrājā mūrdhātastasmāt ṛddhitaḥ paribhraṣṭo jambudvīpeṣu pratyaṣṭhāt/
K10divyav_u:6707: 138.014. atha rājño mūrdhātasyāmātyagaṇamahāmātyā rājyakartāro mantrasahajīvino yena rājā mūrdhātastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6708: 138.016. upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ mūrdhātamidamavocan--bhaviṣyanti khalu devasyātyayāt paścimā janapadāh?
K10divyav_u:6710: saced vo grāmṇyo mamātyayāt kaścidupasaṃkramyaivaṃ pṛcchet--kiṃ bhavanto rājñā mūrdhātena maraṇasamaye vyākṛtam,
K10divyav_u:6711: teṣāmidaṃ syādvacanīyām--rājā bhavanto mūrdhāto ratnaiḥ samanvāgato 'bhūt/
K10divyav_u:6712: 138.019. catasṛbhiśca mānuṣikābhī ṛddhibhiścaturṣu dvīpeṣu rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayitvā devāṃstrāyastriṃśānadhirūḍhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:6720: 138.028. yaḥ prekṣati duḥkhamitonidānaṃ kāmeṣu jātu sa kathaṃ ramate/
K10divyav_u:6721: 138.030. loke hi śalyamupādhiṃ viditvā tasyaiva dhīro vinayāya śikṣet//7//
K10divyav_u:6722: 139.001. <139>yadā ca punastena janakāyena śrutaṃ rājā mūrdhāto glāno maraṇāvasthita iti,
K10divyav_u:6723: tataste 'mātyā janapadāścānekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi rājānaṃ mūrdhātamupasaṃkramya darśanāya/
K10divyav_u:6724: 139.002. yatastena rājñā tasya janasya tāvadevaṃvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā--kāmeṣvādīnavakathā gṛhāśramapadasyādīnavo bhāṣitaḥ,
K10divyav_u:6725: tathā kāmo jugupsito yathā anekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi ṛṣīṇāmantike pravrajya gṛhāśramapadānyapahāya vanaṃ saṃśritāḥ,
K10divyav_u:6726: ṛṣibhiḥ pravrajitvā catvāri brahmavihārān bhāvayitvā kāmeṣu kāmacchandaṃ prahāya tadbahulavihāriṇo brahmalokasabhāgatāyāmupapannāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6727: 139.006. yāvacca jambudvīpe yāvacca pūrvavidehe dvīpe yāvaccāparagodānīye dvīpe yāvaccottarakuruṣu yāvacca saptasu kāñcanamayeṣu parvateṣu yāvacca
K10divyav_u:6729: 139.009. śakrasya bhikṣavo devānāmindrasyāyuṣaḥ prāmāṇam yanmanuṣyāṇāṃ varṣamekaṃ devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāmekarātriṃdivasam/
K10divyav_u:6730: 139.011ṭena rātriṃdivasena triṃśadrātrakena māsena dvādaśamāsena saṃvatsareṇa divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāmāyuṣaḥ pramāṇam/
K10divyav_u:6731: 139.012. tadbhavati mānuṣikayā gaṇanayā tisro varṣalakṣāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca varṣasahasrāṇi//
K10divyav_u:6733: evaṃvidhaṃ cittamutpāditam--aho bata me śakro devānāmindro 'rdhāsanenopanimantrayate,
K10divyav_u:6734: kāśyapo bhikṣustena kālena tena samayena śakro devānāmindro babhūva/
K10divyav_u:6735: 139.016. yasmin khalvānanda samaye rājño mūrdhātasyaivaṃvidhaṃ cittamutpannam--yannvahaṃ
K10divyav_u:6736: śakraṃ devānāmindramasmāt sthānāccyāvayitvā svayameva devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayeyam,
K10divyav_u:6737: kāśyapaḥ samyaksambuddhastena kālena tena samayena śakro devānāmindro babhūva/
K10divyav_u:6744: 139.021. tatra tāvanmayā ānanda sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohena aparimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsadharmeṇa
K10divyav_u:6745: maraṇakālasamaye tāvadevaṃvidhā parikathā kṛtā yadanekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi gṛhāśramamapahāya
K10divyav_u:6746: ṛṣibhyaḥ pravrajitvā kāmeṣu kāmacchandaṃ vyapahāya tadbahulavihāriṇo brahmalokamupapāditāḥ /
K10divyav_u:6747: 139.024. idānīṃ sarvajñenānuttarajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena nirvāṇāya saṃprasthitena tāvadevaṃvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10divyav_u:6752: 139.028. anekāni vaiśālikāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi yeṣāṃ kecitsrotāpattiphale vyavasthāpitāḥ,
K10divyav_u:6761: bhadanta karmāṇi kṛtāni rājñā mūrdhātena yeṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ vipākena sahacittotpādādeva
K10divyav_u:6764: 140.004. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani sarvābhibhūr nāma tathāgato 'rhaṃl loke
K10divyav_u:6765: utpanno vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān /
K10divyav_u:6767: 140.006. tatra viṣaye dharmatā--yā aciroḍhā dārikā bhartari pravahaṇakena pratipradīyate,
K10divyav_u:6768: sā catūratnamayaiḥ puṣpairavakīrya baddhakā svāmine pradīyate/
K10divyav_u:6770: 140.008. sa ca śreṣṭhidārakaścatūratnamayāni puṣpāṇi pratigṛhya yānamadhiruhya śvaśuragṛhamanuprasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:6771: 140.009. tasya gacchato 'bhimukhaṃ sarvābhibhūḥ samyaksambuddho janapadeṣu caryāṃ carannanupūrveṇābhyāgataḥ/
K10divyav_u:6773: 140.011. yato 'sau prasādīkṛtacetā yānādavatīrya taṃ bhagavantaṃ taiścatūratnamayaiḥ puṣpairavakiriti/
K10divyav_u:6774: 140.012. tāni sarvābhibhuvā samyaksambuddhenādhiṣṭhitāni tathā yathā śakaṭacakramātrāṇyabhinirvṛttāni/
K10divyav_u:6778: 140.015. anena dānena mahadgatena buddho bhaveyaṃ sugataḥ svayambhūḥ/
K10divyav_u:6779: 140.017. tīrṇaśca tārayeyaṃ mahājanaughān atāritā ye pūrvakairjinendraiḥ//8//
K10divyav_u:6781: 140.021. praṇidhiśca me tatra kṛtā udārā ākāṅkṣatā vā idamagrabodhim//9//
K10divyav_u:6782: 140.023. tasyaiva karmaṇo vipākato me prāpta hi me bodhiḥ śivā anuttarā/
K10divyav_u:6783: 140.025. vṛṣṭaṃ ca saptāhahiraṇyavarṣaṃ mūrdhātasya rājño mahābalasya//10//
K10divyav_u:6784: 140.027. tasyaiva karmaṇo vipākato me nagaramapi sauvarṇakāñcanaṃ babhūva mahāsudarśanasya ramaṇīyā kuśāvatī nāma purī babhūva//
K10divyav_u:6785: 140.029. bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--kīdṛśaṃ
K10divyav_u:6786: bhadanta rājñā mūrdhātena karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena caturṣu dvīpeṣu rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kāritam,
K10divyav_u:6789: 141.001. <141>bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vipaśyī nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho loke utpannaḥ/
K10divyav_u:6790: 141.002. atha sa vipaśyī samyaksabuddho janapadeṣu caryāṃ caramāṇo 'nupūrveṇa bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīmanuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:6791: 141.003. atha vipaśyī samyaksambuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bandhumatīṃ piṇḍāya prāviśāt/
K10divyav_u:6793: 141.004. bhagavantaṃ vipaśyinamasecanakadarśanarūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā adhikaḥ prasāda utpannaḥ/
K10divyav_u:6794: 141.005. prasādajātena tasya mudgānāṃ muṣṭiṃ gṛhītvā pātre prakṣiptā/
K10divyav_u:6800: 141.009. anena dānena mahadgatena buddho bhaveyaṃ sugataḥ svayambhūḥ/
K10divyav_u:6801: 141.011. tīrṇaśca tārayeyaṃ mahājanaughān na tāritā ye pūrvakairjinendraiḥ//11/
K10divyav_u:6804: 141.013. yanmayā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya prasādajātena mudgānāṃ muṣṭiḥ pātre pakṣiptā,
K10divyav_u:6805: tasmāccatvāro mudgāḥ pātre patitā avaśiṣṭā bhūmau patitāḥ,
K10divyav_u:6806: tasya karmaṇo vipākena caturṣu dvīpeṣu rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kāritam/
K10divyav_u:6809: 141.017. sacedbhikṣavaḥ sa mudgaḥ pātre patito 'bhaviṣyanna bhūmau,
K10divyav_u:6810: sthāanametadvidyate yaddeveṣu ca manuṣyeṣu ca rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kāritamabhaviṣyat/
K10divyav_u:6811: 141.018. yo 'sau otkariko vaṇik tena kālena tena samayena,
K10divyav_u:6814: ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena/
K10divyav_u:6815: 141.020. yasmādevaṃ buddhe bhagavati mahākāruṇike kārāḥ kṛtā atyarthaṃ mahāphalā bhavanti mahānuśaṃśā mahādyutayo mahāvaistārikā iti,
K10divyav_u:6818: buddhe dharme saṃghe kārāḥ karaṇīyāḥ samyakpraṇidhānāni ca karaṇīyānīti//
K10divyav_u:6825: 142.003. ekasmin samaye bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme/
K10divyav_u:6826: 142.004. tena khalu samayena pañcamātrāṇi vaṇikśatāni bhāṇḍaṃ samudānīya anupūrveṇa grāmanigamapallīpattanarājadhānīṣu cañcūryamāṇāni mahāsamudrataṭamanuprāptāni/
K10divyav_u:6828: 142.006. yato vaṇijastaṃ mahāsamudraṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃbhinnamanaso na prasahante samavataritum/
K10divyav_u:6829: 142.007. paścāttervaṇigbhiḥ karṇadhāra uktah--uddhoṣaya naḥ puruṣo mahāsamudrasya bhūtaṃ varṇam/
K10divyav_u:6830: 142.008. yato varṇadhāra uddhoṣayituṃ pravṛttah--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jambudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ,
K10divyav_u:6832: tadyathā--maṇayo muktā vaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilā pravālo rajataṃ jātarūpamaśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitikā dakṣiṇāvartāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6833: 142.010. ya icchati evamrūpai ratnairātmānaṃ samyaksukhena prīṇayituṃ mātāpitarau putradāraṃ dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitam,
K10divyav_u:6834: kālena ca kālaṃ dakṣiṇīyebhyaḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitumūrdhvagāminīṃ saubhāgyakarīṃ sukhavipākāmāyatyāṃ svargasaṃvartanīm,
K10divyav_u:6836: 142.014. evamukte ca punaḥ sarva eva sattvāḥ saṃpattikāmā vipattipratikūlāstaṃ śrutvā tasmin mahāsamudre vyavasitāḥ samavataritum/
K10divyav_u:6839: 142.016. yato vaṇijaḥ kathayanti--kasyedānīṃ vakṣyāmo vahanāt pratyavatarasveti/
K10divyav_u:6841: 142.018. tataḥ sa udghoṣayituṃ pravṛttah--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jambudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ,
K10divyav_u:6842: santyasmin mahāsamudre imāni evamrūpāṇi mahānti mahābhayāni,
K10divyav_u:6843: tadyathā timibhayaṃ timiṃgilabhayamūrmibhayaṃ kūrmabhayaṃ sthale utsīdanabhayaṃ jale saṃsīdanabhayamantarjalagatānāṃ parvatānāmāghaṭṭanabhayaṃ
K10divyav_u:6845: 142.021. yena cātmano jīvitaparityāgo vyavāsthito mātāpitarau putradāraṃ dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitaṃ citraṃ ca jambudvīpaṃ
K10divyav_u:6848: 142.023. taṃ śrutvā tathodghuṣya tu tasmādyānapātrādavatīrṇā bahavaḥ,
K10divyav_u:6851: 142.025. paścād dvau trayo yāvadanupūrveṇa sarve varatrāśchinnāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6852: 142.025. tāsu cchinnāsu tadvahanaṃ mahākarṇadhārasampreritaṃ gagane mahāvātasamprerito megha iva balavadvāyusampreritaṃ kṣiprameva saṃprasthitam/
K10divyav_u:6854: 142.027. sa taṃ pradeśamanuprāptānāṃ karṇadhāraḥ kathayati--santyasmin ratnadvīpe kācamaṇayo ratnasadṛśāḥ,
K10divyav_u:6857: 142.029. tatraiva ca kroñcakumārikā nāma striyo bhavanti/
K10divyav_u:6863: 142.031. asminneva ca ratnadvīpe saptāhāt pareṇa amanuṣyā na sahante,
K10divyav_u:6864: tāvadvidhān viparītān vāyūnutpādayanti yairvahanamapahriyate yathāpi tadakṛtakāryāṇām/
K10divyav_u:6867: 143.001. prāpya ca taṃ ratnadvīpaṃ prayatnamāsthāya ratnānveṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā anupūrveṇopaparīkṣya
K10divyav_u:6868: ratnānāṃ tadvahanaṃ pūritaṃ tadyathā yavānāṃ vā yavasasyānāṃ vā mudgānāṃ vā bhāṣāṇāṃ vā /
K10divyav_u:6869: 143.003. vahanaṃ pūryitvā te 'nukūlaṃ jambudvīpābhimukhena vāyunā saṃprasthitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6870: 143.004. mahāsamudre ca tribhiḥ skandhaiḥ prāṇinaḥ saṃmiśritāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6876: 143.007. tatra ca mahāsamudre tā matsyajātayaḥ parasparānyonyabhakṣaṇaparāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6881: 143.009. tatra timiṃgilo nāma matsyāstṛtīyādudakaskandadhādabhyudgamya uparimandakaskandhamādāya carati/
K10divyav_u:6883: tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāsamudrāt pānīyaṃ mahatā vegenākṣiptaṃ mukhadvāram yato dhāvati/
K10divyav_u:6885: 143.012. tasyaivaṃ carata ātmabhāvācchira evaṃ lakṣyate dūrata eva,
K10divyav_u:6887: 143.013. akṣīṇi cāsya durata eva saṃlakṣyante nabhasīvādityau/
K10divyav_u:6890: teṣāmevaṃ cintayatāṃ tadvahanaṃ tasya mukhadvāram yato vegenopahartumārabdham/
K10divyav_u:6891: 143.016. teṣāṃ vahanaṃ vegenāpahriyamāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā ādotuadvayotpādanaṃ ca saṃlakṣya saṃvega utpannah--kiṃ bhavanto yat tacchrūyate saptādityāḥ kalpasaṃvartanyāṃ samudāgamiṣyantīti,
K10divyav_u:6893: 143.018. yataḥ karṇadhāreṇa teṣāṃ vimarśajātānāmuktam--yat tadbhavantaḥ śrūyate timitimiṃgila iti,
K10divyav_u:6898: 143.022. paśyatha etau dūrata eva sūryavadavalokyete etau akṣitārakau/
K10divyav_u:6903: yasya vo yasmin deve bhaktiḥ sa tamāyācatu/
K10divyav_u:6904: 143.025. yadi tenāpi tāvadāyācanena kāciddevatā asmākamasmānmahābhayādvimoṣkaṇaṃ kuryāt/
K10divyav_u:6907: 143.028. naiva ca teṣāmāyācatāṃ tasmānmaraṇabhayāt jīvitaparitrāṇaviśeṣaḥ kaścit/
K10divyav_u:6908: 143.029. tathaiva tadvahanaṃ salilavegāt bhikṣiptaṃ timiṃgilamukhadvāram yato 'pahriyate/
K10divyav_u:6913: 143.031. kiṃ tu sarva evaikaraveṇa namo buddhāyeti vadāmaḥ/
K10divyav_u:6914: 143.031. sati maraṇe buddhāvalambanayā smṛtyā kālaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ/
K10divyav_u:6917: 144.001. bhagavatā ca jetavanasthena sa vādaḥ śruto divyena śrotreṇa viśuddhena atikrāntamānuṣeṇa/
K10divyav_u:6918: 144.002. śrutvā ca punarbhagavatā sa nādastathā adhiṣṭhito yathā tena timiṃgilena śrutam/
K10divyav_u:6919: 144.003. tasya taṃ namo buddhāyeti rāvaṃ śrutvā manaso 'marṣa utpanno viklavībhūtaśca--buddho bata loka utpannaḥ/
K10divyav_u:6920: 144.004. na mama pratirūpaṃ syāt yadahaṃ buddhasya bhagavato nāmodghoṣaṃ śrutvā āhāramāhareyam/
K10divyav_u:6921: 144.005. sa cintayituṃ pravṛttah--yadyahamidanīṃ sahasaiva mukhadvāraṃ pidhāsyāmi,
K10divyav_u:6924: 144.006. yannvahaṃ mṛdunopakrameṇa svairaṃ svairaṃ mukhadvāraṃ saṃpidadhyām/
K10divyav_u:6925: 144.007. tatastena timiṃgilenātmīyaṃ mukhadvāraṃ mṛdunopakrameṇa svairaṃ svairaṃ pihitam/
K10divyav_u:6927: 144.009. atha te vaṇijastīramāsādya tadbhāṇḍaṃ śakaṭoṣṭragogardabhādibhiḥ purayitvā anupūrveṇa grāmanigamapallīpattanādiṣu cañcūryamāṇāḥ śrāvastīmanuprāptāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6928: 144.010. te tatra gatvā saṃlakṣayanti--dharmataiṣā yasya nāṃnā vahanaṃ saṃsiddhayānapātramāgacchati,
K10divyav_u:6930: 144.012. yannu vayametāni ratnāni buddhasya bhagavato dadyāmaḥ/
K10divyav_u:6931: 144.012. te tāni ratnāni saṃgṛhya bhagavataḥ sakāśamupagatāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6932: 144.013. anupūrveṇa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavataḥ kathayanti--bhagavan,
K10divyav_u:6933: asmākaṃ samudre yānapātreṇāvatīrṇānāṃ timiṃgilagrāheṇa tasmin yānapāre 'pahriyamāṇe
K10divyav_u:6934: jīvitavināśe pratyupasthite bhagavataḥ smaraṇaparāyaṇānāṃ nāmagrahaṇaṃ tasmāt mahāgrāhamukhādvinirmuktam,
K10divyav_u:6935: tato vayaṃ bhagavan saṃsiddhayānapārāḥ kṣemasvastinā ihāgatāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6936: 144.016. dharmatā caiṣā yasya nāṃnā vahanaṃ saṃsiddhayānapātrā āgacchanti,
K10divyav_u:6947: 144.021. yadvayametāni ratnāni tyaktvā bhagavato 'ntike pravrajema iti/
K10divyav_u:6948: 144.022. paścāt te tāni ratnāni mātāpitṛbhyaḥ putradāradāsīdāsakarmakaramitrāmātyajñātisālohitebhyo yathānyāyataḥ saṃvibhajya pravrajitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:6950: 144.024. yato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--kīdṛśāni karmāṇi bhagavan,
K10divyav_u:6952: yeṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ vipākena bhagavānārāgito na virāgitah?
K10divyav_u:6954: 144.027. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāśyapaḥ samyaksambuddho loka utpanno 'bhūt/
K10divyav_u:6955: 144.027. tasya ca śāsane eta eva ca pravrajitā abhūvan/
K10divyav_u:6956: 144.028. tatra pravrajya ca na kaścit tadrūpo guṇagaṇo 'dhigato nānyatra sabrahmacāriṇāmuddiṣṭamadhītaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:6957: 144.029. maraṇakālasamaye praṇidhānaṃ kṛtavantah--yadasmābhiḥ kāśyapaṃ samyaksambuddhamāsādyoddiṣṭamadhītaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ ca,
K10divyav_u:6959: asya karmaṇo vipākena vayam yo 'sau anāgato 'dhvani kāśyapena samyaksambuddhena śākyamuninarmā samyaksambuddho vyākṛtaḥ,
K10divyav_u:6961: 145.001. <145>bhagavānāha--kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāni tāni pañcabhikṣuśatānyatīte 'dhvanyāsan kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śāsane pravrajitāni,
K10divyav_u:6965: 145.003. yaścāsau mahāsamudre timistimiṃgilo nāma matsyo buddhaśabdaṃ śrutvā anāhāratāyāṃ vyavasthitaḥ,
K10divyav_u:6970: 145.007. yatra ca vikṣiptaṃ tatrāpi samīpe nāgasyaiva bhavanam/
K10divyav_u:6972: 145.008. evaṃ kṣiptena pāramparyeṇa tat kalevaraṃ mahāsamudrataṭaṃ samudānītam/
K10divyav_u:6974: 145.009. taccānekaiḥ kākagṛdhraśvaśṛgālaśvāpadādyaiḥ pakṣibhistatsamucchritaiśca kṛmibhirbhakṣyamāṇamasthikaraṅkajīrṇamāsaṃ śvetaṃ śvetaṃ vyavasthitam/
K10divyav_u:6975: 145.011. asyāṃ ca śrāvastyāṃ tasya brāhmaṇasya yadā patnī antarvartinī saṃvṛttā,
K10divyav_u:6976: tadeva tasyā garbhotpādādatīva kṣudduḥkhena pīḍyamānayā gṛhasvāmyabhihitah--āryaputra,
K10divyav_u:6981: 145.014. sā ca tadannapānaṃ sarvamabhyavahṛtya naiva tṛptimupayāti/
K10divyav_u:6989: 145.018. kimetadbhavantaḥ syāt--asyāḥ sattvamudare utpannam yasyotpādānnaiva tṛptimupayāti?
K10divyav_u:6990: yataḥ sa brāhmaṇo naimittakānāṃ darśayitvā saṃśayanirṇayanārthaṃ vaidyādīn bhūtatantravidaśca--paśyantu bhavantaḥ,
K10divyav_u:6991: iyaṃ brāhmaṇī kiṃ mahatā rogeṇābhibhūtā syādatha bhūtagrahāviṣṭā syādanyadvā syādrūpaṃ maraṇaliṅgamanenopasaṃkrameṇa pratyupasthitā syāt/
K10divyav_u:6995: tadā tairvaidyanaimittakabhūtatantravidbhiścikitsakaiḥ sā brāhmaṇīparyanuyuktā--kasmāt kālādārabhya tavaivaṃvidhā dīptāgnitā samutpannā?
K10divyav_u:6996: tayā abhihitam--garbhalambhasamakālameva sa evaṃvidha upakramaḥ kṛtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:6997: 145.025. yato naimittakavaidyacikitsakairabhihitam--nāsyāḥ kaścidanyastadrūpo rogo nāpi bhūtagrahāveśo bādhākara utpannaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7002: 145.029. tasya dārakasya jātamātrasya sā brāhmaṇī vinītakṣudduḥkhā saṃvṛttā/
K10divyav_u:7003: 145.029. sa dārako jātamātra eva atyarthaṃ bubhukṣayopapīḍyate/
K10divyav_u:7004: 145.030. tasya bubhukṣayā pīḍyamānasya mātā stanaṃ dātuṃ pravṛttā/
K10divyav_u:7005: 145.031. sa ca dārakaḥ stanaṃ pītvāpi sarvaṃ naiva tṛptimupayāti/
K10divyav_u:7006: 145.031. paścāt tena brāhmaṇena tayā ca brāhmaṇyā tiraskṛtaprātiveśyasvajanayuvatyaścābhyarthya stanaṃ tasya dārakasya dāpayituṃ pravṛttāḥ/
K10divyav_u:7007: 146.001. <146>sa ca dārakaḥ sarvāsāmapi stanaṃ pītvā naiva tṛptimabhyupagacchate/
K10divyav_u:7008: 146.001. paścāt tena brāhmaṇena tayārthe chagalikā kṛtvā/
K10divyav_u:7009: 146.002. sa dārakastasyā api cchagalikāyāḥ kṣīraṃ pītvā janikāyāśca stanaṃ naiva tṛpyate/
K10divyav_u:7010: 146.003. tatra kālena kālaṃ bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇyaśca piṇḍapātaṃ praviṣya parikathāṃ kurvanti/
K10divyav_u:7011: 146.004. sa dārakastāṃ parikathāṃ śrutvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ na roditi,
K10divyav_u:7013: 146.005. pratyavāsṛteṣu bhikṣubhikṣuṇīṣu ca punaḥ pipāsāduḥkhaṃ pratisaṃvedayamāno rohituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7016: 146.007. sa ca dārako 'nupūrveṇa māsārdharmāsādīnāmatyayādbhuñjāno naiva kadācidannapānasya tṛpyati/
K10divyav_u:7021: 146.009. gṛhītvā śrāvastyāṃ bhikṣāṃ paryaṭitvā āhārakṛtyaṃ kuru/
K10divyav_u:7022: 146.010. yataḥ sa dārako bhaikṣabhājanaṃ gṛhītvā śrāvastyāṃ bhaikṣaṃ paryaṭati/
K10divyav_u:7023: 146.010. paryaṭanneva ca bhuktvā bhuktvā atṛpyamāna eva gṛhamāgacchati/
K10divyav_u:7024: 146.011. yato 'sau saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ mayā karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena na kadācit vitṛpyamāna āhāramārāgayāmi?
K10divyav_u:7033: 146.015. tatra ca tvaṃ pravrajitaḥ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃcayaṃ kariṣyasi/
K10divyav_u:7034: 146.016. akuśalāśca te dharmā ye 'sminnapi janmani saṃcitā bhaviṣyanti,
K10divyav_u:7038: 146.018. atha sa mahātmā upāsakena codito jetavanaṃ gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:7039: 146.018. jetavanaṃ gatvā tatra bhikṣūn pāṭhasvādhyāyamanasikārodyuktān dṛṣṭvā atīva prasādajātaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7046: 146.021. yataḥ sa mātāpitṛbhyāṃ sakāśādanujñāṃ mārgituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7051: 146.024. tatra ca bhikṣūṇāṃ kadācit piṇḍapāto bhavati,
K10divyav_u:7053: 146.024. sa ca yasmin divase piṇḍapāto bhavati,
K10divyav_u:7057: 146.026. yata upādhyāyenāsya saṃlakṣitah--taruṇavayasā pravrajito dīptāgnitayā na tṛptimupayāti/
K10divyav_u:7058: 146.027. sa ātmīyādapi piṇḍapatāt tasya saṃvibhāgaṃ prārabdhaḥ kartum/
K10divyav_u:7062: 146.029. yata upādhyāyastaṃ śrutvā sapremān bhikṣūnanyāṃśca sārdhavihāriṇaḥ prārabdho vaktum/
K10divyav_u:7063: 146.030. yataḥ samānopādhyāyaiḥ samānācāryairanyaiśca sapremakairbhikṣubhirupasaṃhāra ārabdhaḥ kartum/
K10divyav_u:7067: 146.032. dānapatirapi viditvā yadyadadhikaṃ tattadasmai datvā āgacchati/
K10divyav_u:7068: 147.001. <147>atha pānakaṃ bhavati tadapi tathaiva yadadhikaṃ bhavati tattasyānupradīyate/
K10divyav_u:7069: 147.001. tasya ca yataḥ pravrajitasya na kadācidannapānena kukṣiḥ pūṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7070: 147.002. tena khalu samayena anyatamena gṛhapatinā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgha upanimantritaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7071: 147.003. bhagavān bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamantargṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya/
K10divyav_u:7074: 147.005. tena caivamupalabdham yo 'saṃviditameva buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayati sa sahasaiva bhogairabhyudgacchati/
K10divyav_u:7076: 147.007. sa tasyāhārasya śakaṭaṃ pūrayitvā praṇītapraṇītasya śucinaḥ sārdhaṃ sarvarūpairmitrasvajanasahāyo buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayiṣyāmīti vihāraṃ nirgataḥ/
K10divyav_u:7077: 147.009. sa paśyati tasmiñ jetavane bhikṣava eva na santi/
K10divyav_u:7086: 147.012. sa kathayati--yadi te mahātman parityaktaṃ bhavati/
K10divyav_u:7087: 147.013. tatastena gṛhapatinā saṃlakṣayitvā yenāhāreṇaikasya bhikṣoḥ paryāptaṃ bhavati,
K10divyav_u:7088: tāvadannapānaṃ śakaṭaṃ gṛhītvā taṃ dharmaruciṃ pariveṣayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7096: 147.016. tatastena gṛhapatinā bhūyastasmāt śakaṭādyena bhikṣudvayasyāhāreṇa paryāptaṃ syāt,
K10divyav_u:7104: 147.020. yatastasmācchakaṭādannapānaṃ gṛhītvā trayāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ paryāptaṃ syāditi punarbhojayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7109: 147.022. yataḥ sa gṛhapatistasmādannapānaṃ gṛhītvā yena caturṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ paryāptaṃ syāditi punarbhojayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7121: 147.027. yataḥ śrūyate pañcabhir nīlavāsaso yakṣaśatairjetavanamaśūnyamiti teṣāṃ bhaviṣyatyeva anyatamaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7122: 147.028. iti saṃcintya garbharūpāṇi gṛhe 'nupraveśayituṃ pravṛttah--gacchatha yūyaṃ śīghraṃ gṛhameva,
K10divyav_u:7124: 147.029. sa gṛhajanaṃ visarjya maraṇabhayabhītastasmāt śakaṭādannapānaṃ gṛhītvā pariveṣayitumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7132: 148.002. tasmānnagarāt piṇḍapātanirhārako bhikṣu tasyaiva piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:7134: 148.003. tasya dharmarucer na kadācidyato jātasya kuṣkiṃ pūrṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7136: 148.004. tasya ca gṛhapater nagaraṃ praviśato 'bhimukhaṃ bhagavān bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtaḥ saṃprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7138: ahaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamuddiśya pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāṃ tṛptitaḥ śakaṭamannapānasya pūrayitvā jetavanaṃ gato buddhapramyukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ
K10divyav_u:7139: 148.007. na ca me tatra bhikṣavo labdhāḥ/
K10divyav_u:7141: 148.007. tena samākhyātaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamantargṛham upanimantraṇaṃ praviṣṭam/
K10divyav_u:7143: 148.009. yatastasya mamānupūrveṇa sarvaṃ tadannapānaṃ śakaṭaṃ dattam/
K10divyav_u:7151: 148.012. bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--ko 'sau dānapatirbhaviṣyati yo 'sau dharmaruceretāvatā āhāreṇa pratidivasam yogodvahanaṃ kariṣyati?
K10divyav_u:7157: paścādbhagavān vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājaḥ sahacittotpādāt ṛddhyā dharmaruciṃ gṛhītvā samudrataṭamanuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7167: 148.020. sa itaścāmutaśca tasyā anupārśvanaṃ tāṃ paryeṣamāṇaḥ śramamupagataḥ/
K10divyav_u:7172: 148.023. yato 'sau bhagavato 'ntikaṃ gatvā bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati--kiṃ tadbhagavan?
K10divyav_u:7181: 148.026. dharmarucistaṃ śrutvā bhagavadvaco vyākulitacetāḥ kathayati--mamaiṣedṛśī asthiśakalā?
K10divyav_u:7186: 148.029. ityuktvā bhagavān vitatapakṣa iva rājahaṃsa ṛddhyā jetavanamanuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7187: 148.030. atha dharmarucinā cintayatā manasikāramanutiṣṭhatā uṣmagatānyutpāditāni murdhānaḥ kṣāntayo laukikā agradharmā darśanamārgo bhāvanāmārgaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7199: 149.006. sa evaṃ saṃlakṣya duṣkarakārako bata me bhagavān/
K10divyav_u:7200: 149.007. yadi ca bhagavatā mamaivaikasyārthe 'nuttarā samyaksambodhiradhigatā syāt,
K10divyav_u:7204: 149.009. tena khalu samayena bhagavānanekaśatāyā bhikṣuparṣadaḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt/
K10divyav_u:7207: 149.011. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte nyaṣīdat/
K10divyav_u:7214: 149.015. yato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--bhagavan
K10divyav_u:7215: dharmarucirihaiva śrāvastyāṃ jāto 'sminneva jetavane pravrajito na kutaścidāgato na kutracidgataḥ /
K10divyav_u:7220: evamukte bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--na bhikṣavaḥ pratyutpannaṃ saṃdhāya kathayāmi/
K10divyav_u:7223: 149.019. icchatha bhikṣavo 'sya dharmaruceḥ pūrvikāṃ karmaplotimārabhya dhārmikathāṃ śrotum?
K10divyav_u:7225: etasya sugata samayo yadbhagavān dharmarucimārabhya bhikṣūṇāṃ dhārmikathāṃ kuryāt/
K10divyav_u:7227: 149.023. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani prathame 'saṃkhyeye kṣemaṃkaro nāma tathāgato
K10divyav_u:7228: loka utpanno vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
K10divyav_u:7231: 149.025. tasyāṃ ca kṣemāvatyāṃ kṣemo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati/
K10divyav_u:7232: 149.026. tasyāṃ ca kṣemāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāmanyatamo vaṇikśreṣṭhī prativasati/
K10divyav_u:7233: 149.027. tenāsau kṣemaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ ṣaṣṭiṃ traimāsān sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena sarvopakaraṇairupasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7235: 149.028. bhāṇḍaṃ samudānīya tasmācca ratnānyānīya saṃghe pañcavārṣikaṃ kariṣyāmīti/
K10divyav_u:7236: 149.029. evaṃ saṃcintya bhāṇḍaṃ samudānīya grāmanigamapallīpattanarājadhānīṣvanupūrveṇa cañcūryamāṇaḥ samudramanuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7238: 149.031. asya tasmin mahāsamudre 'vatīrṇasya kṣemaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sakalambuddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7241: 150.001. sa ca śreṣṭhī saṃsiddhayānapātreṇa devatāmānuṣyaparigṛhītena tasmānmahāsamudrāt tīrṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7242: 150.002. uttīrya ca taṃ bhāṇḍaṃ śakaṭairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiśca cotkṣipya anupūrveṇa saṃprasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7243: 150.003. sa ca panthānaṃ gacchan prātipathikān pṛcchati--kiṃ bhavanto jānīdhvaṃ kṣemāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ pravṛttih?
K10divyav_u:7245: 150.004. sa kathayati--asti kaścit kṣemāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ kṣemaṃkaro nāma samyaksambuddhah?
K10divyav_u:7246: te kathayanti--parinirvṛtaḥ sa bhagavān kṣemaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7249: 150.007. tasmācca jalābhiṣekeṇa pratyāgataprāṇo jīvita utthāya bhūyaḥ pṛcchati--kiṃ bhavanto jānīdhvaṃ śrāvakā api tāvattasya bhagavatastiṣṭhanti?
K10divyav_u:7251: 150.009. saptāhaparinirvṛtasya ca buddhasya bhagavataḥ kṣemaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya kṣemeṇa rājñā caityamalpeśākhyaṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam/
K10divyav_u:7252: 150.010. tena ca gatvā śreṣṭhinā janapadāḥ pṛṣṭāḥ/
K10divyav_u:7253: 150.010. asti bhavantastasya bhagavato buddhasya kiṃcit stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam/
K10divyav_u:7256: 150.012. tasya etadabhavat--etaṃ mayā suvarṇaṃ kṣemaṃkaraṃ samyaksambuddham uddiśyānītam/
K10divyav_u:7258: 150.013. yannvahametenaiva suvarṇena tasyaiva bhagavataścaityaṃ maheśākhyataraṃ kārayeyam/
K10divyav_u:7263: ahametenaiva suvarṇenaitat tasya bhagavataścaityaṃ maheśākhyataraṃ kārayeyam/
K10divyav_u:7265: 150.017. tato brāhmaṇā nagaraṃ prati nivāsinaḥ saṃbhūya sarve tasya mahāśreṣṭhinaḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayanti--bho mahāśreṣṭhin,
K10divyav_u:7270: 150.019. idānīṃ tu tasya parinirvṛtasya vayameva dakṣiṇīyāḥ/
K10divyav_u:7272: 150.020. sa teṣāṃ kathayati--nāham yuṣmākametat suvarṇaṃ dāsyāmi/
K10divyav_u:7277: 150.022. teṣāṃ tathā vyutpadyatāṃ na lebhe taccaityam yathepsitaṃ tena suvarṇena kārayitum/
K10divyav_u:7278: 150.023. atha sa śreṣṭhī rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--mahārāja,
K10divyav_u:7279: taccaityaṃ na labhe brāhmaṇānāṃ sakāśādyathābhipretaṃ kārayitum/
K10divyav_u:7281: 150.025. evaṃ ca rājñā svapuruṣa ājñaptah--yadyasya mahāśreṣṭhinaḥ stūpamabhisaṃskurvataḥ kaścidapanayaṃ karoti,
K10divyav_u:7283: 150.026. evaṃ deveti sahasrayodhī puruṣo rājñaḥ pratiśrutya nirgataḥ/
K10divyav_u:7284: 150.027. nirgamya ca tān brāhmaṇānevaṃ vadati--śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ,
K10divyav_u:7285: ahaṃ rājñāsya mahāśreṣṭhinaḥ svapuruṣo dattah--yadyasya stūpamabhisaṃskurvataḥ kaścidvighātaṃ kuryāt,
K10divyav_u:7286: sa tvayā mahatā daṇḍena śāsayitavya iti/
K10divyav_u:7289: 150.030. te brāhmaṇāḥ sahasrayodhinaḥ puruṣasyaivaṃ śrutvā bhītāḥ/
K10divyav_u:7290: 150.030. yatastena mahāśreṣṭhinā saṃcintya yathaitat suvarṇaṃ tatraiva garbhasaṃsthaṃ
K10divyav_u:7291: syāt tathā kartavyamiti tasya stūpasya sarvaireva caturbhiḥ pārśvaiḥ pratikaṇṭhukayā
K10divyav_u:7293: 150.032. yāvadanupūrveṇa<151> prathamā meḍhī tato 'nupūrveṇa dvitīyā tatastṛtīyā meḍhī yāvadanupūrveṇāṇḍam/
K10divyav_u:7294: 151.001. tathāvidhaṃ ca stūpasyāṇḍaṃ kṛtam yatra sā yūpayaṣṭirabhyantare pratipāditā/
K10divyav_u:7298: 151.004. tatra ca kriyamāṇe sahasrayodhinaḥ puruṣasyaivamutpannam--nātra kaścididānīṃ prahariṣyati/
K10divyav_u:7300: 151.005. tena ca mahāśreṣṭhinā tasya stūpasya caturbhiḥ pārśvaiścatvāro dvārakoṣṭhakā māpitāḥ,
K10divyav_u:7306: 151.008. tatra ca vividhāni jalajāni mālyāni ropitāni tadyathā utpalaṃ padmaṃ kumudaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ sugandhikaṃ mṛdugandhikam/
K10divyav_u:7307: 151.010. vividhāni ca puṣkariṇītīreṣu sthalajāni mālyāni ropitāni,
K10divyav_u:7313: 151.013. ye tasmiṃścaitye gandhairdhūpairmālyaiśca cūrṇaiḥ kārāḥ kurvanti/
K10divyav_u:7316: dakṣiṇena vāyunā sarvapuṣpajātīnāṃ gandhena taccaityamaṅgaṇaṃ cāsya sphuṭaṃ bhavatyanubhāvitam/
K10divyav_u:7319: 151.016. vāyatā vāyatā taccaityāṅgaṇaṃ ca tena vividhena gandhamālyena sphuṭaṃ bhavatyanubhāvitam/
K10divyav_u:7321: 151.018. sa taṃ stūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvajātakṛtaniṣṭhitaṃ kathayati--asmiṃścaitye kārāṃ kṛtvā kimavāpyate?
K10divyav_u:7322: yato 'sau śreṣṭhī buddhodāharaṇaṃ pravṛttaḥ kartum--evaṃ tribhirasaṃkhyeyairvīryeṇa vyāyamatā anuttarā bodhiravāpyate/
K10divyav_u:7323: 151.020. sa taṃ śrutvā viṣādamāpanno hīnotsāhatayā kathayati--nāhaṃ śakṣyāmi anuttarāṃ samyaksambodhiṃ samudānayitum/
K10divyav_u:7324: 151.021. tato 'sau śreṣṭhī pratyekabuddhodāharaṇaṃ pravṛttaḥ kartum--evaṃ sahasrayodhī
K10divyav_u:7325: tasyāpi varṇodāharaṇaṃ śrutvā viṣaṇṇacetāḥ kathayati--etāmapyahaṃ pratyekabodhiṃ
K10divyav_u:7327: 151.023. tataḥ sa mahāśreṣṭhī śrāvakavarṇodāharaṇaṃ kṛtvā kathayati--asminnapi tāvat praṇidhatsva cittam/
K10divyav_u:7328: 151.024. yataḥ sahasrayodhyāha--tvayā punarmahāśreṣṭhin katamasyāṃ bodhau praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam?
K10divyav_u:7334: 151.028. kiṃ tu loke yadā tvaṃ buddhotpādaśabdaṃ śrutvā smṛtiṃ pratilabhethāḥ/
K10divyav_u:7335: 151.029. sa ca śreṣṭhī taṃ caityaṃ kṛtvā nirīkṣya pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ karoti--
K10divyav_u:7336: 151.030. anena dānena mahadgatena buddho bhaveyaṃ sugataḥ svayambhūḥ/
K10divyav_u:7339: ahameva sa tasmin samaye bodhisattvacaryāṃ vartāmi/
K10divyav_u:7341: eṣa eva dharmarucistena kālena tena samayena/
K10divyav_u:7345: 152.005. dvitīye dīpaṃkaro nāma samyaksambuddho loka utpanno vidyācaraṇasamyaksambuddhaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān/
K10divyav_u:7346: 152.006. atha dīpamakaraḥ samyaksambuddho janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran dvīpāvatīṃ rājadhānīmanuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7347: 152.007. dvīpāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ dvīpo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:7348: 152.009. tatra dīpena rājñā dīpaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sābhisaṃskāreṇa nagarapraveśenopanimantritaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7349: 152.010. tasya ca dīpasya rājño vāsavo nāma sāmantarājo 'bhūt/
K10divyav_u:7351: iha mayā dīpaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sābhisaṃskāreṇa nagarapraveśenopanimantritaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7353: 152.012. tadā ca vāsavena rājñā dvādaśavarṣāṇi yajñamiṣṭvā yajñāvasāne rājñā pañca mahāpradānāni vyavasthāpitāni,
K10divyav_u:7359: 152.014. tena khalu samayena anyeṣu janapadeṣu dvau māṇavakau prativasataḥ/
K10divyav_u:7362: 152.017. tābhyāṃ ca śrutaṃ vāsavena rājñā pañca mahāpradānāni yajñāvasāne samudānītāni,
K10divyav_u:7363: yo brāhmaṇaḥ svādhyāyasampanno bhaviṣyati sa lapsyatīti/
K10divyav_u:7366: 152.019. ko 'smākaṃ tatra bahuśrutatamo vā svādhyāyatamo bhaviṣyatīti saṃcintya yena vāsavasya rājño mahānagaraṃ tena saṃprasthitau/
K10divyav_u:7368: 152.020. yau etau dvau māṇavakau āgacchataḥ sumatiśca matiśca,
K10divyav_u:7370: 152.021. yadevaṃ dvau māṇakakau āgacchataḥ sumitaśca matiśca,
K10divyav_u:7372: 152.021.yadevaṃ mahārāja tvayā dvādaśa varṣāṇi yajña iṣṭaḥ,
K10divyav_u:7374: 152.023. sa rājā saṃlakṣayati--nūnametau mahātmānau yeṣāmāmarthāya devatā apyārocayanti/
K10divyav_u:7375: 152.024. yato 'sau rājā paśyati māṇavakau dūrata evāgacchantau agrasanamībhiruhyavasthitau/
K10divyav_u:7376: 152.025. yato rājā vāsavastyau sumatiṃ māṇavaṃ pṛcchati--bhavān sumati?
K10divyav_u:7378: 152.028. yato rājā vāsavaḥ sumatiṃ māṇavamagrāsane bhojayitvā pañca pradānāni prayacchati/
K10divyav_u:7382: 152.030. yataḥ sā kanyā sumatiṃ māṇavaṃ prāsādikamabhirūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā lubdhā snehotpannā,
K10divyav_u:7385: 152.032. yataḥ sā kanyā rājñā pradānabuddhyā parityaktā <153>na punargṛhītā,
K10divyav_u:7386: sumatināpi māṇavenāpratigṛhyamāṇā rājño dīpasya dīpāvatīṃ nagarīṃ gatā/
K10divyav_u:7387: 153.002. sā tatra gatvā tadātmīyamalaṃkāraṃ śarīrādavatārya mālākārāyānuprayacchati--asyālaṃkārasya mūlyaṃ me pratidivasaṃ devasyārthe nīlotpalāni
K10divyav_u:7388: 153.003. sā tenopakrameṇa tadalaṃkārikaṃ suvarṇaṃ datvā devaśuśraūṣikā saṃvṛttā/
K10divyav_u:7389: 153.004. sa ca māṇavakaḥ sumatistāni catvāri mahāpradānāni gṛhya upādhyāyasakāśaṃ gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:7392: kārṣāpaṇānāṃ tu pañca śatāni tasyaiva sumaterdadāti/
K10divyav_u:7393: 153.006. sa ca sumatistasyāmeva rātrau daśa svapnānadrākṣīt--mahāsamudraṃ pibāmi,
K10divyav_u:7395: imau candrādityau evaṃmaharddhikau evaṃmahānubhāvau pāṇinā āmārṣṭi parimārṣṭi,
K10divyav_u:7402: 153.010. pratibuddhasyaitadabhavat--ka eṣāṃ svapnānāṃ mama vyākaraṇaṃ kariṣyati?
K10divyav_u:7404: 153.011. atha sumatirmāṇavaḥ saṃśayanirṇayanārtham ṛṣeḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:7405: 153.012. sumatistasya ṛṣeḥ pratisaṃmodanaṃ kṛtvā svapnānākhyāyāha--kuruṣva me eṣāṃ svapnānāṃ nirṇayam/
K10divyav_u:7408: 153.013. tatra dīpena rājñā dīpaṃkaro nāma samyaksambuddhaḥ sābhisaṃskāreṇa nagarapraveśenopanimantritaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7410: 153.015. atha vāsavo rājā tasya dīpasya rājñaḥ pratiśrutya aśītyamātyasahasraparivṛto dīpāvatīṃ rājadhānīmanuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7411: 153.016. tena ca dīpena rājñā saptamāddivasāddīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya sābhisaṃskāreṇa
K10divyav_u:7412: nagarapraveśaṃ kariṣyāmīti sarvaviṣayādhiṣṭhānāñca sarvapuṣpāṇāṃ saṃgrahaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ /
K10divyav_u:7413: 153.018. tatra ca yasmin divase rājñā dīpena tasya dīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya sābhisaṃskāreṇa nagarapraveśa ārabdhaḥ kartum,
K10divyav_u:7416: 153.020. sā ca devopasthāyikā dārikā mālākārasakāśaṃ gatā--prayaccha me nīlotpalāni,
K10divyav_u:7418: 153.022. mālākāra āha--adya rājñā sarvapuṣpāṇi gṛhītāni dīpaṃkaranagarapraveśasyārthe/
K10divyav_u:7420: punarapi tatra puṣkiriṇyām yadi matpuṇyair nīlotpalapadmamanuddhṛtamāsādyeta/
K10divyav_u:7421: 153.023. tatra puṣkiriṇyāṃ sumateḥ puṇyānubhāvāt sapta nīlapadmāni prādurbhūtāni/
K10divyav_u:7430: 153.027. yataḥ sā dārikā kathayati--madīyaiḥ puṇyairetāni prādurbhūtāni,
K10divyav_u:7435: 153.030. tena mālākāreṇaivaṃ śrutvā tasyā dārikayāstānyuddhṛtya anupradattāni/
K10divyav_u:7436: 153.031. sā tāni gṛhītvā udakakumbhe prakṣipya tatkumbhamudakasya pūrayitvā adhiṣṭhānaṃ gatā prasthitā/
K10divyav_u:7444: 154.003. sā ca dārikā tasmādudyānāt tasya sumatermāṇavasyābhimukhamāgatā/
K10divyav_u:7446: 154.005. yatastāni sumatirdṛṣṭvā tasyā dārikāyāḥ kathayati--prayaccha mamaitāni padmāni/
K10divyav_u:7448: 154.006. sā dārikā tasya sumateḥ kathayati--tadā necchasi māṃ pratigṛhītum/
K10divyav_u:7455: yadi tvameṣāṃ padmānāṃ pradānaphalena mamāpi jātyāṃ jātyāṃ patnīmicchasi,
K10divyav_u:7456: asya dānasya pradānakāle yadyevaṃ praṇidhānaṃ karoṣi--jātyāṃ jātyāṃ mama bhāryā syāditi/
K10divyav_u:7457: 154.011. sumatirāha--vayaṃ dānābhiratāḥ svagarbharūpaparityāgaṃ svamāṃsaparityāgaṃ ca kurmaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7458: 154.012. tataḥ sā dārikā sumateḥ kathayati--tvamevaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kuru,
K10divyav_u:7461: 154.013. evamukte tayā dārikayā tasya sumateḥ pañca padmānyanupradattāni,
K10divyav_u:7465: 154.016. tatra te 'haṃ bhavet patnī nityaṃ sahadharmacāriṇī//2//
K10divyav_u:7468: 154.020. sa ca rājā śataśalākaṃ chatraṃ gṛhītvā dīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya pratyudgataḥ/
K10divyav_u:7470: 154.021. evameva vāsavo rājā amātyaiḥ saha pratyudgataḥ/
K10divyav_u:7471: 154.021. dīpo rājā bhagavato buddhasya pādayor nipatya vijñāpayati--bhagavan,
K10divyav_u:7474: 154.023. sa ca rājā dīpaḥ śataśalākaṃ chatraṃ dīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya dhārayati/
K10divyav_u:7477: 154.024. bhagavatā ṛddhyā tathā adhiṣṭhitam yathā ekaikaḥ saṃlakṣayati--ahaṃ bhagavataśchatraṃ dhārayāmīti/
K10divyav_u:7479: 154.026. tatra bhagavatā sābhisaṃskāra indrakīle pādo vyavasthāpitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7481: tadaiva samanantarakālaṃ pṛthivī ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitā--calitā pracalitā saṃpracalitā,
K10divyav_u:7483: 154.028. dharmatā ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatām yadendrakīle sābhisaṃskāreṇa pādau vyavasthāpayanti,
K10divyav_u:7505: padmāni kumudāni puṇḍarīkānyagurucūrṇāni candanacūrṇāni tagaracūrṇāni tamālapatrāṇi divyāni mandāravāṇi puṣpāṇi kṣipanti,
K10divyav_u:7512: 155.009. tatra ca dīpāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāmanekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi puṣpairdhūpairgandhaiśca kārāṃ kurvanti/
K10divyav_u:7513: 155.010. te 'pi ca sumatiśca dārikā ca yena dīpaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhastenānugacchanti padmāni gṛhya/
K10divyav_u:7514: 155.011. te ca tatra mahājanakāyena pūjārthaṃ saṃparivṛtasya bhagavata upaśleṣaṃ na labhante/
K10divyav_u:7515: 155.012. bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--bahutaraṃ sumatirmāṇavo 'smānmahājanakāyāt puṇyaprasavaṃ kariṣyati iti/
K10divyav_u:7518: 155.014. labdhāvakāśaśca sumatirmāṇavo bhagavantamasecanakadarśanaṃ dṛṣṭvā atīva prasādajātaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7519: 155.015. prasādajātena ca tāni pañca padmāni bhagavataḥ kṣiptāni/
K10divyav_u:7520: 155.016. tāni ca bhagavatā dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena tathā adhiṣṭhitāni,
K10divyav_u:7524: 155.018. tathā dṛṣṭvā tayā dārikayā prasādajātayā dvau padmau bhagavataḥ kṣiptau/
K10divyav_u:7525: 155.018. tau cāpi bhagavatā tathā adhiṣṭhitau yathā śakaṭīcakramātrau karṇasamīpe vitānaṃ baddhvā vyavasthitau/
K10divyav_u:7526: 155.019. tatra ca pradeśe tumulena vātavarṣeṇa kardamo jātaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7527: 155.020. paścāt sumatirmāṇavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ sakardamaṃ pṛthivīpradeśamupagataḥ/
K10divyav_u:7528: 155.021. tasmin sakardame pṛthivīpradeśe jātaṃ saṃtīrya bhagavato bhagavataḥ purato gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
K10divyav_u:7531: 155.024. tatastena dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena samyaksambuddhena tasya sumatermāṇavasya jaṭāsu pādau vyavasthāpitau/
K10divyav_u:7532: 155.025. tasya ca sumateḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubuddha eva matirmāṇavastiṣṭhati/
K10divyav_u:7534: anena dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhenāsya sumatermāṇavasya tiraścām yathā padbhyāṃ jaṭā avaṣṭabdhāḥ/
K10divyav_u:7535: 155.027. paścāt dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena sumatirmāṇavo vyākṛtah--bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ nṛbhavādvimukto mukto vimurlokahitāya śāstā/
K10divyav_u:7536: 155.030. śākyātmajaḥ śākyamunīti nāṃnā trilokasāro jagataḥ pradīpaḥ//4//
K10divyav_u:7537: 156.001. <156>yadā ca sa sumatirmāṇavo dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena vyākṛtaḥ,
K10divyav_u:7542: 156.003. dṛṣṭvā ca praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam--yadā anenānuttarajñānamadhigataṃ tadāsya vayaṃ śrāvakā bhavema/
K10divyav_u:7547: 156.008. śrāvikā te bhaviṣyāmi tasmin kāla upasthite//6//
K10divyav_u:7548: 156.009. khagasthaṃ māṇavaṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasrāṇi śatāni ca/
K10divyav_u:7552: 156.013. yadā ca sumatirmāṇavo dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena vyākṛtaḥ,
K10divyav_u:7560: 156.016. tena rājñā teṣāṃ bhṛtyānāmekaiko vālo dattaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7561: 156.017. tairamātyaiḥ svake vijite gatvā caityāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni/
K10divyav_u:7563: tadā dīpena rājñā vāsavena ca rājñā tairanekaiśca naigamajānapadaiḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravārito 'nāgataguṇāvekṣatayā/
K10divyav_u:7564: 156.019. tataḥ sa matirmāṇava ucyate--ahamanuttarasyāṃ samyaksambodhau vyākṛtah--tvayā kutra cittamutpāditam?
K10divyav_u:7567: tataḥ sa kathayati--yadā tava dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena padbhyāṃ jaṭā avaṣṭabdhāḥ,
K10divyav_u:7568: tadā kupitena vāg niścāritā--dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena śrotriyasya jaṭā tiraścām yathā padbhyāmavaṣṭabdhāḥ/
K10divyav_u:7571: 156.024. tatastau sumatirmatiśca dīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya pravacane pravrajitau/
K10divyav_u:7574: 156.026. sa ca sumatirmāṇavaścyutaḥ kālagatastuṣite devanikāye upapannaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7576: 156.028. bhagavānāha--yo 'sau vāsavo rājābhūt tena kālena tena samayena,
K10divyav_u:7578: 156.029. yāni tānyaśītiramātyasahasrāṇi tena kālena tena samayena,
K10divyav_u:7587: 157.001. <157>etaddvitīye 'saṃkhyeye asya ca dharmarucermama ca darśanam yadahaṃ saṃdhāya kathayāmi--cirasya dharmaruce,
K10divyav_u:7589: 157.003. tasmādapyārvāk tṛtīye 'saṃkhyeye krakucchando nāma samyaksambuddho loka
K10divyav_u:7590: utpanno vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān /
K10divyav_u:7593: 157.006. sa ca kalatrasahāyaḥ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
K10divyav_u:7594: 157.006. tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7597: 157.007. sa ca gṛhapatistāṃ patnīmevamāha--jāto 'smākam ṛṇadharo dhanaharaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7599: 157.009. sa ca vaṇiglokenāvṛto dūrataraṃ gato bhāṇḍamādāya/
K10divyav_u:7601: 157.010. sa ca dārakaḥ kālāntareṇa mahān saṃvṛtto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7607: 157.012. sā ca mātā asya kleśairbādhyamānā cintayituṃ pravṛttā--ka upāyaḥ syāt yadahaṃ kleśān vinodayeyam,
K10divyav_u:7610: yathā anenaiva me sārdhaṃ rogavinodakaṃ bhavati,
K10divyav_u:7612: 157.016. tatastayā vṛddhayuvatī āhūya bhojayitvā dvis triḥ paścānnavena paṭenācchāditā/
K10divyav_u:7613: 157.016. tasyāḥ sā vṛddhā kathayati--kena kāryeṇaiva mamānuprasādādinā upakrameṇānupravṛttiṃ karoṣi?
K10divyav_u:7614: sā tasyā vṛddhāyā viśvastā bhūtvā evamāha--amba,
K10divyav_u:7618: yo 'bhyantara eva syānna ca śaṅkanīyo janasya/
K10divyav_u:7619: 157.019. vṛddhā kathayati--neha gṛhe tathāvidho manuṣyaḥ saṃvidyate,
K10divyav_u:7622: 157.021. katamaḥ sa manuṣyo bhaviṣyati yasyāhaṃ vakṣyāmi?
K10divyav_u:7623: tataḥ sā vaṇikpatnī tasyā vṛddhāyāḥ kathayati--yadyanyo manuṣya evaṃvidhopakramayukto nāsti,
K10divyav_u:7626: 157.023. tasyāstayā vṛddhayā abhihitam--kathaṃ nu putreṇa sārdhaṃ ratikrīḍāṃ gamiṣyasi?
K10divyav_u:7628: 157.024. tataḥ sā vaṇikpatnī kathayati--yadyanyo 'bhyantaro manuṣyo na saṃvidyate,
K10divyav_u:7631: 157.026. tataḥ sā vṛddhayuvatī tasya vaṇijaḥ putrasyaivāgamya pṛcchati--vatsa,
K10divyav_u:7635: tataḥ sā vṛddhā kathayati--bhavānevamabhirūpaśca yuvā ca asmin vayasi taruṇayuvatyā sārdhaṃ śobhethāḥ krīḍan raman paricārayan/
K10divyav_u:7638: 157.030. tataḥ sā vṛddhā evaṃ dvirapi trirapi tasya dārakasya kathayati--taruṇayuvatistavārthe kleśairbādhyate/
K10divyav_u:7639: 157.031. sa vaṇigdārako dvirapi trirapyucyamānastasyā vṛddhāyāḥ kathayati--amba,
K10divyav_u:7641: tatah <158>sā vṛddhā kathayati--uktaṃ tasyā mayā tannimittam/
K10divyav_u:7643: 158.001. sā ca dārikā hīvyapatrāpyagṛhītā na kiṃcidvakṣyati/
K10divyav_u:7645: 158.002. na tvayā tasyā vā anveṣaṇe yatnaḥ karaṇīyaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7646: 158.003. tatastena vaṇigdārakeṇa tasyā vṛddhāyā abhihitam--kutrāsmākaṃ saṃgataṃ bhaviṣyati?
K10divyav_u:7650: 158.005. sā ca vṛddhā tasyā vaṇikpatnyāḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--icchāpitaḥ sa vo 'yaṃ dārakaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7653: 158.007. sa ca dārakaḥ kāryāṇi kṛtvā gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:7657: 158.008. sa dārako labdhānujñastasyā vṛddhāyā gṛhaṃ gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:7658: 158.009. tasya dārakasya tasmin gṛhe gatasya ratikrīḍākālamāgamayamānasya tiṣṭhato niśikālamapratyabhijñātam/
K10divyav_u:7659: 158.010. rūpe kāle sā mātā asya vaṇigdārakasya tasminneva gṛhe ratikrīḍāmanubhavanārthaṃ tatraiva gatā/
K10divyav_u:7660: 158.011. gatvā ca tasmin gṛhe vikālamavyaktiṃ vibhāvyamāne rūpākṛtau nirgūḍhenopacārakrameṇa ratikrīḍāṃ putreṇa sārdhamanubhavituṃ pravṛttā
K10divyav_u:7661: 158.013. sā ca parikṣīṇāyāṃ rātrau anubhūtaratikrīḍā satamondhakāre kālāyāmeva rajanyāmavibhāvyamānarūpākṛtau svagṛhaṃ gacchati/
K10divyav_u:7662: 158.014. sa cāpi vaṇigdārako ratikrīḍāmanubhūya prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ bhāṇḍāvāriṃ gatvā kuṭumbakāryāṇi karoti/
K10divyav_u:7664: 158.015. tatra vṛddhāyā gṛhe ratikrīḍāmanubhavaṃśca cirakālamevaṃ vartamānena ratikrīḍākrameṇa
K10divyav_u:7669: 158.019. iti saṃcintya tatraiva vṛddhāgṛhe gatvā ratikrīḍāṃ putreṇa sārdhamanubhūya
K10divyav_u:7670: rajanyāḥ kṣaye satamondhakārakāle tasya dārakasyoparimaṃ prāvaraṇaṃ nivasyātmanīyāṃ
K10divyav_u:7672: 158.021. sa ca dārakaḥ prabhāakāle tāṃ paṭṭikāṃ śirasi mañcasyāvatiṣṭhantīṃ saṃpaśyati/
K10divyav_u:7673: 158.022. ātmīyāmevopariprāvaraṇapotrīmalabhamānastatraiva tāṃ paṭṭikāṃ saṃlakṣya tyaktvā bhāṇḍāvārīṃ gatvā yugalamanyaṃ prāvṛtya svagṛhaṃ gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:7674: 158.023. tatra ca gataḥ saṃpaśyati tamevātmīyaṃ pravaraṇaṃ tasyā mātuḥ śirasi prāvṛtam/
K10divyav_u:7678: evaṃ cirakālaṃ tava mayā sārdhaṃ kāmān paribhuñjato 'dyāpyahaṃ tava saivāmbā?
K10divyav_u:7679: yataḥ sa vaṇigdārakastathāvidhaṃ mātṛvacanamupaśrutya saṃmūḍho vihvalacetā bhūmau nipatitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7681: 158.027. sa jalapariṣekāvasikto dārakaścireṇa kālena pratyāgataprāṇastayā mātrā samāśvāsyate--kimevaṃ khedamupāgatastvam?
K10divyav_u:7684: 158.029. sa dārakastasyāḥ kathayati--kathamahaṃ khedaṃ na kariṣyāmi saṃmohaṃ vā,
K10divyav_u:7685: yena mayā evaṃvidhaṃ pāpakaṃ karma kṛtam?
K10divyav_u:7686: tataḥ sa tayābhihitah--na te manaḥśūkaṃsdminnarthe utpādayitavyam/
K10divyav_u:7695: na ca tīryaṃ putrasya snāyato doṣakārakaṃ bhavati/
K10divyav_u:7697: 159.002. api ca pratyanteṣu janapadeṣu dharmataivaiṣā yasyāmeva pitā asaddharmeṇābhigacchati,
K10divyav_u:7699: 159.004. evamasau vaṇigdārako mātrā bahuvidhairanunayavacanairvinītaśokastayā mātrā tasmin pātake 'saddharme punaḥ punaratīva saṃjātarāgaḥ pravṛttaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7703: 159.006. sā vaṇikpatnī tathāvidhaṃ lekhārthaṃ śrutvā vaimanasyajātā cintayituṃ pravṛttā--mahāntaṃ kālaṃ mama tasyāgamanamudīkṣamāṇāyāḥ/
K10divyav_u:7705: 159.008. idānīṃ mayā evaṃvidhenopakrameṇa putraṃ ca paricaritvā sa cāgamiṣyati/
K10divyav_u:7706: 159.008. ka upāyaḥ syāt yadahaṃ tamihāsamprāptameva jīvitāt vyaparopayeyam?
K10divyav_u:7707: iti saṃcintya taṃ putramāhūya kathayati--pitrā te lekhyo 'nupreṣitah āgamiṣyatīti/
K10divyav_u:7711: yadā asau na prasahate pitṛvadhaṃ kartum,
K10divyav_u:7712: tadā tayā mātrā bhūyo 'nuvṛttivacanairabhihitah--tasyānuvṛttivacanairucyamānasya kāmeṣu saṃraktasyādhyavasāyo jātaḥ pitṛvadhaṃ prati/
K10divyav_u:7713: 159.013. kāmān khalu pratisevato na hi kiṃcit pāpakaṃ karmākaraṇīyamiti vadāmi/
K10divyav_u:7716: 159.015. ityuktvā viṣamādāya samitāyāṃ miśrayitvā maṇḍilakān paktvā anye 'pi ca nirviṣāḥ paktāḥ/
K10divyav_u:7719: 159.017. gṛhya pitṛsakāśaṃ gatvā ca tasya viśvastasyaikatra bhuñjata etān saviṣān maṇḍilakān prayacchasva,
K10divyav_u:7721: 159.018. tataḥ sa dārakastena lekhavāhikamanuṣyeṇa sārdhaṃ tān maṇḍilakān gṛhya gataḥ pitṛsakāśam/
K10divyav_u:7722: 159.019. āgamya pitā asya atīva taṃ putraṃ dṛṣṭvā abhirūpaprāsādikaṃ maheśākhyaṃ prāmodyaṃ prāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7723: 159.020. sahyāsahyaṃ pṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ vaṇijāmākhyāti--ayaṃ bhavanto 'smākaṃ putraḥ/
K10divyav_u:7724: 159.021. yadā tena dārakeṇa saṃlakṣitaṃ sarvatra ahamanena pitrā pratisaṃvedita iti,
K10divyav_u:7728: 159.023. paścāttena pitrā sārdhamekaphalāyāṃ bhuñjatā tasya pituḥ saviṣā maṇḍilakā dattāḥ,
K10divyav_u:7730: 159.024. yato 'sya pitā tān saviṣān maṇḍilakān bhakṣayitvā bhṛtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7731: 159.025. tasya ca pituḥ kāladharmaṇā yuktasya ca dārako na kenacit pāpakaṃ karma kurvāṇo 'bhiśaṅkito vā pratisaṃvedito vā/
K10divyav_u:7732: 159.026. paścāttairiṣṭasnigdhasuhṛdbhirvaṇigbhiḥ śocayitvā yattattu kiṃcittasya vaṇijo bhaṇḍamāsīddhiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ vā,
K10divyav_u:7734: 159.028. sa dārakastaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ paitṛkaṃ gṛhya svagṛhamanuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7735: 159.029. tasya ca gatasya svagṛhaṃ sā mātā pracchannāsaddharmeṇa taṃ putraṃ paricaramāṇā ratiṃ nādhigacchati,
K10divyav_u:7736: anabhiratarūpā ca taṃ putraṃ vadati--kiyatkālaṃ vayamevaṃ pracchannena krameṇa ratikrīḍāmanubhaviṣyāmah?
K10divyav_u:7737: yannu vayamasmāddeśādanyadeśāntaraṃ gatvā prakāśakrameṇa niḥśaṅkā bhūtvā jāyāpatīti vikhyātadharmāṇaḥ sukhaṃ prativasema/
K10divyav_u:7738: 159.032. tatastau gṛhaṃ tyaktvā <160>mitrasvajanasambandhivargānapahāya purāṇadāsīdāsakarmakarāṃstyaktvā yāvadarthajātaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ ca gṛhya anyaviṣayāntaraṃ gatau/
K10divyav_u:7739: 160.002. tatra gatvā janapadeṣu vikhyāpayamānau jāyāpatikamiti ratikrīḍāmanubhavamānau vyavasthitau/
K10divyav_u:7740: 160.003. yāvadarhan bhikṣuḥ kenacit kālāntareṇa janapadacārikāṃ caraṃs tamadhiṣṭhānamanuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7741: 160.004. tena tatra piṇḍapātamanvāhiṇḍatā vīthyāṃ niṣadya ayaṃ vaṇigdharmaṇā saṃvyavahāramāṇaḥ sa dārako dṛṣṭaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7743: sa ca dārakastamarhantaṃ tathā abhivadamānamupaśrutya saṃbhinnacetāḥ svena duścaritena karmaṇā śaṅkitamanāścintayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7746: eṣa sa ihādhiṣṭhāne pratisaṃvedayiṣyati eṣā asya dārakasya māteti/
K10divyav_u:7749: tatastayoḥ saṃcintya taṃ gṛhamenamupanimantrayitvā bhuñjānaṃ ghātayāmaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7751: 160.011. sa dārako gūḍhaśastro bhūtvā arhantaṃ bhojayituṃ mātrā saha nirjanaṃ gṛhaṃ kṛtvā sa cārhadbhikṣubhuktvā tasmādgṛhādviśrabdhacārakrameṇa
K10divyav_u:7756: 160.015. tasya dārakasya sā mātā taṃ putramasaddharmeṇānuvartamānā tasminnevādhiṣṭhāne śreṣṭhiputreṇa sārdhaṃ pracchannakāmā asaddharmeṣu saktacittā
K10divyav_u:7760: 160.018. sā ca tasmiñ śreṣṭhiputre saṃraktacittā dvirapi trirapyucyamānā na nirvartate/
K10divyav_u:7761: 160.018. tatastena niṣkoṣamāsiṃ kṛtvā sā mātā jīvitādvyaparopitā/
K10divyav_u:7766: 160.022. sa yadā nirvāsitastasmādadhiṣṭhānāt tadā cintayituṃ pravṛttah--asti cāsya buddhaśāsane kaścidevānunayah?
K10divyav_u:7769: 160.024. sa ca vihāraṃ gatvā bhikṣusakāśamupasaṃkramya evaṃ kathayati--ārya,
K10divyav_u:7778: 160.028. tatastena bhikṣuṇā abhihitah--ekaikena eṣāṃ karmāṇāmācaraṇānna pravrajyārho bhavasi,
K10divyav_u:7782: 160.030. tataḥ sa puruṣo 'nyasya bhikṣoḥ sakāśamupasaṃkramya kathayati--ārya pravrajeyam/
K10divyav_u:7787: 160.032. sa yadā <161>dvirapi trirapi pravrajyāmāyācamāno 'pi bhikṣubhir na pravrājitaḥ,
K10divyav_u:7788: tadā amarṣajātaścintayituṃ pravṛttah--yā api sarvasādhāraṇā pravrajyā,
K10divyav_u:7791: 161.003. tasmin vihāre 'gniṃ datvā anyatra vihāraṃ gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:7795: 161.005. tatrāpi vihāre bahavo bhikṣavaḥ śaikṣāśaikṣāśca dagdhāḥ/
K10divyav_u:7796: 161.006. evaṃ tasyānekān vihārān dahataḥ sarvatra śabdo visṛtah--evaṃvidhaścaivaṃvidhaśca pāpakarmakārī puruṣo bhikṣubhyaḥ pravrajyāmalabhan vihārān bhikṣūṃśca dahatīti/
K10divyav_u:7798: 161.008. tatra ca vihāre bodhisattvajātīyo bhikṣuḥ prativasati tṛpitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7799: 161.008. tena śrutaṃ sa evaṃ duṣkarakarmakārī puruṣa ihāgacchatīti/
K10divyav_u:7800: 161.009. yataḥ sa bhikṣustasya puruṣasyāsamprāptasyaiva tasmin vihāre pratyudgataḥ/
K10divyav_u:7801: 161.010. sa taṃ puruṣaṃ sametya kathayati--bhadramukha, kimetat?
K10divyav_u:7806: 161.012. paścāt tena bhikṣuṇā tasya puruṣasya śiro muṇḍāpayitvā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dattāni/
K10divyav_u:7809: 161.013. tatastena bhikṣuṇā uktah--kiṃ te śikṣāpadaiḥ prayojanam?
K10divyav_u:7813: 161.015. paścāt sa bhikṣustasya puruṣasya dharmadeśanāmārabdhaḥ kartum--tvamevaṃvidhaścaivaṃvidhaśca pāpakarmakārī sattvo yadi kadācidbuddhaśabdaṃ
K10divyav_u:7819: ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena/
K10divyav_u:7826: 161.021. yāvacca mayā bhikṣavastribhirasaṃkhyeyaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiranyaiśca duṣkaraśatasahasrairanuttarā samyaksambodhiḥ samudānītā,
K10divyav_u:7833: 162.002. buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe/
K10divyav_u:7834: 162.002. rājagṛhe nagare subhadro nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7837: 162.004. sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
K10divyav_u:7838: 162.004. tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
K10divyav_u:7839: 162.005. bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
K10divyav_u:7840: 162.006. rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caran yena subhadrasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7842: 162.007. dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ patnīmādāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7851: 162.011. tena bhagavataḥ śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pātrapūro dattaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7856: 162.013. gacchāmi, paśyāmi kiṃ śramaṇena gautamena vyākṛtamiti/
K10divyav_u:7860: ārya, mayā tasya patnī darśitā--kiṃ janayiṣyati?
K10divyav_u:7865: 162.017. sa bhūriko gaṇitre kṛtāvī śvetavarṇāṃ gṛhītvā gaṇayitumārabdhah--paśyati yathā bhagavatā vyākṛtaṃ tatsarvaṃ tathaiva/
K10divyav_u:7868: 162.020. tadatra kiṃcid saṃvarṇayitavyaṃ kiṃcit vivarṇayitavyamiti viditvā hastau saṃparivartayati,
K10divyav_u:7874: 162.023. ārya, kiṃ satyaṃ kiṃ vā mṛṣā?
K10divyav_u:7879: 162.024. mandabhāgyaḥ sa sattvo jātamātra evāgninā kulaṃ dhakṣyati/
K10divyav_u:7880: 162.025. yat kathayati--divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti, idaṃ mṛṣā/
K10divyav_u:7881: 162.026. gehapate, asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭo manuṣyabhūto divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhavan?
K10divyav_u:7884: 162.027. yadā asya na bhaktaṃ na vastram,
K10divyav_u:7895: 162.031. subhadraḥ saṃlakṣayati--sarvathā parityājyo 'sau iti viditvā sa bhaiṣajyaṃ dātumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7902: 163.002. asthānametadanavakāśo yaccaramabhavikaḥ sattvo 'ntarāducchidya kālaṃ kariṣyati aprāpte āśravakṣaye/
K10divyav_u:7912: 163.007. sā tenāraṇyaṃ nītvā tathopakrāntā yathā kālagatā/
K10divyav_u:7913: 163.007. sa tāṃ pracchannaṃ gṛhamānīya suhṛtsambandhibāndhavānāṃ prātiveśakānāṃ ca kathayati--bhavantaḥ,
K10divyav_u:7916: 163.009. sā tairvikrośadbhir nīlapītalohitāvadātairvastraiḥ śibikāmalaṃkṛtya śītavanaṃ śmaśānamabhinirhṛtā/
K10divyav_u:7917: 163.010. nirgranthaiḥ śrutam--te hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditāśchatrapatākā ucchrayitvā rājagṛhasya nagarasya rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭake upāhiṇḍamānā ārocayanti--śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7918: 163.012. śramaṇena gautamena subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ patnī vyākṛtā--putraṃ janayiṣyati,
K10divyav_u:7926: 163.016. dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttānāmekārakṣāṇāṃ
K10divyav_u:7931: daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trirdivasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate--ko hīyate,
K10divyav_u:7948: 163.029. dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti,
K10divyav_u:7949: tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhānniścārya kāścidadhastādgacchanti,
K10divyav_u:7952: tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanamavīcimarbudaṃ
K10divyav_u:7953: nirarbudamaṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhavamutpalaṃ padma <164>mahāpadmaṃ narakaṃ gatvā ye uṣṇanarakāsteṣu
K10divyav_u:7956: 164.002. teṣāmevaṃ bhavati--kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ,
K10divyav_u:7959: 164.003. teṣāṃ nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ bhavati--na hyeva vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ,
K10divyav_u:7963: 164.005. te nirmite cittamabhiprasādya tannarakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhiṃ gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti/
K10divyav_u:7974: 164.016. atha tā arciṣastrisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātumanvāhiṇḍya bhagavantameva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti/
K10divyav_u:7982: 164.028. tatkālaṃ svayamadhigamya dhīra buddhyā śrotṛrṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām/
K10divyav_u:7985: 165.003. yasyārthe smitamupadarśayanti nāthāstaṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ//7//iti/
K10divyav_u:7987: 165.005. nāhetupratyayamānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti/
K10divyav_u:7990: 165.007. yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ śmaśānacārikāṃ gantum,
K10divyav_u:7992: 165.008. evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣūṇāmārocayati--tathāgata āyuṣmantaḥ śmaśānacārikāṃ gantukāmaḥ/
K10divyav_u:7993: 165.009. yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ śmaśānacārikaṃ gantum,
K10divyav_u:7995: 165.010. evamāyuṣmanniti te bhikṣavaḥ sarve saṃśrutya bhagavatsakāśamupagatāḥ/
K10divyav_u:7996: 165.011. atha bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāro mukto muktaparivāra
K10divyav_u:7997: āśvasta āśvāstaparivāro vinīto vinītaparivāro 'rhannarhatparivāro vītarāgo vītarāgaparivāraḥ
K10divyav_u:7998: prāsādikaḥ prāsādikaparivāro vṛṣabha iva gogaṇaparivṛto gajarāja iva kalabhagaṇaparivṛtaḥ
K10divyav_u:7999: siṃha iva daṃṣṭagaṇaparivṛto haṃsarāja iva haṃsagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suparṇīva parikṣagaṇaparivṛto
K10divyav_u:8000: vipra iva śiṣyagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suvaidya ivāturagaṇaparivṛtaḥ śūra iva yodhagaṇaparivṛto
K10divyav_u:8001: deśika ivādhvagaṇaparivṛtaḥ sārthavāha iva vaṇiggaṇaparivṛtaḥ śreṣṭhīva paurajanaparivṛtaḥ
K10divyav_u:8003: nakṣatragaṇaparivṛtaḥ sūrya iva raśmisahasraparivṛto dhṛtarāṣṭra iva gandharvagaṇaparivṛto
K10divyav_u:8004: virūḍhaka iva kumbhāṇḍagaṇaparivṛto brahmeva brahmakāyikaparivṛtaḥ stimita iva jalanidhiḥ
K10divyav_u:8005: sajala iva jaladharo vimada iva gajapatiḥ sudāntairindrayairasaṃkṣobhiteryāpathapracāro dvātriṃśatā
K10divyav_u:8007: sūryasahasrātirekaprabho jaṅgama iva ratnaparvataḥ samantato bhadrako daśabhirbalaiścaturbhirvaiśāradyaistribhirāveṇikaiḥ
K10divyav_u:8009: parivṛto 'nyena ca mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena anekaiśca prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ śītavanaṃ mahāśmaśānaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ /
K10divyav_u:8010: 165.026. aṣṭādaśānuśaṃsā buddhacārikāyāmityanekāni devatāśatasahasrāṇi bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhāni/
K10divyav_u:8012: 165.028. rājagṛhāt dvau bāladārakau brāhmaṇadārakaḥ kṣatriyadārakaśca bahir nirgatya krīḍataḥ/
K10divyav_u:8015: bhagavatā subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ patnī vyākṛtā--putraṃ janayiṣyati,
K10divyav_u:8019: 165.032. sā ca mṛtā kālagatā śītavanaṃ śmaśānaṃ nirhṛtā--mā haiva bhagavatā bhāṣitaṃ vitathaṃ syāditi/
K10divyav_u:8021: 166.001. <166>sacandratāraṃ prapatedihāmbaraṃ mahī saśailā savanā nabho vrajet/
K10divyav_u:8022: 166.003. mahodadhīnāmudakaṃ kṣayaṃ vrajenmaharṣayaḥ syūr na mṛṣābhidhāyinaḥ//8//iti
K10divyav_u:8033: 166.012. yathā hyamī śītavanonmukhotsukāḥ pravānti vātā himapaṅkaśītalāḥ/
K10divyav_u:8034: 166.014. prayānti nūnaṃ bahavo divaukaso nirīkṣituṃ śākyamunervikurvitam//10//iti/
K10divyav_u:8035: 166.016. rājñā bimbisāreṇa śrutam--bhagavatā subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ patnī vyākṛtā--putraṃ janayiṣyati,
K10divyav_u:8039: 166.018. sā ca mṛtā kālagatā śītavanaṃ śmaśānamabhinirhṛtā/
K10divyav_u:8041: 166.019. śrutvā ca punarasyaitadabhavat--na bhagavān nirarthakaṃ śītavanaṃ gacchati/
K10divyav_u:8042: 166.020. nūnaṃ bhagavān subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ patnīmāgamya mahadvineyakāryaṃ kartukāmo bhaviṣyati/
K10divyav_u:8045: 166.022. adrākṣīt sa kṣatriyakumārako rājānaṃ māgadhaśreṇyaṃ bimbisāraṃ dūrādeva/
K10divyav_u:8047: 166.024. yathā hi śreṇyo magadhādhipo hyayaṃ viniryayau rājagṛhāt sabāndhavaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8048: 166.026. pravartate me hṛdi niścitā matirmahājanasyābhyudayo bhaviṣyati//11//iti/
K10divyav_u:8051: 166.029. nirgrantha bhagavantaṃ smitonmukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃlakṣayanti--yathā śramaṇo gautamaḥ smitonmukho mahājanamadhyaṃ praviṣṭaḥ,
K10divyav_u:8054: nanvayaṃ sattvo mandabhāgyo na kālagata iti/
K10divyav_u:8061: 167.002. tasyāḥ sarvaḥ kāyo dagdhaḥ sthāpayitvā kukṣisāmantakam/
K10divyav_u:8064: 167.003. tasya coparipadmakarṇikāyāṃ kumāro niṣaṇṇo 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8065: 167.004. taṃ dṛṣṭvā anekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi paraṃ vismayamupagatāni/
K10divyav_u:8075: 167.008. tatra bhagavāñ jīvakaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate--gṛhāṇa jīvaka kumārakamiti/
K10divyav_u:8083: sa kathayati--rājakule 'haṃ bhadanta jāto rājakule vṛddhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8085: 167.017. tatra bhagavān subhadraṃ gṛhapatimāmantrayate--gṛhāṇedānīṃ gṛhapate kumāramiti/
K10divyav_u:8090: ayaṃ sattvo 'tīva mandabhāgyo yo hi nāma sarvabhakṣeṇāpyagninā na dagdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8091: 167.020. kiṃ bahunā? yadyevaṃ gṛhaṃ praveśayasi, nīyatām/
K10divyav_u:8096: 167.022. tatra bhagavān rājānaṃ bimbisāramāmantayate--gṛhāṇa mahārāja kumāramiti/
K10divyav_u:8099: kiṃ bhavatu asya dārakasya jyotiṣka iti nāmeti/
K10divyav_u:8101: 167.025. tato bhagavatā tasya janakāyasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10divyav_u:8115: 167.031. yadbhūyasā sā parṣadbuddhaniṃnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā/
K10divyav_u:8116: 167.032. jyotiṣko dārako rājñā bimbisāreṇa aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nupradatto <168>dvābhyāsaṃsadhātrībhyāṃ
K10divyav_u:8117: dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhāgtrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām /
K10divyav_u:8118: 168.002. so 'ṣṭhābhirdhātrībhirunnīyate vardhate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍena anyaiścottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
K10divyav_u:8121: 168.004. tena śrutam yathā mama bhaginī sattvavatī saṃvṛttā/
K10divyav_u:8127: 168.007. tena śrutam yathā sā asmākaṃ bhaginī kālagateti/
K10divyav_u:8128: 168.008. śrutvā ca punaḥ saṃlakṣayati--bhagavatā asau vyākṛtā putraṃ janayiṣyati,
K10divyav_u:8132: 168.010. mā haiva tabhagavato bhāṣitaṃ vitathaṃ syāt/
K10divyav_u:8133: 168.010. tena tiraḥprātiveśyāḥ pṛṣṭāh--śrutaṃ mayā asmākaṃ bhaginī sattvavatī saṃvṛttā/
K10divyav_u:8140: 168.014. mā haiva bhagavato bhāṣitaṃ vitathaṃ syāditi/
K10divyav_u:8142: 168.015. sacandratāraṃ prapatedihāmbaraṃ mahī saśailā savanā nabho vrajet/
K10divyav_u:8143: 168.017. mahodadhīnāmudakaṃ kṣayaṃ vrajenmaharṣayaḥ syūr na mṛṣābhidhāyinaḥ//13//
K10divyav_u:8146: kiṃ tu tena svāmināpi asau tathā tathā upakrāntā,
K10divyav_u:8151: 168.021. sa subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--na yuktaṃ gṛhapate tvayā kṛtam/
K10divyav_u:8152: 168.022. kiṃ kṛtam? asmākaṃ sattvavatī bhaginī tvayā nirgranthavigrāhitena tathā tathā upakrāntā,
K10divyav_u:8163: rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu cāvaraṇaṃ niścārayāmah--asmākaṃ bhaginī subhadreṇa gṛhapatinā praghātitā/
K10divyav_u:8169: nūnamevaṃ karomīti viditvā rājñaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati--deva,
K10divyav_u:8170: mama jñātaya evaṃ paribhāṣante--yadi tāvat kumāramānayasītyevaṃ kuśalam,
K10divyav_u:8174: rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu cāvaraṇaṃ niścārayāmah--asmākaṃ bhaginī subhadreṇa gṛhapatinā praghātitā/
K10divyav_u:8180: na mayā tvatsakāśāt jyotiṣkaḥ kumāro gṛhītaḥ,
K10divyav_u:8186: mama jñātaya evaṃ paribhāṣante--yadi tāvat kumāramānayasītyevaṃ kuśalam/
K10divyav_u:8196: 169.007. bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--yadi subhadro jyotiṣkaṃ kumāraṃ na labhate,
K10divyav_u:8197: sthānametadvidyate yaduṣṇaṃ rudhiraṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣyati/
K10divyav_u:8200: evaṃ ca vada--anuprayaccha mahārāja subhadrasya gṛhapaterjyotiṣkaṃ kumāram/
K10divyav_u:8201: 169.010. yadi subhadro gṛhapatirjyotiṣkaṃ kumāraṃ na labhate,
K10divyav_u:8202: sthānametadvidyate yaduṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣyatīti/
K10divyav_u:8203: 169.012. evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yena rājā bimbisārastenopasaṃskrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8205: kathayati ca--anuprayaccha mahārāja subhadrasya gṛhapaterjyotiṣkaṃ kumāram/
K10divyav_u:8206: 169.014. yadi subhadro gṛhapatirjyotiṣkaṃ kumāraṃ na labhate,
K10divyav_u:8207: sthānametadvidyate yat subhadro gṛhapatiruṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣye/
K10divyav_u:8215: yadi māṃ divase divase triṣkālaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmatīti/
K10divyav_u:8218: sa rājñā sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitaṃ kṛtvā hastiskandha āropya visarjitaḥ//
K10divyav_u:8219: 169.022. ācaritametallokasya--na tāvat putrasya nāma prajñāyate yāvat pitā jīvati/
K10divyav_u:8223: 169.024. buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:8224: 169.024. tena yasmin pradeśe tena subhadreṇa patnī āghātitā,
K10divyav_u:8226: 169.026. tathā sthavirairapi sūtrānta upanibaddham--bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati mṛditakukṣike dāva iti//
K10divyav_u:8227: 169.028. subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ pauruṣeyā ye paṇyamādāya deśāntaraṃ gatāḥ,
K10divyav_u:8230: 169.029. sa buddhe 'bhiprasanno dharme saṃghe 'bhiprasanno buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gata iti/
K10divyav_u:8234: 169.032. ghaṇḍāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--nedaṃ kenacit viṣṭayā vā <170>śītayā vā karkaṭakena vā gṛhītavyam/
K10divyav_u:8235: 170.001. ya etacchramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā maharddhiko vā mahānubhāvah ṛddhyā gṛhṇāti,
K10divyav_u:8245: 170.005. yāvat sthavirasthavirā bhikṣavo rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭāḥ/
K10divyav_u:8250: uktaṃ bhagavatā--pracchannakalyāṇairvo bhikṣavo vihartavyaṃ dhūtapāpairityuktvā prakrāntāḥ/
K10divyav_u:8255: 170.010. āyuṣmān daśabalakāśyapaḥ saṃlakṣayati--yena mayā anādikālopacitaṃ kleśagaṇaṃ vāntaṃ tyaktaṃ charditaṃ pratinisṛṣṭam,
K10divyav_u:8271: 170.017. api tu catvāri pātrāṇi suvarṇamayaṃ rūpyamayaṃ varḍūryamayaṃ sphaṭikamayam/
K10divyav_u:8272: 170.018. aparāṇyapi catvāri pātrāṇi rītimayaṃ tāmramayaṃ kaṃsamayamabhramayaṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:8279: 170.022. api tvadhīṣṭāni te dve pātre āyasaṃ mṛṇmayam/
K10divyav_u:8280: 170.022. yāvadapareṇa samayena jyotiṣkasya gṛhapaterdivyamānuṣī śrīḥ prādurbhūtā/
K10divyav_u:8281: 170.023. antarā ca rājagṛhamantarā ca campāmatrāntare śulkaśālā/
K10divyav_u:8284: 170.024. tena putrāṇāṃ svapnadarśanaṃ dattam--yaḥ kaścit paṇyamaśulkayitvā gamiṣyati,
K10divyav_u:8285: sā ghaṇṭā tāvadviraviṣyati yāvadasau nivartya śulkaṃ dāpayitavyamiti (yiṣyatīti?)/
K10divyav_u:8286: 170.027. taistaṃ svapnaṃ saṃbandhibāndhavānāṃ nivedya divasatithimuhūrtena tasmin pradeśe yakṣasthānaṃ kāritam/
K10divyav_u:8290: 170.030. sā brāhmaṇī saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ brāhmaṇo yaistairupāyairdhanopārjanaṃ karoti/
K10divyav_u:8304: 171.004. so 'pattanaṃ ghoṣayitvā tām yamalīṃ chatradaṇḍe prakṣipya sārthena sārdhaṃ rājagṛhaṃ saṃprasthito yāvadanupūrveṇa śulkaśālāmanuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8317: 171.010. sārthikā avadhyātumārabdhāh--kim yūyamasamān bhūṣitukāmā yena bhūyo bhūyaḥ pratinivartayadhvamiti?
K10divyav_u:8321: 171.012. anyeṣāṃ gacchatāṃ sā ghaṇṭā tathaiva raṭitumārabdhā/
K10divyav_u:8331: 171.016. kiṃ tu devasyaiva sānnidhyaṃ jñātaṃ bhavatīti/
K10divyav_u:8338: 171.018. brāhmaṇaḥ kathayati--yūyaṃ kathayatha śulkaṃ na dāpayāma iti/
K10divyav_u:8342: 171.020. api devasyaitat sānnidhyamiti kṛtvā asmābhiḥ prāvṛtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8344: 171.021. sa taṃ punargṛhītvā punaśchatranāḍikāyāṃ prakṣipya prakrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8347: 171.022. tatrāpi tāṃ na kaścit kārṣāpaṇasahasreṇa yācate/
K10divyav_u:8349: 171.023. jyotiṣkaśca kumāro rājakulānniṣkramya hastiskandhābhirūḍho vīthīmadhyena svagṛhaṃ gacchati/
K10divyav_u:8380: 172.002. sa brāhmaṇo bhūyasyā mātrayā abhiprasannaḥ kathayati--gṛhapate,
K10divyav_u:8389: 172.005. jyotiṣkeṇa tato yaḥ paribhuktakaḥ sa dārakāya dattaḥ,
K10divyav_u:8392: 172.007. jyotiṣkasya sa snānaśāṭaka upari gṛhasyābhyavakāśe śoṣito vāyunā hriyamāṇo rājño bimbisārasyopari patitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8397: śrūyate rājño māndhātuḥ saptāhaṃ hiraṇyavarṣaṃ patitam/
K10divyav_u:8401: jyotiṣko gṛhapatirbhagavatā vyākṛto divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti/
K10divyav_u:8408: tvaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛto divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti/
K10divyav_u:8460: kiṃ tu devasya kāṣṭhadhūmena vastrāṇi dhūpitāni,
K10divyav_u:8462: 173.001. rājā tatra divyamānuṣyā śriyā upacaryamāṇaḥ pramatto na niṣkrāṃti/
K10divyav_u:8471: na śaknoṣi tvamekaṃ divasaṃ rājyaṃ kārayitum?
K10divyav_u:8474: 173.006. rājā jyotiṣkasya mukhaṃ nirīkṣya kathayati--kumāra satyam?
K10divyav_u:8478: deva, puṣpāṇāṃ saṃkocavikāsānmaṇīnāṃ jvalanājvalanayogācchakunīnāṃ ca kūjanākūjanāt/
K10divyav_u:8479: 173.009. santi tāni puṣpāṇi yāni rātrau vikasanti,
K10divyav_u:8481: santi yāni divā vikasanti rātrau mlāyanti?
K10divyav_u:8482: santi te maṇayo ye rātrau jvālanti, na divā?
K10divyav_u:8483: santi ye divā jvalanti, na rātrau?
K10divyav_u:8484: santi te śakunayo ye rātrau kūjanti, na divā?
K10divyav_u:8485: santi ye divā kūjñati, na rātrau?
K10divyav_u:8488: 173.013. yathā tvaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtastathaiva nānyathetyuktvā jyotiṣkagṛhāt niṣkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8489: 173.014. ajātaśatrukumāreṇa jyotiṣkasantako maṇirapahṛtya dārakasya haste dattaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8504: api tu yata eva tvayā gṛhītastatraiva gatvā avasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8510: 173.021. yadā ajātaśatruṇā devadattavigrāhitena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājo jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ,
K10divyav_u:8515: 173.024. sa saṃlakṣayati--yena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ praghātitaḥ,
K10divyav_u:8530: 173.029. ajātaśatruḥ saṃlakṣayate--evamapi mayā na śakitaṃ jyotiṣkasya maṇīnapahartum/
K10divyav_u:8539: 174.001. teṣām yo yatrābhirūḍhaḥ sa tatraivāsthito yāvat prabhātā rajanī saṃvṛttā/
K10divyav_u:8542: anena kalirājena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājo jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ//
K10divyav_u:8546: 174.004. ajātaśatruṇā jyotiṣkasay dūto 'nupreṣitah--muñcata mamāyaṃ khalīkāra saṃlakṣayate--yena nāma pitā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ,
K10divyav_u:8547: sa māṃ na praghātayitṣyatīti kuta etat?
K10divyav_u:8548: sarvathā ahaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtah--mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarthattvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyatīti/
K10divyav_u:8552: 174.009. atha jyotiṣko gṛhapatiḥ suhṛtsambandhibāndhavānavalokya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8553: 174.010. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8554: 174.010. ekāntaniṣaṇṇo jyotiṣko gṛhapatirbhagavantamidamavocat--labheyāhāṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
K10divyav_u:8560: 174.016. ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaśca saṃghāṭiparītadehaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8563: 174.020. tenodyacchamānena vyāyacchamānena idameva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ
K10divyav_u:8568: 174.025. bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā jyotiṣkeṇa karma kṛtam yena citāmāropitaḥ,
K10divyav_u:8574: na bhikṣavaḥ kārmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10divyav_u:8578: api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
K10divyav_u:8580: 175.002. sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//15//
K10divyav_u:8581: 175.003. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣava ekanavatikalpe vipaśyī nāma śāstā loka udapādi tathāgato
K10divyav_u:8584: 175.005. dvāṣaṣṭibhikṣusahasraparivāro janapadacārikāṃ caran bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīmanuprāpto bandhumatyāṃ viharati sma bandhumatīyake dāve/
K10divyav_u:8585: 175.006. tena khalu samayena bandhumatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ bandhumān nāma rājā rājyaṃ
K10divyav_u:8586: kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ
K10divyav_u:8589: 175.009. tasyānaṅgaṇo nāma gṛhapatirāḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
K10divyav_u:8590: 175.010. sa saṃlakṣayate--bahuśo mayā vipaśyī samyaksambuddho 'ntargṛhe upanimantraya bhojitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8591: 175.011. na tu kadācit traimāsīṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravāritaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8592: 175.012. yannvahaṃ vipaśyinaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ traimāsīṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravārayeyam/
K10divyav_u:8594: 175.013. upasaṃkramya vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8595: 175.014. ekāntaniṣaṇṇamanaṅgaṇaṃ gṛhapatiṃ vipaśyī samyakasmbuddho dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
K10divyav_u:8596: 175.015. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
K10divyav_u:8602: 175.019. athānaṅgaṇo gṛhapatirbhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8603: 175.021. aśrauṣīdbandhumān rājā--vipaśyī samyaksambuddho dvāṣaṣṭibhikṣusahasraparivāro janapadacārikāṃ caran bandhumatīmanuprāpto bandhumatyāṃ viharati bandhumatīye dāve iti/
K10divyav_u:8604: 175.023. śrutvā ca punarasyaitadabhavat--bahuśo mayā bhagavānantargṛhe upanimantrya bhojitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8605: 175.023. na tu kadācit traimāsīṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravāritaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8608: 175.025. upasaṃkramya vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8609: 175.026. ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ bandhumantaṃ rājānaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
K10divyav_u:8610: 175.027. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
K10divyav_u:8611: 175.028. atha bandhumān rājā utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena vipaśyī samyaksambuddhastenāñjaliṃ
K10divyav_u:8616: ahaṃ tathā kariṣye yathā anaṅgaṇo gṛhapatirājñāsyati/
K10divyav_u:8619: 176.001. atha bandhumān rājā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrānto yena svaṃ nirveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8620: 176.003. bandhumān rājā anaṅgaṇaṃ gṛhapatiṃ dūtena prakrośyedamavocat--yatkhalu gṛhapate jānīyāt--ahaṃ tvatprathamato vipaśyinaṃ samyakasmbuddhaṃ
K10divyav_u:8621: tataḥ paścāt tavāpi na duṣkaraṃ bhaviṣyati vipaśyinaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ bhojayitumiti/
K10divyav_u:8630: tathāpi yena pūrvanimantritaḥ sa eva bhojayati/
K10divyav_u:8636: 176.010. tathā anaṅgaṇo gṛhapatistāmeva rātriṃ śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ
K10divyav_u:8637: samudānīya kālyamevotthāyodakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayati--samayo bhadanta,
K10divyav_u:8638: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate/
K10divyav_u:8639: 176.012. atha vipaśyī samyaksambuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto yenānaṅgaṇasya gṛhapaterbhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8641: 176.015. athānaṅgaṇo gṛhapatiḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati
K10divyav_u:8642: 176.016. anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya
K10divyav_u:8643: saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ
K10divyav_u:8645: 176.018. atha vipaśyī samyaksambuddho 'naṅgaṇaṃ gṛhapatiṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
K10divyav_u:8646: 176.020. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya prakrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8650: 176.022. tato bandhumān rājā kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8652: kasmāt tvaṃ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparastiṣṭhasīti?
K10divyav_u:8654: kathamahaṃ na cintāparastiṣṭhāmi yo 'haṃ mama viṣayanivāsinaṃ kuṭumbinaṃ na śaknomi bhaktottarikayā parājayitum?
K10divyav_u:8660: 176.026. bhavantaḥ, na kenacit madviṣayanivāsinā kāṣṭhaṃ vikretavyam/
K10divyav_u:8665: 176.028. surabhiṇā gandhena sarvā bandhumatī nagarī sphuṭā saṃvṛttā/
K10divyav_u:8678: 177.002. tena cittaṃ pradūṣya kharā vāg niścārita--tāvanme bhaktakāṣṭhamasti,
K10divyav_u:8680: 177.003. rājā kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8686: 177.005. vayaṃ tathā kariṣyāmo yathā devaścānaṅgaṇaṃ gṛhapatiṃ parājayatīti/
K10divyav_u:8687: 177.006. tairaparasmin divase bandhumatī rājadhānī apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhalyā vyavasthāpitā
K10divyav_u:8693: 177.011. tato bandhumān rājā dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayamāpannaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8694: 177.012. tato vismayāvarjitacittasaṃtatirvipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya dūtena kālamārocayati--samaye bhadanta,
K10divyav_u:8695: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
