K10divyav_u:8696: 177.014. atha vipaśyī samyaksambuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena bandhumato rājño bhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8698: 177.017. bandhumato rājño maṅgalyābhiṣeko hastināgo vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya śataśalākaṃ chatramupari mūrdhno dhārayati,
K10divyav_u:8700: 177.018. bandhumato rājño 'gramahiṣī vipaśyinaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ sauvarṇena maṇivālavyajanena vījayati,
K10divyav_u:8702: 177.020. anaṅgaṇena gṛhapatinā avacarakaḥ puruṣaḥ preṣitah--gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa,
K10divyav_u:8703: paśya kīdṛśenāhāreṇa bandhumān rājā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayatīti/
K10divyav_u:8709: 177.023. so 'pi tāṃ vibhūtiṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ viṣādamāpannaḥ saṃlakṣayati--śakyamanyat saṃpādayitum/
K10divyav_u:8710: 177.024. kiṃ tu hastināmantaḥpurasya ca kuto mama vibhavah?
K10divyav_u:8711: iti viditvā niveśanaṃ gato dauvārikaṃ puruṣamāmantrayate--bhoḥ puruṣa,
K10divyav_u:8721: 177.029. iti viditvā kauśiko brāhmaṇaveṣamabhinirmāya yenānaṅgaṇasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8723: anaṅgaṇasya gṛhapateḥ kathaya--kauśikagotro brāhmaṇo dvāre tiṣṭhati bhavantaṃ draṣṭukāma iti/
K10divyav_u:8725: gṛhapatinā ahaṃ sthāpitah--yaḥ kaścid yācanaka āgacchati,
K10divyav_u:8735: kauśikasagotro brāhmaṇo dvāre tiṣṭhati āryaṃ draṣṭukāma iti/
K10divyav_u:8737: yena taysa prayojanaṃ tat prayaccha--kiṃ tenātra praviṣṭeneti?
K10divyav_u:8739: ukto mayā evaṃ kathayati--nāhaṃ kiṃcit prārthayāmi,
K10divyav_u:8743: 178.007. brāhmaṇaḥ kathayati--kasmāt tvaṃ gṛhapate kare kapolaṃ cintāparastiṣṭhasīti?
K10divyav_u:8745: 178.009. na tasya kathayecchokam yaḥ śokānna pramocayet/
K10divyav_u:8751: 178.012. atha śakro devendraḥ kauśikabrāhmaṇarūpamantardhāpy svarūpeṇa sthitvā kathayati--gṛhapate,
K10divyav_u:8752: viśvakarmā te devaputraḥ sāhāyyaṃ kalpayiṣyatītyuktvā prakrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8753: 178.013. atha śakro devendro devāṃstrāyastriṃśān gatvā viśvakarmāṇaṃ devaputramāmantrayate--gaccha,
K10divyav_u:8756: 178.015. paraṃ bhadraṃ tava kauśiketi viśvakarmaṇā devaputreṇa śakrasya devendrasya pratiśrutya āgataḥ/
K10divyav_u:8759: 178.017. airāvaṇo nāgarājo vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya śataśalākaṃ chatramupari mūrdhno dhārayati,
K10divyav_u:8761: 178.018. śacī devakanyā vipaśyinaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ sauvarṇena maṇivālavyajanena vījayati,
K10divyav_u:8763: 178.019. bandhumatā rājñā avacarakaḥ puruṣaḥ preṣitah--gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa,
K10divyav_u:8765: sa puruṣastatra gatastāṃ vibhūtiṃ dṛṣṭvā tatraiva avasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8770: 178.022. tato bandhumān rājā svayameva taddvāraṃ gatvā avasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8781: tvamevaiko 'rhasi dine dine buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayituṃ na vayaṃtī/
K10divyav_u:8783: praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpya pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā evaṃvidhe
K10divyav_u:8785: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeyam,
K10divyav_u:8789: 179.001. <179>kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau anaṅgaṇo nāma gṛhapatiḥ,
K10divyav_u:8790: eṣa evāsau jyotiṣkaḥ kulaputrastena kālena tena samayena/
K10divyav_u:8791: 179.002. yadanena bandhumato rājño dṛṣṭasatyasyāntike kharā vāgniścāritā,
K10divyav_u:8792: tasya karmaṇo vipākena pañcaśatāni samātṛkaścitāyāmāropya dhmāpitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8794: 179.004. yadvipaśyini tathāgate kārāṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam,
K10divyav_u:8795: tasya karmaṇo vipākena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8798: 179.006. ahamanena vipaśyinā samyaksambuddhena sārdhaṃ samajavaḥ samabalaḥ samadhuraḥ samasāmānyaprāptaḥ śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8799: 179.007. iti hi bhikṣavah ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10divyav_u:8802: 179.009. tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10divyav_u:8811: 180.001. ekasmin samaye bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ/
K10divyav_u:8812: 180.002. satkṛto bhagavān gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito bhikṣubhirbhikṣuṇībhirupāsakairupāsikābhī
K10divyav_u:8815: 180.004. lābhī bhagavān prabhūtānāṃ praṇītānāṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ divyānāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:8818: sa bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
K10divyav_u:8820: 180.009. sa imaṃ sadevakaṃ lokaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ saśramaṇabrāhmaṇīṃ prajāṃ sadevamānuṣīṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayamabhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasampadya
K10divyav_u:8821: 180.011. sa dharmaṃ deśayati ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye paryavasāne kalyāṇam/
K10divyav_u:8822: 180.012. svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati/
K10divyav_u:8823: 180.013. tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--sacedbhikṣavaḥ sattvā jānīyurdānasya
K10divyav_u:8824: phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam yathāhaṃ jānāmi dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam,
K10divyav_u:8828: 180.016. na caiṣāmutpannaṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhet/
K10divyav_u:8829: 180.017. yasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ sattvā na jānante dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam yathāhaṃ jānāmi dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam,
K10divyav_u:8831: 180.019. utpannaṃ caiṣāṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhati/
K10divyav_u:8833: 180.021. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani rājābhūt kanakavarṇo nāma abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paramayā suvarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ/
K10divyav_u:8834: 180.022. rājā bhikṣavaḥ kanakavarṇa āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8837: 180.024. rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya khalu bhikṣavaḥ kanakāvatī nāma rājadhānī babhūva pūrveṇa paścimena ca dvādaśa yojayānyāmena,
K10divyav_u:8838: dakṣiṇenottareṇa ca sapta yojanāni ca vistāreṇa/
K10divyav_u:8839: 180.026. ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca ramaṇīyā ca/
K10divyav_u:8841: 180.028. aṣṭādaśa kulakoṭī ṛddhāni sphītāni kṣemāṇi subhikṣāṇyākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṇi/
K10divyav_u:8842: 180.029. saptapañcāśadgrāmakoṭya ṛddhāḥ sphītāḥ kṣemāḥ subhikṣā ramaṇīyā mahājanākīrṇamanuṣyāḥ/
K10divyav_u:8843: 180.030. ṣaṣṭiḥ karvaṭasahasrāṇyabhūvann ṛddhāni sphītāni kṣemāṇi subhikṣāṇyākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṇi/
K10divyav_u:8848: 181.001. <181>athāpareṇa samayena rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya ekākino rahogatasya pratisamlīnasya evaṃ cetasi cetaḥparivitarkamudapādi--yannvahaṃ sarvavaṇijo 'śulkānagulmān muñceyam/
K10divyav_u:8850: 181.003. atha rājā kanakavarṇo gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapariṣadyānāmantrayate--adyāgreṇa vo grāmaṇyaḥ sarvavaṇijo 'śulkān muñcāmi,
K10divyav_u:8852: 181.005. tasyānenopāyena bahūni varṣāṇi rājyaṃ kārayato 'pareṇa samayena nakṣatraṃ viṣamībhūtam,
K10divyav_u:8854: 181.006. atha brāhmaṇā lakṣaṇajñā naimittikā bhūmyantarikṣamantrakuśalā nakṣatraśukragrahacariteṣu tat saṃlakṣayitvā yena rājā kanakavarṇaḥ,
K10divyav_u:8856: 181.008. apasaṃkramya rājānaṃ kanakavarṇamidamavocan--yatkhalu devo jānīyāt--nakṣatraṃ viṣamībhūtam,
K10divyav_u:8858: 181.009. atha rājā kanakavarṇa idamevamrūpaṃ nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā aśrūṇi pravartayati--aho bata me jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ,
K10divyav_u:8859: aho bata me jambudvīpah ṛddhaḥ sphītaḥ kṣemaḥ subhikṣo ramaṇīyo bahujanākīrṇamanuṣyo nacirādeva śūnyo bhaviṣyati rahitamanuṣyaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8860: 181.012. atha rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya muhūrtaṃ śocitvā etadabhavat--ya ime āḍhyā mahādhanā mahābhogāḥ,
K10divyav_u:8868: 181.016. ekaṃ koṣṭhāgāraṃ kārayitvā sarvajāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ samaṃ bhaktaṃ pratyarpayeyamiti/
K10divyav_u:8873: 181.019. paraṃ deveti gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapāriṣadyā rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya pratiśrutya sarvajambudvīpādannādyaṃ gaṇayanti,
K10divyav_u:8876: 181.021. ekasmin koṣṭhāgāre sthāpayitvā yena rājā kanakavarṇaḥ,
K10divyav_u:8878: 181.022. upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ kanakavarṇamidamavocat--yat khalu deva jānīyāh--sarvagrāmanagaranigamakarvaṭarājadhānīṣvannādyaṃ saṃhṛtam,
K10divyav_u:8881: māpayitvā sarvagrāmanagaranigamarājadhānīṣvekasmin koṣṭhāgāre sathāpitam yasyedānīṃ devaḥ kālaṃ manyate/
K10divyav_u:8882: 181.025. atha rājā kanakavarṇaḥ saṃkhyāgaṇakalipikapauruṣeyānāmantrayitvā etadavocat--gacchata yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaḥ,
K10divyav_u:8884: gaṇayitvā grāmaṇyaḥ sarvajāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ samaṃ bhaktaṃ prayacchata/
K10divyav_u:8885: 181.027. paraṃ deveti saṃkhyāgaṇakalipikapauruṣeyā rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya pratiśrutya sarvajāmbudvīpakān manuṣyān gaṇayanti,
K10divyav_u:8886: saṃgaṇya rājānaṃ kanakavarṇamādau kṛtvā sarvajāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ samaṃ bhaktaṃ prajñapayanti/
K10divyav_u:8889: 181.030. nirgato dvādaśasya varṣasyaiko māso yāvadbahavaḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikā jighatsitāḥ pipāsitāḥ kālaṃ kurvanti/
K10divyav_u:8890: 181.031. ten khalu punaḥ samayena sarvajambudvīpādannādyaṃ parikṣīṇamanyatra rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasyaikā mānikā bhaktasyāvaśiṣṭā//
K10divyav_u:8891: 182.001. <182>tena khalu samayena anyatamaścatvāriṃśatkalpasamprasthito bodhisattva imāṃ sahālokadhātumanuprāpto babhūva/
K10divyav_u:8892: 182.002. adrākṣīd bodhisattvo 'nyatarasmin banaṣaṇḍe putraṃ mātrā sārdhaṃ vipratipadyamanam/
K10divyav_u:8895: yatra hi nāma asyāmeva nava māsān kukṣau uṣitvā,
K10divyav_u:8899: 182.006. ka utsahata īdṛśānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya bodhisattvacaryāṃ caritum?
K10divyav_u:8903: 182.008. paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtimupasthāpya pañcasūpādānaskandheṣūdayavyayānudarśī viharati yadutedaṃ rūpam,
K10divyav_u:8912: 182.011. sa evaṃ pañcasūpādānaskandheṣūdayavyayānudarśī viharannacirādeva yatkiṃcit samudayadharmakaṃ tat sarvaṃ nirodhadharmakamiti viditvā tatraiva pratyekāṃ bodhimadhigatavān/
K10divyav_u:8913: 182.013. atha bhagavān pratyekabuddho yathāprāptānavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
K10divyav_u:8914: 182.014. saṃsevamānasya bhavanti snehāḥ snehānvayaṃ saṃbhavatīha duḥkham/
K10divyav_u:8916: 182.018. atha tasya bhagavataḥ pratyekabuddhasyaitadabhavat--bahūnāṃ me sattvānāmarthāya duṣkarāṇi cīrṇāni,
K10divyav_u:8917: na ca kasyacit sattvasya hitaṃ kṛtam/
K10divyav_u:8920: atha bhagavān pratyekabuddho divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa sarvāvantamimaṃ
K10divyav_u:8921: jambudvīpaṃ samantādanuvilokayannadrākṣīt sa bhagavān pratyekabuddhaḥ sarvajambudvīpādannādyaṃ parikṣīṇam,
K10divyav_u:8924: 182.023. yannvahaṃ rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya niveśanāt piṇḍapātamahṛtya paribhuñjīya/
K10divyav_u:8925: 182.024. atha bhagavān pratyekabuddhastat eva ṛddhyā vihāyasamabhyudgamya dṛśyatā kāyena śakuniriva ṛddhyā yena kanakāvatī rājadhānī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8926: 182.025. tena khalu samayena rājā kanakavarṇa upariprāsādatalagato 'bhūt pañcamātrairamātyasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8927: 182.026. adrākṣīdanyatamo mahāmātrastaṃ bhagavantaṃ pratyekabuddhaṃ dūrata evāgacchantam/
K10divyav_u:8930: 182.028. dvitīyo mahāmātra evamāha--naiṣa grāmaṇyo lohitapakṣaḥ śakuntaḥ,
K10divyav_u:8933: 182.030. atha rājā kanakavarṇa ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ mukhaṃ saṃparimārjya mahāmātrānāmantrayate--naiṣa grāmaṇyo lohitapakṣaḥ śakuntaḥ,
K10divyav_u:8936: 182.032. atha sa bhagavān pratyekabuddho rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya prāsāde pratyaṣṭhāt//
K10divyav_u:8937: 183.001. <183>atha rājā kanakavarṇastaṃ bhagavantaṃ pratyekabuddhamutthāyāsanāt pratyudgamya pādau śirasā vanditvā prajñapta evāsane niṣīdayati/
K10divyav_u:8938: 183.002. atha rājā kanakavarṇastaṃ bhagavantaṃ pratyekabuddhamidamavocat--kimartham ṛṣe ihābhyāgamanam?
K10divyav_u:8943: yatra hi nāma jambudvīpaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayitvā ekasyāpi ṛṣerasamarthaḥ piṇḍapātaṃ pratipādayitum/
K10divyav_u:8946: 183.007. kiṃ duḥkhaṃ dāridryaṃ kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ tadeva dāridryam/
K10divyav_u:8948: 183.009. atha rājā kanakavarṇaḥ koṣṭhāgārikaṃ puruṣamāmantrayate--asti bhoḥ puruṣa,
K10divyav_u:8951: sa evamāha--yat khalu deva jānīyāh--sarvajambudvīpādannādyaṃ parikṣīṇam,
K10divyav_u:8959: 183.013. kathaṃ nāmehedṛśa ṛṣiḥ śīlavān kalyāṇadharmā mama niveśane 'dya yathādhautena pātreṇa nirgamiṣyati?
K10divyav_u:8960: atha rājā kanakavarṇo gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapāriṣadyān saṃnipātyaivamavocat--anumodata yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaḥ,
K10divyav_u:8962: 183.016. anena kuśalamūlena sarvajāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ dāridryasamucchedaḥ syāt/
K10divyav_u:8963: 183.017. atha rājā kanakavarṇastasya maharṣestat pātraṃ gṛhītvā ekāṃ mānikāṃ bhaktasya
K10divyav_u:8964: pātre prakṣipya ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ pātraṃ gṛhītvā jānubhyāṃ nipatya tasya bhagavataḥ
K10divyav_u:8966: 183.019. dharmatā punarbhagavatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ kāyikī dharmadeśanā na vācikī/
K10divyav_u:8967: 183.020. atha bhagavān pratyekabuddho rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasyāntikāt piṇḍapātramādāya tat eva ṛddhyā uparivihāyasā prakrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:8968: 183.022. atha rājā kanakavarṇaḥ prāñjalirbhūtvā tāvadanimiṣaṃ prekṣamāṇo 'sthāt,
K10divyav_u:8970: 183.023. atha rājā kanakavarṇo gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapāriṣadyānāmantrayate--gacchata grāmaṇyaḥ svakasvakāni niveśanāni/
K10divyav_u:8971: 183.024. mā ihaiva prāsāde jighatsāpipāsābhyāṃ sarva eva kālaṃ kariṣyatha/
K10divyav_u:8973: tadā vayaṃ devena sārdhaṃ krīḍatā ramatā kathaṃ punarvayamidānīṃ devaṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye parityakṣyāma iti/
K10divyav_u:8977: 183.028. mā ihaiva prāsāde jighatsāpipāsābhyāṃ sarva eva kālaṃ kariṣyatha/
K10divyav_u:8978: 183.029. evamuktā gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapāriṣadyāḥ prarudanto 'śrūṇi pravartayanto 'śrūṇi saṃparimārjya yena rājā kanakavarṇastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
K10divyav_u:8979: 183.030. upasaṃkramya rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya pādau śirasā vanditvā añjaliṃ kṛtvā rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasyaitadūcuh--kṣantavyaṃ te yadasmābhiḥ kiṃcidaparāddham/
K10divyav_u:8981: 184.001. <184>tadyathā tena bhagavatā pratyekabuddhena sa piṇḍapātraḥ paribhuktaḥ,
K10divyav_u:8982: atha tasminneva kṣaṇe samantāccatasṛṣu dikṣu catvāryabhrapaṭalāni vyutthitāni,
K10divyav_u:8986: 184.003. atha tasminneva divase dvitīye 'rdhabhāge vividhasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya varṣaṃ pravarṣati/
K10divyav_u:8988: idamevamrūpaṃ khādanīyaṃ mūlakhādanīyaṃ skandhakhādanīyaṃ patrakhādanīyaṃ puṣpakhādanīyaṃ phalakhādanīyaṃ tilakhādanīyaṃ khaṇḍaśarkaraguḍakhādanīyaṃ
K10divyav_u:8989: 184.006. atha rājā kanakavarṇo hṛṣṭatuṣṭah udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapārṣadyānāmantrayate--paśyatha yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaḥ,
K10divyav_u:8992: 184.010. atha dvitīye divase saptāhaṃ dhānyavarṣaṃ pravarṣanti,
K10divyav_u:8998: suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya lohitamukteraśmagarbhasya musāragalvasya/
K10divyav_u:8999: 184.013. sarvasya rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasyānubhāvena jāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ dāridryasamucchedo babhūva//
K10divyav_u:9000: 184.015. syāt khalu bhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vimatirvā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājā kanakavarṇo babhūva/
K10divyav_u:9002: 184.016. ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājā kanakavarṇo babhūva/
K10divyav_u:9004: 184.017. sacedbhikṣavaḥ sattvā jānīyurdānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam--apīdānīm yo 'sau apaścimakaḥ kavalaścarama ālopaḥ,
K10divyav_u:9007: 184.019. na caiṣāmutpannaṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhati/
K10divyav_u:9008: 184.020. yasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ sattvā na jānate dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam--yathā ahaṃ jāne dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam,
K10divyav_u:9010: utpannaṃ caiṣāṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādattaṃ tiṣṭhati/
K10divyav_u:9011: 184.024. na naśyate pūrvakṛtaṃ śubhāśubhaṃ na naśyate sevanaṃ piṇḍatānām/
K10divyav_u:9012: 184.026. na naśyate āryajaneṣu bhāṣitaṃ kṛtaṃ kṛtajñeṣu na jātu naśyati//3//
K10divyav_u:9014: 184.029. asti caitasya vipāko avaśya dāsyate phalam//4//
K10divyav_u:9016: 184.030. āttamanasaste bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikādevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayaḥ sarvāvatī ca parṣadbhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan//
K10divyav_u:9020: 185.002. buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe/
K10divyav_u:9021: 185.002. ācaritamāyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya kālena kālaṃ narakacārikāṃ carituṃ tiryakcārikāṃ carituṃ pretacārikāṃ devacārikāṃ manuṣyacārikāṃ
K10divyav_u:9028: 185.007. yasya kasyacit sārdhaṃvihārī antevāsī vā anabhirato brahmacaryaṃ carati,
K10divyav_u:9033: 185.010. evamaparamaparaṃ te āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena samyagavavāditāḥ samyaganuśiṣṭā abhiratā brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
K10divyav_u:9035: 185.011. tena khalu samayenāuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaścatasṛbhiḥ parṣadbhirākīrṇo viharati bhikṣubhirbhikṣuṇībhirupāsakairupāsikābhiśca/
K10divyav_u:9038: 185.014. sa kathayati--ācaritaṃ bhadanta āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya kālena kālaṃ narakacārikāṃ carituṃ tiryakcarikāṃ pretacārikāṃ devacārikāṃ manuṣyacārikāṃ caritum/
K10divyav_u:9045: 185.018. yasya kasyacit sārdhaṃvihārī antevāsī vā anabhirato brahmacaryaṃ carati,
K10divyav_u:9049: 185.021. evamaparamaparaṃ te āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena samyagavavāditāḥ samyagavuśiṣṭā abhiratā brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
K10divyav_u:9051: 185.023. ayaṃ bhadanta heturayaṃ pratyayo yenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaścatasṛbhiḥ parṣadbhirākīrṇo viharati bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikābhiḥ/
K10divyav_u:9052: 185.024. na sarvatra ānanda maudgalyāyano bhikṣurbhaviṣyati maudgalyāyanasadṛśo vā/
K10divyav_u:9054: 185.026. uktaṃ bhagavatā dvārakoṣṭhake pañcagaṇḍakaṃ cakraṃ kārayitavyamiti/
K10divyav_u:9056: 185.027. bhagavānāha--pañca gatayaḥ kartavyā narakāstiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyāśca/
K10divyav_u:9066: 185.031. anupapādukāḥ sattvā ghaṭīyantraprayogeṇa cyavamānā upapadyamānāśca kartavyāḥ/
K10divyav_u:9074: 186.005. uktaṃ bhagavatā dvārakoṣṭhake pañcagaṇḍakaṃ cakraṃ kārayitavyamiti bhikṣubhiḥ kāritam/
K10divyav_u:9079: 186.007. bhagavānāha--dvārakoṣṭhake bhikṣuruddeṣṭavyo ya āgatāgatānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ darśayati/
K10divyav_u:9081: 186.008. te aviśeṣeṇoddiśanti bālānapi mūḍhānapi avyaktānapi akuśalānapi/
K10divyav_u:9087: 186.012. sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
K10divyav_u:9088: 186.012. tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9089: 186.013. tasya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kulasadṛśaṃ nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam/
K10divyav_u:9096: 186.015. sa suhṛtsambandhibāndhavānāmantrayitvā antarjanaṃ ca samāśvāsya mahāsamudragamanīyaṃ paṇyamādāya divasatithimuhūrtena mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9098: 186.017. tasya patnyā sa dārako jñātibalena hastabalena pālitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhito lipyāmupanyasto lipyakṣareṣu ca kṛtāvī saṃvṛttaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9099: 186.018. sa vayaskareṇa sārdhaṃ veṇuvanaṃ gato vihāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ paśyati dvārakoṣṭhake pañcagaṇḍakaṃ cakramabhilikhitam/
K10divyav_u:9103: etāḥ pañca gatayo narakāstiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyāśca/
K10divyav_u:9104: 186.021. ārya, kimebhiḥ karma kṛtam yenaivaṃvidhāni duḥkhāni praryanubhavantīti?
K10divyav_u:9105: sa kathayati--ete prāṇātipātikā adattādāyikāḥ kāmamithyācārikā mṛṣāvādikāḥ paiśunikāḥ pāruṣikāḥ saṃbhinnapralāpikā abhidhyālavo vyāpannacittā
K10divyav_u:9106: 186.024. tadebhirete daśākuśalāḥ karmapathā atyarthamāsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ,
K10divyav_u:9109: 186.026. ebhiranyaiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtam yena evaṃvidhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti?
K10divyav_u:9112: 186.028. ebhiranyaiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtam yena evaṃvidhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti?
K10divyav_u:9115: 186.030. tattena mātsaryeṇāsevitena bhāvitena bahulīkṛtena evaṃvidhāni duḥkhāni kṣuttṛṣādīni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti/
K10divyav_u:9117: 186.031. ebhiranyaiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtam yena evaṃvidhāni sukhāni pratyanubhavanti?
K10divyav_u:9119: ete prāṇātipātāt prativiratā adattādānāt <187>kāmamithyācārānmṛṣāvādāt paiśunyāt pāruṣyāt saṃbhinnapralāpādanabhidhyāpannacittāḥ samyagdṛṣṭayaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9120: 187.002. tadebhirete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā atyarthamāsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ,
K10divyav_u:9123: 187.004. ebhiranyaiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtam yena sukhāni pratyanubhavanti?
K10divyav_u:9125: ebhirapi daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāstanutarā mṛdutarāścāsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ,
K10divyav_u:9127: 187.006. ārya, āsāṃ pañcānāṃ gatīnām yā etāstisro gatayo narakāstiryañcaḥ pretāśca,
K10divyav_u:9129: 187.007. ye tu ete devā manuṣyāśca ete rocete/
K10divyav_u:9130: 187.008. tatkathamete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ samādāya vartayitavyāh?
K10divyav_u:9132: svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajya saced dṛṣṭa eva dharme ājñāmārāgayiṣyasi,
K10divyav_u:9136: 187.010. uktaṃ hi bhagavatā--pañcānuśaṃsān samanupaśyatā piṇḍatenālameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum/
K10divyav_u:9138: āveṇikā ime svārthā anuprāpto bhaviṣyāmīti saṃpaśyatā piṇḍatenālameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum/
K10divyav_u:9139: 187.012. yeṣāmahaṃ dāsaḥ preṣyo nirdeśyo bhujiṣyo nayena kāmaṃgamaḥ,
K10divyav_u:9140: teṣāṃ pūjyaśca bhaviṣyāmi praśaṃsyaśceti saṃpaśyatā piṇḍatena alameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum/
K10divyav_u:9141: 187.014. anuttaram yogakṣemaṃ nirvāṇamanuprāpsyāmīti saṃpaśyatā piṇḍatena alameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum/
K10divyav_u:9142: 187.015. anuttaraṃ vā yogakṣemaṃ nirvāṇamanuprāpnuvato 'nāpattikasya sato deeveṣūpapattirbhaviṣyatīti saṃpaśyatā piṇḍatena alameva pravrajyādhimuktena
K10divyav_u:9169: 187.024. tatra mayā dvārakoṣṭhake pañcagaṇḍakaṃ cakramabhilikhitaṃ dṛṣṭam/
K10divyav_u:9170: 187.025. tatra pañca gatayo narakāstiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyāśca/
K10divyav_u:9183: 187.031. putra, mayā tvaṃ jñātibalena hastabalena cāpyāyitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9191: 188.002. sa tayā anujñāto bhṛtakavīthīṃ gatvā avasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9194: 188.004. sa tatra divasamatināmya vikāle gṛhaṃ gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:9205: 188.007. so 'parasmin divase tādṛśaṃ veṣamāsthāya bhṛtakavīthīṃ gatvā avasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9208: 188.009. tena taṃ pratyākhyāya anye bhṛtakapuruṣā gṛhītāḥ/
K10divyav_u:9214: 188.011. tāt, kiṃ tvaṃ pūrvaṃ bhṛtiṃ dadāsi,
K10divyav_u:9220: 188.013. adya tāvat jijñāsyāmi yadi śakṣyati karma kartum, dāsyāmi/
K10divyav_u:9246: 188.024. śrutvā gṛhapatistasya dārakasya dviguṇāṃ bhṛtiṃ dātumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9254: yāvat tava gṛhe karma kartavyaṃ tāvat tavaiva haste tiṣṭhatu/
K10divyav_u:9257: tadā asau dārako bhṛtiṃ gaṇayitumārabdho yāvat pañca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni na paripūryante/
K10divyav_u:9264: 188.031. mayā pañcānāṃ kārṣāpaṇaśatānāmarthāya bhṛtikayā karma prārabdhaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayiṣyāmi,
K10divyav_u:9267: 189.001. punarapi mayā anyatra bhṛtikayā karma kartavyamiti/
K10divyav_u:9278: 189.004. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9280: mayā pañcānāṃ kārṣāpaṇaśatānāmarthāya bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhojayiṣyāmītyamukasya gṛhapaterbhṛtikayā karma kṛtam/
K10divyav_u:9288: 189.008. sa parituṣṭo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrānto yena sa gṛhapatistenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9289: 189.009. upasaṃkramya gṛhapaterantikāt pañca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni gṛhītvā mātuḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:9299: 189.013. sa tasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ śiraḥpraṇāmaṃ kṛtvā kathayati--tvayaiva etāni pañca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni dattāani/
K10divyav_u:9300: 189.014. asmākaṃ gṛhe na bhāṇḍopaskaro nāpi śayanāsanam/
K10divyav_u:9303: 189.016. gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--mamedaṃ gṛhamacirotthitaṃ buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena paribhuktaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K10divyav_u:9309: 189.019. sa saṃjātasaumanasyaḥ śiraḥpraṇāmaṃ kṛtvā prakrānto yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9310: 189.020. upasaṃkramya vṛddhānte sthitvā kathayati--so 'haṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamupanimantrayāmīti/
K10divyav_u:9312: 189.021. atha sa gṛhapatiputro bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ//
K10divyav_u:9313: 189.023. tenāpi gṛhapatinā tāmeva rātriṃ śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyamevotthāya gṛhaṃ saṃmārjitam/
K10divyav_u:9317: 189.025. tenāpi gṛhapatiputreṇa gatvā bhagavata ārocitam--samayo bhadanta,
K10divyav_u:9318: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate iti/
K10divyav_u:9319: 189.026. atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena tasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9320: 189.027. ṣaḍvargīyāḥ pṛcchanti--kenāayaṃ buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgha upanimantrita iti?
K10divyav_u:9325: gacchāma kulopakagṛheṣu gatvā purobhaktakāṃ karma iti/
K10divyav_u:9331: 189.031. bhagavāṃstasya gṛhapater niveśane purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9333: 190.001. atha sa gṛhapatipurtaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhijanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati
K10divyav_u:9334: 190.002. satatapariveṣaṇaṃ kurvāṇaḥ paśyti ṣaḍvargīyān na satkṛtya parimuñjānān/
K10divyav_u:9335: 190.003. dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhagavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ bhagavataḥ purastāt sthitvā kathayati--bhagavan,
K10divyav_u:9340: 190.006. atha bhagavāṃstaṃ gṛhapatiputraṃ ca dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ//
K10divyav_u:9341: 190.008. atrāntare pañcamātrāṇi vaṇikśatāni mahāsamudrāt saṃsiddhayānapātrāṇni rājagṛhamanuprāptāni/
K10divyav_u:9342: 190.009. rājagṛhe ca parva pratyupasthitamiti na kiṃcit krayeṇāpi labhyate/
K10divyav_u:9345: āgamayata kasyādya gṛhe buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena bhaktam,
K10divyav_u:9349: tavādya buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena bhukte iha parva pratyupasthitamiti na kiṃcit krayeṇāpi labhyate/
K10divyav_u:9360: 190.016. te tenānnapānena saṃtarpitā gṛhapatergatvā kathayanti--tasya te gṛhapate lābhāḥ sulabdhā yasya te niveśane buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho 'nnapānena saṃtarpitaḥ,
K10divyav_u:9363: 190.019. anena buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho 'nnapānena saṃtarpito na mayeti/
K10divyav_u:9371: 190.022. tadayaṃ paṭakaṃ prajñapto yena vo yat parityaktam,
K10divyav_u:9373: 190.023. te pūrvamevābhiprasannāḥ sārthavāhena ca protsāhitā iti tairyathāsambhāvyena maṇimuktādīni ratnāni dattāni/
K10divyav_u:9382: 190.027. kiṃ tu vayaṃ tavābhiprasannāḥ prasannādhikāraṃ kurmaḥ, gṛhāṇeti/
K10divyav_u:9384: mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho bhojito deveṣūpapatsye iti/
K10divyav_u:9393: 190.031. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9395: mayā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā yadannapānamavaśiṣṭam <191>tadviṇijāṃ dattam/
K10divyav_u:9397: 191.001. kiṃ kalpate tanmama grahītumāhosvinna kalpata iti?
K10divyav_u:9403: 191.003. tena bhagavadvacanābhisampratyayāt parituṣṭena gatvā ratnāni gṛhītāni//
K10divyav_u:9405: 191.005. tato rājagṛhanivāsinaḥ paurāḥ saṃnipatya saṃjalpaṃ kurvanti--bhavantaḥ,
K10divyav_u:9434: 191.016. sa gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--yadapyanena mama bhṛtikayā karma kṛtam,
K10divyav_u:9437: 191.017. tena tasya sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitā duhitā bhāryārthaṃ dattā/
K10divyav_u:9440: 191.018. sahasaivaṃ bhogairabhyudgata iti tasya sahasodgato gṛhapatiḥ sahasodgato gṛhapatiriti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā//
K10divyav_u:9443: 191.021. yannvahaṃ punarapi buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamantargṛhe upanimantrya bhojayeyam/
K10divyav_u:9445: 191.022. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9446: 191.022. ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ sahasodgataṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
K10divyav_u:9447: 191.024. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
K10divyav_u:9448: 191.025. atha sahasodgato gṛhapatirutthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ
K10divyav_u:9449: praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu bhagavāñ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti /
K10divyav_u:9451: 191.027. atha sahasodgato gṛhapatirbhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9452: 191.028. atha sahasodgato gṛhapatistāmeva rātriṃ śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ
K10divyav_u:9453: samudānīya kālyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñapyodakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena
K10divyav_u:9455: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
K10divyav_u:9456: 191.031. atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto yena sahasodgatasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9458: 192.001. atha sahasodgato gṛhapatiḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati/
K10divyav_u:9459: 192.002. anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya
K10divyav_u:9460: saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ
K10divyav_u:9462: 192.005. tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāyasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10divyav_u:9463: yāṃ śrutvā sahasodgatena gṛhapatinā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
K10divyav_u:9464: 192.007. sa dṛṣṭasatyastrirudānamudānayati--idamasmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na
K10divyav_u:9465: pitrā neṣṭena na svajanabandhuvargeṇa na rājñā na devatābhir na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇairyadbhagavatā asmākaṃ kṛtam /
K10divyav_u:9473: 192.011. eṣo 'haṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:9474: 192.012. upāsakaṃ ca māṃ dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetamabhiprasannamiti/
K10divyav_u:9475: 192.012. atha bhagavān sahasodgataṃ gṛhapatiṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ//
K10divyav_u:9476: 192.015. bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāaḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta sahasodgatena gṛhapatinā karma kṛtam yena bhṛtikayā karma kṛtam,
K10divyav_u:9479: bhagavānāha--sahasodgatenaiva bhikṣavo gṛhapatinā karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavatpratyupasthitānyavaśyabhāvīni/
K10divyav_u:9482: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipaṣyante,
K10divyav_u:9486: api tu upātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
K10divyav_u:9488: 192.024. sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//3//
K10divyav_u:9489: 192.025. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatarasmin karvaṭake gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito
K10divyav_u:9491: 192.027. sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
K10divyav_u:9492: 192.027. tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
K10divyav_u:9493: 192.028. sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
K10divyav_u:9495: 192.029. tasya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasāni vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kulasadṛśaṃ nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam/
K10divyav_u:9497: 192.031. yāvadapareṇa samayena sa gṛhapatiḥ saṃprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu
K10divyav_u:9500: 193.001. asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasyā/
K10divyav_u:9504: 193.004. adrākṣīt sa gṛhapatistaṃ pratyekabuddhaṃ kāyaprāsādikaṃ ca śānteneryāpathenodyānaṃ praviśantam/
K10divyav_u:9517: 193.010. so 'pi tasya piṇḍakena yogodvahanaṃ kartuṃ pravṛttaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9518: 193.011. yāvadapareṇa samayena tasya gṛhapateranyatarakarvaṭake kiṃcit karaṇīyamutpannam/
K10divyav_u:9524: 193.013. aparasmin divase sā gṛhapatnī kālyamevotthāya tadarthamannapānaṃ sādhayitumārabdhā/
K10divyav_u:9531: kimarthaṃ bhṛtikayā karma kṛtvā na bhuṅkta iti?
K10divyav_u:9540: 193.019. kiṃ tu anena dārakeṇa tasyāntike kharāvāgniścāritā/
K10divyav_u:9545: 193.021. gacchāmi, taṃ mahātmānaṃ kṣamāpayāmi--mā atyantameva kṣato bhaviṣyati/
K10divyav_u:9546: 193.022. iti viditvā taṃ dārakamādāya yena pratyekabuddhastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9553: 193.025. kāyikī teṣāṃ mahātmanāṃ dharmadeśanā na vācikī/
K10divyav_u:9554: 193.026. sa tasyānukampārthaṃ vitatapakṣa hava haṃsarāja uparivihāyasamabhyudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kartumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9556: 193.028. sa mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ saputraḥ pādayor nipatitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9557: 193.028. tataḥ sa dāraka āhṛṣṭaromakūpaḥ kathayati--avatara avatara sadbhūtadakṣiṇīya,
K10divyav_u:9560: 193.030. sa gṛhapatiputrastīvreṇāśayena pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kharā vāgniścāritā,
K10divyav_u:9575: 194.006. ahaṃ cānena pratyekabuddhakoṭiśatasahasrebhyaḥ prativiśiṣṭataraḥ śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9576: 194.007. iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10divyav_u:9582: 194.010. (iyaṃ tāvadutpattir na tāvat buddho bhagavāñ śrāvakāṇāṃ vinaye śikṣāpadam/?)
K10divyav_u:9589: 195.002. ekasmin samaye bhagavān bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśābhirbhikṣuśataiḥ/
K10divyav_u:9590: 195.003. tatra bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--paśya bhadanta,
K10divyav_u:9591: yāvadāyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau tatprathamataraṃ nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtau,
K10divyav_u:9593: 195.005. atredānīṃ bhikṣavaḥ kimāścaryam yadetarhi śāriputramaudgalyāyanau bhikṣū
K10divyav_u:9596: buddhapramukhe bhikṣusaṃghe tatprathamataraṃ nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtau,
K10divyav_u:9603: 195.013. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvanyuttarāpathe bhadraśilā nāma nagarī rājadhānī abhūt,
K10divyav_u:9604: ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca/
K10divyav_u:9605: 195.014. dvādaśayojanānyāyāmena dvādaśayojanāni vistareṇa caturasrā caturdvārā suvibhaktā
K10divyav_u:9609: 195.018. tasyāṃ ca rājadhānyāmagurugandhāścandanagandhāścūrṇagandhāḥ sarvakālikāśca kusumagandhā nānāvātasamīritā atiramaṇīyā vīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu vāyavo vāyanti sma/
K10divyav_u:9610: 195.019. hastyaśvarathapattibalakāyasampannā yugyayānopaśobhitā vistīrṇātiramaṇīyavīthīmahāpathā ucchritavicitradhvajapatākā toraṇagavākṣārdhacandrāvanaddhā amarālaya iva śobhate/
K10divyav_u:9613: 195.025. bhadraśilāyāṃ ca rājadhānyāmanyataraṃ maṇigarbhaṃ nāma rājodyānaṃ nānāpuṣpaphalavṛkṣaviṭapopaśobhitaṃ
K10divyav_u:9616: 195.027. bhadraśilāyāṃ rājādhānyāṃ rājābhūccandraprabho nāma abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ
K10divyav_u:9617: prāsādiko divyacakṣuścaturbhāgacakravartī dhārmiko dharmarājā jambudvīpe rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ
K10divyav_u:9620: na ca maṇirvā pradīpo vā ulkā vā purastāt nīyate,
K10divyav_u:9621: api tu svakāt kāyāt rājñaścandraprabhasya prabhā niścaranti tadyathā candramaṇḍalādraśmayaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9622: 195.032. anena kāraṇena rājñaścandraprabhasya candraprabha iti saṃjñā babhūva//
K10divyav_u:9623: 196.001. <196>tena khalu samayenāsmiñ jambudvīpe 'ṣḍaṣaṣṭinagarasahasrāṇi babhūvurbhadraśilārājadhānīprabhukhāni ṛddhāni sphītāni kṣemāṇi subhikṣāṇyākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṇi/
K10divyav_u:9624: 196.002. apīdānīṃ jambudvīpakā akarā abhūvann aśulkā atarapaṇyāḥ/
K10divyav_u:9627: 196.004. tena khalu samayena catuścatvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrāṇi jambudvīpe manuṣyāṇāmāyuṣaḥ pramāṇamabhūt/
K10divyav_u:9628: 196.005. rājā candraprabho bodhisattvo 'bhūt sarvaṃdadaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca/
K10divyav_u:9630: 196.006. tena bhadraśilāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ nirgatya bahirdhā nagarasya caturṣu nagaradvāreṣu catvāro catvāro mahāyajñavāṭā māpitāśchatradhvajayūpapatākātyucchritāḥ/
K10divyav_u:9639: 196.011. kumārāḥ kumārikāśca sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitāḥ kṛtvā pradānāni dīyante/
K10divyav_u:9643: yena sarve jambudvīpakā manuṣyā āḍhyā mahādhanā mahābhogāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
K10divyav_u:9645: yathā asmiñ jambudvīpe ekamanuṣyo 'pi padbhyāṃ na gacchati/
K10divyav_u:9646: 196.016. sarve jambudvīpakā manuṣyā hastipṛṣṭhaiśca caturaśvayuktaiśca rathairuparisuvarṇamayai rūpyamayaiścātapatrairudyānenodyānaṃ grāmeṇa grāmamanuvicaranti sma/
K10divyav_u:9647: 196.018. tato rājñaścandraprabhasyaitadabhavat--kiṃ punarme itvareṇa dānena pradattena?
K10divyav_u:9650: yat sarve jambudvīpakā manuṣyā rājakrīḍayā krīḍeyuḥ/
K10divyav_u:9653: 196.022. rājñā candraprabheṇa tāvanti rājārhāṇi vastrāṇyalaṃkārāṇi maulayaḥ paṭṭāścānupradattāḥ,
K10divyav_u:9654: yena sarve jambudvīpakā manuṣyā maulidharāḥ paṭṭadharāśca saṃvṛttāḥ/
K10divyav_u:9655: 196.023. yā rājñaścandraprabhasyākṛtistādṛśā eva sarve jambudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
K10divyav_u:9656: 196.024. tato rājñā candraprabheṇāṣṭaṣaṣṭiṣu nagarasahasreṣu ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--sarve bhavanto jambudvīpakā manuṣyā rājakrīḍayā,
K10divyav_u:9659: 196.026. atha jambudvīpakā manuṣyā rājñaścandraprabhasya ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇāṃ śrutvā sarva eva rājakrīḍayā krīḍitumārabdhāḥ/
K10divyav_u:9663: 196.029. tena khalu samayena jambudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ rājalīlayā krīḍatām yaśca
K10divyav_u:9665: yaścandraprabhasya caturṣu mahāyajñavāṭeṣu suvarṇabherīṇāṃ tāḍyamānānāṃ varṇamanojñaśabdo niścarati,
K10divyav_u:9666: tena sarvo jambudvīpo manojñaśabdanādito 'bhūt tadyathā devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāmabhyantaraṃ devaputam <197>nṛttagītavāditaśabdena nirnāditam/
K10divyav_u:9667: 197.001. evameva tasmin kāle tasmin samaye sarvo jambudvīpavāsināṃ janakāyastena gītavāditaśabdena ekāntasukhasamarpito 'tyarthaṃ ramate/
K10divyav_u:9668: 197.002. tena khalu samayena bhadraśilāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ dvāsaptatirayutakoṭīśatāni manuṣyāṇāṃ prativasanti sma/
K10divyav_u:9669: 197.004. teṣāṃ rājā candraprabha ṛṣṭo babhūva priyo manāpaśca/
K10divyav_u:9670: 197.004. apīdānīṃ varṇākṛtiliṅgasthairyamasya nirīkṣamāṇā na tṛptimupayānti sma/
K10divyav_u:9671: 197.005. yasmiṃśca samaye rājā candraprabho mahāyajñavāṭaṃ gacchati,
K10divyav_u:9673: evaṃ cāhuh--devagarbho batāyaṃ rājā candraptabha iha jamudvīpe rājyaṃ kārayati/
K10divyav_u:9674: 197.007. na khalu manuṣyā īdṛgvarṇasaṃsthānā yādṛśā devasya candraprabhasyeti/
K10divyav_u:9676: tena tena strīsahasrāṇyavalokayanti--dhanyāstāḥ striyo yāsāmeṣa bharteti/
K10divyav_u:9681: 197.011. vyaktau paṇḍitau medhāvinau guṇaiśca sarvāmātyamaṇḍalaprativiśiṣṭau sarvādhikṛtau rājaparikarṣakau rājaparipālakau/
K10divyav_u:9683: 197.013. mahācandraścāgrāmātyo 'bhīkṣṇaṃ jambudvīpakān manuṣyān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu
K10divyav_u:9684: niyojayati--imān bhavanto jambudvīpakā manuṣyā daśa kuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartatheti /
K10divyav_u:9687: 197.016. mahācandrasyāgrāmātyasya rājā candraprabha iṣṭaścābhūt priyaśca manāapaśca/
K10divyav_u:9689: 197.018. yāvadapareṇa samayena mahācandreṇāgrāmātyena svapno dṛṣṭah--rājñaścandraprabhasya dhūmavarṇaiḥ piśācairmaulirapanītaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9692: abhūdromaharṣah--mā haiva devasya candraprabhasya śiroyācanaka āgacchet/
K10divyav_u:9695: 197.021. tasya buddhirutpannā--na mayā rājñaścandraprabhasya svapno nivedayitavyaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9696: 197.022. api tu ratnamayāni śirāṃsi kārayitvā koṣakoṣṭhāgāraṃ praveśya sthāpayitavyāni/
K10divyav_u:9699: 197.024. iti viditvā ratnamayāni śirāṃsi kārayitvā koṣakoṣṭhāgareṣu prakṣipya sthāpitavān/
K10divyav_u:9700: 197.025. apareṇa samayena mahīdhareṇāgrāmātyena svapno dṛṣṭah--sarvaratnamayaḥ potaścandraprabhasya kulasthaḥ śataśo viśīrṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9701: 197.026. dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhītastrastaḥ saṃvignah--mā haiva rājñaścandraprabhasya rājyacyutirbhaviṣyati jīvitasya cāntarasya cāntarāya iti/
K10divyav_u:9702: 197.027. tena brāhmaṇā ye naimittikā vipaścikāścāhūya uktāh--bhavantaḥ,
K10divyav_u:9705: 197.028. tatastairbrāhmaṇair naimittikairvipaścikaiśca samākhyātam--yādṛśo 'yaṃ tvayā svapno dṛṣṭaḥ,
K10divyav_u:9708: 197.030. tato mahīdharo 'grāmātyaḥ svapnanirdeśaṃ śrutvā kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo
K10divyav_u:9713: 198.002. dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhītāstrastāḥ saṃvignāh--mā haiva rājñaścandraprabhasya mahāpṛthivīpālasya maitrātmakasya kāruṇikasya sattvavatsalasyānityatābalamāgacchet,
K10divyav_u:9714: mā haiva asmākaṃ devena sārdhaṃ nānābhāvo bhaviṣyati vinābhāvo viprayogaḥ,
K10divyav_u:9717: 198.005. tena śrutvā aṣṭaṣaṣṭinagarasahasreṣu ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--rājalīlayā bhavantaḥ sarve jambudvīpakā mānuṣyāḥ krīḍantu yāvadahaṃ
K10divyav_u:9719: rājñaścandraprabhasya ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ śrutvā sarva eva jambudvīpakā manuṣyā rājalīlayā krīḍitumārabdhāḥ,
K10divyav_u:9723: 198.010. tena khalu samayena jambudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ rājakrīḍayā krīḍatām yaśca
K10divyav_u:9724: rājñaścandraprabhasya caturṣu mahāyajñavāṭeṣu suvarṇabherīṇāṃ tāḍyamānānāṃ valgurmanojñaḥ śabdo niścarati,
K10divyav_u:9727: evameva tasmin kāle tasmin samaye sarvo jambudvīpanivāsī janakāyastena gītaśabdenaikāntasukhasamarpito 'tyarthaṃ ramate//
K10divyav_u:9728: 198.016. tena khalu samayena gandhamādane parvate raudrākṣo nāma brāhmaṇaḥ prativasati sma indrajālavidhijñaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9729: 198.017. aśrauṣīdraudrākṣo brāhmaṇo bhadraśilāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ candraprabho nāma rājā sarvaṃdado 'smītyātmānaṃ pratijānīte/
K10divyav_u:9733: 198.019. api tu duṣkarametadasthānamanavakāśo yadevamiṣṭaṃ kāntaṃ priyaṃ manāpamuttamāṅgaṃ parityakṣyati yaduta śīrṣam,
K10divyav_u:9736: 198.021. atha gandhamādananivāsinī devatā vikroṣṭumārabdhā--hā kaṣṭaṃ rajñaścandraprabhasya maitrātmakasya mahākāruṇikasya sattvavatsalasyānityatābalaṃ
K10divyav_u:9742: 198.024. bhadraśilāyāṃ ca rājadhānyāṃ nātidūre pañcābhijño ṛṣiḥ praivasati viśvāmitro nāṃnā pañcaśataparivāro maitrātmakaḥ kāruṇikaḥ sattvavatsalaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9743: 198.026. atha sa ṛṣiḥ sarvajambudvīpamākulaṃ dṛṣṭvā māṇavakānāmantrayate--yatkhalu māṇavakā jānīta sarvajambudvīpa etarhyākulākulo dhūmāndhakāraḥ/
K10divyav_u:9744: 198.027. sūryācandramasau evamahānubhāvau na bhāsato na tapato na virocataḥ/
K10divyav_u:9747: 198.029. rodanti kinnaragaṇā vanadevatāśca dhikkāramutsṛjanti devagaṇā pi na sthuḥ/
K10divyav_u:9748: 198.031. candro na bhāti na vibhāti sahasraraśmir naiva vādyavāditaravo 'pi niśāmyate 'tra//1//
K10divyav_u:9749: 199.001. <199>ete hi pādapagaṇāḥ phalapuṣpanaddhā bhūmau patanti pavanairapi cālitāni/
K10divyav_u:9750: 199.003. saṃśrūyate dhvanirayaṃ ca yathātibhīmo vyakto bhaviṣyati pure vyasanaṃ mahāntam//2//
K10divyav_u:9751: 199.005. ete bhadraśilānivāsaniratāḥ sarve saduḥkhā janā atyantapratiśokaśalyavihatāḥ praspandakaṇṭhānanāḥ/
K10divyav_u:9752: 199.007. etāścandranibhānanā yuvatayo rodanti veśmottame sarve ca prarudanti tīvrakaruṇāḥ santaḥ śmaśāne yathā//3//
K10divyav_u:9753: 199.009. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ puranivāsijanāḥ samagrāḥ saṃpiṇḍitaṃ manasi duḥkhamidaṃ vahanti/
K10divyav_u:9755: 199.013. ete payodā vinadantyatoyā jalāśrayāḥ śokamamī vrajanti/
K10divyav_u:9756: 199.015. bhuvorivāmbhasi ca bālasamīraṇāstā vātāḥ pravānti ca kharā rajasā vimiśrāḥ//5//
K10divyav_u:9759: 199.019. api tu khalu māṇavakā rājñaścandraprabhasya caturṣu mahāyajñavāṭeṣu suvarṇabherīṇāṃ tāḍyamānānāṃ na bhūyo manojñaḥ svaro niścarati/
K10divyav_u:9762: 199.021. tato nagaravivāsinī devatā raudrākṣaṃ brahmaṇaṃ dūrādeva dṛṣṭvā yena rājā candraprabhāstenopasaṃkrāntā/
K10divyav_u:9763: 199.022. upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ candraprabhamidamavocat--yatkhalu deva jānīyāh--adya devasya yācanaka āgamiṣyati hiṃsako viheṭhako 'vatāraprekṣī
K10divyav_u:9766: 199.025. atha rājā candraprabhaḥ śiroyācanakamupaśrutya pramuditamanā vismayotphalladṛṣṭirdevatāmuvāca--gaccha devate,
K10divyav_u:9769: 199.027. atha sā devatā rājñaścandraprabhasya idamevamrūpaṃ vyavasāyaṃ viditvā duḥkhinī durmanaskā vipratisāriṇī tatraivāntarhitā/
K10divyav_u:9773: 199.030. tato raudrākṣo brāhmaṇo dakṣiṇena nagaradvāreṇa praviśan devatayā nivāritah--gaccha pāpabrāhmaṇa, mā praviśa/
K10divyav_u:9778: 200.003. yāvadetat prakaraṇaṃ rājñā candraprabheṇa śrutam--yācanako me nagaradvāre devatayā vidhāryate iti/
K10divyav_u:9779: 200.004. śrutvā ca punarmahācandramagrāmātyamāmantrayate--yatkhalu mahācandra jānīyāh--yācanako me nagaradvāri devatayā vidhāryate/
K10divyav_u:9781: 200.005. evaṃ deveti mahācandro 'grāmātyo rājñaścandraprabhasya pratiśrutya nagaradvāraṃ gatvā tāṃ devatāmuvāca--yatkhalu devate jānīyāh--praviśatveṣa
K10divyav_u:9784: jānīyāh--eṣa brāhmaṇo raudracitto niṣkāruṇiko rājñaścandraprabhasya vināśārthaṃ bhadraśilāmanuprāptaḥ /
K10divyav_u:9786: eṣa mayā devate upāyaścintito yenāyaṃ brāhmaṇo na prabhaviṣyati devasya śiro grahītumiti/
K10divyav_u:9787: 200.011. atha mahācandro 'grāmātyo raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamādāya nagaraṃ praviśya ratnadharānājñāpayati--ānīyantāṃ bhavanto ratnamayāni śirāṃsi/
K10divyav_u:9789: 200.013. bhāṇḍāgārikai ratnamayānāṃ śīrṣāṇāṃ rājadvāre rāśiḥ kṛtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9790: 200.014. mahācandreṇāgrāmātyena raudrākṣasya ratnamayāni śīrṣāṇyupadarśitāni--pratigṛhṇa tvaṃ mahābrāhmaṇa prabhūtāni ratnamayāni śīrṣāṇi/
K10divyav_u:9794: evamukte raudrākṣo brāhmaṇo mahācandramagrāmātyamidamavocat--na ratnamayairme śirobhiḥ prayojanam/
K10divyav_u:9796: 200.018. api tvahamasya mahāpṛthivīpālasya sarvaṃdadasya sakāśamāgataḥ śiraso 'rthāya/
K10divyav_u:9797: 200.019. evamukte mahācandramahīdharau agrāmātyau kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparau vyavasthitau--kimidānīṃ prāptakālamiti/
K10divyav_u:9798: 200.020. athaitadvṛttāntamupaśrutya rājā candraprabho mahācandramahīdharau agrāmātyau dūreṇa prakrośyaitadavocat--ānīyatāmeṣa matsamīpam/
K10divyav_u:9801: paridevamānau abhirudya devasya maitrātmakasya kāruṇikasya sattvavatsalāsyānekaguṇasamuditasya
K10divyav_u:9803: adyāsmākaṃ devena sārdhaṃ nānābhāvo bhaviṣyati vinābhāvo viprayogo visamyogaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9804: 200.025. iti viditvā rājñaḥ pādayor nipatya ekānte niṣaṇṇau/
K10divyav_u:9805: 200.025. atha rājā candraprabhaḥ paramatyāgaprativiśiṣṭaṃ tyāgaṃ parityakukāmo dūrata eva taṃ brāhmaṇamāmantrayate--ehi tvaṃ brāhmaṇa,
K10divyav_u:9807: 200.027. atha raudrākṣo brāhmaṇo yena rājā candraprabhastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9808: 200.028. upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ candraprabhaṃ jayenāyuṣā ca vardhayitvā rājānaṃ candraprabhamidamavocat--
K10divyav_u:9809: 200.029. dharme sthito 'si vimale śubhabuddhisattva sarvajñatāmabhilaṣan hṛdayena sādho/
K10divyav_u:9810: 200.031. mahyaṃ śiraḥ sṛja mahākaruṇāgracetā mahyaṃ dadasva mama toṣakaro bhavādya//7//
K10divyav_u:9812: śrutvā pramuditamanāḥ prītivisphāritākṣo raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamuvāca--hantedaṃ brāhmaṇa
K10divyav_u:9815: 201.004. priyo yathā yadyapi caikaputrakastathāpi me kharpamidaṃ gṛhāṇa/
K10divyav_u:9816: 201.006. tvaccintitānāṃ phalamastu śīghraṃ śiraḥpradānāddhi labheya bodhim//8//
K10divyav_u:9818: 201.008. yadā ca rājā candraprabheṇa śiraso maulirapanītaḥ,
K10divyav_u:9819: tatsamanantarameva sarveṣāṃ jambudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ maulayaḥ patitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:9820: 201.010. bhadraśilāyāṃ ca rājadhānyāṃ caturdiśamulkāpātā diśodāhāśca prādurbhūtāḥ/
K10divyav_u:9821: 201.010. nagaradevatābhiśca śabdo niścāritah--asya rājñaścandraprabhasya pāpabrāhmaṇo śiraśchetsyatīti/
K10divyav_u:9823: śarīraparityāgaṃ viditvā sāśrudurdidavadanau rājñaścandraprabhasya pādau pariṣvajyāhatuh--dhanyāste
K10divyav_u:9824: puruṣā deva ya evamatyadbhutarūpadarśanaṃ vā drakṣyantīri /
K10divyav_u:9825: 201.014. tau abhimukhamudvīkṣyamāṇau rājani candraprabhe cittamabhiprasādya raudrākṣe
K10divyav_u:9826: ca brāhmaṇe maitryacittamutpādya nāvāṃ śakṣyāmo nirupamaguṇādhārāsya devasyānityatāṃ
K10divyav_u:9829: 201.016. rājñaścandraprabhasyedamevamrūpaṃ vyavasāyaṃ buddhvā tāṃ ca nagaranivāsinīnāṃ
K10divyav_u:9830: devatānāmārtadhvanimupaśrutya bhaumā yakṣā antarikṣacarāśca yakṣāḥ krinditumārabdhāh--hā
K10divyav_u:9833: 201.019. tato raudrākṣo brāhmaṇastaṃ mahājanakāyamavekṣya śiro grahītum/
K10divyav_u:9836: 201.022. evamukte rājā candraprabho raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamavocat--evaṃ mahābrāhmaṇa kriyatām/
K10divyav_u:9839: 201.023. atha rājā candraprabho rājā āsanādutthāya tīkṣaṇamasimādāya yena maṇiratnagarbhamudyānaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9840: 201.024. atha rājā candraprabhasya idamevamrūpaṃ vyavasāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhadraśilāyāṃ rājadhānyāmanekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi vikrośamānāni pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhāni/
K10divyav_u:9842: 201.026. dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ samāśvāsayannāha--apramādaḥ karaṇīyaḥ kuśaleṣu dharmoṣviti/
K10divyav_u:9843: 201.027. saṃkṣepeṇa dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamādāya maṇiratnagarbhamudyānaṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9844: 201.028. samanantarapraviṣṭasya rājñaścandraprabhasya maṇiratnagarbha udyāne bhadraśilāyāṃ chatrāṇi dhvajapatākāśca yena maṇiratnagarbhamudyānaṃ
K10divyav_u:9845: 201.029. tato rājā candraprabho maṇiratnagarbhasyodyānasya dvāraṃ pidhāya taṃ taṃ raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamāmantrayate--pratigṛhyatāṃ brāhmaṇa mamottamāṅgamiti/
K10divyav_u:9846: 201.031. evamukte raudrākṣo brāhmaṇo rājānaṃ candraprabhamuvāca--nāhaṃ śakṣyāmi devasya śiraśchettumiti/
K10divyav_u:9852: 202.003. evaṃ cāhuh--kathamidānīṃ tvaṃ pāpabrāhmaṇa rājñaścandraprabhasyādūṣiṇo 'napakāriṇo mahājanavatsalasyānekaguṇasampannasya śiraśchetsyasīti?
K10divyav_u:9853: tato rājā candraprabha udyānadevatā nivārayati--mā devatā mama śiroyācanakasyāntarāyaṃ kuruta/
K10divyav_u:9855: bhūtapūrvaṃ devatā mamottamāṅgam yācanakasya devatāyā antarāyaḥ kṛtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9858: yadi tayā devatayā antarāyo na kṛto 'bhaviṣyat,
K10divyav_u:9860: 202.008. ataśca tvāmahamevaṃ bravīmi--mā me tvamuttamāṅgayācanakasyāntarāyaṃ kuruṣveti/
K10divyav_u:9861: 202.009. asminneva te maṇiratnagarbha udyāne mayā sahasraśaḥ śiraḥparityāgaḥ kṛtaḥ,
K10divyav_u:9863: 202.010. tasmāt tvaṃ devate mamottamāṅgayācanakasyāntarāyaṃ mā kuru/
K10divyav_u:9864: 202.011. eṣa eva devate sa pṛṣṭhībhūto maitreyo yo vyāghryā ātmānaṃ parityajya catvāriṃśatkalpasamprasthito maitreyo bodhisattva ekena śiraḥparityāgenāvapṛṣṭhīkṛtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9865: 202.013. atha sā devatā rājñaścandraprabhasya maharddhitāmavetya tasmin rājani paraṃ prasādaṃ pravedayantī tūṣṇīmavasthitā/
K10divyav_u:9866: 202.014. atha rājā candraprabhaḥ samyakpraṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ,
K10divyav_u:9869: asmiṃs tyāgaṃ svaśiraḥparityāgam yena cāhaṃ satyena svaśiraḥ parityajāmi,
K10divyav_u:9870: na rājyārthāya na svargārthāya na bhogārthāya na śakratvāya na brahmatvāya na cakravartivijayāya
K10divyav_u:9871: nānyatra kathamahamanuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambuddhya adāntān sattvān damayeyam,
K10divyav_u:9877: 202.020. anena satyena satyavacanena saphalaḥ pariśramaḥ syāt,
K10divyav_u:9879: asya ca maṇiratnagarbhasyodyānasya madhye mahān stūpaḥ syāt sarvastūpaprativiśiṣṭaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9880: 202.022. ye ca sattvāḥ śāntakāyā mahācaityaṃ vanditukāmā gaccheyuḥ,
K10divyav_u:9881: te taṃ sarvastūpaprativiśiṣṭaṃ dhātuparaṃ dṛṣṭvā viśrāntā bhaveyuḥ/
K10divyav_u:9883: janakāyā āgatya kārāṃ kṛtvā svargamokṣaparāyāṇā bhaveyuriti/
K10divyav_u:9884: 202.024. evaṃ samyak praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā tasmiṃścampakavṛkṣe śikhāṃ baddhvā raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamuvāca--āgaccha mahābrāhmaṇa,
K10divyav_u:9887: 202.027. tato rājā candraprabha ātmanaḥ kāyasya sthāma ca balaṃ ca saṃjanya tasmiṃśca
K10divyav_u:9888: brāhmaṇe karuṇāsahagataṃ maitracittamutpādya śiraśichattvā raudrākṣāya brāhmaṇāya niryātitavān /
K10divyav_u:9889: 202.028. kālaṃ ca kṛtvā atikramya brahmalokaṃ praṇītatvācchubhakṛtsne devanikāye upapannaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9890: 202.029. samanantaraparityakte rājñā candraprabheṇa śirasi ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātus triḥ kampitaḥ saṃkampitaḥ saṃprakampitaḥ,
K10divyav_u:9894: padmāni kumudāni puṇḍarīkānyagarucūrṇāni tagaracūrṇāni candanacūrṇāni tamālapatrāṇi divyāni <203>māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi,
K10divyav_u:9904: 203.005. tata ekatyāstasminneva pradeśe sthitvā dhyānānyutpādya tatraiva kālaṃ kṛtvā śubhakṛtsne devanikāye upapannā rājñaścandraprabhasya sabhāgatāyām/
K10divyav_u:9905: 203.006. apare dhyānānyutpādya tatraiva kālaṃ kṛtvā bhāsvare devanikāye upapannāḥ/
K10divyav_u:9907: 203.008. aparaiḥ saṃnipātya rājñaścandraprabhasya śarīraṃ sarvagandhakāṣṭhaiścitāṃ citvā,
K10divyav_u:9911: 203.010. gandhairmālyairdhūpairdīpaiḥ puṣpaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā candraprabhe rājani svacittamabhiprasādya kālagatāḥ ṣaṭsu devanikāyeṣu kāmāvacareṣu
K10divyav_u:9914: 203.013. syātkhalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā anyā sā tena kālena samayenottarāpathe bhadraśilā nāma rājadhānyabhūditi/
K10divyav_u:9917: eṣaiva sā takṣaśilā tena kālena tena samayena bhadraśilā nāma rājadhānī babhūva/
K10divyav_u:9918: 203.015. syātkhalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayenottarāpathe bhadraśilā nāma rājadhānyabhūditi/
K10divyav_u:9921: eṣaiva sā takṣaśilā tena kālena tena samayena bhadraśilā nāma rājadhānī babhūva/
K10divyav_u:9922: 203.015. syātkhalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣuvaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena candraprabho nāma rājābhūditi/
K10divyav_u:9925: ahameva tena kālena tena samayena rājā candraprabho babhūva/
K10divyav_u:9926: 203.018. syātkhalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena raudrākṣo nāma brāhmaṇo 'bhūditi/
K10divyav_u:9929: eṣa eva sa tena kālena tena samayena devadatto babhūva/
K10divyav_u:9930: 203.020. syātkhalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyau tau tena samayena mahācandramahīdharau agrāmātyau babhūvaturiti/
K10divyav_u:9956: 204.002. ayaṃ tāvat khustikayā ekottarikayā dharmaṃ deśayati--amī bhikṣavo dharmakathikā yuṃktamutkamuktapratibhānāḥ/
K10divyav_u:9961: 204.004. te kathayanti--tvaṃ tāvanmahalla khustikayā ekottarikayā dharmaṃ deśayasi/
K10divyav_u:9970: 204.008. sa saṃlakṣayati--yadi me utkṣepaṇīyaṃ karma kariṣyanti,
K10divyav_u:9972: 204.009. sa teṣāṃ śayitakānāṃ taṃ vihāramantarhāpayitvā mahāsamudraṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9977: 204.010. te kathayanti--ko 'pyasau devo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā bhagavatyabhiprasanno buddhe dharme saṃghe kārān kurvan,
K10divyav_u:9980: 204.012. bhagavānāha--yo 'sau bhikṣavo nirmito yadi ṣaḍvargikairbhikṣubhir na viheṭhito 'bhaviṣyat,
K10divyav_u:9988: 204.017. śrāvastyāṃ buddharakṣito nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9990: 204.018. sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍate ramate paricārayati/
K10divyav_u:9991: 204.018. tasya krīḍato ramataḥ paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
K10divyav_u:9993: 204.020. tena sa gṛhapatiḥ sapatnīkaḥ śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadeṣu pratikṣṭhāpitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:9994: 204.020. apareṇa samayena sā tasya patnī āpannasattvā savṛttā/
K10divyav_u:9995: 204.021. āyuṣmāñ śāriputrastasya ca vaineyakālaṃ jñātvā ekākyeva tat kulamupasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:10006: 204.027. sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām {atyayāt} prasūtā/
K10divyav_u:10007: 204.027. dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūstuṅganāsaḥ/
K10divyav_u:10008: 204.029. tasya jñātayaḥ saṃgamya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasāni vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti--kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāma?
K10divyav_u:10012: tasminneva divase pañcānāṃ vaṇikśatānāṃ pañca putraśatāni jātāni/
K10divyav_u:10014: 205.001. saṃgharakṣito dāraka unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍena anyaiścottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
K10divyav_u:10017: tadā āyuṣmāñ śāriputrastasya vaineyakālaṃ jñātvā ekākyeva tatkulamupasaṃkramya nimittamupadarśayitumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:10019: ajāta eva tvaṃ mayā āryaśāriputrasya paścācchramaṇo datta iti/
K10divyav_u:10020: 205.006. caramabhavikaḥ sa āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa pravrājita upasampādita āgamacatuṣṭayaṃ ca grāhitaḥ//
K10divyav_u:10021: 205.007. athāpareṇa samayena tāni pañca vaṇikśatāni mahāsamudragamanīyaṃ paṇyaṃ samudānīya
K10divyav_u:10053: 205.023. atha tāni pañca vaṇikśatāni kṛtakautukamaṅgalasvastyayanāni śakṭairbhārairmūḍhaiḥ piṭakairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiḥ prabhūtaṃ paṇyamāropya mahāsamudraṃ saṃprasthitāni/
K10divyav_u:10054: 205.025. te nipuṇataḥ samudrayānapātraṃ pratipadya mahāsamudramavatīrṇā dhanahārakāḥ/
K10divyav_u:10056: 205.027. te devatāyācanaṃ kartumārabdhāh--yo 'smin mahāsamudre devo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā prativasati,
K10divyav_u:10059: 205.029. te kathayati--āryasaṃgharakṣito 'smākaṃ vayasyakaḥ sahajanmikaḥ sahapāṃśukrīḍanako bhadantaśāriputreṇānupradattako bhagavatānuparītakaḥ/
K10divyav_u:10071: 206.003. na tveva vayamārya saṃgharakṣita tvāṃ parityakṣyāmaḥ/
K10divyav_u:10072: 206.004. āyuṣmān saṃgharakṣitaḥ saṃlakṣayati--yaduktaṃ bhagavatā bhayabhairavasahiṣṇunā te bhavitavyamitīdaṃ tat/
