K10divyav_u:10618: 216.015. tasya putro bhaviṣyatyupagupto nāma alakṣaṇako buddho yo mama varṣaśatapatinirvṛtasya buddhakāryaṃ bhavi(kari)ṣyati/
K10divyav_u:10620: 216.017. te 'ṣṭādaśahastāmāyāmena dvādaśahastāṃ vistāreṇa caturaṅgalamātrābhiḥ śaṇakābhiḥ pūjayiṣyanti/
K10divyav_u:10621: 216.018. eṣo 'gro me ānanda śrāvakāṇāṃ bhaviṣyatyavavādakānām yaduta upagupto bhikṣuḥ/
K10divyav_u:10625: 216.020. atra varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya śāṇakavāsī nāma bhikṣurbhaviṣyati/
K10divyav_u:10628: 216.022. mathurāyāmānanda naṭo bhaṭaśca dvau bhrātarau śreṣṭhinau bhaviṣyataḥ/
K10divyav_u:10630: 216.024. etadagraṃ me ānanda bhaviṣyati śamathānukūlānāṃ śayyāsanānām yadidaṃ naṭabhaṭikāraṇyāyatanam/
K10divyav_u:10631: 216.025. athāyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat--āścaryaṃ bhadanta yadīdṛśamāyuṣmānupagupto bahujanahitaṃ kariṣyati/
K10divyav_u:10633: yathā atīte 'pyadhvani tena vinipatitaśarīreṇāpyatraiva urumuṇḍaparvate trayaḥ pārśvāḥ/
K10divyav_u:10638: sa tam yūthamapahāya yatra pārśve pañca pratyekabuddhaśatāni prativasanti,
K10divyav_u:10640: 216.030. tasya tān pratyekabuddhān dṛṣṭvā prasādo jātaḥ/
K10divyav_u:10641: 216.030. sa teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ śīrṇaparṇāni mūlaphalāni copanāmayati/
K10divyav_u:10643: sa vṛddhānte praṇāmaṃ kṛtvā yāvannavāntaṃ gatvā paryaṅkenopaviśati,
K10divyav_u:10650: 217.003. tataḥ sa markaṭaḥ śocitvā paridevitvā ca dvitīyaṃ pārśvaṃ gato yatra pañca ṛṣiśatāni prativasanti/
K10divyav_u:10665: 217.009. te 'nācāryakā anupadeśakāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣān dharmānāmukhīkṛtya pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ sākṣātkṛtavantaḥ/
K10divyav_u:10673: 217.015. tadāpi tena vinipatitaśarīreṇāpyatraivorumuṇḍe parvate bahujanahitaṃ kṛtam/
K10divyav_u:10674: 217.015. anāgate 'pyadhvani varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya mama atraivorumuṇḍe parvate bahujanahitaṃ kariṣyati/
K10divyav_u:10675: 217.016. tacca yathaivaṃ tathopadarśayiṣyāmah--yadā sthavireṇa śāṇakavāsinā urumuṇḍe parvate vihāraḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ,
K10divyav_u:10679: 217.018. sa yāvat samanvāharati--yo 'sau tasya putra upagupto nāṃnā alakṣa.ṅko buddho nirdiṣṭaḥ,
K10divyav_u:10683: 217.021. sa yadā abhiprasannastadā sthaviraḥ saṃbahulairbhikṣubhiḥ sārdhamekadivasaṃ tasya gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
K10divyav_u:10686: 217.023. yāvadgupto gandhikaḥ sthaviraṃ śāṇakavāsinamekākinaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati--na khalu āryasya kaścit paścāccchramaṇah?
K10divyav_u:10699: 217.029. sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttastadā sthaviraḥ śāṇakavāsī guptaṃ gāndhikamadhigamyovāca--vatsa,
K10divyav_u:10722: 218.007. yāvat sthaviraḥ śāṇakavāsī samanvāharati--kimayaṃ sa upaguptah?
K10divyav_u:10725: 218.008. yāvadguptasya gāndhikasya tṛtīyaḥ putro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prasādiko 'tikrānto mānuṣavarṇamasamprāptaśca divyavarṇam/
K10divyav_u:10726: 218.009. tasya vistareṇa jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā upagupta iti nāma kṛtam/
K10divyav_u:10745: kīdṛśāste cittacetasikāḥ pravartante kliṣṭā vā akliṣṭā veti?
K10divyav_u:10750: yadi kevalaṃ cittaṃ parijñātuṃ na śakyasi,
K10divyav_u:10752: 218.020. tena tasya kṛṣṇikapaṭṭikā dattā pāṇḍurikā ca/
K10divyav_u:10769: 218.028. tasyā dāsī upaguptasakāśaṃ gatvā gandhān krīṇāti/
K10divyav_u:10774: upagupto gāndhikadārako rūpasampannaścāturyamādhuryasampannaśca dharmeṇa vyavahāraṃ karori/
K10divyav_u:10775: 218.031. śrutvā ca vāsavadattāyā upaguptasakāśe sānurāgaṃ cittamutpannam/
K10divyav_u:10781: 219.002. tasyā buddhirutpannā--niyataṃ pañca purāṇaśatāni notsahate dātum/
K10divyav_u:10782: 219.002. tayā yāvaddāsī upaguptasakāśaṃ preṣitā--na mamāryaputrasakāśāt kārṣāpaṇenāpi prayojanam/
K10divyav_u:10787: 219.005. anyataraśca sārthavāha uttarāpathāt pañcaśatamaśvapaṇyaṃ gṛhītvā mathurāmanuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:10790: 219.007. sa pañca puraṇaśatāni gṛhītvā bahūṃśca prābhṛtān vāsavadattāyāḥ sakāśāmabhigataḥ/
K10divyav_u:10791: 219.008. tato vāsavadattayā lobhākṛṣṭena taṃ śreṣṭhiputraṃ praghātayitvā^vaskare prakṣipya sārthavāhena saha ratimanubhutā/
K10divyav_u:10795: vāsavadattāṃ hastapādau karṇanāsaṃ ca cchittvā śmaśāne chorayantu/
K10divyav_u:10796: 219.011. yāvat tairvāsavadattā hastapādau karṇanāsaṃ ca cchittvā śmaśāne choritā/
K10divyav_u:10797: 219.012. yāvadupaguptena śrutam--vāsavadattā hastapādau karṇanāsaṃ ca cchittvā śmaśāne choritā/
K10divyav_u:10798: 219.013. tasya buddhirutpannā--pūrvaṃ tayā mama viṣayanimittaṃ darśanamākāṅkṣitam/
K10divyav_u:10799: 219.013. idānīṃ tu tasyā hastapādau karṇanāsaṃ ca vikārtitau,
K10divyav_u:10803: 219.017. mokṣārthināṃ janmaparānmukhānāṃ śreyastadāsyāstu na darśanaṃ syāt//2//
K10divyav_u:10804: 219.019. idānīṃ tu tasyāḥ kāle 'yaṃ draṣṭuṃ gatamānarāgaharṣāyāḥ/
K10divyav_u:10807: 219.022. tasyāśca preṣikā pūrvaguṇānurāgāt samīpe 'vasthitā kākādīn nivārayati/
K10divyav_u:10809: yasya tvayā ahaṃ sakāśaṃ punaḥ punaranupreṣitā,
K10divyav_u:10815: 219.028. tataḥ preṣikāmuvāca--yau hastapādau karṇanāsaṃ ca maccharīrādvikartitau,
K10divyav_u:10819: 219.029. tato vāsavadattā upaguptamagrataḥ sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati--āryaputra,
K10divyav_u:10820: yadā maccharīraṃ svasthabhūtaṃ viṣayaratyanukūlaṃ tadā mayā āryaputrasya punaḥ punardūtī visarjitā/
K10divyav_u:10823: 220.001. idānīṃ mama hastapādau karṇanāsau ca vikartitau,
K10divyav_u:10827: 220.005. babhūva gātraṃ mama darśanakṣamaṃ tadā na dṛṣṭo 'si mayālpabhāgyayā//5//
K10divyav_u:10828: 220.007. etarhi kiṃ draṣṭumihāgato 'si yadā śarīraṃ mama darśanākṣamam/
K10divyav_u:10834: 220.016. nirīkṣyamāṇā api yatnavadbhir nāpyatra dṛṣṭāsi bhavedyathāvat//8//
K10divyav_u:10835: 220.018. idaṃ tu rūpaṃ tava dṛśyametat sthitaṃ svabhāve racanādviyuktam/
K10divyav_u:10836: 220.020. te 'paṇḍitāste ca vigarhaṇīyā ye prākṛte 'smin kuṇape ramante//9//
K10divyav_u:10838: 220.024. śirāsahasraiśca vṛte samantāt ko nāma rajyeta itaḥ śarīre//10//
K10divyav_u:10847: 221.006. saṃbuddhasya tu ye vacaḥ suvacasaḥ śṛṇvanti kurvantyapi te kāmāñ śramaśokaduḥkhajananān sadbhiḥ sadā garhitān/
K10divyav_u:10848: 221.008. tyaktvā kāmanimittamuktamanasaḥ śānte vane nirgatāḥ pāram yānti bhavārṇavasya mahataḥ saṃśritya mārgaplavam//14//
K10divyav_u:10852: 221.012. me tvāṃ sādhuṃ samāsādya buddhasya vacanaṃ śrutam//15//
K10divyav_u:10853: 221.013. yāvadupaguptena vāsavadattāyā anupūrvikāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyāni saṃprakāśitāni/
K10divyav_u:10855: 221.014. tenātmīyayā dharmadeśanayā sahasatyābhisamayādanāgāmiphalaṃ vāsavadattayā ca srotāpattiphalaṃ prāptam/
K10divyav_u:10860: 221.021. eṣāhaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharma ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ cetyāha--
K10divyav_u:10862: 221.024. tamamarabudhajanamahitaṃ jinaṃ virāgaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca//17// iti//
K10divyav_u:10863: 221.025. yāvadupagupto vāsavadattāṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya prakrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:10865: 221.026. devataiśca mathurāyāmārocitam--vāsavadattayā upaguptasakāśāddharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā āryasatyāni dṛṣṭāni,
K10divyav_u:10867: 221.027. śrutvā ca mathurāvāsatavyena janakāyena vāsavadattāyāḥ śarīre pūjā kṛtā//
K10divyav_u:10868: 221.029. yāvat sthaviraḥ śāṇakavāsī guptaṃ gāndhikamabhigamyovāca--anujānīhi upaguptaṃ pravrājayiṣyāmīti/
K10divyav_u:10871: 221.030. yadā na lābho na cchedo bhaviṣyati,
K10divyav_u:10873: 221.031. yāvat sthaviraśāṇakavāsinā ṛddhyā tathā adhiṣṭhitam yathā <222>
K10divyav_u:10879: 222.002. tataḥ sthaviraḥ śāṇakavāsī guptaṃ gāndhikamuvāca--ayaṃ hi bhagavatā buddhena nirdiṣṭo mama varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya buddhakāryaṃ kariṣyatīti/
K10divyav_u:10882: 222.004. tataḥ sthavireṇa śāṇakavāsinā upagupto naṭabhaṭikāraṇyāyatanaṃ nītaḥ,
K10divyav_u:10887: tvaṃ bhagavatā nirdiṣṭo vaiṣaśataparinirvṛtasya mamopagupto nāma bhikṣurbhaviṣyatyalakṣaṇako buddhaḥ,
K10divyav_u:10889: 222.008. eṣo 'gro me ānanda śrāvakāṇāmavavādakānām yaduta upagupto bhikṣuḥ/
K10divyav_u:10893: 222.010. mathurāyāṃ ca śabdo visṛtah--upagupto nāmālakṣaṇako buddho 'dya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti/
K10divyav_u:10898: paśyati pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyasamprakāśanā kṛtā/
K10divyav_u:10899: 222.014. so 'pi pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyasamprakāśanāṃ kartumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:10908: 222.018. yāvat dvitīye 'pi divase sthaviropaguptena pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyasamprakāśanāyāmārabdhāyāṃ māreṇa cāsyāṃ parṣadi suvarṇavarṣamutsṛṣṭam,
K10divyav_u:10913: 222.021. yāvat tṛtīye śivase bahutarako janakāyo nirgataḥ/
K10divyav_u:10916: 222.023. yāvat tṛtīye 'pi divase sthaviropaguptaḥ pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyā nyārabdhaḥ saṃprakāśayitum/
K10divyav_u:10920: 222.025. yāvadvītarāgo janakāyo divyāni rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā divyāṃśca śabdāñ śrutvā māreṇākṛṣṭaḥ/
K10divyav_u:10922: 222.026. praītimanasā māreṇa sthaviropaguptasya śirasi mālā buddhā/
K10divyav_u:10925: 222.028. tasya buddhirutpannā--ayaṃ māro bhagavacchāsane mahāntaṃ vyākṣepaṃ karoti/
K10divyav_u:10928: 222.029. tasya ca vinayāt sattvānugrahādahaṃ bhagavatā alakṣaṇako buddho nirdiṣṭaḥ/
K10divyav_u:10929: 222.030. yāvat sthaviropaguptaḥ samanvāharati--kimasya vinayakāla upasthita āhosvinneti?
K10divyav_u:10931: 222.031. tataḥ sthaviropaguptena trayaḥ kuṇapā gṛhītāh--ahikṛṇapaṃ kurkurakuṇapaṃ manuṣyakuṇapam/
K10divyav_u:10933: 223.001. dṛṣṭvā ca mārasya prītirutpannā--upagupto 'pi mayā ākṛṣṭa iti/
K10divyav_u:10940: 223.005. bhikṣujanapratikūlā mālā baddhā yathaiva me bhavatā/
K10divyav_u:10942: 223.007. yatte balaṃ bhavati tatpratidarśayasva buddhātmajena hi sahādya samāgato 'si/
K10divyav_u:10945: 223.011. paramapi ca svayamanupraviśya pipīlika ivādrirājamapanayituṃ na śaśāka/
K10divyav_u:10947: 223.013. yadi moktuṃ na śakyāmi kaṇṭhāt śvakuṇapaṃ svayam/
K10divyav_u:10950: 223.016. brahmāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ śatakratuṃ vā dīptaṃ vā praviśa hutāśamarṇavaṃ vā/
K10divyav_u:10951: 223.018. na kledaṃ na ca pariśoṣaṇaṃ na bhedaṃ kaṇṭhasthaṃ kuṇapamidaṃ tu yāsyatīha//21//
K10divyav_u:10958: 223.026. kāmaṃ mamāpi mahadasti balaṃ tathāpi nāhaṃ tathāgatasutasya balena tulyaḥ/
K10divyav_u:10959: 223.028. tejasvināṃ na khalu na jvalane 'sti kiṃ tu nāsau dyutirhutavahe ravimaṇḍale yā//24//
K10divyav_u:10963: 224.002. śaghrīṃ tameva śaraṇaṃ vraja yaṃ sametya bhraṣṭo hi yaḥ kṣititale bhavatīha janturuttiṣṭhati kṣitimasāvavalambya bhūyaḥ//25//
K10divyav_u:10966: 224.008. tasya buddhasya sāmarthya pramātuṃ ko nu śaknuyāt//26//
K10divyav_u:10971: 224.014. mohāndhena hi tatra tatra sa mayā taistair nayaiḥ kheditastenāhaṃ ca tathāpi nāma balinā naivāpriyaṃ śrāvitaḥ//28//
K10divyav_u:10972: 224.016. atha kāmadhātvadhipatirmāro nāstyanyā gatiranyatropaguptakādeveti jñātvā sarvamutsṛjya sthaviropaguptasamīpamupetya pādayor nipatyovāca--bhadanta,
K10divyav_u:10973: kimaviditametadbhadantasya yathā bodhimūlamupādāya mayā bhagavato vipriyaśatāni kṛtāni? kutah?
K10divyav_u:10977: 224.022. sa mayāyāsito nātho na cāhaṃ tena hiṃsitaḥ//30//
K10divyav_u:10983: 224.026. kiṃ sarṣapeṇa samatāṃ nayasīha meruṃ khadyotakena raviṃ maṇḍalinā samudram/
K10divyav_u:10984: 224.028. anyā hi sā daśabalasya kṛpā prajāsu na śrāvakasya hi mahākaruṇāsti saumya//32//
K10divyav_u:10989: 225.002. brūhi brūhi śrīmatastasya bhāvaṃ saṅgaṃ chettuṃ kṣāntiguptavratasya/
K10divyav_u:10990: 225.004. yo 'sau mohānnityamāyāsito me tenāhaṃ ca prekṣito maitryeṇaiva//34//
K10divyav_u:10993: 225.006. na ca buddhāvropitānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmanyat prakṣālanamanyatra tathāgataprasādādeva/
K10divyav_u:10995: 225.009. tvaṃ nāpriyamiha proktaḥ priyāṇyeva tu lambhitaḥ//35//
K10divyav_u:10996: 225.010. nyāyenānena bhaktistava hṛdi janitā tenāgramatinā svalpāpi hyatra bhaktirbhavati matimatāṃ nirvāṇaphaladā/
K10divyav_u:10997: 225.012. saṃkṣepādyatkṛtaṃ te vṛjinamiha mune mohāndhamanasā sarvaṃ prakṣālitaṃ tattava hṛdayagataiḥ śraddhāmbuvisaraiḥ//36//
K10divyav_u:10999: 225.015. sthāne mayā bahuvidhaṃ parikhedito 'sau prāk siddhitaśca bhuvi siddhamanorathena/
K10divyav_u:11000: 225.017. sarvaṃ ca marṣitamṛṣipravareṇa tena putrāparādha iva sānunayena pitrā//37//
K10divyav_u:11001: 225.019. sa buddhaprasādāpyāyitamanāḥ suciraṃ buddhaguṇānanusmṛtya sthavirasya padayor nipatyovāca--
K10divyav_u:11002: 225.020. anugraho paraḥ kṛtastvayā niveśitam yanmayi buddhagauravam/
K10divyav_u:11003: 225.022. idaṃ tu kaṇṭhavyavalambi maitryā maharṣikopābharaṇaṃ visarjaya//38//
K10divyav_u:11006: sthavira uvāca--adyaprabhṛti bhikṣavo na viheṭhayitavyā iti/
K10divyav_u:11015: 225.029. trailokyanāthasya kāñcanādrinibhastasya na dṛṣṭo rūpakāyo me/
K10divyav_u:11017: 226.003, priyamadhikamato hi nāstiṃ me daśabalarūpakutūhalo hyāham//39//
K10divyav_u:11018: 226.005. māra uvāca--tena hi mamāpi samayaḥ śrūyatām/
K10divyav_u:11021: 226.008. buddhānusmṛtipeśalena manasā pūjām yadi tvaṃ mayi svalpāmapyupadarśayiṣyasi vibho dagdho bhaviṣyāmyaham/
K10divyav_u:11022: 226.010. kā śaktirmama vītarāgavihitāṃ soḍhuṃ praṇāmakriyāṃ hastanyāsamivodvahanti na gajasyairaṇḍavṛkṣāṅkurāḥ//41//
K10divyav_u:11027: 226.014. śūraṃ vañcayituṃ purā vyavasitenottaptahemaprabhaṃ bauddhaṃ rūpamacintyabuddhivibhavādāsīnmayā yatkṛtam/
K10divyav_u:11028: 226.016. kṛtvā rūpamahaṃ tadeva nayanaprahlādikaṃ dehināmeṣo 'pyarkamayūkhajālamamalaṃ bhāmaṇḍalenākṣipan//42//
K10divyav_u:11029: 226.018. atha sthavirah evamastu ityuktvā taṃ kuṇapamapanīya tathāgatarūpadarśanotsuko 'vasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11030: 226.019. māraśca vanagahanamanupraviśya buddharūpaṃ kṛtvā naṭa iva suruciranepathyastasmādvanagahanādārabdho nikṣramitum/
K10divyav_u:11035: dakṣiṇe pārśve sthaviraśāradvatīputraṃ vāmapārśve sthaviramahāmaudgalyāyanaṃ pṛṣṭhataścāyuṣmantamānandaṃ
K10divyav_u:11043: 227.005. sa buddhāvalambanayā smṛtyā tathāpyāsaktamanāḥ saṃvṛtto yathā buddhaṃ bhagavantamahaṃ paśyāmīti vyaktamupāgataḥ/
K10divyav_u:11046: 227.008. vaktreṇābhibhavatyayaṃ hi kamalaṃ nīlotpalaṃ cakṣuṣā kāntyā puṣpavanaṃ ghanaṃ priyatayā candraṃ samāptadyutim/
K10divyav_u:11047: 227.010. gāmbhīryeṇa mahodadhiṃ sthiratayā meruṃ raviṃ tejasā gatyā siṃhamavekṣitena vṛṣabhaṃ varṇena cāmīkaram//45//
K10divyav_u:11048: 227.012. sa bhūyasyā mātrayā harṣaṇāpūryamāṇahṛdayo vyāpinā svareṇovāca--
K10divyav_u:11052: 227.017. tenedaṃ jananetrakāntamamalaṃ rūpaṃ samutthāpitam yaṃ dṛṣṭvā ripurapyabhipramuditaḥ syātkiṃ punarmadvidhaḥ//47//
K10divyav_u:11053: 227.019. saṃbuddhālambanaiḥ saṃjñāṃ vismṛtya buddhasaṃjñāmadhiṣṭhāya mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa mārasya pādayor nipatitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11054: 227.020. atha māraḥ sasambhramo 'bravīt--evaṃ taṃ bhadanta nārhasi samayaṃ vyatikramitum/
K10divyav_u:11056: māra uvāca--nanu pratijñātaṃ bhadantena--nāhaṃ bhavantaṃ praṇamiṣyāmīti/
K10divyav_u:11058: 227.024. na khalu na viditaṃ me yasya vādipradhāno jalavihata ivāgnir nirvṛtiṃ saṃprayātaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11059: 227.026. api tu nayanakāntāmākṛtiṃ tasya dṛṣṭvā tamṛṣimabhinato 'haṃ tvāṃ tu nābhyarcayāmi//48//
K10divyav_u:11063: yathā tvaṃ naiva mayā abhyarcito bhavasi,
K10divyav_u:11064: na ca mayā samayātikramaḥ kṛta iti/
K10divyav_u:11070: 228.005. yāvaccaturthe divase māraḥ svayameva mathurāyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣitumārabdhah--yo yuṣmākaṃ svargāpavargasukhaṃ prārthayate,
K10divyav_u:11072: yaiśca yuṣmābhistathāgato na dṛṣṭaste sthaviropaguptaṃ paśyantu iti/
K10divyav_u:11075: 228.011. svargāpavargāya ca yasya vāñchā sa śraddhayā dharmamataḥ śṛṇotu//51//
K10divyav_u:11076: 228.013. dṛṣṭo na yairvā dvipadapradhānaḥ śāstā mahākāruṇikaḥ svayambhūḥ/
K10divyav_u:11078: 228.017. yāvanmathurāyāṃ śabdo visṛtah--sthaviropaguptena māro vinīta iti/
K10divyav_u:11079: 228.017. śrutvā ca yadbhūyasā mathurāvāstavyo janakāyaḥ sthaviropaguptasakāśaṃ nirgataḥ/
K10divyav_u:11080: 228.018. tataḥ sthaviropagupto 'nekeṣu brāhamaṇaśatasahasreṣu saṃnipatiteṣu siṃha iva nirbhīḥ siṃhāsanamabhirūḍhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11082: 228.020. māṃ prati na te śakyaṃ siṃhāsanamaviduṣā samabhiroḍhum/
K10divyav_u:11083: 228.021. yaḥ sa siṃhāsanastho mṛga iva sa hi yāti saṃkocam//53//
K10divyav_u:11084: 228.022. siṃha iva yastu nirbhīr ninadati pravarāridarpanāśārtham/
K10divyav_u:11086: 228.024. yāvat sthaviropaguptena pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyāni saṃprakāśitāni/
K10divyav_u:11093: 228.028. tatra corumuṇḍaparvate guhā aṣṭadaśahastā dairdhyeṇa dvādaśahastā vistāreṇa/
K10divyav_u:11094: 228.028. yadā te kṛtakaraṇīyāḥ saṃvṛttāstadā sthaviropaguptenābhihitam--yo madīyenāvavādena sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyati,
K10divyav_u:11097: 228.031. tasya yāvadāsamudrāyām {pṛthivyām} śabdo visṛtah--mathurāyāmupaguptanāmā<229> avavādakānāmagro nirdiṣṭo bhagavatā/
K10divyav_u:11098: 229.001. tadyathā hi vinītakāmadhātvīśvare dvitīyaśāstṛkalpe mahātmani sthaviropagupte
K10divyav_u:11104: 229.007. atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
K10divyav_u:11109: 229.014. dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ sābhisaṃskāraṃ nagaradvāramindrakīle pādau vyavasthāpayanti,
K10divyav_u:11116: 229.018. vatsā dāmāni cchittvā mātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ samāgacchanti/
K10divyav_u:11122: 229.021. aparāhatāni ca vāditrabhāṇḍāni madhuraṃ śabdaṃ niścārayanti/
K10divyav_u:11126: 229.022. iyaṃ ca tasmin samaye pṛthivī ṣaḍanikāraṃ prakampate/
K10divyav_u:11130: 229.024. itīme cānye cādbhutadharmāḥ prādurbhavanti bhagavato nagarapraveśe/
K10divyav_u:11134: 229.030. atha buddhapraveśakālaniyataiḥ prātihāryairāvarhjitāḥ strīmanuṣyāstannagaramanilabalacalitabhinnavīcītaraṅgakṣubhitamiva mahāsamudraṃ vimuktoccanādaṃ babhūva/
K10divyav_u:11138: 230.001. <230>niṃnā connamate natāvanamate buddhānubhāvānmahī sthāṇuḥ śarkarakaṇḍakavyapagato nirdoṣatām yāti ca/
K10divyav_u:11139: 230.002. andhā mūkajaḍendriyāśca puruṣā vyaktendriyāstatkṣaṇaṃ saṃvādyantyanighaṭṭitāśca nagare nandanti tūryakhanāḥ//57//
K10divyav_u:11140: 230.005. sarvaṃ ca tannagaraṃ sūryasahasrātirekayā kanakamarīcivarṇayā buddhaprabhayā sphuṭaṃ babhūva/
K10divyav_u:11142: 230.007. sūryaprabhāmavabhartsya hi tasya bhābhirvyāptaṃ jagatsakalameva sakānanastham/
K10divyav_u:11143: 230.009. saṃprāpya ca pravaradharmakathābhirāmo lokaṃ surāsuranaraṃ hi samuktabhāvam//58//
K10divyav_u:11150: 230.013. yāvajjayena dārakena saktuṃ dāsyāmīti pāṃśvañjalirbhagavataḥ pātre prakṣiptaḥ,
K10divyav_u:11154: 230.018. dhīreṇa vaktreṇa kṛtaprasādaḥ pāṃśuṃ dadau jātijarāntakāya//59//
K10divyav_u:11155: 230.020. sa bhagavate pratipādayitvā praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena ekacchatrāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ rājā syām,
K10divyav_u:11157: 230.022. tato munistasya niśābhya bhāvaṃ bālasya samyakpraṇidhiṃ ca buddhvā/
K10divyav_u:11158: 230.024. iṣṭaṃ phalaṃ kṣṛtravaśena dṛṣṭvā jagrāha pāṃśuṃ karuṇāyamānaḥ//60//
K10divyav_u:11161: 230.026. dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ vidarśayanti,
K10divyav_u:11166: te saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanamavīciparyanteṣu gatvā ye śītanarakāsteṣūṣṇībhūtvā nipatanti,
K10divyav_u:11177: 231.004. te nirmite cittāni prasādayitvā narakavedanīyāni karmāṇi kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhiṃ gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā
K10divyav_u:11213: 231.022. atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato vāme karatale 'ntarhitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:11216: 231.027. nākāraṇaṃ śaṅkhamṛṇālagauraṃ smitaṃ vidarśayanti jinā jitārayaḥ//36//
K10divyav_u:11217: 231.029. tatkālaṃ svayamadhigamya vīra buddhyā śrotṛrṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām/
K10divyav_u:11223: 232.004. api tu sahetu sapratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitamupadarśayanti/
K10divyav_u:11224: 232.005. paśyasi tvamānanda dārakam yena tathāgatasya pātre pāṃśvañjaliḥ prakṣiptah?
K10divyav_u:11226: 232.006. ayamānanda dārako 'nena kuśalamūlena varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya pāṭaliputre nagare aśoko nāṃnā rājā bhaviṣyati caturbhāgacakravartī dhārmiko dharmarājā,
K10divyav_u:11231: 232.010. astaṃgate mayi bhaviṣyati ekarājā yo 'sau hyaśoka iti nāma viśālakīrtiḥ/
K10divyav_u:11233: 232.014. ayamasya deyadharmo yattathāgatasya pāṃśvañjaliḥ pātre pakṣiptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11234: 232.014. yāvadbhagavatā teṣāṃ sarva āyuṣmate ānandāya dattāḥ/
K10divyav_u:11237: 232.016. yāvadāyuṣmatā ānandena teṣāṃ sagomayena miśrayitvā yatra caṃkramati bhagavān,
K10divyav_u:11239: 232.018. tena khalu punaḥ samayena rājagṛhe bimbisāro rājā rājyaṃ kārayati/
K10divyav_u:11250: 232.021. pāṭaliputre nagare biṃdusāro nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati/
K10divyav_u:11253: 232.023. tena ca samayena campāyāṃ nagaryāmanyatamo brāhmaṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11254: 232.023. tasya duhitā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā janapadakalyāṇī/
K10divyav_u:11255: 232.024. sā naimittikairvyākṛtā--āsyā dārikāyā rājā bhartā bhaviṣyati/
K10divyav_u:11261: 232.026. sa tāṃ duhitaraṃ grahāya pāṭaliputraṃ gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:11262: 232.027. tena sā sarvālaṃkārairvibhūṣayitvā rājño bindusārasya bhāryārthamanupradattā--iyaṃ hi devakanyā dhanyā praśastā ceti/
K10divyav_u:11268: 232.031. sā rājñaḥ kṛśaśmaśruṃ prasādhayati yāvat suśikṣitā saṃvṛttā/
K10divyav_u:11271: 233.001. yāvat rājñā prītena vareṇa pravāritā--kiṃ tvaṃ varamicchasīti?
K10divyav_u:11272: tayā abhihitam--devena me saha samāgamaḥ syāt/
K10divyav_u:11287: 233.008. tasya vistareṇa jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kiṃ kumārasya bhavatu nāma?
K10divyav_u:11294: 233.011. atha rājā bindusāraha kumāraṃ parīkṣitukāmaḥ piṅgalavatsājīvaṃ parivrājakamāmantrayate--upādhyāya,
K10divyav_u:11296: piṅgalavatsājīvaḥ parivrājakaḥ kathayati--tena hi deva kumārānādāya suvarṇamaṇḍapamudyānaṃ nirgaccha,
K10divyav_u:11309: aśokaḥ kathayati--rājā adya suvarṇamaṇḍape udyāne kumārān parīkṣayati/
K10divyav_u:11311: 233.020. yāvadaśokastasmin mahallake 'bhiruhya suvarṇamaṇḍapamudyānaṃ gatvā kumārāṇāṃ madhye 'tra pṛthivyāṃ prastīrya niṣasāda/
K10divyav_u:11323: 233.027. āha--yasya yānaṃ śobhanaṃ sa rājā bhaviṣyati/
K10divyav_u:11339: aśokaḥ kathayati--abhedena vyākṛtam--yasya yānamagramāsanaṃ pānaṃ bhājanaṃ ceti,
K10divyav_u:11342: 234.003. mama hastiskandham yānaṃ pṛthivī āsanaṃ mṛṇmayaṃ bhājanaṃ śālyodanaṃ dadhivyañjanaṃ pānīyaṃ pānamiti//
K10divyav_u:11343: 234.005. tataḥ piṅgalavatsājīvaḥ parivrājakah aśoko rājā bhaviṣyatīti tasya mātaramārabdhaḥ sevitum/
K10divyav_u:11345: kataraḥ kumāro rājño bindusārasyātyayādrājā bhaviṣyatīti? āha--aśokaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11352: 234.010. atha rājño bindusārasya takṣaśilā nāma nagaraṃ viruddham/
K10divyav_u:11353: 234.010. tatra rājñā bindusāreṇa aśoko visarjitah--gaccha kumāra,
K10divyav_u:11364: 234.016. śrutvā takṣaśilānivāsinaḥ paurā ardhatṛtīyāni yojanāni mārge śobhāṃ kṛtvā pūrṇaghaṭamādāya pratyudgatāḥ/
K10divyav_u:11365: 234.017. pratyudgamya ca kathayanti--na vayaṃ kumārasya viruddhāḥ,
K10divyav_u:11367: api tu duṣṭāmātyā asmākaṃ paribhavaṃ kurvanti/
K10divyav_u:11371: 234.019. tena tau vṛttyā saṃvibhaktau tasyāgrataḥ parvatān saṃchindantau saṃprasthitau/
K10divyav_u:11375: 234.023. yāvat susīmaḥ kumāra udyānāt pāṭaliputraṃ praviśati/
K10divyav_u:11377: 234.024. tasya susīmena kumāreṇa trīḍābhiprāyatayā khaṭakā pātitā/
K10divyav_u:11381: 234.026. tathā kariṣyāmi yathā rājaiva na bhaviṣyati/
K10divyav_u:11392: 234.030. yāvadamātyairaśokaḥ kumāro haridrayā pralipto lakṣāṃ ca lohapātre kvāthayitvā kvathitena rasena lohapātrāṇi mrakṣayitvā chorayanti--aśokaḥ kumāro glānībhūta iti/
K10divyav_u:11394: tadā amātyairaśokaḥ kumāraḥ sarvālaṃkārairbhūṣayitvā<235> rājño bindusārasyopanītah--imaṃ tāvadrājye pratiṣṭhāpaya/
K10divyav_u:11398: 235.002. aśokena cābhihitam--yadi mama dharmeṇa rājyaṃ bhavati,
K10divyav_u:11401: 235.003. taṃ dṛṣṭvā bindusārasya rājña uṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ mukhādāgatam yāvatkālagataḥ/
K10divyav_u:11410: 235.007. aśokenāpi pāṭaliputre nagare ekasmin dvāre eko nagnaḥ sthāpitaḥ,
K10divyav_u:11414: 235.009. rādhaguptena ca pūrvasmin dvāre yantramayo hastī sthāpitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11415: 235.009. aśokasya ca pratimāṃ parikhāṃ khanayitvā khadirāṅgāraiśca pūrayitvā tṛṇenācchādya pāṃśunākīrṇā/
K10divyav_u:11423: 235.014. yadā aśoko rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ sa tairamātyairavajñayā dṛśyate/
K10divyav_u:11427: api tu kaṇṭakavṛkṣāṃś chittvā puṣpavṛkṣān phalavṛkṣāṃśca paripālayitavyam/
K10divyav_u:11429: tato rājñā ruṣitena asiṃ niṣkośaṃ kṛtvā pañcānāmamātyaśatānāṃ śiraṃsi cchinnāni/
K10divyav_u:11430: 235.018. yāvadrājā aśoko 'pareṇa samayenāntaḥpuraparivṛto vasantakālasamaye puṣpitaphaliteṣu pādapeṣu pūrvanagarasyodyānaṃ gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:11431: 235.019. tatra ca paribhramatā aśokavṛkṣaḥ supuṣpito dṛṣṭaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11432: 235.020. tato rājño mamāpi sahanāmā ityanunayo jātaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11436: tasyāntaḥpureṇa roṣeṇa tasmādaśokavṛkṣāt puṣpāṇi śākhāśca cchinnāḥ/
K10divyav_u:11441: 235.023. śrutvā ca rājñā amarṣajātena pañca strīśatāni kiṭikaiḥ saṃveṣṭya dagdhāni/
K10divyav_u:11442: 235.024. tasyemānyaśubhānyālokya caṇḍo rājā caṇḍāśoka iti vyavasthāpitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11445: 235.026. api tu devasya vadhyaghātakāḥ puruṣāḥ sthāpayitavyāḥ,
K10divyav_u:11452: 235.029. caṇḍo duṣṭātmā mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ca paribhāṣate,
K10divyav_u:11454: pipīlikān makṣikān mūṣikān matsyāṃśca jālena baḍiśena praghātayati/
K10divyav_u:11455: 235.031. caṇḍo dārakastasya caṇḍagirika iti nāmadheyaṃ kṛtam/
K10divyav_u:11477: yastatra praviśettasya na bhūyo nirgama iti/
K10divyav_u:11482: 236.012. yāvannarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṃ bhūmau ādīptāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmekajvālibhūtāyāmuttānakān
K10divyav_u:11483: pratiṣṭhāpya ayomayena viṣkambhakena mukhadvāraṃ viṣkambhya ayoguḍānādīptān pradīptān
K10divyav_u:11486: jahvāmapi kaṇṭhamapi kaṇṭhamapi hṛdayamapi hṛdayasāmantamapi antrāṇyantraguṇānapi dagdhvā adhaḥ pragharati/
K10divyav_u:11487: 236.016. evaṃ duḥkhā hi bhikṣavo nārakāḥ sattvā narakeṣūpapannāḥ/
K10divyav_u:11488: 236.017. yāvannarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṃ bhūmau ādīptāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmekajvālibhūtāyāmuttānakān
K10divyav_u:11489: pratiṣṭhāpya ayomayena viṣkambhakena mukhadvāraṃ viṣkambhya kvathitaṃ tāmramāsye prakṣipanti,
K10divyav_u:11494: 236.020. santi sattvā narakeṣūpapannā yānnarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṃ bhūmau ādīptāyāṃ
K10divyav_u:11497: takṣaṇuvanti saṃtakṣṇuvanti saṃpratakṣṇuvanti aṣṭāṃśamapi ṣaḍaṃśamapi ṣaḍaṃśamapi
K10divyav_u:11498: caturasnamapi vṛttamapi maṇḍalamapi unnatamapi avanatamapi śāntamapi viśāntamapi takṣṇuvanti /
K10divyav_u:11500: 236.025. santi sattvā narakeṣūpapannā yānnarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṃ bhūmau ādīptāyāṃ
K10divyav_u:11504: aṣṭāṃśamapi ṣaḍaṃśamapi caturasnamapi maṇḍalamapi unnatamapi avanatamapi śāntamapi viśāntamapi takṣṇuvanti/
K10divyav_u:11506: 236.031. santi sattvā narakeṣūpapannā yānnarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṃ bhūmāvādīptāyāṃ
K10divyav_u:11507: pradīptāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmekajvalībhūtāyāmuttānakān pratiṣṭhāpya pañcaviṣaṭabandhanāṃ kāraṇāṃ kārayanti,
K10divyav_u:11512: 237.002. evaṃ pañca vedanā iti kurute sadṛśāśca kāraṇāḥ sattvānāmārabdhāḥ kārayitum//
K10divyav_u:11513: 237.004. yāvat śrāvastyāmanyatamaḥ sārthavāhaḥ patnyā saha mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11520: 237.007. sa ca samudraḥ sārthavāhaputro bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11522: 237.008. sa pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya pāṭaliputraṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11533: 237.015. durlabhaṃ prāpya mānuṣyaṃ pravrajyāṃ ca sukhodayām/
K10divyav_u:11538: 237.017. tataḥ sakaruṇairvacanaistaṃ bhikṣuḥ kramam yācati sma māsam yāvat/
K10divyav_u:11540: 237.018. sa khalu maraṇabhayodvignahṛdayaḥ saptarātreṇa me na bhavitavyamiti vyāyatamatiḥ saṃvṛttaḥ//
K10divyav_u:11541: 237.020. atha saptame divase 'śokasya rājño 'ntaḥpurikāṃ kumāreṇa saha saṃraktāṃ
K10divyav_u:11542: nirīkṣamāṇāṃ saṃlapantīṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sahadarśanādeva ruṣitena rājñā tau dvāvapi taṃ
K10divyav_u:11548: 237.025. kva tadvadanakāntitvaṃ gātraśobhā kva sā gatā/
K10divyav_u:11552: 237.029. tena tāṃ rajanīṃ kṛtsnāam yujyatā buddhaśāsane/
K10divyav_u:11572: 238.011. tatastena nirghṛṇena dāruṇahṛdayena paralokanirapekṣeṇa roṣāviṣṭena bahūdakāyāṃ sthālyāṃ nararudhiravasāmūtrapurīṣasaṃkulāyāṃ mahālohyāṃ
K10divyav_u:11580: 238.015. atha rājani samāgate prāṇisahasreṣu saṃnipatiteṣu sa bhikṣurvaineyakālamavekṣamāṇah--
K10divyav_u:11581: 238.015. riddhiṃ samutpādya sa tanmuhūrtaṃ lohyanatarasthaḥ salilārdragātraḥ/
K10divyav_u:11582: 238.018. nirīkṣamāṇasya janasya madhye nabhastalaṃ haṃsa ivotpapāt//76//
K10divyav_u:11585: 238.021. ardhena gātreṇa vavarṣa toyamardhena jajvāla hutāśanaśca/
K10divyav_u:11586: 238.023. varṣañ jvalaṃścaiva rarāja yaḥ khe dīptaucadhiprasravaṇeva śailaḥ//77//
K10divyav_u:11589: 238.029. manuṣyatulyaṃ tava saumya rūpam ṛddhiprabhāvastu narānatītya/
K10divyav_u:11590: 238.031. na niścayaṃ tena vibho vrajāmi ko nāma bhāvastava śuddhabhāva//79//
K10divyav_u:11591: 239.001. <239>tatsāmprataṃ brūhi mamedamartham yathā prajānāmi tava prabhāvam/
K10divyav_u:11592: 239.003. jñātvā ca te dharmaguṇaprabhāvān yathābalaṃ śiṣyavadācareyam//80//
K10divyav_u:11595: mahājanahitārthaṃ ca pratipatsyata iti matvā svaguṇamudbhāvayaṃstamuvāca--
K10divyav_u:11597: 239.009. buddhasya putro vadatāṃ varasya dharmānvayaḥ sarvabhaveṣvasaktaḥ//81//
K10divyav_u:11598: 239.011. dāntena dāntaḥ puruṣarṣabheṇa śāntiṃ gatenāpi śamaṃ praṇītaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11601: 239.015. mahārāja, tvaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtah--varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya mama pāṭaliputre nagare 'śoko nāma rājā bhaviṣyati caturbhāgacakravartī
K10divyav_u:11604: 239.017. idaṃ ca devena narakasadṛśaṃ sthānameva sthāpitam yatra prāṇisahasrāṇi nipātyante/
K10divyav_u:11609: 239.022. nāthasya saṃpūrya manorathaṃ ca vistārikān dharmadharān kuruṣva//83//
K10divyav_u:11610: 239.024. atha sa rājā buddhe samupajātaprasādaḥ kṛtakarasampuṭastaṃ bhikṣuṃ kṣamayannuvāca--
K10divyav_u:11612: 239.027. śaraṇamṛṣimupaimi taṃ ca buddhaṃ gaṇavaramāryaniveditaṃ ca dharmam//84//
K10divyav_u:11630: 240.008. tato rājā bhagavaccharīradhātuṃ vistarīṣyāmīti caturaṅgena balakāyena gatvā ajātaśatrupratiṣṭhāpitaṃ droṇastūpamutpāṭya śarīradhātuṃ
K10divyav_u:11631: 240.010. yatroddhāraṇaṃ ca vistareṇa kṛtvā dhātupratyaṃśaṃ datvā stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya
K10divyav_u:11632: evaṃ dvitīyaṃ stūpaṃ vitareṇa bhaktimato yāvatsaptadroṇādgrahāya stūpāṃśca pratiṣṭhāpya rāmagrāmaṃ gataḥ /
K10divyav_u:11638: 240.014. rāmagrāme tvaṣṭamaṃ stūpamadya nāgāstatkālaṃ bhaktimanto rarakṣuḥ/
K10divyav_u:11641: 240.018. yāvadrājā caturaśītikaraṇḍasahasraṃ kārayitvā sauvarṇarūpyasphaṭikavaiḍūryamayānāṃ teṣu dhātavaḥ prakṣiptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11642: 240.019. evaṃ vistareṇa caturaśītikumbhasahasraṃ paṭṭasahasraṃ ca yakṣāṇāṃ haste datvā visarjitam--āsamudrāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ hīnotkṛṣṭamadhyameṣu nagareṣu yatra koṭiḥ paripūryate,
K10divyav_u:11646: 240.023. rājā cintayati--na yadi vaistārikā dhātavo bhaviṣyanti/
K10divyav_u:11652: 240.026. yāvadrājā kurkuṭārāmaṃ gatvā sthavirayaśasamabhigamyovāca--ayaṃ me manorathah--ekasmin divase ekasminmuhūrte caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasraṃ
K10divyav_u:11654: 240.028. ahaṃ tasmin samaye pāṇinā sūryamaṇḍalaṃ praticchādayiṣyāmīti/
K10divyav_u:11655: 240.028. yāvat tasmin divase sthavirayaśasā pāṇinā sūryamaṇḍalaṃ praticchāditam/
K10divyav_u:11658: 241.001. <241>tābhyaḥ saptabhyaḥ pūrvikābhyaḥ kṛtibhyo dhātuṃ tasya ṛṣeḥ sa hyupādāya mauryaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11659: 241.003. cakre stūpānāṃ śāradābhraprabhānāṃ loke sāśīti śāsadahnā sahasram//87//
K10divyav_u:11664: 241.007. āryamauryaśrīḥ sa prajānāṃ hitārthaṃ kṛtsnaṃ stūpān kārayāmāsa lokam/
K10divyav_u:11665: 241.009. caṇḍāśokatvaṃ prāpya pūrvaṃ pṛthivyāṃ dharmāśokatvaṃ karmaṇā tena lebhe//88//
K10divyav_u:11669: 242.002. sa idānīmacirajātaprasādo buddhaśāsane yatra śākyaputrīyān dadarśa ākīrṇe rahasi vā,
K10divyav_u:11670: tatra śirasā pādayor nipatya vandate sma/
K10divyav_u:11671: 242.003. tasya ca yaśo nāmāmātyaḥ paramaśrāddho bhagavati/
K10divyav_u:11674: 242.004. santi hi śākyaśrāmaṇerakāścaturbhyo varṇebhyaḥ pravrajitā iti/
K10divyav_u:11676: 242.005. atha sa rājā kenacit kālāntareṇa sarvasacivānuvāca--vividhānāṃ prāṇināṃ śirobhiḥ karyam/
K10divyav_u:11686: 242.011. tato yaśāmātyastasyaḥ śirasaḥ pratigrāhakamanāsādya savrīḍo rājānamupetyedamarthamuvāca--
K10divyav_u:11688: 242.015. śirastvidaṃ mānuṣamapraśastaṃ na gṛhyate mūlyamṛte 'pi rājan//1//
K10divyav_u:11689: 242.017. atha sa rājā tamamātyamuvāca--kimidamitīdaṃ mānuṣaśiro na kaścidgṛhṇātīti?
K10divyav_u:11698: 242.021. tataḥ sa rājā tamamātyaṃ pratijñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya pratyādiśannimamarthamuvāca--haṃ bhoḥ,
K10divyav_u:11702: 242.024. vināpi mūlyairvijugupsitatvāt pratigrahītā bhuvi yasya nāsti/
K10divyav_u:11703: 242.026. śirastadāsādya mameha puṇyam yadyarjitaṃ kiṃ viparītamatra//2//
K10divyav_u:11704: 242.028. jātiṃ bhavān paśyati śākyabhikṣuṣvantargatāṃsteṣu guṇānna ceti/
K10divyav_u:11706: 243.001. <243>āvāhakāle 'tha vivāhakāle jāteḥ parīkṣā na tu dharmakāle/
K10divyav_u:11707: 243.003. dharmakriyāyā hi guṇā nimittā guṇāśca jātiṃ na vicārayanti//4//
K10divyav_u:11710: 243.007. cittavaśena hi puṃsāṃ kalevaraṃ nindyate 'tha satkriyate/
K10divyav_u:11712: 243.009. yadi guṇaparivarjito dvijātiḥ patita iti prathito 'pi yātyavajñām/
K10divyav_u:11713: 243.011. na tu nidhanakulodgato 'pi jantuḥ śubhaguṇayukta iti praṇamya pūjyaḥ//7//
K10divyav_u:11715: 243.014. kiṃ te kāruṇikasya śākyavṛṣabhasyaitadvaco na śrutaṃ prājñaiḥ sāramasārakebhya iha yannṛbhyo grahītuṃ kṣamam/
K10divyav_u:11716: 243.016. tasyānanyathavādino yadi ca tāmājñāṃ cikīrṣāmyahaṃ vyāhantuṃ ca bhavān yadi prayatate naitat suhṛllakṣaṇam//8//
K10divyav_u:11717: 243.018. ikṣukṣodavadujijñato bhuvi yadā kāyo mama svapsyati pratyutthānanamaskṛtāñjalipuṭakleśakriyāsvakṣamaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11718: 243.020. kāyenāhamanena kiṃ nu kuśalaṃ śakṣyāmi kartuṃ tadā tasmānnāryamataḥ śmaśānanidhanāt sāraṃ grahītuṃ mayā//9//
K10divyav_u:11724: 243.028. na bhavati bahu śocyam yadvadevaṃ śarīre sucaritahṛtasāre naiti śoko 'ntakāle//12//
K10divyav_u:11725: 244.001. <244>sucaritavimukhānāṃ garvitānām yadā tu prasabhamiha hi mṛtyuḥ kāyakumbhaṃ bhinatti/
K10divyav_u:11726: 244.003. dahati hṛdayameṣāṃ śokavahnistadānīṃ dadhighaṭa iva bhagne sarvaśo 'prāptasāre//13//
K10divyav_u:11727: 244.005. kartuṃ vighnamato na me 'rhati bhavān kāyapraṇāmaṃ prati śreṣṭho 'smītyaparīkṣako hi gaṇayan mohāndhakārāvṛtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11728: 244.007. kāyam yastu parīkṣate daśabalavyāhāradīpairbudho nāsau pārthivabhṛtyayorviṣamatāṃ kāyasya saṃpaśyati//14//
K10divyav_u:11729: 244.009. tvagmāṃsāsthiśirāyakṛtprabhṛtayo bhāvā hi tulyā nṛṇāmāhāryaistu vibhūṣaṇairadhikatā kāyasya niṣpadyate/
K10divyav_u:11730: 244.011. etatsāramiheṣyate tu yadimaṃ niśritya kāyādhamaṃ pratyutthānanamaskṛtādikuśalaṃ prājñaiḥ samutthāpyate//15// iti/
K10divyav_u:11732: praṇāmādibhyaḥ samutthasya phalasya bahukalpaśaḥ sthāpayitvā sumeruvanmahāpṛthivībhyaḥ
K10divyav_u:11733: samutthasya phalasya bahukalpaśaḥ sthāpayitvā sumeruvanmahāpṛthivībhyaḥ sārataratāmavekṣya
K10divyav_u:11738: 244.020. tatra yaśo nāṃnā saṃghasthavira uvāca--asti mahārāja/
K10divyav_u:11739: 244.020. yadā bhagavataḥ parinirvāṇakālasamaye tadā apalālaṃ nāgaṃ damayitvā kumbhakālaṃ caṇḍālīgopālīṃ ca nāgaṃ mathurāmanuprāptaḥ,
K10divyav_u:11740: tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate--asyāmānanda mathutāyāṃ varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya gupto nāṃnā gāndhiko bhaviṣyati/
K10divyav_u:11741: 244.023. tasya putro bhaviṣyatyupagupto nāṃnā avavādakānāmagro 'lakṣaṇako buddhaḥ,
K10divyav_u:11746: 244.025. atra varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya naṭabhaṭikā nāmāraṇyāyatanaṃ bhaviṣyati/
K10divyav_u:11747: 244.026. etadagraṃ me ānanda bhaviṣyati śamathānukūlānāṃ śayyāsanānām yaduta naṭabhaṭikā nāmāraṇyāyatanam/
K10divyav_u:11751: 224.030. rājā āha--kiṃ punaḥ sa śuddhasattva utpannaḥ,
K10divyav_u:11756: 245.001. <245>sarvajñalīlo hi sa śuddhasattvo dharmaṃ praṇītaṃ vadate gaṇāgre/
K10divyav_u:11758: 245.005. tena khalu samayena āyuṣmānupagupto 'ṣṭādaśabhirarhatsahasraiḥ parivṛto naṭabhaṭikāraṇyāyatane prativasati/
K10divyav_u:11769: 245.016. yāvadrājñā sthaviropaguptasya sakāśaṃ dūto na preṣitaḥ sthaviradarśanāyāgamiṣyāmīti/
K10divyav_u:11773: 245.018. tato rājñā sthaviropaguptasyārthe nauyānenāgamiṣyatīti yāvacca mathurām yāvacca pāṭaliputramantarānnausaṃkramo 'vasthāpitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11774: 245.019. atha sthaviropagupto rājño 'śokasyānugrahārthamaṣṭādaśabhirarhatsahasraiḥ parivṛto nāvamabhiruhya pāṭaliputramanuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11779: 245.026. śrutvā ca rājñā prītamanasā śatasahasramūlyo muktāhāraḥ svaśarīrādapanīya priyākhyāyino dattaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11784: 245.031. svargāpavargāya ca hetubhūtaṃ sa paśyatāṃ kāruṇikopaguptam//22//
K10divyav_u:11785: 246.001. <246>yebhir na dṛṣṭo dvipadapradhānaḥ śāstā mahākāruṇikaḥ svayambhūḥ/
K10divyav_u:11787: 246.005. yāvadrājñā pāṭalipurre ghaṇṭāṃ ghoṣayitvā nagaraśobhāṃ ca kārayitvā ardhatṛtīyāni
K10divyav_u:11788: yojanāni gatvā sarvavādyena sarvapuṣpagandhamālyena sarvapauraiḥ sarvāmātyaiḥ saha
K10divyav_u:11792: tadantaraṃ hastiskandhādavatīrya padmyāṃ nadītīramabhigamya ekaṃ pādaṃ nadītīre sthāpya dvitīyaṃ nauphalake sthaviropaguptaṃ sarvāṅgenānuparigṛhya nau{saṃkramād} uttāritavān/
K10divyav_u:11793: 246.010. uttārya ca mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ sarvaśarīreṇopaguptasya pādayor nipatito
K10divyav_u:11794: mukhatuṇḍakena ca pādau anuparimārjya utthāya dvau jānumaṇḍalau pṛthivītale nikṣipya
K10divyav_u:11796: 246.013. yadā mayā śatrugaṇānnihatya prāptā samudrābharaṇā saśailā/
K10divyav_u:11797: 246.015. ekātapatrā pṛthivī tadā me prītir na sā yā sthaviraṃ nirīkṣya//24//
K10divyav_u:11799: 246.019. tvadvarśanāccaiva pare 'pi śuddhyā dṛṣṭo mayādyāpratimaḥ svayambhūḥ//25//
K10divyav_u:11801: 246.022. śāntiṃ gate kāruṇike jinendre tvaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kuruṣe triloke/
K10divyav_u:11804: 246.028. vibho mamājñāṃ vada śīghramadya kartāsmi vākyaṃ śuddhasattvā//27//
K10divyav_u:11805: 247.001. <247>atha sthaviropagupto dakṣiṇena pāṇinā rājānaṃ śirasi parimārjayannuvāca--
K10divyav_u:11807: 247.003. durlabhaṃ trīṇi ratnāni nityaṃ pūjaya pārthiva//28//
K10divyav_u:11808: 247.004. api ca mahārāja tena tena bhagavatā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena tava
K10divyav_u:11809: ca mama {ca} śāsanamupanyastaṃ sattvasārathivareṇa gaṇamadhye parīttaṃ paripālyam yatnato 'smābhiḥ /
K10divyav_u:11815: 247.009. saṃśobhitā me pṛthivī samantādvaistārikā dhātudharāḥ kṛtāśca//29//
K10divyav_u:11817: 247.012. ātmā putraṃ gṛhaṃ dārān pṛthivī kośameva ca/
K10divyav_u:11823: 247.016. gate kāle na śocanti iṣṭam yānti surālayam//31//
K10divyav_u:11824: 247.017. yāvadrājā mahatā śrīsamudayena sthaviropaguptaṃ rājakule praveśayitvā sarvāṅgenānuparigṛhya prajñapta evāsane niṣādayāmāsa/
K10divyav_u:11831: 247.025. dānaṃ manāpaṃ suśubhaṃ praṇītaṃ dattaṃ mayā hyapratipudgalasya/
K10divyav_u:11832: 247.027. na pāṃśudānaṃ hi mayā pradattam yathā tvayādāyi tathāgatasya//33//
K10divyav_u:11843: ayaṃ me manoratho ye bhagavatā buddhena pradeśā adhyuṣitāstānarceyam,
K10divyav_u:11845: 248.009. āha ca--ye buddhena bhagavatā pradeśā adhyuṣitāḥ,
K10divyav_u:11846: tānarcayannahaṃ gatvā cihnāni caiva kuryāṃ paścimāṃ janatāmanukampārtham/
K10divyav_u:11851: 248.013. gatvā cihnāni teṣveva kariṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ//37//
K10divyav_u:11852: 248.014. atha rājā caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ saṃnāhya gandhamālyapuṣpamādāya sthaviropaguptasahāyaḥ saṃprasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11853: 248.015. atha sthaviropagupto rājānamaśokaṃ sarvaprathamena lumbinīvanaṃ praveśayitvā dakṣiṇaṃ hastamabhiprasāryovāca--asmin mahārāja pradeśe bhagavāñ jātaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11856: 248.018. jātamātreha sa muniḥ prakrāntaḥ saptapadaṃ bhuvi//38//
K10divyav_u:11859: 248.021. atha rājā sarvaśarīreṇa tatra pādayor nipatya utthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ prarudannuvāca--
K10divyav_u:11865: 248.025. yayā dṛṣṭaḥ prajāyansa vane 'smin vadatāṃ varaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11866: 248.026. tramamāṇaḥ padān sapta śrutā vāco yayā muneḥ//41//
K10divyav_u:11868: 248.027. atha sthaviropagupto yasya vṛkṣasya śākhamavalambya devī mahāmāyā prasūtā,
K10divyav_u:11870: 248.029. naivāsikā yā ihāśokavṛkṣe saṃbuddhadarśinī yā devakanyā/
K10divyav_u:11872: 249.001. <249>yāvat sā devatā svarūpeṇa sthaviropaguptasamīpe sthitvā kṛtāñjaliruvāca--sthavira,
K10divyav_u:11879: 249.006. śrutvāstvayā tasya nararṣabhasya vāco manojñāḥ prathamā vane 'smin//43//
K10divyav_u:11880: 249.008. devatā prāha--mayā hi dṛṣṭaḥ kanakāvadātaḥ prajāyamāno dvipadapradhānaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11881: 249.011. padāni sapta kramāṇa eva śrutā ca vācamapi tasya śāstuḥ//44//
K10divyav_u:11884: 249.013. devatā prāha--na śakyaṃ mayā vāgbhiḥ saṃprakāśayitum/
K10divyav_u:11887: 249.017. sasāgarāntā ca mahī saśailā mahārṇavasthā iva nauścāla//45//
K10divyav_u:11890: 249.020. atha sthaviropagupto rājānaṃ kapilavastu nivedayitvā dakṣiṇahastamabhiprasāryovāca--asmin pradeśe mahārāja bodhisattvo rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyopanāmitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11891: 249.021. taṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇālaṃkṛtaśarīramasecanakadarśanaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā rājā sarvaśarīreṇa bodhisattvasya pādayor nipatitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11895: 249.024. tato rājñā śuddhodanena bodhisattvo devatānāmapyayaṃ deva iti tena bodhisattvasya devātideva iti nāmadheyaṃ kṛtam/
K10divyav_u:11896: 249.025. asmin pradeśe mahārāja bodhisattvo brāhmaṇānāṃ naimittikānāṃ vipaścikānāmupadarśitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:11897: 249.026. asmin pradeśe asitena ṛṣiṇā nirdiṣṭo buddho loke bhaviṣyatīti/
K10divyav_u:11900: 249.028. asmin pradeśe hastigrīvāyāmaśvapṛṣṭhe rathe śaradhanurgrahe tomaragrahe 'ṅkuśagrahe kulānurūpāsu vidyāsu pāragaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/

K10divyav_u:11926: 250.019. asmin pradeśe nandāyā bhuktvā ca madhupāyasam/

K10divyav_u:11947: pradeśe mahārāja bodhisattvena mahāmaitrīsahāyena sakalaṃ mārabalaṃ jitvā anuttarā
K10divyav_u:11950: 251.013. iha munivṛṣabheṇa bodhimūle namucibalaṃ vikṛtaṃ nirastamāśu/

K10divyav_u:11958: mupanīya dakṣiṇaṃ hastamabhiprasāryovāca--asmin pradeśe mahārāja bhagavatā triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmyaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravarjitatam/

K10divyav_u:12300: 260.029. yasminneva divase rājñā aśokena caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam,
K10divyav_u:12301: tasminneva divase rājño 'śokasya padmāvatī nāṃnā devī prasūtā/
K10divyav_u:12308: 261.001. <261>prītiḥ parā me vipulā hyavāptā mauryasya vaṃśasya parā vibhūtiḥ/
K10divyav_u:12309: 261.003. dharmeṇa rājyaṃ mama kurvato hi jāto dharmavivardhano 'stu//101//
K10divyav_u:12312: 261.005. atha rājā kumāraṃ nirīkṣya prītamanāḥ kathayati--
K10divyav_u:12314: 261.009. alaṃkṛtaṃ śobhati yasya vaktraṃ saṃpūrṇacandrapratimaṃ vibhāti//102//
K10divyav_u:12319: asti himavati parvatarāje kuṇāle nāma pakṣī prativasati,
K10divyav_u:12325: 261.018. tasyordhvato yojanam yakṣāḥ śṛṇvantyadho yojanaṃ nāgāḥ/
K10divyav_u:12327: 261.019. atha rājā kuṇālasya netrāṇi suciraṃ nirīkṣya na kiṃcidviśeṣaṃ paśyati/
K10divyav_u:12331: 261.022. netrānurāgeṇa sa pārthivendraḥ sutaḥ kuṇāleti tadā babhāṣe/
K10divyav_u:12332: 261.024. tato 'sya nāma prathitaṃ pṛthivyāṃ tasyāryasattvasya nṛpātmajasya//104//
K10divyav_u:12334: 261.026. tasya kāñcanamālā nāma dārikā patnyarthe ānītā/
K10divyav_u:12335: 261.027. yāvadrājā aśokaḥ kuṇālena saha kurkuṭārāmaṃ gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:12338: 261.028. tena rājño 'bhihitam--kimarthaṃ kuṇālaḥ svakarmaṇi na niyujyate?
K10divyav_u:12341: 261.030. tataḥ kuṇālaḥ sthavirasya pādayor nipatya kathayati--sthavira,
K10divyav_u:12347: 262.005. sa ca tathā abhyāsaṃ karoti manasikāraprayuktaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12350: 262.006. tiṣyarakṣitā ca nāṃnā aśokasyāgramahiṣā taṃ pradeśamabhigatā/
K10divyav_u:12351: 262.007. sā taṃ kuṇālamekākinaṃ dṛṣṭvā nayanānurāgeṇa gātreṣu pariṣvajya kathayati--
K10divyav_u:12352: 262.009. dṛṣṭvā tavedaṃ nayanābhirāmaṃ śrīmadvapurnetrayugaṃ ca kāntam/
K10divyav_u:12353: 262.011. daṃdagyate me hṛdayaṃ samantāddāvāgninā prajvalateva kakṣam//106//
K10divyav_u:12354: 262.013. śrutvā kuṇāla ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ karṇau pidhāya kathayati--
K10divyav_u:12355: 262.014. vākyaṃ na yuktaṃ tava vaktumetat sūnoḥ purastājjananī mamāsi/
K10divyav_u:12356: 262.016. adharmarāgaṃ parivarjayasva apāyamārgasya hi eṣa hetuḥ//107//
K10divyav_u:12361: 262.022. mama bhavatu maraṇaṃ mā tu sthitasya dharme viśuddhabhāvasya/
K10divyav_u:12362: 262.023. na tu jīvitena kāryaṃ sajjanadhikkṛtena mama//109//
K10divyav_u:12363: 262.024. svargasya dharmalopo yato bhavati jīvitena kiṃ tena/
K10divyav_u:12375: 263.003. snehācca yogyaṃ manasā ca buddhvā ājñāpayāmāsa vidhāya yātrām//111//
K10divyav_u:12376: 263.005. atha rājā aśoko nagaraśobhāṃ mārgaśobhāṃ ca kṛtvā jīrṇāturakṛpaṇānāthāṃśca mārgādapanīya ekarathe 'bhiruhya kumāreṇa saha pāṭaliputrānnirgataḥ/
K10divyav_u:12377: 263.006. anuvrajitvā nivartamānaḥ kuṇālaṃ kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya nayanaṃ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ prarudannuvāca--
K10divyav_u:12378: 263.008. dhanyāni tasya cakṣūṃṣi cakṣuṣmantaśca te janāḥ/
K10divyav_u:12384: 263.014. śriyā vivṛddhe hi sukhānukūle paśyāmi netre 'dya vinaśyamāne//113//
K10divyav_u:12386: 263.018. puraṃ vipanne nayane tu tasya bhaviṣyati śokaparītacetāḥ//114//
K10divyav_u:12388: 263.020. śrutvā ca takṣaśilāpaurā ardhatrikāṇi yojanāni mārgaśobhāṃ nagaraśobhāṃ ca kṛtvā pūrṇakumbhaiḥ pratyudgatāḥ/
K10divyav_u:12403: śrutvā ca tiṣyarakṣitā cintayati--yadi kuṇālaṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāsyati,
K10divyav_u:12408: 263.032. tatastiṣyarakṣitayā vaidyānāmabhihitam--yadi kaścidīdṛśena<264> vyādhinā spṛṣṭaḥ strī vā puruṣo vā āgacchati,
K10divyav_u:12417: 264.005. jīvitād vyaparopya kukṣiṃ pāṭayitvā paśyati ca tasya pakvāśayasthāne antrāyāṃ kṛmirmahān prādurbhūtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12421: 264.007. yāvat tatra maricān peṣayitvā dattaṃ na ca mriyate/
K10divyav_u:12425: 264.008. etacca prakaraṇaṃ tayā rajñe niveditam--deva pālāṇḍuṃ parimuṅkṣva,
K10divyav_u:12436: 264.012. tena parituṣṭena tiṣyarakṣitā vareṇa pravāritā--kiṃ te varaṃ prayacchāmi?
K10divyav_u:12441: 264.014. tasyā buddhirutpannā--idānīṃ mayā asya kuṇālasya vairaṃ niryātitavyam/
K10divyav_u:12442: 264.015. tayā kapaṭalekho likhitastakṣaśilakānāṃ paurāṇām--kuṇālasya nayanaṃ vināśayitavyamiti/
K10divyav_u:12444: 264.017. rājā hyaśoko balavān pracaṇḍa ājñāpayattakṣaśilājanaṃ hi/
K10divyav_u:12445: 264.019. uddhāryatāṃ locanamasya śatrormauryasya vaṃśasya kalaṅka eṣaḥ//116//
K10divyav_u:12448: 264.021. yāvat tiṣyarakṣitā śayitasya rājñastaṃ lekhaṃ dantamudrayā mudrayiṣyāmīti rājñaḥ sakāśamabhigatā/
K10divyav_u:12455: 264.025. evaṃ dvirapi rājā bhītaḥ pratibuddhaḥ kathayati--devi,
K10divyav_u:12456: svapno me na śobhano dṛṣṭa iti/
K10divyav_u:12460: 264.027. yāvat tiṣyarakṣitayā rājñaḥ śayitasya sa lekho dantamudrayā mudrayitvā takṣaśilāṃ preṣitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12461: 264.028. yāvadrājñā śayitena svapne dṛṣṭaṃ dantā viśīrṇāḥ/
K10divyav_u:12462: 264.029. tato rājā tasyā eva rātreratyaye naimittikānāhūya kathayati--kīdṛśa eṣāṃ svapnānāṃ vipāka iti?
K10divyav_u:12466: 264.031. dantā yasya viśīryante svapnānte prapatanti ca/
K10divyav_u:12467: 264.032. cakṣurbhedaṃ ca putrasya putranāśaṃ ca paśyati//117//
K10divyav_u:12470: 265.003. yā devatā śāsturabhiprasannā dharme ca saṃghe ca gaṇapradhāne/
K10divyav_u:12471: 265.005. ye cāpi loke ṛṣayo variṣṭhā rakṣantu te 'smattanayaṃ kuṇālam//118//
K10divyav_u:12473: 265.007. atha takṣaśilāḥ paurajānapadā lekhadarśanāt kuṇālasya guṇavistaratuṣṭā notsahante tadaptiyaṃ niveditum/
K10divyav_u:12474: 265.008. ciraṃ vicārayitvā rājā duṣṭaśīlaḥ svaputrasya na marṣayati,
K10divyav_u:12481: 265.012. tataḥ kuṇālo vācayitvā kathayati--viśrabdham yathātmaprayojanaṃ kriyatāmiti/
K10divyav_u:12496: 265.022. paśyānityamidaṃ sarvaṃ nāsti kaścid dhruve sthitaḥ//121//
K10divyav_u:12500: 265.027. utpāṭane 'haṃ na bibhemi saumya netradvayasyāsthiratāṃ hi paśye//123//
K10divyav_u:12501: 265.029. utpāṭe vā na vā netre yathā vā manyate nṛpaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12503: 265.031. tataḥ kuṇālastaṃ puruṣamuvāca--tena hi bhoḥ puruṣa,
K10divyav_u:12505: 265.032. yāvat sa puruṣaḥ kuṇālasya nayanamutpāṭayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12509: 266.003. teṣu prāṇiśatasahasreṣu rudatsu kuṇālasyaiva nayanamutpāṭya haste dattam/
K10divyav_u:12511: 266.005. rūpāṇi kasmānna nirīkṣase tvam yathāpurā prākṛta māṃsapiṇḍa/
K10divyav_u:12512: 266.007. te vañcitāste ca vigarhaṇīyā ātmeti ye tvāmabudhāḥ//126//
K10divyav_u:12514: 266.011. evaṃ pravīkṣanti sadāpramattā ye tvāṃ na te duḥkhamanuprayānti//127//
K10divyav_u:12517: 266.015. tataḥ kuṇālo dṛṣṭasatyastaṃ puruṣamuvāca--idānīṃ dvitīyaṃ viśrabdhaṃ nayanamutpāṭya haste datta/
K10divyav_u:12518: 266.016. atha kuṇālo māṃsacakṣuṣyuddhṛte prajñācakṣuṣi ca viśuddhe kathayati--
K10divyav_u:12526: api tu tiṣyarakṣitāyā ayaṃ prayoga iti/
K10divyav_u:12528: 266.025. ciraṃ sukhaṃ caiva sā tiṣyanāṃnī āyurbalaṃ pālayate ca devī/
K10divyav_u:12529: 266.027. saṃpreṣito 'yaṃ hi yayā prayogo yasyānubhāvena kṛtaḥ svakārtham//132//
K10divyav_u:12531: 266.029. śrutvā ca bhartṛtayā kuṇālasamīpamupasaṃkramya parṣadamavagāhya kuṇālamuddhṛtanayanaṃ rudhirāvasiktagātraṃ dṛṣṭvā sūrcchitā bhūmau
K10divyav_u:12534: 267.001. <267>netrāṇi kāntāni manoharāṇi ye māṃ nirīkṣañjanayanti tuṣṭim/
K10divyav_u:12535: 267.003. te me vipannā hyanirīkṣaṇīyāstyajanti me prāṇasamāḥ śarīram//133//
K10divyav_u:12540: 267.007. karmātmakaṃ lokamidaṃ viditvā duḥkhātmakaṃ cāpi janaṃ hi matvā/
K10divyav_u:12541: 267.009. matvā ca lokaṃ priyaviprayogaṃ kartuṃ priye nārhasi bāṣpamokṣam//134//
K10divyav_u:12542: 267.011. tataḥ kuṇālo bhāryayā saha takṣaśilāyā niṣkāsitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12553: 267.016. tataḥ kuṇālo rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye vīṇāṃ vādayitumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12560: 267.020. yadi tava bhavaduḥkhapīḍitā bhavati doṣaviniśritā matiḥ/
K10divyav_u:12561: 267.022. sukhamiha ca yadīcchasi dhruvaṃ tvaritamihāyatanāni saṃtyajasva//136//
K10divyav_u:12564: 267.025. gītaṃ kuṇālena mayi prasaktaṃ vīṇāsvaraṃ caiva śrutiścireṇa/
K10divyav_u:12565: 267.027. abhyāgato 'pīha gṛhaṃ nu kaṃcinna cecchati draṣṭumayaṃ kumāraḥ//137//
K10divyav_u:12567: 267.030. na khalveṣa kiṃ gītasya kuṇālasadṛśo dhvaniḥ/
K10divyav_u:12576: 268.003. andhaka eṣa vanīpakaḥ patnyā saha devasya yānaśālāyamavasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12577: 268.003. śrutvā ca rājā saṃvignaścintayāmāsa--yathā mayā svapnānyaśobhanāni dṛṣṭāni,
K10divyav_u:12580: 268.006. svapnāntare nimittāni yathā dṛṣṭāni me purā/
K10divyav_u:12581: 268.007. niḥsaṃśayaṃ kuṇālasya netre vai nidhanaṃ gate//140//
K10divyav_u:12584: 268.010. na hi me śāmyate cetaḥ sutavyasanacintayā//141//
K10divyav_u:12585: 268.011. yāvat puruṣo yānaśālāṃ gatvā kuṇālamuvāca--kasya tvaṃ putraḥ, kiṃ ca nāma?
K10divyav_u:12588: 268.014. kṛtsneyaṃ pṛthivī yasya vaśe vartani kiṃkara//142//
K10divyav_u:12589: 268.015. tasya rājñastvahaṃ putraḥ kuṇāla iti viśrutaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12591: 268.017. tataḥ kuṇālaḥ patnyā saha rājño 'śokasya samīpamānītaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12592: 268.017. atha rājā aśokah {paśyati} kuṇālamuddhṛtanayanaṃ vātātapaparidagdhagātraṃ rathyācolakasaṃghātapratyavareṇa vāsasā lakṣyālakṣyapracchāditakaupīnam/
K10divyav_u:12593: 268.019. sa tamapratyābhijñāya ākṛtimātrakaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājā kathayati--tvaṃ kuṇāla iti?
K10divyav_u:12598: 268.021. tataḥ kuṇālasya mukhaṃ nirīkṣya netroddhṛtaṃ śokaparītacetāḥ/
K10divyav_u:12599: 268.023. rājā hyaśokaḥ patito dharaṇyāṃ hā putraśokena hi dahyamānaḥ//144//
K10divyav_u:12601: 268.025. atha rājā kathaṃcit saṃjñāmupalabhya kuṇālamutsaṅge sthāpayāmāsa/
K10divyav_u:12603: 268.027. tato muhūrtaṃ nṛpa āśvasitvā kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya rasāśrukaṇṭhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12604: 268.028. muhuḥ kuṇālasya mukhaṃ pramṛjya bahūni rājā vilalāpa tatra//145//
K10divyav_u:12605: 268.030. netre kuṇālapratime vilokya sutaṃ kuṇāleti purā babhāṣe/
K10divyav_u:12606: 269.001. <269>tadasya netre nidhanaṃ gate te putraṃ kuṇāleti kathaṃ ca vakṣye//146//
K10divyav_u:12608: 269.004. kathaya kathaya sādhu putra tāvadvadanamidaṃ tava cārunetram/
K10divyav_u:12610: 269.008. akaruṇahṛdayena tena tāta munisadṛśasya na sādhu sādhubuddheḥ/
K10divyav_u:12612: 269.012. vada suvadana kṣiprametadarthaṃ vrajati śarīramidaṃ purā vināśam/
K10divyav_u:12615: 269.017. rājannatītaṃ khalu naiva śocyaṃ kiṃ na śrutaṃ te munivākyametat/
K10divyav_u:12616: 269.019. yatkarmabhiste 'pi jinā na muktāḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ sudṛḍhaistathaiva//250//
K10divyav_u:12617: 269.021. labdhāḥ phalasthāśca pṛthagjanāśca kṛtāni kāmānyaśubhāni dehinām/
K10divyav_u:12618: 269.023. svayaṃkṛtānāmiha karmāṇāṃ phalaṃ kathaṃ tu vakṣyāmi parairidaṃ kṛtam//151//
K10divyav_u:12621: 269.027. na śastravajrāgniviṣāṇi pannagāḥ kurvanti pīḍāṃ nabhaso 'vikāriṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12622: 269.029. śarīralakṣyeṇa dhṛtena pārthiva patanti duḥkhānyaśivāni dehinām//153//
K10divyav_u:12624: 269.032. kenoddhṛtāni nayanāni sutasya mahyaṃ ko jīvitaṃ sumadhuraṃ tyajituṃ vyavastaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12625: 270.001. <270>śokānalo nipatito hṛdaye pracaṇḍah ācakṣva putra kasya harāmi daṇḍam//154//
K10divyav_u:12626: 270.003. yāvadrājñā aśokena śrutam--tiṣyarakṣitāyā ayaṃ prayoga iti/
K10divyav_u:12628: 270.005. kathaṃ hi dhanye na nimajjase kṣitau cchindāmi śīrṣaṃ paraśuprahāraiḥ/
K10divyav_u:12631: 270.010. utpāṭya netre paripātayāmi gātraṃ kimasyā nakharaiḥ sutīkṣṇaiḥ/
K10divyav_u:12632: 270.012. jīvantiśūlāmatha kārayāmi cchindāmi nāsāṃ krakacena vāsyāḥ//156//
K10divyav_u:12633: 270.014. kṣureṇa jihvāmatha kartayāmi viṣeṇa pūrṇāmatha ghātayiṣye/
K10divyav_u:12636: 270.020. anāryakarmā yadi tiṣyarakṣitā tvamāryakarmā bhava mā vadha striyam//158//
K10divyav_u:12637: 270.022. phalaṃ hi maitryā sadṛśaṃ na vidyate prabhostitakṣā sugatena varṇitā/
K10divyav_u:12638: 270.024. punaḥ praṇasya pitaraṃ kumāraḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ sūnṛtavāgjagāda//159//
K10divyav_u:12639: 270.026. rājanna me duḥkhamalo 'sti kaścittīvrāpalāre 'pi na manyutāpaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12640: 270.028. manaḥ prasannam yadi me jananyām yenoddhṛte me nayane svayaṃ hi/
K10divyav_u:12641: 270.030. tattena satyena mamāstu tāvannetradvayaṃ prāktanameva sadyaḥ//160//
K10divyav_u:12643: 270.032. yāvadrājñā aśokena tiṣyarakṣitā amarṣitena jatugṛhaṃ praveśayitvā dagdhā,
K10divyav_u:12645: 271.001. <271>bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaśayacchettāramāyuṣmantaṃ sthaviropaguptaṃ pṛcchanti--kiṃ kuṇālena karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena
K10divyav_u:12659: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi narakeṣu duḥkhamanubhūya tataḥ karmāvaśeṣeṇa pañca janmaśatāni tasya nayanānyutpāṭitāni//
K10divyav_u:12660: 271.011. kiṃ karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākenocce kule upapannaḥ,
K10divyav_u:12663: 271.013. tena hyāyucmantaḥ śrūyatām--bhūtapūrvamatīte 'dhvani catvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ krakucchando nāma samyaksambuddho loka udapādi/
K10divyav_u:12664: 271.014. yadā krakucchandaḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ,
K10divyav_u:12665: tasya aśokena rājñā catūratnamayaṃ stūpaṃ kāritam/
K10divyav_u:12670: 271.017. atra janakāyo gatvā viśīrṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā śocitumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12675: 271.020. tatastena ca tatra krakucchandasya samyaksambuddhasya kāyapramāṇikā pratimā babhūva viśīrṇā,
K10divyav_u:12685: tena karmaṇo vipākena kuṇākaḥ prāsādikaḥ samṛttaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12687: tasya karmaṇo vipākena kuṇālena śākyamuniḥ samyaksambuddhastādṛśa eva śāstā samārāgito na virāgitaḥ,
K10divyav_u:12692: 272.002. yadā rājñā aśokena bhagavacchāsane śraddhā pratilabdhā,
K10divyav_u:12693: tena caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ pañcavārṣikaṃ ca kṛtam/
K10divyav_u:12694: 272.003. trīṇi śatasahastāṇi bhikṣūṇāṃ bhojitāni yatraiko 'rhatāṃ dvau śaikṣāṇāṃ pṛthagjanakalyāṇakānāṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:12703: 272.008. atha rājā aśoko 'pareṇa samayena mṛgavadhāya nirgataḥ/
K10divyav_u:12706: 272.010. tenābhigamya pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā sa ṛṣiḥ pṛṣṭah--bhagavan,
K10divyav_u:12719: 272.015. vītaśoka uvāca--asya kaṣṭena tapasā rāgo 'dyāpi na bādhyate,
K10divyav_u:12721: 272.016. kuta eṣāṃ rāgaprahāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati? āha ca--
K10divyav_u:12722: 272.017. kaṣṭe 'smin vijane vane nivasatāṃ vāyvambumūlāśināṃ rāgo naiva jito yadīha ṛṣiṇā kālaprakarṣeṇa hi/
K10divyav_u:12723: 272.019. bhuktavānnaṃ sadhṛtaṃ prabhūtapiśitaṃ dadhyuttamālaṃkṛtaṃ śākyeṣvindriyanigraho yadi bhavedvindhyaḥ plavetsāgare//1//
K10divyav_u:12724: 272.021. sarvathā vañjito rājā aśoko yacchramaṇeṣu śākyaputrīyeṣu kārāṃ karoti/
K10divyav_u:12725: 272.021. etacca vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā upāyajño 'mātyānuvāca--ayaṃ vītaśokastīrthyābhiprasannaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12729: rājā āha--yadā ahaṃ rājā alaṃkāraṃ mauliṃ paṭṭaṃ cāpanayitvā snānaśālāṃ praviṣṭo bhavāmi,
K10divyav_u:12730: tadā yūyaṃ vītaśokasyopāyena mauliṃ paṭṭaṃ ca baddhvā siṃhāsane niṣādayiṣyatha/
K10divyav_u:12732: 272.025. yāvadrājā rājālaṃkāraṃ mauliṃ paṭṭaṃ cāpanayitvā snānaśālāyāṃ praviṣṭaḥ,
K10divyav_u:12734: 272.027. imaṃ tāvadrājālaṃkāraṃ pravaramauliṃ paṭṭaṃ ca baddhvā siṃhāsane niṣīdayiṣyāmah--kiṃ śobhase na veti/
K10divyav_u:12735: 272.028. taistadābharaṇamauliṃ paṭṭaṃ ca baddhvā siṃhāsane niṣādito rājñaśca niveditam/
K10divyav_u:12736: 272.029. tato rājā aśoko vītaśokaṃ rājālaṃkāraṃ maulipaṭṭabaddhaṃ ca siṃhāsanopaviṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati--adhyāpyahaṃ jīvāmi/
K10divyav_u:12739: tato yāvadvadhyaghātakā nīlāmbaravasanāḥ pralambakeśā ghaṇṭāśabdapāṇayo rājñaḥ pādayor nipatyovāca--deva,
K10divyav_u:12748: 273.003. mama bhrātuḥ snehādasya saptāhaṃ rājyaṃ prayacchāmi/
K10divyav_u:12754: 273.005. divase gate vītaśokasyāgrataḥ sthitvā ārocayanti--nirgataṃ vītaśoka ekaṃ divasam/
K10divyav_u:12757: 273.006. vistareṇa yāvatsaptāhadivase vītaśoko rājālaṃkāravibhūṣito rājño 'śokasya samīpamupanītaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12760: vītaśoka uvāca--na me dṛṣṭaṃ vā syācchrutaṃ veti/
K10divyav_u:12762: 273.010. yena śrutaṃ bhavedgītaṃ nṛtyaṃ cāpi nirīkṣitam/
K10divyav_u:12765: idaṃ mayā rājyaṃ saptāhaṃ tava dattam,
K10divyav_u:12770: 273.013. kathaṃ tvaṃ kathayasi--naiva me dṛṣṭaṃ na śrutamiti?
K10divyav_u:12772: 273.015. na me dṛṣṭaṃ nṛtyaṃ na ca nṛpa śruto gītaninado na me gandhā ghrātā na khalu rasā me 'dya viditāḥ/
K10divyav_u:12773: 273.017. na me spṛṣṭaḥ sparśaḥ kanakamaṇihārāṅgajanitaḥ samūho nārīṇāṃ maraṇaparibaddhena manasā//3//
K10divyav_u:12774: 273.019. striyo nṛttaṃ gītaṃ bhavaśayanānyāsanavidhirvayo rūpaṃ lakṣmīrbahuvividharatnā ca vasudhā/
K10divyav_u:12775: 273.021. nirānandā śūnyā mama nṛpa varaśayyā gatasukhā sthitān dṛṣṭvā dvāre vadhakapuruṣānnīlavasanān//4//
K10divyav_u:12779: 273.026. nādrākṣaṃ nṛpate nṛttaṃ na ca bhoktuṃ manaḥspṛhā//6//
K10divyav_u:12783: mā tāvat tavaikajanmikasya maraṇabhayāttava rājaśriyaṃ prāpya harṣo notpannaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12784: 273.030. kiṃ punarbhikṣavo janmaśatamaraṇabhayabhītāḥ sarvāṇyupapattyāyatanāni duḥkhānyanusṛtāni paśyanti/
K10divyav_u:12796: 274.004. mā tāvadekajanmikasya maraṇabhayāttava na jāyate harṣaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12800: 274.008. teṣāṃ tu vastraśayanāsanabhojanādi mokṣo 'bhiyuktamanasāṃ janayeta saṅgam/
K10divyav_u:12802: 274.012. kathaṃ ca teṣāṃ na bhavedvimokṣo mokṣārthināṃ janmaparānmukhānām/
K10divyav_u:12806: eṣo 'haṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ceti/
K10divyav_u:12809: 274.020. budhavibudhamanujamahitaṃ jinaṃ virāgaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca//12//iti/
K10divyav_u:12810: 274.021. atha rājā aśoko vītaśokaṃ kaṇṭhe pariṣvajyovāca--na tvaṃ mayā parityaktaḥ,
K10divyav_u:12811: api tu buddhaśāsanābhiprasādārthaṃ tava mayā eṣa upāyaḥ pradarśitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12823: 274.027. tata utthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ sthavitamuvāca--labheyāhaṃ svakhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
K10divyav_u:12827: 274.029. tato vītaśoko yena rājā aśokastenopasaṃkramya kṛtāñjaliruvāca--deva,
K10divyav_u:12829: 274.030. pravrajiṣyāmi svākhyāte dharmavinaye samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikām/
K10divyav_u:12831: 275.001. <275>udbhrānto 'smi niraṅkuśo rājā iva vyāvartito vibhramāt tvadbuddhiprabhavāṅkuśena vidhivadbuddhopadeśairaham/
K10divyav_u:12832: 275.001. ekaṃ tvamarhasi me varaṃ pradarśituṃ tvaṃ pārthivānāṃ pate lokālokavarasya śāsanavare liṅgaṃ śibhaṃ dhārayet//13//
K10divyav_u:12833: 275.005. śrutvā ca rājā sāśrukaṇṭho vītaśokaṃ kaṇṭhe pariṣvajyovāca--vītaśoka,
K10divyav_u:12839: vyābādhe khalvapi bhaiṣajyamasulabhaṃ pūtimūtraṃ ca bhojanam/
K10divyav_u:12843: 275.010. naiva hi jāne taṃ nūnaṃ viṣayatṛṣito 'nāyāsavihataḥ pravrajyāṃ prāptukāmo na ripuhṛtabalo naivārthakṛpaṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12844: 275.012. duḥkhārtaṃ mṛtyuneṣṭaṃ vyasanaparigataṃ dṛṣṭvā jagadidaṃ panthānaṃ janmabhīruḥ śivamabhayamahaṃ gantuṃ vyavasitaḥ//14//
K10divyav_u:12845: 275.014. śrutvā ca rājā aśokaḥ satvaraṃ praruditumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12847: 275.016. saṃsāradolāmabhiruhya lolam yadā nipāto niyataḥ prajānām/
K10divyav_u:12848: 275.018. kimarthamāgacchati vikriyā te sarveṇa sarvasya yadā viyogaḥ//15//
K10divyav_u:12863: 275.026. athāyuṣmato vītaśokasyārhattvaṃ prāptasya vimuktiprītisukhasaṃvedina etadabhavat--asti khalu me--pūrvaṃ rājño 'śokasya gṛhadvāramanuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12865: rājño 'śokasya nivedaya--vītaśoko dvāri tiṣṭhati devaṃ draṣṭukāma iti/
K10divyav_u:12872: 275.031. dṛṣṭvā ca rajā aśokaḥ saṃhāsanādutthāya mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ sarvaśarīreṇāyuṣmantaṃ vītaśokaṃ nirīkṣamānaḥ prarudannuvāca--
K10divyav_u:12873: 276.001. <276>bhūteṣu saṃsargagateṣu nityaṃ dṛṣṭvāpi māṃ naiti yathā vikāram/
K10divyav_u:12876: 276.005. sa paśyati--āyuṣmato vītaśokasya pāṃśukūlaṃ ca cīvaraṃ mṛṇmayaṃ pātram yāvadannaṃ bhaikṣyaṃ lūhapraṇītam/
K10divyav_u:12877: 276.006. dṛṣṭvā ca rājñaḥ pādayor nipatya kṛtāñjaliruvāca--deva,
K10divyav_u:12884: 276.011. nirāśravam yasya mano viśālaṃ nirāmayaṃ copacitaṃ śarīram/
K10divyav_u:12885: 276.013. svacchandato jīvitasādhanaṃ ca nityotsavaṃ tasya manuṣyaloke//18//
K10divyav_u:12889: 276.018. atyuddhṛtamiva manye yaśasā pūtaṃ puramiva mahaṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:12891: 276.020. atha rājā aśokaḥ sarvāṅgena parigṛhya prajñapta evāsane niṣādayāmāsa,
K10divyav_u:12893: 276.021. bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātramāyuṣmato vītaśokasya purato niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya/
K10divyav_u:12894: 276.022. athāyuṣmān vītaśoko rājānamaśokaṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayannuvāca--
K10divyav_u:12896: 276.025. durlabhā trīṇi ratnāni nityaṃ pūjaya pārthiva//21//
K10divyav_u:12898: 276.027. atha rājā aśokaḥ kṛtakarapuṭaḥ pañcabhiramātyaśataiḥ parivṛto 'nekaiśca paurajanapadasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛta āyuṣmantaṃ vītaśokamanuvrajitumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12902: 277.001. <277>tata āyuṣmān vītaśokaḥ svaguṇānudbhāvayan paśyataḥ sarvajanakāyasya ṛddhyā vaihāyasamutpatya prakrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12903: 277.002. atha rājā aśokaḥ kṛtakarapuṭaḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto gaganatalāvasaktadṛṣṭirāyuṣmantaṃ vītaśokaṃ nirīkṣamāṇa uvāca--
K10divyav_u:12909: 277.009. ṛddhyā khalvavabhartsatāḥ paramayā śrīgarvitāste vayaṃ buddhyā khalvapi nāmitāḥ śirasitāḥ prajñābhimānodayam/
K10divyav_u:12910: 277.011. prāptārthena phalāndhabuddhimanasaḥ saṃvejitāste vayaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa sabāṣpadurdinamukhāḥ sthāne vimuktā vayam//25//
K10divyav_u:12911: 277.013. tatrāyuṣmān vītaśokaḥ pratyantimeṣu janapadeṣu śayyāsanāya nirgataḥ/
K10divyav_u:12913: 277.014. śrutvā ca rājñā aśokena bhaiṣajyamupasthāyikāśca visarjitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:12914: 277.014. tasya tena vyādhinā spṛṣṭasya śiraḥ khustamabhavat/
K10divyav_u:12920: 277.017. tasmiṃśca samaye puṇḍravardhananagare nirgranthopāsakena buddhapratimā nirgranthasya pādayor nipātitā citrārpitā/
K10divyav_u:12926: 277.020. dṛṣṭvā ca rājñā ruṣitenābhihitam--puṇḍravardhane sarve ājīvikāḥ praghātayitavyāḥ/
K10divyav_u:12928: 277.021. tataḥ pāṭaliputre bhūyo 'nyena nirgranthopāsakena buddhapratimā nirgranthasya pādayor nipātitā citrārpitā/
K10divyav_u:12929: 277.022. śrutvā ca rājñā amarṣitena sa nirgranthopāsakaḥ sabandhuvargo gṛhaṃ praveśāyitvā agninā dagdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12930: 277.023. ājñaptaṃ ca--yo me nirgranthasya śiro dāsyati,
K10divyav_u:12933: 277.024. sa cāyuṣmān vītaśoka ābhīrasya gṛhe rātriṃ vāsamupagataḥ/
K10divyav_u:12934: 277.025. tasya ca vyādhinā kliṣṭasya lūhāni cīvarāṇi,
K10divyav_u:12940: 277.028. tataḥ sa ābhīro 'siṃ niṣkoṣaṃ kṛtvā āyuṣmantaṃ vītaśokamabhigataḥ/
K10divyav_u:12941: 277.029. āyuṣmatā ca vītaśokena pūrvānte jñānaṃ kṣiptam/
K10divyav_u:12946: 277.031. dṛṣṭvā ca rājñā aśokena parijñātam--viralāni cāsya śirasi romāṇi na vyaktimupagacchanti/
K10divyav_u:12955: 278.003. yāvadrājñā abhayapradānaṃ dattam--na bhūyaḥ kaścit praghātayitavyaḥ//
K10divyav_u:12956: 278.004. tato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāramāyuṣmantamupaguptaṃ pṛcchanti--kiṃ karma kṛtamāyuṣmatā vītaśokena yasya karmaṇo vipākena śastreṇa praghātitah?
K10divyav_u:12957: sthavira uvāca--tena hyāyuṣmantaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāni pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu/
K10divyav_u:12959: 278.007. bhutapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani anyatamo lubdho mṛgān praghātayitvā jīvikāṃ kalpayati/
K10divyav_u:12961: 278.008. sa tatra lubdho gatvā pāśān yantrāṃśca sthāpayitvā mṛgān praghātayati/
K10divyav_u:12964: 278.009. anyataraḥ pratyekabuddhastasminnudapāne āhārakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā udapānāduttīrya vṛkṣamūle paryaṅkena niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12966: 278.011. sa lubdha āgatya paśyati--neiva mṛgā udapānamabhyāgatāḥ/
K10divyav_u:12969: 278.013. tenāsiṃ niṣkoṣaṃ kṛtvā sa pratyekabuddhaḥ praghātitaḥ//
K10divyav_u:12975: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi narakeṣu duḥkhamanubhūya pañca janmaśatāni manuṣyeṣūpapannaḥ śastreṇa praghātitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:12980: 278.019. tena dāyakadānapatayaḥ saṃghabhaktaṃ kārāpitāstarpaṇāni yavāgūpānāni nimantraṇakāni/
K10divyav_u:12990: 279.002. yadā rājñā aśokena ardhāmalakadānena bhagavacchāsane śraddhā pratilabdhā,
K10divyav_u:12991: sa bhikṣūnuvāca--kena bhagavacchāsane prabhūtaṃ dānaṃ dattam?
K10divyav_u:12994: bhikṣava ūcuh--koṭiśataṃ tena bhagavacchāsane dānaṃ dattam/
K10divyav_u:12995: 279.005. śrutvā ca rājā aśokaścintayati--tena gṛhapatinā bhūtvā koṭiśataṃ bhagavachāsane dānaṃ dattam/
K10divyav_u:13005: trīṇi śatasahasrāṇi bhikṣūṇāṃ bhojitāni yatrekarmahatāṃ dvau śaikṣāṇāṃ pṛthagjanakalyāṇakānāṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:13006: 279.010. kośaṃ sthāpayitvā mahāpṛthivīmantaḥpurāmātyagaṇamātmānaṃ kuṇālaṃ ca āryasaṃghe niryātayitvā catvāri śatasahasrāṇi dattvā niṣkrītavān/
K10divyav_u:13009: 279.012. atha rājā idānīṃ na bhaviṣyāmīti viklavībhūtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13010: 279.013. tasya rādhagupto nāmāmātyo yena saha pāṃśudānaṃ dattam/
K10divyav_u:13011: 279.014. tadā sa rājānamaśokaṃ viklavībhūtamavekṣya pādayor nipatya kṛtāñjaliruvāca--
K10divyav_u:13013: 279.017. padmānanaśrīśatasamprapītaṃ kasmāt sabāṣpaṃ tava deva vaktram//1//
K10divyav_u:13015: nāhaṃ dravyavināśaṃ na rājyanāśanaṃ na cāśrayaviyogaṃ śocāmi,
K10divyav_u:13017: 279.021. nāhaṃ punaḥ sarvaguṇopapannaṃ saṃghaṃ samakṣaṃ naradevapūjitam/
K10divyav_u:13020: ayaṃ me manoratho babhūva--koṭiśataṃ bhagavacchāsane dānaṃ dāsyāmīti,
K10divyav_u:13022: 279.026. tato rājñā aśokena catvāraḥ koṭyaḥ paripūrayiṣyāmīti hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ kurkuṭārāmaṃ praṣayitumārabdhaḥ//
K10divyav_u:13023: 279.028. tasmiṃśca samaye kuṇālasya saṃpadir nāma putro yuvarājye pravartate/
K10divyav_u:13041: 280.004. atha rājā aśokaḥ saṃvigno 'mātyān paurāṃśca saṃnipātya kathayati--kaḥ sāmprataṃ pṛthivyāmīśvarah?
K10divyav_u:13045: 280.008. dākṣiṇyādanṛtaṃ hi kiṃ kathayata bhraṣṭādhirājyā vayaṃ śeṣaṃ tvāmalakārdhamityavasitam yatra prabhutvaṃ mama/
K10divyav_u:13046: 280.010. eśvaryaṃ dhignāryamuddhatanadītoyapraveśopamaṃ martyendrasya mamāpi yatpratibhayaṃ dāridryamabhyāgatam//3//
K10divyav_u:13048: saṃpattayo hi sarvā vipattinidhanā iti pratijñātam yadavitathavādinā gautamena,
K10divyav_u:13050: 280.014. pratiśiṣyate 'smanne cirādājñā mama yāvatī yathā manasā/
K10divyav_u:13053: 280.018. bhraṣṭasvāyatano na bhāti kṛpaṇaḥ saṃpratyaśoko nṛpah chinnāmlānaviśīrṇapatrakusumaḥ śuṣyatyaśoko yathā//5//
K10divyav_u:13054: 280.020. tato rājā aśokaḥ samīpo gataṃ puruṣamāhūyovāca--bhadramukha,
K10divyav_u:13055: pūrvaguṇānurāgādbhraṣṭaiśvaryasyāpi mama imaṃ tāvadapaścimaṃ vyāpāraṃ kuru/
K10divyav_u:13056: 280.021. idaṃ mamārdhāmalakaṃ grahāya kurkuṭārāmaṃ gatvā saṃghe niryātaya/
K10divyav_u:13057: 280.022. madvacanācca saṃghasya pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā vaktavyam--jambudvīpaiśvaryasya rājña eṣa sāmprataṃ vibhava iti/
K10divyav_u:13058: 280.023. idaṃ tāvadapaścimaṃ dānaṃ tathā paribhoktavyam yathā me saṃghagatā dakṣiṇā vistīrṇā syāditi/
K10divyav_u:13060: 280.025. idaṃ pradānaṃ caramaṃ mamādya rājyaṃ ca taṃ caiva gataṃ svabhāvam/
K10divyav_u:13062: 280.029. tatathā bhujyatām yena pradānaṃ mama paścimam/
K10divyav_u:13063: 280.030. yathā saṃghagatā me 'dya vistīrṇā dakṣiṇā bhavet//7//
K10divyav_u:13064: 280.031. evaṃ deveti s puruṣo rājño 'śokasya pratiśrutya tadardhāmalakaṃ kurukuṭārāmaṃ gatvā vṛddhānte sthitvā kṛtāñjalistadardhāmalakaṃ saṃghe
K10divyav_u:13065: 281.001. <281>ekacchatrasamucchrayāṃ vasumatīmājñāpayan yaḥ purā lokaṃ tāpayati sma madhyadivasaprāpto divā bhāskaraḥ/
K10divyav_u:13066: 281.003. bhāgyacchidramavekṣya so 'dya nṛpatiḥ svaiḥ karmābhirvañcitaḥ saṃprāpte divasakṣaye raviriva bhraṣṭaprabhāvaḥ sthitaḥ//8//
K10divyav_u:13067: 281.005. bhaktyavanatena śirasā praṇamya saṃghāya tena khalu dattamidamāmalakasyārdhaṃ lakṣmīcāpalyacihnitam/
K10divyav_u:13070: 281.007. kutah? evaṃ hyuktaṃ bhagavatā--paravipattiḥ saṃvejanīyaṃ sthānamiti/
K10divyav_u:13074: 281.011. mṛtyaiḥ sa bhūmipatiradya hṛtādhikāro dānaṃ prayacchati kilāmalakārdhametat/
K10divyav_u:13076: 281.015. yāvattadardhāmalakaṃ cūrṇayitvā yūṣe prakṣipya saṃghe cāritam/
K10divyav_u:13079: atha rādhagupto 'śokasya pādayor nipatya kṛtāñjaliruvāca--devaḥ pṛthivyāmīśvaraḥ/
K10divyav_u:13080: 281.017. atha rājā aśokaḥ kathaṃcidutthāya caturdiśamavalokya saṃghāya añjaliṃ kṛtvovāca--eṣa
K10divyav_u:13081: idānīṃ mahatkośaṃ sthāpayitvā imāṃ samudraparyantāṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ bhagavacchrāvakasaṃghe niryātayāmi /
K10divyav_u:13084: 281.022. dadāmyahaṃ bhūtadharāṃ samandarāṃ saṃghāya tasminnupabhujyate phalam//11//
K10divyav_u:13086: 281.025. dānenāhamanena nendrabhavanaṃ na brahmaloke phalaṃ kāṅkṣāmi drutavārivegacapalaṃ prāgeva rājaśriyam/
K10divyav_u:13087: 281.027. dānasyāsya phalaṃ tu bhaktimahato yanme 'sti tenāpnuyāṃ cittaiśvaryamahāryamāryamahitaṃ nāyāti yadvikriyām//12//
K10divyav_u:13089: 281.029. tato rājā mahāpṛthivīṃ saṃghe datvā kālagataḥ/
K10divyav_u:13090: 281.030. yāvadamātyair nīlapītābhiḥ śibikābhir nirhāritvā śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā rājānaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāma iti,
K10divyav_u:13094: rādhagupta uvāca--eṣa rājño 'śokasya manorathe babhūva--koṭiśataṃ bhagavacchāsena dānaṃ dāsyāmīti/
K10divyav_u:13097: 282.003. yāvadamātyaiścatasraḥ koṭyo bhagavacchāsane dattvā pṛthivīṃ niṣkrīya saṃpadī rājye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13102: 282.005. so 'mātyānāmantrayate--ka uapāyaḥ syādyadasmākaṃ nāma ciraṃ tiṣṭhet?
K10divyav_u:13103: nairabhihitam--devasya ca vaṃśādaśoko nāṃnā rājā babhūveti/
K10divyav_u:13113: 282.010. yāvadrājā puṣyamitraścaturaṅgabalakāyaṃ saṃnāhayitvā bhagavacchāsanaṃ vināśayiṣyāmīti kukkuṭārāmaṃ nirgataḥ/
K10divyav_u:13120: 282.014. yāvatpuṣyamitro yāvat saṃghārāmaṃ bhikṣūṃśca praghātayan prasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13135: 282.020. yāvatsā duhitā tena kṛmiśasya dattā bhagavacchāsanaparitrāṇāryaṃ parigrahaparipālanārthaṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:13136: 282.021. puṣyamitrasya rājñaḥ pṛṣṭhato yakṣo mahān pramāṇe yūyam(?)/
K10divyav_u:13140: 282.023. kṛmiśena ca yakṣeṇa mahāntaṃ parvatamānayitvā puṣyamitro rājā sabalavāhano 'vaṣṭabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13142: 282.024. yadā puṣyamitro rājā praghātitastadā mauryavaṃśaḥ samucchinnaḥ//
K10divyav_u:13146: 283.002. punarapi mahārāja yanmayā anuttarasamyaksambodhiprāptaye dānāni dattāni,
K10divyav_u:13153: 283.005. tatrottarapāñcālo mahādhano nāṃnā dastināpure rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca
K10divyav_u:13154: sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca śāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍmarataskaradurbhikṣarogāpagataṃ
K10divyav_u:13157: 283.007. tasmiṃśca nagare mahāhrada utpalakumudapuṇḍrīkasampanno haṃsakāraṇḍavacakravākopaśobhito ramaṇīyaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13158: 283.008. tatra ca hrade janmacitrako nāṃ nāgapotaḥ prativasati/
K10divyav_u:13164: 283.011. dakṣiṇapāñcālastu rājā adharmabhūyiṣṭhaścaṇḍo rabhasaḥ karkaśo 'dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati,
K10divyav_u:13166: 283.013. adharmabhūyiṣṭhatayā cāsya devo na kālena kālaṃ samyagvāridhāramutsṛjati/
K10divyav_u:13167: 283.014. tato 'sau mahājanakāyaḥ saṃtrastaḥ svatrastaḥ svajīvitāpekṣayā rāṣṭraparityāgaṃ kṛtvā uttarapāñcālasyaiva rājño viṣayaṃ gatvā prativasati/
K10divyav_u:13168: 283.015. yāvadapareṇa samayena dakṣiṇapāñcālo rājā mṛgayāvyapadeśena janapadān vyavalokanāya nirgataḥ/
K10divyav_u:13171: 283.017. sa janakāyaḥ kva gata iti kathayati/
K10divyav_u:13180: 283.020. tasya janapadā ṛddhāśca sphītāśca kṣemāśca subhikṣāśca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāśca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamarataskaradurbhikṣarogāpagatāḥ
K10divyav_u:13184: 283.023. yato 'sau janakāyaḥ saṃtrastaḥ saṃvegamāpanna uttarapāñcālasya rājño viṣayaṃ gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:13186: ko 'sāvupāyaḥ syādenāsau janakāyaḥ punarāgatya eṣu grāmanagareṣu prativaset?
K10divyav_u:13187: amātyā āhuh--yadi deva uttarapāñcālavaddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayasi,
K10divyav_u:13189: nacirādasau janakāyaḥ punarāgatya eṣu grāmanagareṣu prativaset/
K10divyav_u:13195: yathā asau janakāyaḥ punarāgatya eṣu grāmanagareṣu prativasatīti/
K10divyav_u:13204: 284.003. rājā āha--ko 'sau upāyaḥ syādyenāsau nāgapota ihānīyeta?
K10divyav_u:13209: 284.004. tato rājñā suvarṇapiṭakaṃ dhvajāgre baddhvā svavijite ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--ya uttarapāñcālarājaviṣayājjanmacitrakaṃ nāma nāgapotakamānayati,
K10divyav_u:13219: 284.010. tato 'sau ahituṇḍikaḥ pratyayitasya puruṣasya haste suvarṇapiṭakaṃ sthāpayitvā hastināpuraṃ gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:13221: 284.012. nimittīkṛtah--asau jñmacitro nāgapotaka etasmin pradeśe tiṣṭhatīti/
K10divyav_u:13229: 284.016. tasya hradasya nātidūre dvau lubdhakau prativasataḥ,
K10divyav_u:13237: 284.019. janmacitro nāgapotaḥ saṃlakṣayati--ko 'nyo 'sti mama śaraṇamṛte halakāt lubdhakāt?
K10divyav_u:13238: tato manuṣyaveṣamāsthāya halakasya lubdhakasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:13240: kiṃ tvaṃ jānīṣe kasyānubhāvāddhanasya rājño janapadā ṛddhāśca sphītāśca subhikṣākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāśca
K10divyav_u:13242: sa kathayati--jāne sa rājā dhārmiko dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati,
K10divyav_u:13244: 284.025. asmin pradeśe janmacitrako nāma nāgapitakaḥ prativasati/
K10divyav_u:13256: 284.030. jānīṣe tvaṃ kataro 'sau nāgapotaka iti? na jāne/
K10divyav_u:13261: 285.001. <285>āgatya asya hradasya catasṛṣu dikṣu khadiraśalākānnikhanya nānāraṅgaiḥ sūtrairveṣṭayitvā mantrānāvartayiṣyati/
K10divyav_u:13264: tadā hradamadhyāt kvathamānaṃ pānīyamutthāsyati ahaṃ cotthāsyāmi/
K10divyav_u:13265: 285.003. tadā tvayāsau ahituṇḍikaḥ śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍayitavyaḥ,
K10divyav_u:13267: 285.004. mā te utkṛttamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyāṃ nipātayiṣyāmīti/
K10divyav_u:13275: 285.008. yāvadasau lubdhakaḥ saptame divase pratigupte pradeśe ātmānaṃ gopayitvā avasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13277: 285.010. tena catasṛṣu dikṣu catvāraḥ khadirakīlakā nikhātāḥ/
K10divyav_u:13282: 285.013. mā te utkṛttamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyāṃ nipātayāmīti/
K10divyav_u:13285: 285.015. tato nāgo mantrapāśavinirmukto hradādabhyudgamya lubdhakaṃ pariṣvaktavān,
K10divyav_u:13295: 285.019. asyānubhāvādyuṣmābhiḥ saha viyogo na jāta iti/
K10divyav_u:13296: 285.019. tābhyāmasau vareṇa pravārito vividhāni ca ratnāni dattāni/
K10divyav_u:13298: 285.020. tasya ca hradasya nātidūre puṣpaphalasalilasampanne nānāśakunikūjite ṛṣeragramāśramapadam/
K10divyav_u:13299: 285.021. tatra ca nāgapotakena sārdhaṃ vṛttakaṃ tatsarvaṃ vistareṇa samākhyātam/
K10divyav_u:13300: 285.022. tata ṛṣiḥ kathayati--kiṃ ratnaiḥ kiṃ vā te suvarṇena?
K10divyav_u:13303: 285.023. tato lubdhako 'moghapāśe saṃjātatṛṣṇah ṛṣivacanamupaśrutya punarapi nāgabhavanaṃ gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:13305: 285.025. tasyaitadabhavat--eṣa sa pāśo yo mayā prārthanīyaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13307: 285.025. tato janmacitreṇa nāgapotakena anyaiśca nāgaiḥ sasambhramaiḥ pratisaṃmodito ratnaiśca pravāritaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13313: 285.028. lubdhaka āha--yuṣmākameṣa kadācit karhicit garutmatopadrutānāmupayogaṃ gacchati/
K10divyav_u:13319: 285.031. ten mātāpitarau avalokya sa pāśo dattaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13320: 285.032. tato 'sau lubdhakaḥ pṛthivīlabdhaprakhyena sukhasaumanasyenāpyāyitamanā amoghapāśamādāya nāgabhavanādabhyudgamya svagṛhaṃ gataḥ//
K10divyav_u:13321: 286.001. <286>yāvadapareṇa samayena dhano rājā devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
K10divyav_u:13322: 286.001. tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato na putro na duhitā/
K10divyav_u:13323: 286.002. sa kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitah--anekadhanasamuditaṃ me gṛham/
K10divyav_u:13325: 286.003. mamātyayātsvakulavaṃśacchede rāṣṭrāpahāraḥ sarvasantasvāpateyamaputramiti kṛtvā anyarājavidheyo bhaviṣyatīti/
K10divyav_u:13333: 286.008. sahajāḥ sahadharmikā nityāvubaddhā api devatā āyācate/
K10divyav_u:13334: 286.009. asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraśceti/
K10divyav_u:13339: 286.010. api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvātputrā jāyante duhitaraśca/
K10divyav_u:13342: 286.012. mātā cāsya kalyā bhavati ṛtumatī ca/
K10divyav_u:13344: 286.013. eṣā trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvātputrā jāyante duhitaraśca/
K10divyav_u:13359: 286.018. sā āttamanāḥ svāminn ārocayati--diṣṭyā vardhasva āryaputra/
K10divyav_u:13361: 286.019. yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati,
K10divyav_u:13363: 286.020. so 'pyāttamanāttamanāḥ pūrvaṃ kāyamunnamayya dakṣiṇaṃ bāhumabhiprasārya udānamudānayati--apyevāhaṃ cirakālābhilaṣitaṃ putramukhaṃ paśyeyam/
K10divyav_u:13369: 286.023. asmākaṃ cāpyatītakālagatānāmalpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā asmākaṃ nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādekṣyati--idaṃ tayoryatratatropapannayorgacchatoranugacchatu
K10divyav_u:13372: 286.027. na cāsyāḥ kiṃcidamanojñaśabdaśravaṇam yāvadeva garbhasya paripākāya/
K10divyav_u:13373: 286.028. sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayātprasūtā/
K10divyav_u:13374: 286.029. dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇalalāṭa uccaghoṇaḥ saṃgatabhrūstuṅganāsaḥ
K10divyav_u:13384: 287.003. tasyaivaṃ trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātakarma karoti/
K10divyav_u:13385: 287.004. tasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitumārabdham--kiṃ bhavatu dāraksya nāmeti?
K10divyav_u:13386: amātyāḥ kathayanti--ayaṃ dārako dhanasya rājñaḥ putraḥ,
K10divyav_u:13389: 287.006. sudhano dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nudatto dvābhyāmaṃsadhātrībhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ
K10divyav_u:13390: 287.007. so 'ṣṭābhirdhātrībhirunnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navatītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍairvā anyaiścottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
K10divyav_u:13392: 287.010. sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttastadā lipyāmupanyastaḥ saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāmuddhāre
K10divyav_u:13393: nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ kumāraparīkṣāyāṃ kumārikāparīkṣāyāṃ dāruparīkṣāyāṃ
K10divyav_u:13395: 287.012. so 'ṣṭāsu parīkṣāsu ghaṭako vācakaḥ paṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13396: 287.012. sa yāni tāni bhavanti rājñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktānāṃ janapadaiśvaryamanuprāptānāṃ
K10divyav_u:13398: tasyathā--hastigrīvāyāmaśvapṛṣṭhe rathe tsarau dhanuṣi apayāne niryāṇe 'ṅkuśagrahe
K10divyav_u:13399: pāśagrahe chedye bhedye muṣṭibandhe padabandhe dūravedhe śabdavedhe marmavedhe 'kṣuṇṇavedhe dṛḍhaprahāritāyām /
K10divyav_u:13401: 287.017. tasya pitrā trīṇyantaḥpurāṇi vyavasthāpitāni jyeṣṭhaṃ madhyaṃ kanīyasam/
K10divyav_u:13406: 287.019. tataḥ sudhanakumāra upariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati//
K10divyav_u:13407: 287.021. yāvadapareṇa samayena halako lubdhako mṛgayāmanveṣamāṇastena tenānuvicarannanyatamaṃ parvatamanuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13408: 287.022. tasya ca parvatasyādhastādṛṣerāśramapadaṃ paśyati puṣpaphalasampannaṃ nānāpakṣigaṇavicāritam/
K10divyav_u:13412: 287.025. dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ papraccha--bhagavan,
K10divyav_u:13415: 287.027. asti tvayā iyatā kālenāsmin pradeśe kaścidāścaryādbhutadharmo dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā?
K10divyav_u:13419: 287.029. eṣā brahmasabhā nāma puṣkiriṇī utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkasaṃchannā nānāpakṣigaṇaniṣevitā himarajatatuṣāragaurāmbusampūrṇā surabhikusumapūrṇatoyā/
K10divyav_u:13420: 287.030. asyāṃ puṣkiriṇyāṃ pañcadaśamyāṃ manoharā nāma drumasya kinnararājasya duhitā pañcakinnarīśataparivārā nānāvidhasnānodvartanairāgatya
K10divyav_u:13422: 288.001. ahamapi taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā mahatā prītisaumanasyena saptāhamatināmayāmi/
K10divyav_u:13424: 288.002. atha halakasya lubdhakasyaitadabhavat--śobhano 'yaṃ mayā amoghaḥ pāśo nāgāllabdho manoharāyāḥ kinnaryāḥ kṣepsyāmīti/
K10divyav_u:13425: 288.003. so 'pareṇa samayena pūrṇapañcadaśyāmamoghaṃ pāśamādāya hradatīrasamīpe puṣpaphalaviṭapagahanamāśritya avadhānatatparo 'vashtitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13426: 288.004. yāvanmanoharā kinnarī pañcaśataparivāritā tādṛśyaiva vibhūtyā brahmasabhāṃ puṣkiriṇīmavatīrṇā snātum/
K10divyav_u:13427: 288.005. tatsamantaraṃ ca halakena lubdhakena amoghaḥ pāśaḥ kṣiptaḥ,
K10divyav_u:13429: 288.006. tayā amoghapāśaśritayā hrade mahāhatanādaḥ kṛto bhīṣaṇaśca śabdo niścāritaḥ,
K10divyav_u:13430: yaṃ śrutvā pariśiṣṭaḥ kinnarigaṇa itaścāmutaśca saṃbhrānto manoharāṃ nirīkṣitumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13438: 288.011. mā naiṣīstvaṃ hi mā sprākṣīr naitattva suceṣṭitam/
K10divyav_u:13439: 288.012. rājabhogyā surūpāhaṃ na sādhu grahaṇaṃ tava//1// iti/
K10divyav_u:13452: 288.017. adrākṣītsa lubdhakaḥ sudhanaṃ rājakumāramabhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ prāsādikam/
K10divyav_u:13459: 288.020. upasaṃkramya pādayor nipatya kathayati--idaṃ mama devasya strīratnaṃ prābhṛtamānītam,
K10divyav_u:13470: 288.030. tāṃ pratikīrṇahārāmuttaptajāmbūnadacārupūrṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā kumāraḥ sahasā papāta viddho dṛḍharāgaśareṇa/
K10divyav_u:13477: 289.005. dṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ sudhana indusamānvaktrāṃ prāvṛḍaghanāntaraviniścariteva vidyuta/
K10divyav_u:13478: 289.007. tatsnehamanmathavilāsasamudbhavena sadyaḥ sa cetasi nu rāgaśareṇa viddhaḥ//2//
K10divyav_u:13481: 289.010. tataḥ sudhano rājakumāro manoharayā rūpayauvanaguṇena sughanaḥ kumāronekaiścopacāraśataistathā apahṛto yathā muhūrtamapi tāṃ na jahāti/
