K10divyav_u:13486: sa rājñā purohitaḥ sthāpito bhogaiśca saṃvibhaktaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13489: 289.014. sa kathayati--yathā tava sahāyo brāhmaṇo mama pitrā paurohitye 'vasthāpitaḥ,
K10divyav_u:13491: 289.016. eṣa ca vṛttāntastena brāhmaṇena karṇaparamparayā śrutaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13495: yāvadapareṇa samayena tasya rājño vijite 'nyatamaḥ kārvaṭikaḥ prativiruddhaḥ,
K10divyav_u:13502: 289.022. brāhmaṇa purohitaḥ saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ sa kumārasya vadhopāyakāla iti/
K10divyav_u:13512: 289.026. evaṃ deveti sudhanaḥ kumāro rājñaḥ pratiśrutya antaḥpuraṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13516: sudhanaḥ kumāro manoharayā atīva sakto na śakyate preṣayitum/
K10divyav_u:13518: 289.029. nirgataḥ kumāro 'ntaḥpurāt preṣayitavyo yathā manoharāyāḥ sakāśaṃ na prativasatīti/
K10divyav_u:13519: 289.030. evaṃ deveti amātyai rājñaḥ pratiśrutya balaugho hastyaśvarathapadātisampanno 'nakapraharaṇopakaraṇayuktaḥ sajjīkṛtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13536: 290.008. sa evaṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ saṃdiśya abhivādya ca nānāyodhabalaughatūryanir nāditaiḥ saṃprasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13537: 290.009. anupūrveṇa janapadānatikramya tasya kārvaṭikasya nātidūre 'nyataṃ vṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya vāsamupagataḥ/
K10divyav_u:13540: 290.011. tasya tena pathā gacchataḥ khagapathena yānamavasthitam/
K10divyav_u:13548: 290.015. na ca kasyacitprāṇinaḥ pīḍā karaṇīyeti viditvā pāñcikaṃ mahāyakṣasenāpatimāmantrayate--ehi tvaṃ pāñcika,
K10divyav_u:13550: 290.017. na ca te kasyacitprāṇinaḥ pīḍā kartavyeti/
K10divyav_u:13551: 290.017. tatheti pāñcikena yakṣasenāpatinā vaiśravaṇasya mahārājasya pratiśrutya divyaścaturaṅgo balakāyo nirmitah--tālamātrapramāṇāḥ puruṣaḥ,
K10divyav_u:13554: 290.019. tato nānāvidhakhaṅgamuśalatomarapāśacakraśaraparaśvadhādiśastraviśeṣeṇa nānāvāditrasaṃkṣobheṇa ca mahābhayamupadarśayan mahatā balaudhena pāñciko 'nuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13557: 290.023. tataste karvaṭanivāsinastaṃ balaughaṃ dṛṣṭvā tacca prākārapatanaṃ paraṃ viṣādamāpannāḥ papracchuh--kuta eṣa balaugha āgacchatīti?
K10divyav_u:13560: 290.025. tasya ca balaugho yadi ciraṃ vidhārayiṣyatha,
K10divyav_u:13563: 290.027. vyutpannā na vayaṃ rājño na kumārasya dhīmataḥ/
K10divyav_u:13566: 290.029. tata ucchritadhvajapatākāpūrṇakalaśā nānāvidhatūryanir nāditaiḥ sudhanaṃ kumāraṃ pratyudgatāḥ/
K10divyav_u:13572: 291.001. dhanena ca rājñā tāmeva rātriṃ svapno dṛṣṭah--gṛdhreṇāgatya rājña udaraṃ sphoṭayitvā antrāṇyākṛṣya sarvaṃ tannagaramantrairveṣṭitam,
K10divyav_u:13574: 291.002. tato rājā bhītastrastaḥ saṃvigna āhṛṣṭaromakūpo laghukadhvevotthāya mahāśayane
K10divyav_u:13575: niṣadya kare kapokaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitah--mā haiva me atonidānaṃ rājyaccyutirbhaviṣyati,
K10divyav_u:13577: 291.005. sa prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ svapnaṃ brāhmaṇāya purohitāya nivedayāmāsa/
K10divyav_u:13591: 291.010. tato devena snānaprayatena tāṃ puṣkariṇīmekena so 'ānenāvataritavyam,
K10divyav_u:13612: 291.021. śakṣyasi hyaparāṃ kartuṃ ghātayaināṃ manoharām//7// iti/
K10divyav_u:13613: 291.022. ātmābhinandino na kiṃcinna pratipadyanta iti tenādhivāsitam/
K10divyav_u:13619: 291.026. tāḥ pramuditā dṛṣṭvā manoharā pṛcchati--kim yūyamatīva praharṣitā iva?
K10divyav_u:13620: yāvadaparayā sa vṛttānto vistareṇa manoharāyā niveditaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13621: 291.027. tato manoharā saṃjātaduḥkhadaurmanasyā yena sudhanasya kumārasya jananī tenopasaṃkrāntā/
K10divyav_u:13627: 291.030. tatastayā sa cūḍāmaṇirvastrāṇi ca manoharāyai dattāni,
K10divyav_u:13631: 291.032. tato rājā yathādiṣṭena krameṇa snānaprayato rudhirapūrṇāṃ puṣkiriṇimavatīryottīrṇah<292>/
K10divyav_u:13636: 292.004. nāgīva bandhanānmuktā eṣā gacchāmi sāmpratam//8// iti/
K10divyav_u:13643: 292.007. tato manoharāyāḥ khagapathena gacchantyā etadabhavat--yadahametāmavasthāṃ prāptā,
K10divyav_u:13647: 292.009. tena hi yasyāmi tāvadasyaiva ṛṣeḥ sakāśāmiti/
K10divyav_u:13653: 292.011. tadvijñāpayāmi--yadi yadā kadācitsudhanaḥ kumāra āgacchati māṃ samanveṣamāṇaḥ,
K10divyav_u:13666: tata utkūlako jalapatha ekadhārako vajrakaḥ kāmarūpī/
K10divyav_u:13672: 292.019. ajavaktrameṇḍhakaḥ puruṣo rākṣasarūpī piṅgalāguhāyāṃ lālāsrotasā mahānajagaro vegena pradhāvati/
K10divyav_u:13675: 292.022. ayaṃ bhuktena bāṇena hantavyo mama kāraṇāt/
K10divyav_u:13681: 292.028. yadā paśyettatra kīlakaṃ lalāṭe tasyā nikhānayet//11//
K10divyav_u:13686: 293.001. <293>raṅgā pataṅgā tapanī citrā rudantī hasantī āśīviṣā vetranadī ca/
K10divyav_u:13690: 293.005. āśīviṣāyāṃ nānāvidhāḥ sarpā vetranadyāṃ tu śālmaliḥ//15//
K10divyav_u:13700: 293.010. tato manoharā tam ṛṣimevamuktvā pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā prakrāntā//
K10divyav_u:13701: 293.012. yāvatsudhanaḥ kumārastaṃ karvaṭakaṃ saṃnāmya gṛhītaprābhṛto hastināpuramanuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13703: 293.013. tataḥ kumāro mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya pituḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:13724: 293.020. sa cintāparaḥ praviśya manoharāṃ na paśyati/
K10divyav_u:13725: 293.021. itaścāmutaśca saṃbhrāntaḥ śūnyahṛdayaḥ śabdaṃ kartumārabdhah--manohare manohare iti/
K10divyav_u:13740: 293.029. hṛdayaṃ dahyate caiva rahitasya tayā bhṛśam//18//
K10divyav_u:13741: 293.030. manobhirāmā ca manoharā ca manonukūlā ca manoratiśca/
K10divyav_u:13742: 294.001. <294>saṃtaptadeho 'smi manoharāṃ vinā kuto mamedaṃ vyasanaṃ samāgatam//19// iti/
K10divyav_u:13747: 294.004. sa pitur nairguṇyamakṛtajñatāṃ ca jñātvā kathayati--kutra gatā katareṇa vā patheti?
K10divyav_u:13750: 294.007. uṣito dharmarājena yatra yātā manoharā//20// iti/
K10divyav_u:13756: 294.012. hṛdayaṃ dahyate caiva rahitasya tayā bhṛśam//22//
K10divyav_u:13757: 294.013. manobhirāmā ca manoharā ca manonukūlā ca manoratiśca/
K10divyav_u:13758: 294.015. saṃtaptadeho 'smi manoharāṃ vinā kuto mamedaṃ vyasanaṃ samāgatam//23// iti/
K10divyav_u:13763: sa tayā samāśvāsyamāno 'pi śokasaṃtāpasaṃtaptastasyāḥ pravṛttiṃ samanveṣamāṇa itaścāmutaśca paribhramitumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13765: 294.020. sa halakasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ pṛcchati--manoharā kutastvayā labdheti?
K10divyav_u:13771: 294.023. eṣa ca vṛttānto rājñā śrutah--manoharāviyogātkumāro 'tīva viklava iti/
K10divyav_u:13776: na śakyaṃ mayā tāmanānīya antaḥpurasthena bhavitum/
K10divyav_u:13781: 294.028. uktaṃ ca--pañceme rātryā alpaṃ svapanti bahu jāgārti/
K10divyav_u:13791: 294.031. sa rātryā vyutthāya nīlotpalamālābaddhaśirā<295> yena rakṣiṇaḥ puruṣā na santi,
K10divyav_u:13792: tena tāṃ mālāṃ dhvaje baddhvā avatīrṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13795: 295.003. bhoḥ pūrṇacandra rajanīkara tārarāja tvaṃ rohiṇīnayanakānta susārthavāha/
K10divyav_u:13796: 295.005. kaccitpriyā mama manoharaṇaikadakṣā dṛṣṭā tvayā bhuvi manoharanāmadheyā//24// iti/
K10divyav_u:13800: 295.008. he tvaṃ kuraṅgi tṛṇavāripalāśabhakṣe svastyastu te cara sukhaṃ na mṛgārirasmi/
K10divyav_u:13801: 295.010. dīrghekṣaṇā mṛgavadhūkamanīyarūpā dṛṣṭā tvayā mama manoharanāmadheyā//25//
K10divyav_u:13802: 295.012. sa tāmatikramya anyatamaṃ pradeśaṃ gato dadarśa vanaṃ nānāpuṣpaphalopaśobhitaṃ bhramarairupabhujyamānasāram/
K10divyav_u:13809: 295.021. rāgāgninā tava samo na viṣāgnirugro dṛṣṭā tvayā mama manoharanāmadheyā//27//
K10divyav_u:13812: 295.025. bhoḥ kokilottama vanāntaravṛkṣavāsin nārī manohara patatrigaṇasya rājan/
K10divyav_u:13820: 296.007. vande ṛṣe nataśirā vada me laghu tvaṃ dṛṣṭā tvayā mama manoharanāmadheyā//30//
K10divyav_u:13821: 296.009. tataḥ sa ṛṣiḥ sudhanaṃ kumāraṃ svāgatavacanāsanadānakriyādipuraḥsaraḥ pratisaṃmodya uvāca--
K10divyav_u:13822: 296.011. dṛṣṭā sā paripūrṇacandravadanā nīlotpalābhāsvarā rūpeṇa priyadarśanā subadanā nīlañcatabhrūlatā/
K10divyav_u:13823: 296.013. tvaṃ svastho bhuvi bhujyatāṃ hi vividhaṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ ca prabho pañcātsvasti gamiṣyasīti manasā nātrāsti me saṃśayaḥ//31//
K10divyav_u:13824: 296.015. idaṃ hyavocadvacanaṃ ca subhrūḥ kumāra tṛṣṇā tvayi bādhate me/
K10divyav_u:13825: 296.017. mahacca duḥkhaṃ vasatāṃ vaneṣu yātāṃ ramāṃ drakṣyasi niṣcayena//32// iti/
K10divyav_u:13833: 296.021. kumāra, idaṃ ca tayā samākhyātam--uttare digbhāge trayaḥ kālaparvatāḥ,
K10divyav_u:13836: 296.022. tatpradeśena tvayā imāni bhaiṣajyāni samudānetavyāni--tadyathā sūdayā nāmauṣadhistayā ghṛtaṃ paktvā pātavyam/
K10divyav_u:13837: 296.023. tena ca te na tṛṣā na bubhukṣā,
K10divyav_u:13844: 296.026. tataḥ kūlako jalapathaḥ khadiraka ekadhārako vajrakaḥ kāmarūpī/
K10divyav_u:13852: 296.029. ajavaktro meṇḍhakaḥ puruṣo rākṣasīrūpī piṅgalāyāṃ guhāyāṃ lālāsrotasā mahatā ajagaro vegena pradhāvati/
K10divyav_u:13861: 297.007. yadā paśyettadā kīlaṃ lalāṭo tasyā nikhānayet//35//
K10divyav_u:13866: 297.012. raṅgā pataṅgā tapanī citrā rudantī hasantī āśīviṣā vetranadī ca/
K10divyav_u:13870: 297.016. āśīviṣāyāṃ nānāvidhāḥ sarpā vetranadyāṃ tu śālmaliḥ//39//
K10divyav_u:13880: 297.022. tataḥ sudhanaḥ kumāro yathopadiṣṭānauṣadhimantrāgadaprayogān samudānīya tasya ṛṣeḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13881: 297.023. tatastena yathopadiṣṭāḥ sarve samudānītāḥ sthāpavitvā vānaram/
K10divyav_u:13890: 297.027. candrasya khe vicarataḥ kva sahāyabhāvo daṃṣṭrābalena balinaśca mṛgādhipasya/
K10divyav_u:13891: 297.029. agneśca dāvadahane kva sahāyabhāvah asmadvidhasya ca sahāyabalena kiṃ syāt//41//
K10divyav_u:13892: 298.001. <298>kiṃ bho mahārṇavajalaṃ na vigāhitavyaṃ kiṃ sarpadaṣṭa iti naiva cikitsanīyaḥ//
K10divyav_u:13893: 298.003. vīryaṃ bhajetsumahadūrjitasattvadṛṣṭam yatne kṛte yadi na siddhyati ko 'tra doṣaḥ//42// iti/
K10divyav_u:13895: 298.005. anupūrveṇa parvatanadīguhāprapātādīni bhaiṣajyamantrāgadaprayogeṇa vinirjitya drumasya kinnararājasya bhavanasamīpaṃ gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:13896: 298.007. kumāro 'paśyannagaramadūraṃ śrīmadudyānopaśobhitaṃ nānāpuṣpaphalopetaṃ nānāvihagasevitaṃ taḍāgadīrghikāvāpikinnaraiḥ samupāvṛtam/
K10divyav_u:13898: 298.008. tatastāḥ sudhanakumāreṇābhihitāh--kimanena bahunā pānīyena kriyata iti?
K10divyav_u:13899: tāḥ kathayanti--asti drumasya kinnararājasya duhitā manoharā nāma/
K10divyav_u:13902: 298.011. sudhanaḥ kumāraḥ pṛcchati--kimete ghaṭāḥ samastāḥ sarve tasyā upari nipātyante,
K10divyav_u:13908: 298.014. sā ca kinnarī abhihitā--anena tvayā ghaṭena manoharā tatprathamataraṃ snāpayitavyā/
K10divyav_u:13910: 298.015. tatastayāsau ghaṭaḥ prathamataraṃ manoharāyā mūrdhni nipātito yāvadaṅgulimudrā utsaṅge nipatitā/
K10divyav_u:13917: 298.018. tato manoharā pituḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati--tāta,
K10divyav_u:13921: sa kathayati--tamahaṃ khaṇḍaśataṃ kṛtvā catasṛṣu śikṣu kṣipeyam/
K10divyav_u:13928: tasyāhaṃ tvāṃ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitāṃ prabhūtacitropakaraṇaiḥ kinnarīsahasraparivṛtāṃ bhāryārthaṃ dadyāmiti/
K10divyav_u:13929: 298.024. tato manoharayā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditayā sudhanaṃ kumāro divyālaṃkāravibhūṣito drumasya kinnararājasyopadarśitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13930: 298.025. tato drumaḥ kinnnararājaḥ sudhanaṃ kumāraṃ dadarśa abhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ prasādikaṃ paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatam/
K10divyav_u:13932: 298.027. tatastasya jijñāsāṃ kartukāmena sauvarṇāḥ stambhā ucchritāḥ,
K10divyav_u:13946: 299.004. tato bodhisattvo nṛttagītavīṇāpaṇavasughoṣakavallarīmṛdaṅgādinānāvidhena daivatopasaṃhṛtena vāditraviśeṣeṇa samantādāpūryamāṇe 'nekaiḥ kinnarasahasraiḥ pativṛtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13951: 299.011. nīlotpaladalābhenāsinā gṛhītena paśyato drumasya kinnararājasya sauvarṇastambhasamīpaṃ gatvā tān stambhān kadalīcchedena khaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ
K10divyav_u:13952: 299.012. tatastāṃs tilaśo 'vakīrya sapta tālān sapta bherīḥ sapta ca sūkarān bāṇena vidhya sumeruvadakampyo 'vasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13954: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca kinnararājaḥ paraṃ vismayamupagataḥ/
K10divyav_u:13955: 299.015. tataḥ kinnarīsahasrasya manoharāsamānarūpasya madhye manoharāṃ sthāpayitvā sudhanaḥ kumāro 'bhihitah--ehi kumāra,
K10divyav_u:13958: 299.018. yathā drumasya duhitā mameha tvaṃ manoharā/
K10divyav_u:13962: ayaṃ sudhanaḥ kumāro balavīryaparākramasamanvito manoharāyāḥ pratirūpaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13965: 299.022. tato drumaḥ kinnararājaḥ kinnaragaṇena saṃvarṇitaḥ sudhanaṃ kinnarābhimetena
K10divyav_u:13966: mahatā satkāreṇa puraskṛtya manoharāṃ divyālaṃkāravibhūṣitāṃ vāmena pāṇinā gṛhītvā
K10divyav_u:13968: eṣā te manoharā kinnarīpativṛtā bhāryārthāya dattā/
K10divyav_u:13971: 299.025. paraṃ tāteti sudhanaḥ kumāro drumasya kinnararājasya pratiśrutya kinnarabhavanastho manoharayā sārdhaṃ niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍate ramate paricārayati/
K10divyav_u:13972: 299.027. so 'pareṇa samayena svadeśamanusmṛtya mātāpitṛviyogajena duḥkhenātyāhato manoharāyā nivedayati--mātāpitṛviyogajaṃ me duḥkhaṃ bādhata
K10divyav_u:13973: 299.028. tato manoharayā eṣa vṛttānto vistareṇa pitur niveditaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13977: 299.030. tato drumeṇa kinnararājena prabhūtaṃ maṇimuktāsuvarṇādīn dattvā anupreṣitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13980: 300.001. tato hastināpuraṃ nagaraṃ nānāmanohareṇa surabhinā gandhaviśeṣeṇa sarvā digāmoditam/
K10divyav_u:13984: 300.004. tataḥ kumāro 'nekanaravarasahasraparivṛto manoharayā sārdhaṃ hastināpuraṃ nagaraṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13985: 300.005. tato mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya vividhāni ratnānyādāya pituḥ sakāśamupasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13989: 300.007. tato dhanena rājñā atibalavīryaparākrama iti viditvā rājyābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktaḥ/
K10divyav_u:13990: 300.008. sudhanaḥ kumāraḥ saṃlakṣayati--yanmama manoharayā sārdhaṃ samāgamaḥ saṃvṛtto rājyābhiṣekaścānuprāptaḥ,
K10divyav_u:13994: 300.010. tena hastināpure nagare dvādaśa varṣāṇi nirgaṭo yajña iṣṭaḥ//
K10divyav_u:13995: 300.011. syātkhalu te mahārāja anyaḥ sa tena kālena samayena sudhanaḥ kumāro veti?
K10divyav_u:13997: 300.012. api tvahameva tena kālena tena samayena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ vartamānaḥ sudhano nāma rājā babhūva/
K10divyav_u:14001: kiṃ tu taddānaṃ tacca vīryamanuttarāyāḥ samyaksamboderhetumātrakaṃ pratyayamātrakaṃ saṃbhāramātrakam//
K10divyav_u:14003: 300.016. āttamanasaste ca sarve lokā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan//
K10divyav_u:14007: 301.002. tatra bhagavbānāyuṣmantamāmantrayate--sma āgamaya ānanda yena śrāavastīti/
K10divyav_u:14009: 301.003. atha bhagavān yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:14013: 301.005. dadarśa sa brāhmaṇo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakcaṇaiḥ
K10divyav_u:14017: 301.008. na tathā dvādaśavarṣābhyastaḥ śamathaścattasya kalyatāṃ janayati,
K10divyav_u:14022: 301.010. sa tāṃ peyāmādāya laghuladhveva yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:14026: 301.012. tato bhagavatā brāhmaṇasya jīrṇakūpo darśitah--sacette brāhmaṇa parityaktā,
K10divyav_u:14030: yathāpi tadbuddhānāṃ buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena/
K10divyav_u:14031: 301.014. tato bhagavatā sa brāhmaṇo 'bhihitah--cāraya mahābrāhmaṇa peyāmiti/
K10divyav_u:14033: 301.015. bhagavatā tathā adhiṣṭhitā yathā sarvasaṃghena pītā/
K10divyav_u:14035: 301.017. tato 'sau brāhmaṇo bhūyasyā mātrayā abhiprasanno bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya/
K10divyav_u:14036: 301.018. tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāyasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10divyav_u:14037: pūrvavadyāvadanādikālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāapattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
K10divyav_u:14040: 301.020. eṣo 'haṃ bhagavantaṃ buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:14041: 301.021. upāsakaṃ ca māṃ dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatamabhiprasannam/
K10divyav_u:14042: 301.022. athāsau brāhmaṇo vaṇigiva labdhalābhaḥ śasyasampanna iva kṛṣīvalaḥ śūra
K10divyav_u:14043: iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ sarvaroganirmukta ivāturo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyānandyānumodya
K10divyav_u:14044: bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrānto yāvatkṣetraṃ gataḥ /
K10divyav_u:14045: 301.025. paśyati tasmin kṣetre sauvarṇān yavān saṃpannān/
K10divyav_u:14071: 302.005. yāvadanyatamasmin pradeśe pañcakārṣaśatānyutpāḍūtpāṇḍukāni sphuṭitapāṇipādāni śaṇaśāṭīnivāsitāni laṅgalāni vāhayanti/
K10divyav_u:14072: 302.006. te 'pi balīvardā baddhaiḥ prayoktraiḥ pratodayaṣṭibhiḥ kṣatavikṣatagātrā muhurmuhur niśvasanto vahanti/
K10divyav_u:14073: 302.007. tadṛśuste kārṣākā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ pūrvavadyāvadupacitakuśalamūlasattvasya tatprathamato
K10divyav_u:14076: 302.010. dṛṣṭvā ca punarvineyāpekṣayā mārgādapakramya purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:14077: 302.010. eta kārṣakā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekāntaniṣaṇṇāḥ/
K10divyav_u:14078: 302.011. tato bhagavatā teṣāṃ kārṣakāṇāmāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10divyav_u:14079: pūrvavadyāvadanādikālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāapattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
K10divyav_u:14084: 302.016. te bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā pravrājitāḥ pūrvavadyāvatte 'vasthitā buddhamanorathena/
K10divyav_u:14087: 302.017. te 'pi balīvardā yoktrāṇi varatrāṇi ca cchittvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
K10divyav_u:14089: 302.019. teṣāṃ bhagavatā tribhiḥ padārthairdharmo deśitaḥ pūrvavadyāvadyathā gaṅgāvatāre haṃsamatsyakūrmāṇām yāvad dṛṣṭasatyāḥ svarbhavanaṃ
K10divyav_u:14090: 302.021. bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ nu taiḥ kārṣakapūrvakairbhikṣubhiḥ karma kṛtam yena kārṣakāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ,
K10divyav_u:14095: bhagavānāha--ebhireva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pūrvavadyāvatphalanti khalu dehinām//
K10divyav_u:14096: 302.026. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'sminneva bhadrakalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma śāstā loka udapādi/
K10divyav_u:14099: 302.028. tasya śāsane etāni pañca karṣakaśatāni pravrajitānyabhūvan/
K10divyav_u:14100: 302.028. tatraibhir na paṭhitaṃ na svādhyāyitaṃ nāpi manasikāro vihitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:14101: 302.029. kiṃ tu śraddhādeyaṃ bhuktvā bhuktvā saṃgaṇikābhirataiḥ kausīdyenābhināmitam//
K10divyav_u:14102: 303.001. <303>kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāni tāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni,
K10divyav_u:14106: 303.002. yadebhirvihārasvāmisantakaṃ śraddhādeyaṃ paribhujya na paṭhitaṃ na svādhyāyitaṃ nāpi manasikāro vihitaḥ,
K10divyav_u:14108: tena karmaṇā pañca janmaśatāni tasya vihārasvāminaḥ kārṣakāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
K10divyav_u:14110: 303.005. yadebhiḥ kāśayapasya samyaksambuddhāsya śāsane pravrajya brahmacaryaṃ caritam,
K10divyav_u:14111: tenaitarhi mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
K10divyav_u:14112: 303.007. te ca balīvardapūrviṇo devaputrāḥ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śāsane pravrajitā āsan/
K10divyav_u:14122: 303.013. tatra bhagavānāyucmantamāmantrayate sma--āgamaya ānanda yena toyikā/
K10divyav_u:14126: 303.015. athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtagātraṃ pūrvavadyāvatsamantato bhadrakam/
K10divyav_u:14131: 303.018. tatko 'sāvupāyaḥ syādyena me na karmaparihāṇi syānnāpi puṇyaparihāṇiriti?
K10divyav_u:14134: 303.020. tena yathāgṛhītayaiva pratodayaṣṭyā tatrasthenābhivādanaṃ kṛtam--abhivādaye buddhaṃ bhagavantam/
K10divyav_u:14139: 303.023. evamanena dvābhyāṃ samyaksambuddhābhyāṃ vandanā kṛtā bhavet/
K10divyav_u:14142: 303.025. athāyuṣmānānando laghulaghveva caturguṇamuttarāsaṅgaṃ prajñapya bhagavantamidamavocat--niṣīdatu bhagavān prajñapta evāsane/
K10divyav_u:14143: 303.027. evamayaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo dvābhyāṃ samyaksambuddhābhyāṃ paribhukto bhaviṣyati,
K10divyav_u:14147: 303.028. niṣadya bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--icchatha yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śarīrasaṃghātamavikopitaṃ draṣṭum?
K10divyav_u:14153: 303.032. dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavanto laukikam <304>
K10divyav_u:14154: tasmin samaye kuntapipīlikādayo 'pi prāṇino bhagavataścetasā cittamājānanti/
K10divyav_u:14155: 304.002. nāgāḥ saṃlakṣayanti--kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavatā laukikaṃ cittamutpāditam?
K10divyav_u:14158: 304.004. tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--gṛhṇīta bhikṣavo nimittam/
K10divyav_u:14161: 304.006. rājñā prasenajitā śrutam--bhagavatā śrāvakāṇāṃ darśanāya avikopitaḥ kaśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śarīrasaṃghāta ucchrāpita iti/
K10divyav_u:14162: 304.007. śrutvā ca punaḥ kutūhalajātaḥ sārdhamantah--pureṇa kumārauramātyairbhaṭabalāgrair naigamajanapadaiśca draṣṭuṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:14166: anekāni ca prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi kutūhalajātāni draṣṭuṃ saṃprasthitāni pūrvakaiśca kuśalamūlaiḥ saṃcodyamānāni/
K10divyav_u:14168: 304.011. taiḥ śrutam--antarhito 'sau bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śīrarasaṃghāta iti/
K10divyav_u:14169: 304.012. śrutvā ca punasteṣāṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyamutpannam--vṛthā asmākamāgamanaṃ jātamiti//
K10divyav_u:14171: 304.013. evaṃ cetasā cittamabhisaṃskṛtam--asmānme padāvihārāt kiyatpuṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti?
K10divyav_u:14172: atha bhagavāṃstasya mahājanakāyasyāvipratisārasaṃjananārthaṃ tasya copāsakasya cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣite--
K10divyav_u:14173: 304.016. śataṃsahasrāṇi suvarṇaniṣkā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
K10divyav_u:14174: 304.018. yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacittaḥ padāvihāraṃ prakaroti vidvān//2//
K10divyav_u:14178: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāpi cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
K10divyav_u:14179: 304.023. śataṃsahasrāṇi suvarṇapiṇḍaṃ jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
K10divyav_u:14192: 305.008. śatasahasrāṇi suvarṇavāhā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
K10divyav_u:14193: 305.010. yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacitto mālāvihāraṃ prakaroti vidvān//5// iti/
K10divyav_u:14197: atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
K10divyav_u:14199: 305.017. yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacittaḥ pradīpadānaṃ prakaroti vidvān//6// iti/
K10divyav_u:14203: atha bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
K10divyav_u:14204: 305.022. śatasahasrāṇi suvarṇāśayo jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
K10divyav_u:14205: 305.024. yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacitto gandhābhiṣekaṃ prakaroti vidvān//7// iti/
K10divyav_u:14208: muktapuṣpāṇāṃ mālavihārasya pradīpadānasya gandhābhiṣekasya ca iyatpuṇyamuktaṃ bhagavatā,
K10divyav_u:14213: 306.005. eṣāṃ hi dakṣiṇā proktā aprameye tathāgate/
K10divyav_u:14217: 306.008. atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
K10divyav_u:14223: 306.014. tato bhagavatā tasya mahājanakāyasya tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10divyav_u:14234: 306.018. yadbhūyasā sā parṣadbuddhaniṃnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā/
K10divyav_u:14235: 306.019. sārdhaṃ tatra brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhistasmin pradeśe mahaḥ sthāpitah--toyikāmahastoyikāmaha iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā//
K10divyav_u:14240: 307.002. ekasmin samaye bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ/
K10divyav_u:14241: 307.003. satkṛto bhagavān gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito bhikṣubhibhikṇyupāsakopāsikai rājñā
K10divyav_u:14243: 307.005. lābhī ca bhagavān prabhutānāṃ praṇītānāṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ divyānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca,
K10divyav_u:14245: 307.007. tena khalu punaḥ samayena ayameva bhagavato 'nurūpa udāraḥ kalyāṇakīrtiśabda
K10divyav_u:14247: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
K10divyav_u:14248: 307.010. sa imāṃ sadevakaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ saśramaṇabrāhmaṇīṃ prajāṃ sadevamanuṣīṃ svayamabhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasampadya viharati/
K10divyav_u:14249: 307.011. sa dharmaṃ deśayatyādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇāṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇam/
K10divyav_u:14250: 307.012. svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati sma/
K10divyav_u:14251: 307.013. tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--evaṃ ca bhikṣavaḥ sattvā jānīyuh--dānaṃ dānaphalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca vipākam,
K10divyav_u:14252: apīdānīm yo 'sau caramaḥ kavalaḥ paścima ālopaḥ,
K10divyav_u:14254: na cotpannaṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭheyuḥ/
K10divyav_u:14255: 307.016. yasmāttarhi bhikṣavaḥ sattvā na jānanti dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam yathāhaṃ jāne dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam,
K10divyav_u:14256: tasmātsattvā yo 'sau caramaḥ kavalaḥ paścima ālopaḥ,
K10divyav_u:14258: utpannaṃ cauṣāṃ mātsaryamalaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhati//
K10divyav_u:14259: 307.020. bhikṣavaḥ sarvasaṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayānāṃ chettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantamapṛcchan--āścaryaṃ bhadanta yāvacca bhagavata etarhi yācakāḥ
K10divyav_u:14263: 307.023. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvanyuttarāpatheṣu janapadeṣu utpalāvatī nāṃ nagarī rājadhānī babhūva ṛddhā ca sphaītā ca kṣemā ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā
K10divyav_u:14264: 307.024. athāpareṇa samayena utpalāvatyāṃ nagararājadhānyāṃ durbhikṣamabhūd durjīvaṃ durlabhapiṇḍaṃ nasukaramapatāne pragrahaṇe yāpayitum/
K10divyav_u:14265: 307.026. tena khalu samayenotpalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ rūpāvatī nāma strī babhūva abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā śubhavarṇapuṣkalanayā samanvāgatā/
K10divyav_u:14266: 307.027. atha rūpāvatī strī svānniveśanānniṣkramya utpalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ jaṅghāvihāramanukrāmati/
K10divyav_u:14268: 307.028. tasmin khalu samaye tasminnapavarake strī prasūtā,
K10divyav_u:14269: dārakaṃ prajātā abhirūpaṃ prāsādikaṃ śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatam/
K10divyav_u:14270: 307.030. taṃ sā strī kṣutkṣāmaparītā raikṣacittā dārakaṃ gṛhṇāti,
K10divyav_u:14272: 307.031. tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rūpāvatī strī etadavovat--kimidaṃ bhagini kartukāmāsi?
K10divyav_u:14275: 308.001. rūpāvatī āha--tenabhagini niveśane kiṃcitsaṃvidyate 'nnaṃ vā pānaṃ vā bhojanaṃ vā svādanīyaṃ vā?
K10divyav_u:14277: 308.002. na me bhagini kiṃcitsaṃvidyate niveśane annaṃ vā pānaṃ vā khādyaṃ vā bhojanaṃ vā svādanīyaṃ vā lehyaṃ vā/
K10divyav_u:14285: 308.006. na tāvattvaṃ dvāraśālāyā nirgatā bhaviṣyasi yāvanme vāyava ākramiṣyanti/
K10divyav_u:14286: 308.007. yathā rūpāvatyā etadabhavat--yadi dārakaṃ gṛhītvā gamiṣyāmi,
K10divyav_u:14291: tasyā etadabhavat--anaparādhyāśayavati saṃsāre bahūni duḥkhānyanubhūtāni asakṛ nnarakeṣvasakṛttiryakṣvasakṛd
K10divyav_u:14292: yamaloke 'sakṛ nmanuṣyalokeṣu hastacchedāḥ pādacchedāḥ karṇacchedā karṇanāsācchedā
K10divyav_u:14294: 308.012. ko mayā tenārtho 'nuprāpto yadā āhamātmanaḥ sthāmaṃ ca balaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca saṃjanayitvā imāṃ striyaṃ svena rudhireṇa māṃsena saṃtarpya imaṃ dārakaṃ parimocayeyam/
K10divyav_u:14295: 308.014. rūpāvatī pṛcchati--asti te bhagini niveśane śastram?
K10divyav_u:14300: 308.016. tato rūpāvatyā svayameva śastraṃ tīkṣṇaṃ gṛhītvā tau stanau cchittvā tāṃ striyaṃ svakena māṃsarudhireṇa saṃtarpayati sma/
K10divyav_u:14301: 308.017. saṃtarpya ca tāṃ striyametadavocat--yatkhalu bhagini jānīyāh--ayaṃ dārako mayā svakena māṃsarudhireṇa krītaḥ/
K10divyav_u:14302: 308.018. sāhaṃ tava nikṣepamanuprayacchāmi--mā bhūyo dārakaṃ bhakṣayiṣyasi,
K10divyav_u:14305: 308.020. atha rūpāvatī strī rudhireṇoddharatā yena svaṃ niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntā/
K10divyav_u:14307: strīṃ rudhireṇoddharatā pradharatā dūrata eva agacchantīm/
K10divyav_u:14308: 308.022. dṛṣṭvā ca punā rūpāvatīmetadavocat--kenedamevamrūpaṃ rūpāvati viprakāraṃ kṛtam?
K10divyav_u:14310: 308.023. ārocayitvā etadavocat--prajñapaya āryaputra tasyā striyā bhaktam/
K10divyav_u:14313: 308.024. yenāryaduhitaḥ satyena satyavacanena ayamevamrūpa āścaryādbhuto dharmo na kadācid dṛṣṭo vā śruto vā,
K10divyav_u:14314: tena satyena satyavacanena ubhau tava stanau yathāpaurāṇau prādurbhavetām/
K10divyav_u:14315: 308.026. sahakṛtenāsminnevamrūpe satyavacane tasyā asminneva kṣaṇe ubhau stanau yathāpaurāṇau prādurbhūtau//
K10divyav_u:14316: 308.028. atha śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhavat--atityāgo 'tityāgagauravatā yā rūpāvatyā striyā kṛtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:14317: 308.029. mā haiva sā rūpāvatī strī ataḥ śakrabhavanāccyāvayet/
K10divyav_u:14320: suvarṇadaṇḍena maṇivālavyajanena vījyamānastadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṃmiñjitaṃ bāhuṃ
K10divyav_u:14322: evameva śakro devānāmindro deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣvantarhita utpalāvatyām <309>rājadhānyāṃ pratyasthāt/
K10divyav_u:14323: 309.001. atha śakro devānāmindra utpalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ bhaikṣyamanvāhiṇḍan yana rūpāvatyāḥ striyā niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkramya dvāri sthitvā
K10divyav_u:14324: 309.002. tato rūpāvatī strī bhaikṣamādāya yena sa brāhmaṇaveṣadharaḥ śakraḥ,
K10divyav_u:14326: 309.003. atha sa śakro devānāmindro rūpāvatīṃ striyametadvocat--satyaṃ te rūpāvari dārakasyārthāyobhau stanau parityaktau?
K10divyav_u:14328: 309.005. sa tāmāh--evaṃ te rūpāvatī ubhau stanau parityajāmīti parityajantyāḥ parityajya vā abhūccittasya vipratisārah?
K10divyav_u:14329: sā āha--na me ubhau stanau parityajantyā abhūccittasya vipratisāraḥ/
K10divyav_u:14332: 309.008. yena satyena brahman satyavacanenobhau stanau parityajāmīti parityajantyāḥ parityajya vā nābhūccittasyānyathātvam,
K10divyav_u:14334: api ca brahman yena satyena mayā dārakasyārthāyobhau stanau parityaktau,
K10divyav_u:14335: na rājyārthaṃ na bhogārthaṃ na śakrārthaṃ na rājñāṃ cakravartināṃ viṣayārthaṃ nānyatrāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambudhya adāntān damayeyam,
K10divyav_u:14339: tena satyena satyavacanena mama strīndriyamantardhāya puruṣendriyaṃ prādurbhavet/
K10divyav_u:14342: 309.014. atha khalu śakro devendrastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātas tata eva ṛddhyā vaihāyasamabhyudgamyodānamudānayati--rūpāvatyāḥ
K10divyav_u:14344: 309.016. rūpāvatyāḥ striyo rūpāvataḥ kumāra iti saṃjñā utpāditā//
K10divyav_u:14345: 309.018. athāpareṇa samayenopalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ nagaryāṃ rājā aputraḥ kālagataḥ/
K10divyav_u:14346: 309.018. tatra piṇḍatajātīyānāṃ mahāmātrāṇāmetadabhūt--yannu vayamutpalāvatyāṃ rāhadhānyāṃ rāhānaṃ sthāpayema/
K10divyav_u:14348: 309.020. te rūpāvataṃ kumāramutpalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ rājānaṃ sthāpayanti/
K10divyav_u:14351: 309.022. kāyasya bhedāttasyāmevotpalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāmanyatamasya śroṣṭhino gṛhapateragramahiṣyāḥ kukṣāvupapannaḥ/
K10divyav_u:14352: 309.023. sā pūrṇānāmaṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāddārakaṃ janayati abhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ prāsādikaṃ śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatam/
K10divyav_u:14355: 309.025. athānyatarā strī yena sa śreṣṭhī gṛhapatistenopasaṃkrāntā/
K10divyav_u:14356: 309.026. upasaṃkramya śreṣṭhinaṃ gṛhapatimetadavocat--yatkhalu gṛhapate jānīyāh--te dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ śubhayā varṇapuṣkalatayā
K10divyav_u:14359: 309.028. atha sa śreṣṭhī gṛhapatistuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ prītasaumanasyajātas tasyā
K10divyav_u:14360: eva rātryā atyayādye jānanti brahmaṇā lakṣaṇyā naibhittikā vaipañcikā bhūmyantarikṣamantrakuśalā
K10divyav_u:14362: sa tān saṃnipātya dārakamupadarśayati--yatkhalu brāhmaṇā jānīdhvam--ayamagramahiṣyā dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prasādikāḥ śubhayā varṇapuṣkalatayā
K10divyav_u:14365: 309.033. tadasya brāhmaṇā dārakasya lakṣaṇāni prekṣya <310>nāma avasthāpayati/
K10divyav_u:14366: 310.001. tasye ta brāhmaṇā lakṣaṇanaimittikā vipañcikā bhūmyantarīkṣamantrakuśalā nakṣatraśukragrahacatiteṣu kovidā dārakamupagatāḥ/
K10divyav_u:14367: 310.002ṭe saṃlakṣya vadanti--te gṛhapate dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prasādikaḥ śubhayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgaraḥ/
K10divyav_u:14368: 310.003. asya jātamātrasya tādṛśī kāyātprabhā muktā yayā candraprabhā niṣprabhīkṛtā/
K10divyav_u:14370: 310.005. atha śreṣṭhī gṛhapatistān brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā visarjya candraprabhasya dārakasya catasro dhātrīranuprayacchati aṅkadhātrī maladhātrī stanadhātrī karīḍāpaṇilā dhātrī/
K10divyav_u:14376: 310.009. krūḍāpanikā dhātryucyate yāni tāni dārakāṇāṃ dakṣakāṇāṃ taruṇakānāṃ ktīḍāpanikāni bhavanti,
K10divyav_u:14378: syapeṭārikā vaṃśaghaṭikā saṃdhāvaṇikā hastivigrahā aśvavigrahā balīvardavigrahāḥ kathayanti dhanurgrahāḥ kāṇḍakaṭacchupūrakūrcabhaiṣajyasthavikāśca purataḥ patikṛṣyante/
K10divyav_u:14381: tadainaṃ mātāpitarau susnātaṃ suviliptaṃ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitaṃ kṛtvā saṃbahulairdārakaiḥ parivṛttaṃ lipiṃ prāpayante/
K10divyav_u:14382: 310.014. tena khalu samayena tasyāṃ lipiśālāyāṃ pañcamātrakadārakaśatāni lipiṃ śikṣanti/
K10divyav_u:14383: 310.015. atha candraprabho dārakastān dārakānetadavocat--etaddārakā vayaṃ sarve 'nuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambodhau cittamutpādayema/
K10divyav_u:14387: tadyathā--dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā/
K10divyav_u:14390: 310.19. sa tīkṣṇaṃ śastramādāya madhusarpiśca yenānyataraṃ mahāśmaśānaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:14391: 310.020. śastreṇātmanaḥ kāyaṃ kṣaṇitvā madhusarpiṣā mrakṣayitvā tasmin sa mahāśmaśāne ātmānaṃ vadhāyotsṛjati/
K10divyav_u:14392: 310.021. tena ca samayena tasmin mahāśmaśāne uccaṃgamaḥ pakṣī prativasati/
K10divyav_u:14393: 310.022. sa candraprabhasya dārakasyāṅge sthitvā dakṣiṇaṃ nayanaṃ gṛhītvā utpāṭayati,
K10divyav_u:14395: 310.023. dvirapi trirapi uccaṃgamaḥ prāṇī candraprabhasya dārakasya dakṣiṇaṃ nayanaṃ gṛhītvā utpāṭayitvā punarmuñcati/
K10divyav_u:14396: 310.024. atha candraprabho dāraka uccaṃgamaṃ pakṣiṇamidamavocat--kimidaṃ pakṣi mama nayanaṃ gṛhītvā utpāṭayitvā utpāṭayitvā punaḥ pramuñcasi?
K10divyav_u:14400: candraprabha āha--sacenmama pakṣī sahasrakṛtvo nayanaṃ gṛhītvā utpāṭayatu,
K10divyav_u:14408: abhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ prāsādikāṃ śubhayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatam/
K10divyav_u:14409: 310.032. tasya mātāpitarau brāhmaprabha iti nāma sthāpitavantau/
K10divyav_u:14413: sa pañcamātrāṇi māṇavakāni svayameva mantrān vācayati/
K10divyav_u:14414: 311.002. yadā brahmaprabho māṇavakaḥ ṣoḍaśavarṣo jātyā saṃvṛttaḥ,
K10divyav_u:14420: sa āha--icchāmyahaṃ sattvānāmarthāya tapastaptuṃ duṣkaraṃ caritum/
K10divyav_u:14422: 311.006. brahmaprabhamāṇavako mātāpitroḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya utpalāvatyā rājadhānyā niṣkramya yenānyataradvanaṣaṇḍaṃ
K10divyav_u:14423: 311.007. tena khalu samayena tasmin vanaṣaṇḍe dvau brāhmaṇarṣī prativasataḥ/
K10divyav_u:14424: 311.008. apaśyatāṃ brāhmaṇarṣīṃ brahmaprabhaṃ māṇavakaṃ dūrata evāgacchantam/
K10divyav_u:14429: sa āha--icchāmyahaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya tapastaptuṃ duṣkaraṃ caritum/
K10divyav_u:14434: 311.012. atha brahmaprabho māṇavako 'nyatarasmin pradeśe kuṭīṃ kārayitvā caṃkramaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya sattvānāmarthāya tapastaptavān/
K10divyav_u:14435: 311.013. athāpareṇa samayena brahmaprabhasya kuṭyā nātidūre vyāghrī gurviṇī vāsamupagatā/
K10divyav_u:14437: 311.014. tāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca yena punastau dvau brahmarṣī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:14438: 311.014. upasaṃkramya tau ca brahmarṣī etadavocat--yatkhalu ṛṣī jānītām--iha me kuṭyā nātidūre vyāghrī gurviṇī vāsamupagatā/
K10divyav_u:14441: 311.017. athāpareṇa samayena vyāghrī prasūtā kṣutkṣāmaparītā icchati svakau potakau bhakṣayitum/
K10divyav_u:14445: 311.018. dṛṣṭvā ca punaryena tau brahmarṣī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:14446: 311.019. upasaṃkramya punaryena tau dvau brahmarṣī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:14447: 311.020. upasaṃkramya dvau brahmarṣī etadavocat--yatkhalu brāhmaṇau jānītām--sā vyāghrī prasūtā kṣutkṣāmaparītā svakau potakau bhakṣayitumicchati/
K10divyav_u:14448: 311.021. ekaṃ potakaṃ gṛhītvā dvitīyaṃ muñcati na bhakṣayati/
K10divyav_u:14451: 311.022. atha tau brahmarṣī yena sā vyāghrī tenopasaṃkrāntau/
K10divyav_u:14457: 311.026. dṛṣṭvā ca punastau brahmarṣī etadavocat--nanu brāhmaṇau,
K10divyav_u:14460: tau āhatuh--ka utsahate tiryagyonigatasyārthāya jīvitaṃ parityaktum?
K10divyav_u:14462: 311.029. atha sa brahmaprabho māṇavako yena sā vyāghrī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:14466: 311.031. atha brahmaprabhasya māṇavasyaitadabhavat--iyaṃ mama vyāghrī sāvijñānakaṃ kāyaṃ na bhakṣayati/
K10divyav_u:14468: 311.032. tatastīkṣṇaṃ ca veṇupeśīṃ tīkṣṇāṃ gṛhītvā idamevaṃ rūpaṃ satyavacanamakarot--samanvāharantu
K10divyav_u:14469: me ye 'smin vanaṣaṇḍe 'dhyuṣitā <312>udārā devā nāgā yakṣā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragāḥ,
K10divyav_u:14473: 312.002. api tu yenāhaṃ satyena satyavacanena parityajāmi,
K10divyav_u:14474: na rājyārthaṃ na bhogārthaṃ na śakrāthaṃ na rājacakravartiviṣayārtham,
K10divyav_u:14480: tena satyena satyavacanena mā me parityāgo niṣphalo bhūditi kṛtvā svayameva galaṃ chittvā tasyā vyāghryā purata upanikṣipati/
K10divyav_u:14485: 312.016. sahaparityakte khalu bhikṣavo brahmaprabheṇa māṇavena svake gale,
K10divyav_u:14486: ayaṃ rtisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ kampati saṃkampati saṃprakampati,
K10divyav_u:14497: sūryacandramasau na tapato na bhāsato na virājataḥ//
K10divyav_u:14498: 312.021. syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyā sā tena samayenottarāpatheṣu janapadeṣūtpalāvatīnāṃ nagarīrājadhānī babhūva/
K10divyav_u:14500: 312.022. puṣkalāvataṃ tena kālena tena samayenotpalāvataṃ nāma nagaraṃ rājadhānī babhūva/
K10divyav_u:14501: 312.023. syādbhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vimatirvā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayenotpalāvate nagare rājadhānyāṃ rūpāvatī strī babhūva/
K10divyav_u:14503: 312.024. ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena rūpāvatī nāma strī babhūva/
K10divyav_u:14504: 312.025. syādbhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyā sā tena kālena tena samayenāpavarake strī prasūtā/
K10divyav_u:14506: 312.026. candraprabhamāṇavikā tena kālena tena samayenāpavarake strī prasūtā/
K10divyav_u:14507: 312.027. syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyastena kālena tena samayena dārako babhūva/
K10divyav_u:14509: 312.028. rāhulaḥ kumāraḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena dārako 'bhūt/
K10divyav_u:14510: 312.029. syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena candraprabho nāma dārako babhūva/
K10divyav_u:14512: 312.030. ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena candraprabho nāma dārako babhūva/
K10divyav_u:14513: 312.031. syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena pañcamātrāṇi dārakaśatānyabhūvan/
K10divyav_u:14515: 312.033. imāni tāni pañca etadbhadrikaśatāni tena kālena tena samayena pañcamātrāṇi dārakaśatāni <313>abhūvan/
K10divyav_u:14516: 313.001. syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena tasmin mahāśmaśāne uccaṃgamo nāma pakṣī babhūva/
K10divyav_u:14518: 313.002. kauṇḍinyo bhikṣustena kālena tena samayenoñcaṃgamo nāma pakṣī babhūva/
K10divyav_u:14519: 313.003. syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena brahmaprabho nāma māṇavo 'bhūt/
K10divyav_u:14521: 313.005. ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena brahmaprabho nāma māṇavo 'bhūt/
K10divyav_u:14522: 313.005. syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyau tau tena kālena tena samayena brahmaprabhasya māṇavasya mātāpitarau abhūtām/
K10divyav_u:14524: 313.007. rājā śuddhodano māyādevī tena kālena tena samayena brahmaprabhasya māṇavasya mātāpitarau abhūvatām/
K10divyav_u:14525: 313.008. syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vanamabhūt/
K10divyav_u:14526: 313.009. .... syādbhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyau tau tena kālena tena samayena dvau brahmarṣī abhūtām/
K10divyav_u:14528: 313.010. maitreyo bodhisattvaḥ suprabhaśca buddhastena kālena tena samayena tasmin vanaṣaṇḍe dvau brahmarṣī abhūtām/
K10divyav_u:14529: 313.011. syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vyāghrī babhūva/
K10divyav_u:14531: 313.012. kauṇḍinyo bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena dvau vyāghrapotau babhūvatuḥ/
K10divyav_u:14533: 313.015. nando bhikṣū rāhulaśca tena kālena tena samayena vyāghrapotakau abhūtām/
K10divyav_u:14534: 313.016. tadā me bhikṣavaścatvāriṃśatkalpasamprasthito maitreyo bodhisattva ekena galaparityāgena paścānmukhīkṛtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:14536: 313.017. evaṃ sacet sarve sattvā jānīyuh--dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca vipākam yathā ahaṃ jānābhi dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca
K10divyav_u:14540: 313.020. yasmāttarhi bhikṣavaḥ sattvā na jānanti dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca vipākam,
K10divyav_u:14541: tasmātsattvā yo 'sau caramaḥ kavalaḥ paścima ālopaḥ,
K10divyav_u:14544: 313.023. punākṛtaṃ na paśyati no śubhāśubhaṃ na sevitam/
K10divyav_u:14545: 313.024. na paśyati paṇḍite jane na nāśametyāryagaṇe//3//
K10divyav_u:14546: 313.025. śubhāśubhaṃ kṛtaṃ kṛtajñeṣu na jātu naśyati/
K10divyav_u:14550: 313.028. āttamanaso bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇya upāsakā upāsikā devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragāḥ sarvāvatī ca pariṣadbhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan//
K10divyav_u:14555: 314.002. ekasmin samaye bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme/
K10divyav_u:14556: 314.003. athāyuṣmānānandaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
K10divyav_u:14557: 314.004. athāyuṣmānānandaḥ śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyo yenānyatamamudapānaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:14558: 314.005. tena khalu samayena tasminnudapāne prakṛtir nāma mātaṅgadārikā udakamuddharate sma/
K10divyav_u:14559: 314.006. athāyuṣmānānandaḥ prakṛtiṃ mātaṅgadārikāmetadavocat--dehi me bhagini pānīyam, pāsyāmi/
K10divyav_u:14561: 314.008. nāhaṃ te bhagini kulaṃ vā jātiṃ vā pṛcchāmi/
K10divyav_u:14566: 314.011. atha prakṛtirmātaṅgadārikā athāyuṣmata ānandasya śarīre mukhe svare ca sādhu
K10divyav_u:14567: ca suṣṭhu ca nimittamudgṛhītvā yoniśomanasikāreṇāviṣṭā saṃrāgacittamutpādayati sma--āryo
K10divyav_u:14571: 314.013. atha prakṛtirmātaṅgadārikā pānīyaghaṭamādāya yena caṇḍālagṛhaṃ tenopasaṃkramya
K10divyav_u:14572: pānīyaghaṭamekānte nikṣipya svāṃ jananīmidamavocat--yatkhalu evamamba jānīyāh--ānando
K10divyav_u:14576: sā tāmavocat--śaktāhaṃ putri ānandamānayituṃ sthāpayitvā yo mṛtaḥ syādyo vā vītarāgaḥ/
K10divyav_u:14578: 314.018. rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ śramaṇagautamamatīva sevate bhajate paryupāsane/
K10divyav_u:14583: 314.020. evamuktā prakṛtirmātaṅgadārikā mātaramidamavocat--sacedadamba śramaṇo gautamo vītarāgaḥ,
K10divyav_u:14589: 314.024. atha prakṛtermātaṅgadārikā mātā madhye gṛhāṅganasya gomayenopalepanaṃ kṛtvā
K10divyav_u:14590: vedīmālipya darbhān saṃstīrya agniṃ pajvālya aṣṭaśatamarkapuṣpāṇāṃ gṛhītvā mantrānāvartayamānā
K10divyav_u:14596: 314.028. vismayaṃ mahārājasya samabhivardhayituṃ devebhyo manuṣyebhyo gandharvebhyaḥ
K10divyav_u:14597: śikhigrahā devā viśikhigrahā devā ānandasyāgamanāya saṃgamanāya kramaṇāya grāṇāya juhomi svāhā //
K10divyav_u:14599: 315.001. sa vihārānniṣkramya yena caṇḍālagṛhaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmati sma/
K10divyav_u:14601: 315.002. dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prakṛtiṃ duhitaramidamavocat--ayamasau putri śramaṇa ānanda āgacchati/
K10divyav_u:14603: 315.004. atha prakṛtirmātaṅgadārikā hṛṣṭatuṣṭā pramuditamanā āyuṣmata ānandasya śayyāṃ prajñapayati sma//
K10divyav_u:14615: 315.011. ītayo yatra śāmyanti bhayāni calitāni ca//1//
K10divyav_u:14620: 315.016. dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ svāṃ jananīmidamavocat--ayamasau mātaḥ śramaṇa ānandaḥ pratigacchati/
K10divyav_u:14621: 315.017. tāmāha mātā--niyataṃ putri śramaṇena gautamena samanvāhṛto bhaviṣyati/

K10divyav_u:15167: 330.001. ete brāhmaṇā ekaviṃśatyadhvaryavo bhūtvā ekottaraśatadhā bhinnāḥ/

K10divyav_u:15184: 330.010. anumānamapi brāhmaṇa pramāṇaṃ pratītya etāni dvādaśabhedaśatāni ṣoḍaśabhedāśca ye brāhmaṇaiḥ pauraṇaiḥ samyag dṛṣṭāḥ/
K10divyav_u:15185: 330.011. chandasi vā vyākaraṇe vā lokayate vā padamīmāṃsāyāṃ vā/
K10divyav_u:15188: 330.012. tatte brāhmaṇa bravīmi--saṃjñāmātrakametallokasya yaduta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
K10divyav_u:15190: 330.014. putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitamutsṛja bhāryārthāya/
K10divyav_u:15192: 330.016. idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkormātaṅgarājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tūṣṇīmbhūto madgubhūtaḥ srastaskandho 'dhomukho niṣpratibhaḥ pradhyānaparo 'sthāt//
K10divyav_u:15193: 330.018. dadarśa triśaṅkurmātaṅgarājo brāhmaṇaṃ puṣkarasāriṇaṃ tūṣṇīmbhūtaṃ madgubhūtaṃ srastaskandhamadhomukhaṃ niṣpratibhaṃ pradhyānaparaṃ
K10divyav_u:15194: 330.019. dṛṣṭvā ca punaridamabravīt--yadapi te brāhmaṇa evaṃ syādasadṛśena saha saṃbandho bhaviṣyatīti/
K10divyav_u:15197: ye pramāṇaśrutiśīlaprajñādayo guṇā agryā lokasya te mama putrasya śārdūlakarṇasya saṃvidyante/
K10divyav_u:15198: 330.022. yadapi te brāhmaṇa evaṃ syāt--ye vājapeyam yajñam yajanti,
K10divyav_u:15199: aśvamedhaṃ puruṣamedhaṃ śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍam yajñam yajanti,
K10divyav_u:15200: sarve te kāyasya bhedātsugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyanta iti/
K10divyav_u:15203: vājapeyaṃ brāhmaṇa yajñam yajamānā aśvamedhaṃ puruṣamedhaṃ śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍam yajña ca yajamānā bahudhā mantrān pravartayantaḥ prāṇihiṃsāṃ ca pravartayanti/
K10divyav_u:15204: 330.026. tasmātte brāhmaṇa bravīmi--na hyeṣa mārgaḥ svargāya/
K10divyav_u:15205: 330.026. ahaṃ te brāhmaṇa mārgaṃ svargāya vyākhyāmi/
K10divyav_u:15208: 330.029. praśaṃsāṃ vittalābhaṃ ca pratya svarge ca modanam//70//
K10divyav_u:15209: 330.030. yairbrāhmaṇa itaḥ pūrvaṃ vājapeyo yajña iṣṭaḥ,
K10divyav_u:15210: yairaśvamedho yaiḥ puruṣamedho yaiḥ śāmyaprāśo yair nirargaḍo yajña iṣṭaḥ,
K10divyav_u:15214: ye 'śvamedham ye śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍam yajñam yakṣyanti,
K10divyav_u:15216: 331.002. tasmātte brāhmaṇa bravīmi--ehi tvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ saṃbandham yojanayasva/
K10divyav_u:15220: 331.005. śraddhā śīlaṃ tapastyāgaḥ śrutirjñānaṃ dayaiva ca//
K10divyav_u:15225: 331.008. aṣṭau cemā brāhmaṇa nirdiṣṭā mātṛtulyā bhaginyo loke pravartante/
K10divyav_u:15235: 331.012. atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin brāhmaṇānāṃ sapta gautrāṇi svākhyāsyāmi,
K10divyav_u:15236: tāni śrūyantām--tadyathā gautamā vātsyāḥ kautsāḥ kāśyapā vāsiṣṭhā māṇḍavyā ityetāni brāhmaṇa sapta gotrāṇi/
K10divyav_u:15238: 331.014. atra ye gautamāste kauthumāste gagarste bhāradvājāsta ārṣṭiṣeṇāste vaikhānasāste vajrapādāḥ/
K10divyav_u:15239: 331.015. tatra ye vātsyāsta ātreyāste maitreyāste bhārgavāste sāvarṇyāste bahujātāḥ/
K10divyav_u:15240: 331.016. tatra ye vātsyāsta ātreyāsta maitreyāste bhārgavāste sāvarṇyāste salīlāste bahujātāḥ/
K10divyav_u:15241: 331.016. tatra ye kautsāste maudgalyāyanāste gauṇāyanāste lāṅgalāste lagnāste daṇḍalagnāste somabhuvāh{vah}/
K10divyav_u:15242: 331.017. tatra ye kauśikāste kātyāyanāste darbhakātyāyanāste valkalinaste pakṣiṇaste laukākṣāste lohitāyanāh (lohityāyanāḥ/)/
K10divyav_u:15243: 331.018. tatra ye kāśyapāste maṇḍanāsta iṣṭāste śauṇḍāyanāste rocaneyāste 'napekṣāste 'gniveśyāḥ/
K10divyav_u:15244: 331.019. tatra ye kāśyapāste jātukarṇyāste dhānyāyanāste pārāśarāste vyāghranakhāste āṇḍāyanāsta aupamanyavāḥ/
K10divyav_u:15245: 331.021. tatra ye māṇḍavyāste bhāṇḍāyanāste dhomrāyaṇāste kātyāyanāste khalvavāahanāste sugandhārāyaṇāste kāpiṣṭhalāyanāḥ/
K10divyav_u:15246: 331.022. ityetāni brāhmaṇa evamekonapañcāśadgotrāṇi brāhmaṇaiḥ paurāṇaiḥ samyag dṛṣṭāni cchandasi vyākaraṇe padamīmāṃsāyām/
K10divyav_u:15247: 331.023. anyāni ca gotrāṇi vistarato mayā vācitāni/
K10divyav_u:15250: 331.025. tasmātte brāhmaṇa bravīmi sāmānyaṃ saṃjñāmātrakamidaṃ lokasya yaduta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
K10divyav_u:15252: 331.027. putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaramutsṛja bhāryārthāya/
K10divyav_u:15254: 331.029. idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkormātaṅgarājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tūṣṇīmbhūto madgubhūtaḥ srastaskandho 'dhomukho niṣpratibhaḥ pradhyānaparaḥ sthito 'bhūt/
K10divyav_u:15255: 331.030. adrākṣīt triśaṅkurmātaṅgarājah <332>puskarasāriṇaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ tūṣṇīmbhūtaṃ madgubhūtaṃ srastaskandhamadhomukhaṃ niṣpratibhaṃ pradhyānaparaṃ
K10divyav_u:15257: 332.003. yādṛśaṃ vāpyate bījaṃ tādṛśaṃ labhyate phalam/
K10divyav_u:15264: 332.010. bhavette bhavinī bhāryā naitad brāhmaṇa yujyate//75//
K10divyav_u:15265: 332.011. yadi tāvadayaṃ loko brahmaṇā janitaḥ svayam/
K10divyav_u:15267: 332.013. atha vaiśyasya vaiśyā vai śūdrā vā punaḥ/
K10divyav_u:15268: 332.014. na bhāryā bhaginī yuktā brahmaṇā janitā yadi//77//
K10divyav_u:15269: 332.015. na sattvā brahmaṇo jātāḥ kleśajāḥ karmajāstvamī/
K10divyav_u:15271: 332.017. teṣāṃ ca jātisāmānyād brāhmaṇe kṣatriye tathā/
K10divyav_u:15272: 332.018. atha vaiśye ca śūdre ca samaṃ jñānaṃ pravartate//79//
K10divyav_u:15277: 332.023. manojavā ca gāndhārī ghorī vidyā vaśaṃkarī/
K10divyav_u:15278: 332.024. kākavāṇī ca mantraṃ ca indrajālaṃ ca bhañjanī//82//
K10divyav_u:15284: 332.030. na hyasau brāhmaṇīputraḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa manyase//85//
K10divyav_u:15287: 333.003. na hyasau brāhmaṇīputraḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi//86//
K10divyav_u:15288: 333.004. kṣatriyā reṇukā nāma jajñe rāmaṃ mahāmunim/
K10divyav_u:15290: 333.006. na hyasau brāhmaṇīputraḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi//87//
K10divyav_u:15291: 333.007. ye ca te manujā āsaṃs tejasā tapasā yutāḥ/
K10divyav_u:15293: 333.009. na hi te brāhmaṇīputrāḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi//88//
K10divyav_u:15296: 333.012. tasmātte brāhmaṇa bravīmi saṃjñāmātrakamidaṃ lokasya yaduta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
K10divyav_u:15298: 333.013. putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaramanuprayaccha bhāryārthāya/
K10divyav_u:15300: 333.015. idaṃ ca punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkormātaṅgarājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅgarājamidamavocat--kiṃgotro bhavān?
K10divyav_u:15331: 333.025. bhūtapūrvaṃ brāhmaṇa atīte 'dhvani vasur nāma ṛṣirbabhūva/
K10divyav_u:15333: 333.026. tena tatra takṣakaduhitā kapilā nāma āsaditā bhāryārtham/
K10divyav_u:15334: 333.026. sa tatra saṃraktacittastayā kanyayā sārdhaṃ maithunamagacchat/
K10divyav_u:15336: 333.028. ṛddhiparihīnaḥ sa vipratisārī ātmano duścaritaṃ vigarhāṇastasyāṃ velāyāṃ sāvitrīṃ bhāṣate sma/
K10divyav_u:15341: 333.031. iti hi brāhmaṇa ajñānaśodhanārthamimameva mantraṃ sa brāhmaṇo divārātraṃ japati sma/
K10divyav_u:15356: 334.007. kāmā hi loke paramāḥ prajānāṃ kleśaprahāṇe bhūtā antarāyāḥ/
K10divyav_u:15357: 334.009. tasmādbhavantaḥ prajahantu kāmāṃs tato 'tulaṃ prāpsyatha brahmalokam//91//
K10divyav_u:15358: 334.011. itīyaṃ brāhmaṇa brahmaṇā sahāpatinā sāvitrī bhāṣitā,
K10divyav_u:15366: 334.015. kṛttikā rohiṇī mṛgaśirā ārdrā punarvasuḥ puṣyah āśleṣā maghā pūrvaphalgunī
K10divyav_u:15367: uttaraphalgunī hastā citrā svātī viśākhā anurādhā anurādhā jyeṣṭā mūlā pūrvāṣāḍhā
K10divyav_u:15368: uttarāṣāḍhā abhijit śravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā śatabhiṣā pūrvabhādrapadā uttarabhādrapadā
K10divyav_u:15371: 334.019. katitārakāṇi katisaṃsthānāni katimuhūrtayogāni kimāhārāṇi kiṃdaivatāni kiṃgotrāṇi?
K10divyav_u:15372: 334.021. kṛttikā bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatraṃ ṣaṭtāraṃ kṣurasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ dadhyāhāramagnidaivataṃ vaiśyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15373: 334.022. rohiṇīnakṣatraṃ pañcatārakaṃ śakaṭākṛtisaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ mṛgamāṃsāhāraṃ prajāpatidaivataṃ bhāradvājaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15374: 334.023. mṛgāśirānakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ mṛgaśīrṣasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ phalamūlāhāraṃ somadaivataṃ mṛgāyaṇīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15375: 334.024. ārdrānakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcadaśamuhūrtayogaṃ sarpirmaṇḍāhāraṃ sūryadaivataṃ hārītāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15376: 334.026. punarvasunakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padasaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ madhyāhāram aditidaivataṃ vāsiṣṭhaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15377: 334.027. puṣyanakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ vardhamānasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ madhumaṇḍāhāraṃ bṛhaspatidaivatam aupamanyavīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15378: 334.028. āśleṣānakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcadaśamuhūrtayogaṃ pāyasabhojanaṃ sarpadaivataṃ maitrāyaṇīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15379: 334.029. itīmāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta nakṣatrāṇi pūrvadvārakāṇi//
K10divyav_u:15380: 334.031. maghānakṣatraṃ pañcatāraṃ nadīkubjasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ tilakṛsarāhāraṃ titṛdaivatam <335>piṅgalāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15381: 335.001. pūrvaphalgunīnakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padakasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ bilvabhojanaṃ bhavadaivataṃ gautamīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15382: 335.002. uttaraphalgunīnakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ godhūmamatsyāhāramaryamādaivataṃ kauśikaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15383: 335.003. hastanakṣatraṃ pañcatāraṃ hastasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ śyāmākabhojanaṃ sūryadaivataṃ kāśyapaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15384: 335.004. citrānakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ mudgakṛsaraghṛtapūpāhāraṃ tvaṣṭṛdaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15385: 335.005. svātīnakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcadaśamuhūrtayogaṃ mudgakṛsaraphalāhāraṃ vāyudaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15386: 335.007. viśākhānakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ viṣāṇasaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ tilapuṣpāhāramindrāgnidaivataṃ śākhāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15388: 335.009. anurādhānakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ ratnāvalīsaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ surāmāṃsāhāraṃ mitradaivatamālambāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15389: 335.010. jyeṣṭhānakṣatraṃ tritāram yavamadhyasaṃsthānaṃ pañcadaśamuhūrtayogaṃ śāliyavāgūbhojanamindradaivataṃ dīrghakātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15390: 335.011. mūlanakṣatraṃ saptatāraṃ vṛścikasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ mūlaphalāhāraṃ nairṛtidaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15391: 335.012. pūrvāṣāḍhānakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ govikramasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ nyagrodhakaṣāyāhāraṃ toyadaivataṃ darbhakātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15392: 335.013. uttarāṣāḍhānakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ gajavikramasaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ madhulājāhāraṃ viśvadaivataṃ maudgalāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15393: 335.015. abhijinnakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ gośīrṣasaṃsthānaṃ ṣaṇmuhūrtayogaṃ vāyvāhāraṃ brahmadaivataṃ brahmāvatīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15394: 335.016. śravaṇānakṣatraṃ tritāram yavamadhyasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ pakṣimāṃsāhāraṃ viṣṇudaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15395: 335.017. ityetāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta nakṣatrāṇi paścimadvārakāṇi//
K10divyav_u:15396: 335.019. dhaniṣṭhānakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ śakunasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ kulatthapūpāhāraṃ vasudaivataṃ kauṇḍinyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15397: 335.020. śatabhiṣānakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcadaśamuhūrtayogam yavāgubhojanaṃ varuṇadaivataṃ tāṇḍyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15398: 335.021. pūrvabhādrapadānakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padakasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ māṃsarudhirāhāramahirbudhnyadaivataṃ jātūkarṇyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15399: 335.022. uttarabhādrapadānakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ māṃsāhāram aryamādaivataṃ dhyānadrāhyāyaṇīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15400: 335.024. revatīnakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ madhupāyasabhojanaṃ gandharvadaivataṃ maitrāyaṇīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15401: 335.026. bharaṇīnakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ bhagasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ tilataṇḍulāhāram yamadaivataṃ bhārgavīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divyav_u:15402: 335.027. ityetāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta nakṣatrāṇi uttaradvārakāṇi//
K10divyav_u:15403: 335.028. amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭaviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ ṣaṇnakṣatrāṇi pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogāni/
K10divyav_u:15404: 335.029. tadyathā--rohiṇī punarvasu uttaraphalgunī viśākhā uttarāṣāḍhā uttarabhādrapadā ceti/
K10divyav_u:15406: 335.030. tadyathā--ārdrā āśleṣā svātī jyeṣṭhā śatabhiṣā ceti/
K10divyav_u:15409: 336.001. <336>amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ pūrvadvārikāṇāṃ kṛttikā prathamā nāmā,
K10divyav_u:15411: 336.002. amīṣāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ dakṣiṇadvārīkāṇāṃ maghā prathamā nāma,
K10divyav_u:15413: 336.003. amīṣāṃ paścimadvārikāṇāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāmanurādhā prathamā nāma,
K10divyav_u:15415: 336.004. amīṣāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāmuttaradvārikāṇāṃ dhaniṣṭhā prathamā nāma,
K10divyav_u:15417: 336.006. amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ sapta balāni/
K10divyav_u:15419: yaduta trīṇi pūrvāṇi viśākhānurādhā punarvasuḥ punarvasuḥ svātiśca/
K10divyav_u:15425: 336.009. śravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā śatabhiṣā jyeṣṭhā mūlā iti/
K10divyav_u:15429: 336.010. yaduta kṛttikā mṛgaśirā puṣyā aśvinī ceti//
K10divyav_u:15430: 336.011. amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭhāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ trayo yogā bhavanti--ṛṣabhānusārī yogaḥ/
K10divyav_u:15433: 336.012. tatra nakṣatram yadi purastādgacchati candraśca pṛṣṭhataḥ,
K10divyav_u:15435: 336.013. yaduta candraḥ purastād gacchati nakṣatraṃ ca pṛṣṭhataḥ,
K10divyav_u:15437: 336.014. yadi punaścandro nakṣatraṃ cobhau samau yugapad gacchataḥ,

K10divyav_u:18628: 421.030. syātte brāhmaṇa kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena brahmā devānāṃ pravaro 'bhūt/

K10divyav_u:18647: 422.010. so 'haṃ brāhmaṇa tvāṃ bravīmi--sāmānyasaṃjñāmātrakamidaṃ lokasya brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
K10divyav_u:18649: 422.011. putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaramanuprayaccha bhāryārthāya/

K10divyav_u:18657: 422.021. nārhasi bho upādhyāya vidyamāneṣu brāhmaṇeṣu cāṇḍālena sārdhaṃ saṃbandhaṃ kartum//
K10divyav_u:18658: 422.023. atha brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī teṣāṃ nidānaṃ nidāya śabdaṃ saṃsthāpya nipatya ślokenaitānarthānabhāṣata--

K10divyav_u:18662: triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅgarājamidamavocat--ayaṃ bhostriśaṅko brahmaṇā sahāpatinā cātrumahābhaitiko

K10divyav_u:18672: 423.005. pitrā ca mātrā ca kṛtāni karmāṇi bhavanti/
K10divyav_u:18674: 423.007. gacchanti sattvā bahugarbhayoniṃ na caiva kaścinmanujo hyayoniḥ/

K10divyav_u:18679: 423.017. sahāsthicarmāḥ sanakhāḥ samāṃsā duḥkhī sukhī mūtrapurīṣayuktāḥ/

K10divyav_u:18681: 423.021. mantrairhi yadi labhyeta svargaṃ tu gamanaṃ dvijaḥ/
K10divyav_u:18685: 423.025. māṇavakaśateṣu sa tatra vinihato mahāyaśasā triśaṅkunā puṣkarasārī brāhmaṇo 'bravīt--brāhmaṇo 'sau mātaṅgarājo hi triśaṅkur nāma/
K10divyav_u:18691: 423.029. jñānena hi tvaṃ parameṇa yuktaḥ sarveṣu śāstreṣu bhavān kṛtārthaḥ/
K10divyav_u:18692: 424.001. <424>śreṣṭho viśiṣṭo paramo 'si loke bhavān hi vidyācaraṇena yuktaḥ//1077//

K10divyav_u:18699: 424.014. dharmeṇa vai kārayati svarājyaṃ kṣemaṃ subhikṣaṃ ca sadotsavāḍhyam//1080// iti/
K10divyav_u:18700: 424.016. syād bhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena triśaṅkur nāma mātaṅgarājo 'bhūt?

K10divyav_u:18705: 424.019. eṣa sa ānando bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena śārdūlakarṇo nāma mātaṅgarājakumāro 'bhūt/
K10divyav_u:18706: 424.021. syādevam yuṣmākam--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇo 'bhūt/
K10divyav_u:18708: 424.022. eṣa śāradvatīputro bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇo 'bhūt/
K10divyav_u:18709: 424.023. nānyā sā tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitābhūt/
K10divyav_u:18711: 424.024. eṣā sā prakṛtirbhikṣuṇī tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitābhūt/
K10divyav_u:18712: 424.025. sā etarhi tenaiva snehena tenaiva premṇā ānandaṃ bhikṣuṃ gacchantamanugacchati tiṣṭhantamanutiṣṭhati/

K10divyav_u:18724: tīvracchando vīryaṃ vyāyāma utsāha unnatiraprativāṇiḥ smṛtyā saṃprajanyenāpramādato yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ //
K10divyav_u:18725: 425.007. asmiṃśca khalu punardharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe bhikṣūṇāṃ ṣaṣṭimātrāṇāmanupādāya āsravebhyaścittāani vimuktāni/
K10divyav_u:18726: 425.008. saṃbahulānāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ brahmaṇāṃ gṛhapatīnāṃ ca virajaskaṃ vigatamalaṃ dharmacakṣurudapādi viśuddham//
K10divyav_u:18733: 426.002. ekasmin samaye bhagavāñchrāvastyāṃ viahrati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdham/
K10divyav_u:18734: 426.003. tatra {bhagavān} bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--saptagtriṃśatā bhikṣava ākāraiḥ paṇḍito dānaṃ dadāti/
K10divyav_u:18761: 426.022. tathāagatacaityeṣu tathāgatabimbeṣu ca sugandhodakasnānaṃ dānaṃ dadāti dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanavipākapratilābhasaṃvartanīyam/

K10divyav_u:18786: sa kathayati--mamāpatyaṃ jātaṃ jātaṃ kālaṃ karoti/

K10divyav_u:18830: 427.027. mahāpanthako dāraka unnīto vardhito mahān saṃvṛttaḥ/

K10divyav_u:18833: bhoskāre ṛgvede yajurvede sāmavede 'tharvavede yajane yājane 'dhyayane 'dhyāpane dāne pratigrahe /

K10divyav_u:18844: sa vaktavyah--ayaṃ dāraka āryasya pādābhivandanaṃ karoti/

K10divyav_u:18865: 428.012. panthako dāraka unnīto vardhito mahān saṃvṛttiḥ/

K10divyav_u:18896: 428.029. āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau pañcaśataparivārau kosaleṣu jānapadeṣu cārikāṃ carantau śrāvastīmanuprāptau/
K10divyav_u:18897: 428.030. śrāvastyāṃ janakāyena śrutam--āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau pañcaśataparivārau kosaleṣu jānapadeṣu cārikāṃ carantau śrāvastīmanuprāptau/
K10divyav_u:18898: 428.031. śrutvā ca punaḥ sa janakāyo bahir nirgantumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:18899: 428.032. mahāpanthako 'pi bahiḥ śrāvastyāmanyatamasmin vṛkṣamūle <429>pañcamātrāṇi māṇavakaśatāni brāhmaṇakān mantrān vācayati/
K10divyav_u:18900: 429.001. tena sa janakāyaḥ śrāvastyā nirgacchan dṛṣṭaḥ/
K10divyav_u:18904: bhadantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau pañcaśataparivārau kosaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caritvā iha śrāvastīmanuprāptau,
K10divyav_u:18907: yatredānīṃ tadagraṃ varṇamapahāya dvitīyavarṇasya śramaṇasya gautamasyāntike pravrajitau/
K10divyav_u:18914: 429.007. ācaritaṃ teṣāṃ māṇavakānām yadā apāṭhā bhavanti,
K10divyav_u:18918: 429.009. apareṇa samayena te sarve apāṭhāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/

K10divyav_u:18963: te kathayanti--āryo mahāpanthakaḥ pañcaśataparivātaḥ kosaleṣu <430>janapadeṣu cārikāṃ carañ śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ/

K10divyav_u:18973: sa kathayati--ahaṃ cūḍaḥ paramacūḍo dhanvaḥ paramadhanvaḥ/

K10divyav_u:18981: 430.010. riktaḥ kāmaiḥ smṛtimān saṃprajānan duḥkhaṃ na sa vidyādanarthopasaṃhitam//1//
K10divyav_u:18982: 430.012. tasyaiṣā gāthā traimāsyenāpi na vṛttā jātā/
K10divyav_u:18983: 430.012. anyeṣāṃ gopālakānāṃ paśupālakānāṃ śrutvā pravṛttā jātā/
K10divyav_u:18986: 430.013. dharmatā khalu yathā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dvau śrāvakāṇāṃ saṃnipātau bhavataḥ,
K10divyav_u:18990: te tāṃstān manasikāraviśeṣānādāya tāsu tāsu grāmanigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu varṣā upagacchanti/
K10divyav_u:18994: 430.018. āyuṣmato mahāpanthakasya sārdhaṃvihāryantevāsikā bhikṣavo janapade varṣoṣitāḥ,
K10divyav_u:18999: 430.020. tatra ye cūḍā bhavanti paramacūḍā dhanvāḥ paramadhanvāḥ,
K10divyav_u:19001: 430.022. āyuṣmān panthakaḥ ṣaḍvargīyān sevate bhajate paryupāsate/
K10divyav_u:19006: na tvekā gāthā mama vṛttā jātā,
K10divyav_u:19013: 430.028. āyuṣmān mahāpanthakaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kimasyedaṃ svaṃ pratibhānamāhosvit kenacitprayuktah?
K10divyav_u:19017: 430.031. sa tena grīvāayāṃ gṛhītvā bahirvihārasya niṣkāsitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:19023: 431.001. dṛṣṭvā ca punarāgacchantamidamavocat--kasmāttvaṃ pathaka vahirvihārasya rodiṣyasi,
K10divyav_u:19027: 431.004. bhagavānāha--nedaṃ vatsa maunīndraṃ vacanaṃ tavopādhyāyena tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyairaneikairduṣkaraśatasahasraiḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrya
K10divyav_u:19028: api tu mayedaṃ maunīndraṃ pravacanaṃ tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyairanaikairduṣkaraśatasahasraiḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrya samudānītam/
K10divyav_u:19030: ahamasmi bhadanta cūḍaḥ paramacūḍo dhanvaḥ paramadhanvaḥ/
K10divyav_u:19032: 431.009. yo bālo bālabhāvena paṇḍitastatra tena saḥ/
K10divyav_u:19033: 431.010. bālaḥ paṇḍitamānī tu sa vai bāla ihocyate//2//
K10divyav_u:19034: 431.011. asthānamanavakāśo yadbuddhā bhagavantaḥ padaśo dharmaṃ vācayiṣyanti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate/
K10divyav_u:19035: 431.012. tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma--imaṃ pāṭhaya tvamānanda panthakam/
K10divyav_u:19043: 431.015. bhagavatā tasya dve pade datte--rajo harāmi,
K10divyav_u:19060: 431.023. athāyuṣmataḥ panthakasya rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye etadabhavat--bhagavānevamāha--rajo harāmi,
K10divyav_u:19062: 431.024. kiṃ nu bhagavānādhyātmikaṃ rajaḥ saṃdhāyāha āhosvidbāhyam?
K10divyav_u:19063: tasyaivaṃ cintayatastasyāṃ velāyāmaṣrutapūrvāstisro gāthā āmukhīpravṛttā jātāh--
K10divyav_u:19064: 431.026. rajo 'tra rāgo na hi reṇureṣa rajo rāgasyādhivacanaṃ na reṇoḥ/
K10divyav_u:19065: 431.028. etadrajaḥ prativinudanti paṇḍitā na ye pramattāḥ sugatasya śāsane//3//
K10divyav_u:19066: 431.030. rajo 'tra dveṣo na hi reṇureṣa rajo dveṣasyādhivacanaṃ na reṇoḥ/
K10divyav_u:19067: 432.001. <432>etadrajaḥ prativinudanti paṇḍitā na ye pramattāḥ sugatasya śāsane//4//
K10divyav_u:19068: 432.003. rajo 'tra moho na hi reṇureṣa rajo mohasyādhivacanaṃ na reṇoḥ/
K10divyav_u:19069: 432.005. etadrajaḥ prativinudanti paṇḍitā na ye pramattāaḥ sugatasya śāsane//5//
K10divyav_u:19076: 432.011. sa tena bāhau gṛhītvoktah--āgaccha svādhyāyinikāṃ tāvatkuru,
K10divyav_u:19080: 432.013. āyuṣmatā mahāpanthakena pṛṣṭato mukhaṃ vyavalokayatā dṛṣṭaḥ/
K10divyav_u:19082: evaṃ te tvayā guṇagaṇā adhigatāh? adhigatāḥ//
K10divyav_u:19085: 432.017. śramaṇo gautama evamāha--gambhīro me dharmo gambhīrāvabhāso durdṛśo durnubodho 'tarko 'tarkāvacaraḥ,
K10divyav_u:19088: yasyedānīṃ panthakaprabhṛtayaścūḍāḥ paramacūḍā dhanvāḥ paramadhanvāḥ pravrajanti/
K10divyav_u:19089: 432.020. bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--sumeruprakhye mahāśrāvake mahājanakāyaḥ kṣāntiṃ gṛhṇāti/
K10divyav_u:19093: 432.022. evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yenāyuṣmān panthakastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:19094: 432.023. upasaṃkramyāyuṣmantaṃ panthakamidamavocat--śāstā tvāmāyuṣman panthaka evamāha--bhikṣuṇyaste avavaditavyā iti/
K10divyav_u:19095: 432.024. āyuṣmān panthakaḥ kathayati--kimarthaṃ sthavirasthavirān bhikṣūnapahāya māṃ bhagavān bhikṣuṇyavavādakamājñāpayati?
K10divyav_u:19122: 433.004. ṣaḍjanyaḥ śrāvastyāṃ praviśya rathya rathyāvīthicatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣvārocayantu--so 'smākaṃ tādṛśo 'vavādaka āgamiṣyati,
K10divyav_u:19125: 433.006. yena na kaścit putramoṭikāputro 'lpaśruta utsahate bhikṣuṇīravavaditum/
K10divyav_u:19126: 433.007. tāsāṃ ṣaḍbhir janībhir dvādaśahastikābhir latābhiḥ saṃhāsanaṃ prajñaptam,
K10divyav_u:19127: ṣaḍbhikṣuṇībhiḥ śrāvastīṃ praviśya rathyāvīthicatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣvārocitam--so 'smākaṃ tādṛśo 'vavādaka āgamiṣyati,
K10divyav_u:19130: 433.010. āyuṣmān panthakaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
K10divyav_u:19131: 433.011. kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktāpiṇḍapātrapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratisamayya pādau prakṣālya vihāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ pratisamlayanāya/
K10divyav_u:19132: 433.012. athāyuṣmān panthakaḥ sāyāhne pratisamlayanāya vyutthāya saṃghāṭīmādāya anyatamena bhikṣuṇā paścāccramaṇena saṃprasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:19135: 433.014. adrākṣīt sā pariṣat āyuṣmantaṃ panthakaṃ dūrādeva/
K10divyav_u:19136: 433.015. dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ parasparaṃ pṛcchati--kataro 'tra bhikṣuṇyavavādakah?
K10divyav_u:19146: 433.019. apare kathayanti--tiṣṭhāmo yadi dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati, śroṣyāmaḥ/
K10divyav_u:19149: 433.020. āyuṣmatā panthakena siṃhāsanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ prajñaptakaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ tāvat prasādajātābhiḥ prajñaptamāhosvit viheṭhanābhiprāyābhih?
K10divyav_u:19151: 433.020. dṛṣṭvā saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ tāvat prasādajātābhiḥ prajñaptamāhosvit viheṭhanābhiprasāyābhih?
K10divyav_u:19153: 433.022. āyuṣmatā panthakena gajabhujasadṛśaṃ bāhumabhiprasārya taṃ siṃhāsanam yathāsthāne sthāpitam/
K10divyav_u:19155: 433.023. sa niṣīdan kaiścit dṛṣṭah. kaiścit na dṛṣṭaḥ/
K10divyav_u:19156: 433.024. athātrastha āyuṣmān panthakastadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte sve āsane 'ntarhitaḥ,
K10divyav_u:19157: pūrvasyāṃ diśi uparivihāyasamabhyudgamya pūrvavat yāvat ṛddhiprātihāryāṇi vidarśya tān ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān pratiprasrabhya prajñapta evāsane
K10divyav_u:19158: 433.026. niṣadya āyuṣmān panthakastā bhikṣuṇīrāmantrayate--mayā bhaginyastribhirmāsairekā gāthā paṭhitā/
K10divyav_u:19161: 433.029. pāpaṃ na kuryānmanasā na vācā kāyena vā kiṃcana sarvaloke/
K10divyav_u:19162: 433.031. riktaḥ kāmeiḥ smṛtimān saṃprajānan duḥkhaṃ na sa vidyādanarthopasaṃhitam//6//iti/
K10divyav_u:19172: 434.005. yadbhūyasā sā pariṣad buddhaniṃnādharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā/
K10divyav_u:19173: 434.006. athāyuṣmān panthakastāṃ pariṣadaṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:19175: 434.007. te saṃlakṣayanti--adyāyuṣmatā panthakena mahājanakāyaḥ prasādito bhaviṣyati/
K10divyav_u:19176: 434.008. te na ṣaknuvantyāyuṣmantaṃ panthakaṃ saṃmukhamapriyaṃ praṣṭum/
K10divyav_u:19178: 434.009. āyuṣman, adya āyuṣmatā panthakena kiṃ mahājanakāyo na prasādito vā prasāditah?
K10divyav_u:19180: 434.010. bhagavatā vārāṇasyām ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmyaṃ cakraṃ pravartitam,
K10divyav_u:19184: 434.013. tatra bhagavāan bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikcūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ cetovivartakuśalānām yaduta panthako bhikṣuḥ/
K10divyav_u:19185: 434.014. bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--paśya bhadanta dvādaśavargīyābhirāyuṣmataḥ panthakasyānarthaṃ kariṣyāmi ityatha eva kṛtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:19186: 434.015. bhagavānāha--na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'pyadhvani ābhiranarthaṃ kariṣyāma ityartha eva kṛtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:19190: 434.018. sa tayā sardhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
K10divyav_u:19191: 434.018. tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato bhūyaḥ krīḍati ramate paricārayati yāvar dvādaśa putrā jātāḥ/
K10divyav_u:19196: 434.021. yadā tāsāṃ svāmino bahir nirgatā bhavanti,
K10divyav_u:19201: 434.023. sa puruṣāṇāṃ padaśabdāñ śrutvā tāḥ snuṣā garjayati.
K10divyav_u:19204: 434.026. taistā uktāh--kiṃ kāraṇam yūyaṃ tātasya cakaṭyodanaṃ kāñjikacchiṭiṃ cānuprayacchata?
K10divyav_u:19213: 434.030. tābhiḥ kumbhakāara uktah--śakṣyasi tvaṃ bhadramukham ekamukhike dve sthālyau kartum?
K10divyav_u:19218: 434.032. tābhiḥ svāmināṃ purastādekasya <435>sthālyāṃ taṇḍulāḥ prakṣiptā ekasyāṃ dadhi/
K10divyav_u:19222: 435.003. tābhisteṣāṃ purastāttasyaukasyāḥ sthālyā uddhṛtya cakaṭyodanaṃ dattaṃ dvitīyāyāḥ kañjikam/
K10divyav_u:19223: 435.004. tata evaṃ tābhisteṣāmekasyāḥ sthālyā uddhṛtya śālyodanaṃ dattaṃ dvitīyāyā dadhi uddhṛtam/
K10divyav_u:19231: tena tāsāmapratyakṣaṃ mahānasaṃ praviśya paryeṣamāṇena hastasaṃspatśenaikamukhe dve sthālyau labdhe/
K10divyav_u:19235: 435.010. gatvā paśyadhvamasmākaṃ gṛha eva ekamukhī sthālī/
K10divyav_u:19236: 435.010. putraka, anyeṣu geheṣu na shālīdvayaṃ tvakamukhamasmākaṃ mandabhāgyānām/
K10divyav_u:19242: sa kathayati--kīdṛśaṃ sarpaṃ mṛgayatha jīvantamāhosvit mṛtakamiti?
K10divyav_u:19246: 435.015. dharmatā khalu sarpasya ruṣitasya dvayoḥ sthānayorviṣaṃ saṃkrāmati--śirasi pucche ca/
K10divyav_u:19247: 435.016. tena roṣitvā śiraḥ pucchaṃ svayaṃ chittvā tāsāṃ madhye sarpā dattaḥ/
K10divyav_u:19250: sa brāhmaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kimetā me hilimāṃ jomāṃ dāsyanti?
K10divyav_u:19266: 435.023. tasya tena bāṣpeṇa bhūyasyā mātrayā paṭale sphuṭite/
K10divyav_u:19268: 435.024. tāḥ pūrvam yathā tasyāndhasya tato viśvastā vihṛtavantyastathaiva vihartumārabdhāḥ/
K10divyav_u:19270: 435.025. kathayati ca--kim yūyaṃ jānītha idānīmapyahaṃ na paśyāmi?
K10divyav_u:19275: eṣa evāsau panthakastena kālena tena samayena/
K10divyav_u:19279: 435.029. etarhyapi ābhirasyānarthaṃ kariṣyāma ityartham eva kṛtaḥ//
K10divyav_u:19280: 435.030. bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--paśya bhadanta bhagavatā āyuṣmān
K10divyav_u:19281: panthakaḥ parīttenāvavādenācodya saṃsārakāntārāduttārya atyantaniṣṭhe anuttare yogakṣeme
K10divyav_u:19283: 435.032. bhagavānāha--na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'pyadhvanyeṣo mayā parīttenāvavādenācodya mahatyaiśvaryādhipatye pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:19285: 436.001. <436>bhūtabhūtaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasmin kartavaṭake gṛhapariḥ prativasati āḍyo sahādhano mahābhogaḥ/
K10divyav_u:19287: 436.002. sa tayā sārdhaṃ trīṭati ramate paticārayati/
K10divyav_u:19293: 436.004. sa gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--yadahamasyai prabhūtānaṃ kārṣāpaṇān dāsyāmi,
K10divyav_u:19296: 436.006. tasmin karpaṭake śreṣṭhī prativasati tasya gṛhapatervayasyaḥ/
K10divyav_u:19297: 436.006. tasya haste prabhūtāḥ kārṣāpaṇāḥ sthāpitāh--yadi mama patnyā bhaktācchādena yogodvahanaṃ kuryāḥ/
K10divyav_u:19300: 436.008. tayā sa dārako jñātibakena svahastabalena vā āyāpitā(payitvā)
K10divyav_u:19304: sā saṃlakṣayati--yadyasya vakṣyāmi mahāsamudre potasaṃvyavahāriṇa āsann iti,
K10divyav_u:19307: 436.011. śrutamāhitastava putā ca pitāmahāśca ihaiva vāṇijyamakārṣuḥ/
K10divyav_u:19311: tvaṃ mayā kathaṃcit jñātibalena svahastabakena āyāpitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:19313: api tvayaṃ śroṣṭī tava pitṛvayasyo bhavati/
K10divyav_u:19314: 436.015. asya sakāśāt kārṣāpaṇān gṛhītvā karma kuru/
K10divyav_u:19318: 436.017. tasya ca gṛhāt preṣyadārikāyāḥ saṃkāratalasyopari mṛtamūṣikāṃ dṛṣṭvā prayacchati cchorayitum/
K10divyav_u:19319: 436.018. sa śreṣṭhī tasya puruṣasya kathayati--yaḥ puruṣaḥ syāt,
K10divyav_u:19331: 436.023. tena vāṇijakena dāraka ucyate--anuprayaccha asya biḍālasya mṛtamūṣikām/
K10divyav_u:19337: 436.026. sa tān bhrāṣṭre bharjayitvā śītalasya pānīyasya vardhanīyasya pūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tadgṛhya tasmātsthānakānniṣkramya yasmin pradeśe kāṣṭhahārakā
K10divyav_u:19344: 436.029. tena teṣāṃ kalāyānāṃ stoktaṃ dattaṃ śītalaṃ ca pānīyaṃ pātam/
K10divyav_u:19347: 436.030. bhāgineya, vayaṃ tāvat kalyamevotthāya gatvā idānīmāgacchāmaḥ/
K10divyav_u:19352: 436.032. sa tāṃ vikrīya <437>kalāyānāṃ gṛhītvā bharjayitvā udakasya kumbhaṃ pūrayitvā tasminneva praveśe gatvāvasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:19356: divase divase tvaṃ kalāyān pānīyaṃ ca gṛhītvā āgamya atraiva tiṣṭham/
K10divyav_u:19372: 437.010. tasya tatprabhūto lābhaḥ sa saṃlakṣayati--etat pratikruṣṭataraṃ vāṇijyānām yaduta ukkarikāpaṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:19376: 437.012. sa saṃlakṣayati--etadapi pratikraṣṭataraṃ ca tadvāṇijyānāṃ pūrvavat/
K10divyav_u:19378: 437.013. tasya mūṣikāhairaṇyako mūṣikāhairaṇyaka iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
K10divyav_u:19382: yathā mahāsamudramavataret tatraivānayena vyasanamāpatsyate tathā kariṣyāma iti/
K10divyav_u:19383: 437.016. te tasya nātidūre sthitvā svaiḥ kathāsamlāpena tiṣṭhanti--yathāpi nāma bhavantaḥ puruṣo hastigrīvāyāṃ gatvā aśvapṛṣṭhena gacchet,
K10divyav_u:19386: evamevāsya mūṣkikāhairaṇyikasya pitā ca pitāmahāśca samudre potasaṃvyavahātiṇa āsan/
K10divyav_u:19387: 437.019. eṣa idānīṃ kuṛcchreṇa jīvikāṃ kalpayati hairaṇyikāpaṇaṃ vāhayatīti/
K10divyav_u:19389: te kathayanti--tava pitā ca pitāmahāśca potasaṃvyavahāriṇa āsan/
K10divyav_u:19393: satyamasmākaṃ pitā ca pitāmahāśca mahāsamudre petasaṃvyavahāriṇa āsan?
K10divyav_u:19404: 437.026. tena ghaṇṭāvadhoṣaṇaṃ kṛtam--yo yuṣmākamutsahate mūṣikāhairaṇyena sārdhamaśulkenāgulmenātarapaṇyena mahāsamudramavataritum,
K10divyav_u:19407: 437.028. atha mūṣilāhairaṇyikaḥ kṛtamaṅgalakaitūhalasvastyayanaḥ śakaṭairbhārairmūṭaiḥ piṭakairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiḥ paṇyamāropya mahāsamudraṃ
K10divyav_u:19411: 437.031. sārthavāhaḥ karṇadhārasya kathayati--kathaya kathaya bhoḥ puruṣa yathābhūtaṃ mahāsamudrasya varṇam/
K10divyav_u:19415: 438.002. yo yuṣmākamutsahate evamrūpai ratnairātmānaṃ samyaksukhena pratiṇayitum,
K10divyav_u:19416: mātāpitarau putradārān dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ motrāmātyajñātisālohitaṃ kālena kālaṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitum,
K10divyav_u:19422: sa karṇadhārasya kathayati--ghoṣaya bhoḥ puruṣa mahāsamudrasya yathābhūtaṃ varṇam/
K10divyav_u:19423: 438.008. tataḥ karṇadhāra uddhoṣitumāravdhah--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jambudvīpakā vaṇijaḥ/
K10divyav_u:19425: tadyadhā timibhayaṃ timiṃgalabhayaṃ timitimiṃgalabhayamāvartabhayaṃ kumbhīrabhayaṃ śiśumārabhayamantarjalagatānāṃ parvatānāmāghātabhayam/
K10divyav_u:19428: 438.012. yena yuṣmākaṃ priyamātmānaṃ parityaktvā mātāpitarau putradāraṃ dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ mitrāmātyañjātisālohitaṃ mahāsamudramavataratu/
K10divyav_u:19432: 438.014. tataḥ karṇadhārastriruddḥpṣaṇāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ paścādekāṃ vastrāṃ muñcati,
K10divyav_u:19434: yatastadvahanaṃ mahākarṇadhārasaṃdhānabalavadvāyusampreritaṃ mahāmegha iva saṃprasthito 'nuguṇena vāyunā yāvad ratnadvīpamanuprāptam/
K10divyav_u:19435: 438.016. tataḥ karṇadhāra uddhoṣayitumārabdhah--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jambudvīpakā vaṇijaḥ,
K10divyav_u:19439: 438.019. asminneva ca ratnadvīpe kroñjakumārikā nāma rākṣasyaḥ prativasanti/
K10divyav_u:19440: 438.020. tāḥ puruṣaṃ tathā upalālayanti yathā tatraivānayena vyasanamāpadyante/
K10divyav_u:19447: 438.023. saptāahasyātyayāt tādṛśaṃ vāyumutsṛjanti yena vahanamapahriyate yathāpi tadkṛtakāryāṇām/
K10divyav_u:19448: 438.024. yaṃ śrutvā te vaṇijo 'vahitā apramattā avasthitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:19456: 438.028. sa tathā uktah--putra na tava putā na putāmaho dhanikaḥ kṛtaḥ,
K10divyav_u:19461: 438.030. tena suvarṇasya phelāṃ pūrayitvā catasno mūṣikāścaturṣu pārśveṣu sthāpayitvā śroṣṭhigṛhaṃ gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:19462: 438.031. sa śreṣṭhī tadā tasyaiva tadvarṇaṃ bhāṣamāṇastiṣṭhati--paśyata bhavanto
K10divyav_u:19463: mūṣikāhairaṇyikaḥ kathaṃ puṇyamaheśākhyo yam yameva gṛhṇāti tṛṇaṃ vā loṣṭaṃ vā sarvaṃ
K10divyav_u:19480: 439.005. tava pitrā gacchatā mama hasto kārṣāpaṇāḥ sthāpitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:19481: 439.006. tena śreṣṭhinā duhitā sarvlamlāravibhūṣitā tasya bhāryārthamanupradattā//
K10divyav_u:19485: eṣa eva panthakastena kālena tena samayena/
K10divyav_u:19487: 439.009. etarhyapyeṣa mayā parittenāvavādenāvavādya saṃsārakāntārāduttārya atyantaniṣṭhe 'nuttare yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ//
