K10divyav_u:20515: 458.021. santi tasminnantaḥpure striyo yāstrayāṇāṃ samyojanānāṃ prahāṇācchrotāpannā
K10divyav_u:20516: avinipātadharmiṇyo niyatasamādhiparāyaṇāḥ saptakṛtvo bhavaparamāḥ saptakṛtvo devāṃśca
K10divyav_u:20519: 458.024. santi tasminnantaḥpure striyo yāḥ svajīvitahetorapi śikṣāṃ na vyatikrāntāḥ/
K10divyav_u:20521: 458.025. santi tasminnantaḥpure striyo yā mamāntike prasannacittālaṃkāraṃ kṛtvā kāyasya bhedātsugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapannāḥ/
K10divyav_u:20523: 458.027. āgamyata bhikṣavo yena śyāmāvatīpramukhānāṃ pañcastrīśatānāṃ kalevarāṇi/
K10divyav_u:20525: 458.028. atha khalu bhagavān saṃbahulairbhikṣubhiḥ sārdham yena tāsāṃ pañcānāṃ strīśatāṇāṃ kalevarāṇi tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:20526: 458.030. upasaṃkramya bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--etāni bhikṣavastāni pañcaśatakalevarāṇi yatra udayano vatsarājo raktaḥ sakto gṛddho grathito mūrcchito
K10divyav_u:20531: 459.003. asatsaditi paśyanti paśyatāṃ nāsti kiṃcana//24// iti/
K10divyav_u:20533: yaddagdhasthūṇāyāmapi cittaṃ na pradūṣayiṣyāmaḥ prāgeva savijñānake kāye/
K10divyav_u:20550: pañcahastinīśatāni pañcāśvaśatāni pañcavaḍavāśatāni pañcakumāraśatāni pañcakumārikāśatāni suvarṇalakṣaṃ kauśāmbyadhiṣṭhānam/
K10divyav_u:20551: 459.013 paṭe lekhayata puṣpadantaprāsādam yathā mākandikena bhūrjaṃ kalamā tailaṃ tūlamasirapaścime ca bhūrjabhāge 'gniḥ prakṣiptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:20555: 459.016. yathā yantrakalācārya āgatya kathayati--dvārakoṣṭhakaṃ jvalantamanyat sthānaṃ saṃkramayāmīti/
K10divyav_u:20560: pañcakumāraśatāni pañcakumārikāśatāni suvarṇasya lakṣaṃ kauśāmbyadhiṣṭhānaṃ paṭe
K10divyav_u:20562: 459.020. yathā mākandikena bhūrjaṃ kalamā tailaṃ tūlamasirapaścime bhūrjabhārake 'gniḥ prakṣipto yathā dvārako 'ṣṭhake prajvālitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:20565: 459.023. yathā yantrakalācārya āgatah--ahamenaṃ dvārakoṣṭhakaṃ jvalantamanyat sthānaṃ saṃkramayāmīti,
K10divyav_u:20569: 459.025. tato 'priyākhyāyino 'mātyānāṃ lekho 'nupreṣito rājña īdṛśo 'nartha utpanno 'hamasyānenopāyena nivedayiṣyāmi/
K10divyav_u:20571: 459.027. sa teṣāṃ lekhāṃ lekhayitvā caturaṅgabalakāyayukto 'nyatamasmin pradeśe gatvāvasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:20576: 459.029. yadi tāvattvaṃ śaknoṣi yuddhena niyoktumityevaṃ kuśalam,
K10divyav_u:20577: no cetpañcahastinīśatāni pañcāśvaśatāni pañcavaḍavāśatāni pañcakumāraśatāni pañcakumārikāśatāni suvarṇasya lakṣaṃ datvā tamāneṣyāmīti/
K10divyav_u:20578: 459.032. rājña udayanasya sa kārvaṭiko balavān saṃnāmaṃ na gacchati/
K10divyav_u:20582: 460.002. etattasyaivaṃ likhitam--mamaivaṃnāmā kārvaṭikaḥ saṃnāmaṃ na gacchati/
K10divyav_u:20588: 460.004. sa saṃlakṣayati--ekena tāvadahaṃ rājñā daśa diśo viśrāntaḥ,
K10divyav_u:20591: 460.006. sa kaṇṭhe 'siṃ baddhvā nirgatya rājña udayanasya pādayor nipatitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:20593: 460.007. athasāvapriyākhyāyī rājalīlayā rājña udayanasya sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--deva,
K10divyav_u:20597: 460.009. yadi tāvattvaṃ śaknoṣi yuddhena nirjetumiyevaṃ kuśalam,
K10divyav_u:20598: no cetpañcahastiśatāni pañcahastinīśatāni pañcavaḍavāśatāni pañcakumāraśatāni pañcakumārikāśatāni suvarṇasya lakṣaṃ datvā tamāneṣyāmīti/
K10divyav_u:20605: 460.013. rājā paṭaṃ nirīkṣya marmavedhaviddha iva ruṣyamāṇaḥ kathayati--bhoḥ kim?
K10divyav_u:20607: kiṃ kathayasi śyāmāvatīpramukhāni pañca strīśatānyagninā dagdhānīti?
K10divyav_u:20608: sa paṭṭaṃ mauliṃ cāpanīya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
K10divyav_u:20609: 460.016. nāhaṃ narendro na narendraputraḥ pādopajīvī tava deva mṛtyaḥ/
K10divyav_u:20614: ayaṃ mākandikaḥ puṣpadantaṃ prāsādaṃ bhūrjādinā prayogeṇa dahati,
K10divyav_u:20615: imāni śyāmāvatīpramukhāni pañca strīśatānyagninā dahyamānānyutplutya nipatitānīti/
K10divyav_u:20618: deva, nāhaṃ kathayāmi api tu deva eva kathayati/
K10divyav_u:20621: anyathā te mayāsinā nikṛntitamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyāṃ nipātitamanvabhavisyadityutkvā mūrcchitaḥ pṛthivyāṃ nipatitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:20630: 460.028. tato yogandharāyaṇasyājñā dattā--gaccha mākandikamanupamayā saha yantragṛhe prakṣipya dahyatām/
K10divyav_u:20631: 460.029. tato yogandharāyaṇena suguptaṃ bhūmigṛhe prakṣipya sthāpitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:20639: tvayāpyanupamayā saparivārayā sārdhaṃ mayā pravrajitavyaṃ jātamiti/
K10divyav_u:20641: ityarthameva mayā asau bhūmigṛhe prakṣipya sthāpitā/
K10divyav_u:20646: 461.002. nūnamanayā parapuruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ paricāritamiti viditvā kathayati--anupame,
K10divyav_u:20655: 461.004. api tu kiṃ navaśavāyā arthe bhagavantaṃ pravakṣyāmi,
K10divyav_u:20656: śyāmāvatyā arthe pravakṣyāmīti viditvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:20657: 461.006. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:20658: 461.006. udayano vatsarājo bhagavantamidamavocat--kiṃ bhadanta śyāmāvatīpramukhaiḥ pañcabhiḥ strīśataiḥ karma kṛtam yenāgninā dagdhāni?
K10divyav_u:20660: 461.008. bhagavānāha--ābhireva mahārāṭ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni pūrvavadyāvatphalanti khalu dehinām//
K10divyav_u:20661: 461.010. bhūtapūrvaṃ mahārāja vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryā brahmadatto rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca pūrvavadyāvaddharmeṇa rājyaṃ
K10divyav_u:20662: 461.011. asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
K10divyav_u:20685: 461.021. sa tāsāmanukampārthaṃ tata evākāśamutplutya tapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kartumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:20687: 461.023. tā mūlanikṛntita iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya kṣamayitumārabdhāḥ/
K10divyav_u:20691: 461.025. tāni tasmin kārāṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kārtumārabdhāh--yadasmābhirevaṃ sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye 'pakāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
K10divyav_u:20697: 461.028. kiṃ manyase mahārāja tadā sāsau rājño brahmadattasyāgramahiṣī,
K10divyav_u:20698: eṣaiva sā śyāmāvatī tena kālena tena samayena/
K10divyav_u:20700: etānyeva tāni pañca strīśatāni tāni tena kālena tena samayena/
K10divyav_u:20702: eṣaivāsau kubjottarā tena kālena tena samayena/
K10divyav_u:20704: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣāṇi narakeṣu patkā yāvadetarhyapi dṛṣṭasatyā agninā dagdhāḥ/
K10divyav_u:20707: 462.001. iti hi mahārāja ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmāṇāṃ pūrvavadyāvadevamābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ/
K10divyav_u:20709: 462.003. atrodayano vatsarājo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinindyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikātprakrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:20710: 462.005. bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta kubjottarayā karma kṛtam yena kubjā saṃvṛttā?
K10divyav_u:20711: bhagavānāha--kubjottarayaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni pūrvavadyāvad phalanti khalu dehinām/
K10divyav_u:20712: 462.008. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati pūrvavadyāvaddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati/
K10divyav_u:20714: 462.009. rājñā vārāṇasyāmevaṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--yasya dvādaśavārṣikaṃ bhaktamasti,
K10divyav_u:20716: 462.010. yasya nāsti tenānyatra gantavyamiti yataḥ kolenāgantavyamiti/
K10divyav_u:20717: 462.011. tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ saṃdhāno nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhoga iti vistaraḥ pūrvavadyāvad vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
K10divyav_u:20719: bhaviṣyati mama saparivārasya dvādaśa varṣāṇi bhaktamiti?
K10divyav_u:20722: 462.014. asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante pūrvavadyāvadbhoḥ puruṣa,
K10divyav_u:20723: vinyasya pravrajitasahasrasya mama dvādaśa varṣāṇi bhaktamiti/
K10divyav_u:20734: 462.019. sā pṛṣṭhaṃ vināmayitvā kathayati--tāta, īdṛśa iti/
K10divyav_u:20737: 462.021. punarapi bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta,
K10divyav_u:20738: kubjottarayā karma kṛtam yena śrutadharāa jāteti?
K10divyav_u:20739: bhagavānāha--tena kālena tena samayena pratyekabuddhānām yaḥ saṃghasthaviraḥ sa vāyvādhikaḥ/
K10divyav_u:20741: 462.023. tasya saṃdhānaduhitrā hastāt kaṭānavatārya sa pratyekabuddha uktah--ārya,
K10divyav_u:20747: evameva mamāpi saṃtāne ye dharmāḥ praviśeyuḥ,
K10divyav_u:20749: 462.026. yattayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena śrutadharā saṃvṛtā//
K10divyav_u:20750: 462.028. punarapi bhikṣavo bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta kubjottarayā karma kṛtam yena dāsīsaṃvṛtteti?
K10divyav_u:20753: 462.031. punarapi bhikṣavo bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta anupamayā karma yadeṣā nirāhārā bhūmigṛhe sthāpitā amlānagātrī cotthitā/
K10divyav_u:20754: 462.032. bhagavānāha--anupamayaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni pūrvavadyāvatphalanti khalu dehinām//
K10divyav_u:20755: 463.001. <463>bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasmin karvaṭake dve dārike anyonyasaṃstutike kṣatriyadārikā brāhmaṇadārikā ca/
K10divyav_u:20756: 463.002. asti buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
K10divyav_u:20758: 463.004. aparasmin divase pūrvāhṇe nivāsya piṇḍārthī pracalitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:20762: ekā ghoṣilasya gṛhapaterduhitā jātā mahāsundarī śrīmatī nāma/
K10divyav_u:20763: 463.006. ekasmin samaye rājñā dṛṣṭā pṛṣṭā ca--kasyeyaṃ kanyā?
K10divyav_u:20773: 463.009. udayanena vatsarājenāntaḥpuraṃ praveśya mahatā śrīsamudayena pariṇītā/
K10divyav_u:20776: 463.011. sa kathayati--ākāṅkṣase kiṃ tu bhikṣavo rājakulaṃ praviśānti/
K10divyav_u:20779: adyāgreṇa na bhokṣye na pāsya iti/
K10divyav_u:20791: 463.017. tato bhūri karma kārayitvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:20792: 463.017. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:20793: 463.018. ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ ghoṣilaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
K10divyav_u:20794: 463.019. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tuṣṇīm/
K10divyav_u:20795: 463.020. atha ghoṣilo gṛhapatirutthāyāsanādyena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu
K10divyav_u:20796: me bhagavāñchvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena mama nimantritaṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena /
K10divyav_u:20798: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālāṃ manyata iti/
K10divyav_u:20801: 463.024. pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairbuddhā bhagavanta aupadhike tiṣṭhanti--abhinirhṛtaṃ manrtayate sma/
K10divyav_u:20806: 463.027. sa praviśya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:20807: 463.027. atha śrīmatī devī sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ śāriputrapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā pūrvavadyāvannīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā purastānniṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya/
K10divyav_u:20808: 463.029. athāyuṣmāñchāriputraḥ śrīmatīṃ devīṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
K10divyav_u:20819: 464.003. tena tasyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ ca prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10divyav_u:20820: yāṃ śrutvā śrīmatyā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ pūrvavadyāvatsarvaṃ vādyaṃ triśaraṇagamabhiprasannam/
K10divyav_u:20821: 464.005. athāyuṣmāñchāriputraḥ śrīmatīṃ satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpya prakrānto yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:20822: 464.006. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:20823: 464.006. ekānte niṣaṇṇa āyuṣmāñchāriputra etatprakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavate vistaraṇārocayati/
K10divyav_u:20832: 464.010. atha bhagavāñchikṣākāmatayā varṇaṃ bhāṣitvā pūrvavadyāvat pūrvikā prajñaptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:20834: 464.011. yaḥ punarbhikṣuranirgatāyāṃ rajanyāmanudgate 'ruṇe anirhṛteṣu ratneṣu ratnasaṃmateṣu
K10divyav_u:20835: vā rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhnābhiṣiktasya indrakīlaṃ vā idrakīlasāmantaṃ vā samatikrāmedanyatra
K10divyav_u:20845: 464.017. ratneṣu veti ratnānyucyante maṇayo muktā vaiḍūryaṃ pūrvavadyāvaddakṣiṇāvartaḥ/
K10divyav_u:20846: 464.018. ratnasaṃmateṣu veti ratnasaṃmatamucyate sarvaṃ saṃgrāmāvacaraśastraṃ sarvaṃ ca gandharvāvacaraṃ bhāṇḍam/
K10divyav_u:20847: 464.019. rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasyeti vā rājye stryapi rājyābhiṣikeṇābhiṣiktā bhavati,
K10divyav_u:20849: 464.020. kṣatriyo 'pi brāhmaṇo 'pi vaiśyo 'pi śūdro 'pi rājyābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto bhavati rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhnābhiṣiktaḥ/
K10divyav_u:20865: 464.027. bhikṣuraprabhāte aprabhātasaṃjñī antaḥpurendrakīlam asmatikrāmati āpadyate pāpāntikam/
K10divyav_u:20869: 464.028. anāpattih--rājā śabdayati--devyaḥ kumārā āmātyā aṣṭānāmantarāyāṇāmantyatamānyatamamupathitaṃ bhavati rājā cauramanuṣyāmanuṣyavyālāgnyudakānām/
K10divyav_u:20874: 465.002. buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe/
K10divyav_u:20878: 465.003. roruke mahānagare rudrāyaṇo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:20885: 465.007. rājagṛhe rājā bimbisāro rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:20894: asti kasyacidanyasyāpi rājña evamavidhā janapadā ṛddhāśca sphītāśca kṣemāṣca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāśca?
K10divyav_u:20898: te vaṇijaḥ kathayanti--asti deva pūrvadeśe rājagṛhaṃ nagaram/
K10divyav_u:20899: 465.014. tatra rājā bimbisāro rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:20908: 465.019. tena tasya ratnānāṃ peṭāṃ pūrayitvā prābhṛtamanupreṣitaṃ lekhaśca dattah--priyavayasya,
K10divyav_u:20910: 465.020. yadā tava kiṃcid roruke nagare karaṇīyaṃ bhavati,
K10divyav_u:20913: 465.021. te taṃ prābhṛtamādāya yena rājagṛhaṃ tena prakrāntāḥ/
K10divyav_u:20915: 465.022. taiḥ sā ratnapeṭā rājño bimbisārasyopanāmitā lekhaśca/
K10divyav_u:20916: 465.022. rājā bimbisāro lekhaṃ vācayitvā amātyānāmantrayate--kiṃ bhavantastadrājño durlabham?
K10divyav_u:20920: 465.024. tena tasya mahārhāṇāṃ vastrāṇāṃ vastrāṇāṃ peṭāṃ pūrayitvā prābhṛtamanupreṣitaṃ lekhaśca dattah--priyavayasya,
K10divyav_u:20925: 465.027. te taṃ prābhṛtamādāya yena rorukaṃ tena prakrāntāḥ/
K10divyav_u:20927: 465.028. taiḥ sā vastrapeṭā rājño rudtāyaṇasyopanāmitā lekhaṣca/
K10divyav_u:20933: api tu sa rājā svayaṃ prahartā/
K10divyav_u:20935: rudrāyaṇasya rājño maṇivarma pañcāṅgepetośītam uṣṇasaṃsparśamuṣṇe śootasaṃsparśaṃ duśchedaṃ durbhedaṃ viṣaghnamavabhāsātmakaṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:20937: idaṃ mayā ca tava maṇivarma prābhṛtamanupreṣitaṃ pañcāṅgopetaṃ śīte uṣṇasaṃsparśamuṣṇe śītasaṃsparśaṃ duśchedaṃ durbhedaṃ viṣaghnamavabhāsātmakam/
K10divyav_u:20947: 466.006. dharmatā khalu yasya na śakyate mūlyaṃ kartum,
K10divyav_u:20949: 466.007. rājā bimbisāro vyathitaḥ kathayati--kiṃ mayā tasya prābhṛtamanupreṣitavyaṃ bhaviṣyati?
K10divyav_u:20954: 466.009. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:20955: 466.010. rājā bimbisāro bhagavantamidamavocat--roruke bhadanta nagare rājā rudrāyaṇo nāma prativasati mamādṛṣṭasakhā/
K10divyav_u:20989: 466.029. asya tvayā ardhatṛtīyāni yojanāni mārgaśobhā kartavyam/
K10divyav_u:20991: 466.031. vistīrṇāvakāśe pradeśe sthāpayitvā mahatīṃ pūjāṃ satkāraṃ kṛtvodghāṭayitavyam/
K10divyav_u:20993: 466.032. rājñā bimbisāreṇa yathāsaṃdiṣṭaṃ lekho likhitvā saṃpreṣitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:20998: kīdṛśaṃ mama tena prabhṛtamanupreṣitam yasya satkāraḥ kartavyo bhaviṣyati?
K10divyav_u:21003: 467.004. na śakyaṃ tena yadvā tadvā pratiprābhṛtamanupreṣayitum/
K10divyav_u:21010: 467.007. vistīrṇāvakāśe pradeśe sthāpayitvā mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvoddhāṭitā/
K10divyav_u:21012: 467.008. tairbuddhapratimāṃ dṛṣṭvā ekaraveṇa nādo muktah--namo buddhāyeti/
K10divyav_u:21013: 467.009. tasya buddha ityaśrutapūrvaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā sarvaromakūpāṇyāhṛṣṭāni/
K10divyav_u:21014: 467.009. sa kathayati--ka eṣa bhavanto buddho nāma?
K10divyav_u:21016: śākyānāṃ kumāra utpanno 'sti himavatpārśve nadyā bhāgīrathyāstīre kapilasya ṛṣerāśramapadasya nātidūre/
K10divyav_u:21019: rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī caturaṅgairvijetā dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ/
K10divyav_u:21021: tadyathā--cakraratnaṃ hastiratnamaśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnameva saptamam/
K10divyav_u:21022: 467.014. pūrṇaṃ cāsya bhaviṣyati sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
K10divyav_u:21023: 467.015. sa imāmeva samudraparyantāṃ mahāpṛthvīṃkhilāmalaṇṭakāmanutpīḍāmadaṇḍenāśastreṇa dharmeṇa śamenābhinirjitya adhyāvasiṣyati/
K10divyav_u:21024: 467.016. sacet keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajiṣyati,
K10divyav_u:21033: 467.021. atha rudrāyaṇo rājā sāmātyaḥ pratyūṣasamaye sarvārthān sarvakarmāntān pratiprasrabhya niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhāṃ smṛtimupasthāpya/
K10divyav_u:21036: asyotpādādidamutpadyate yaduta avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvatsamudayo nirodhaśca bhavati/
K10divyav_u:21037: 467.024. tenemaṃ dvādaśāṅgaṃ pratītyasamutpādamanulomapratilomaṃ vyavalokayatā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
K10divyav_u:21046: anādikālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
K10divyav_u:21049: 467.032. atha sa rājā bimbisāro yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21050: 468.001. <468>upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21051: 468.001. ekāntaniṣaṇṇo bhagavantamidamavocat--rudrāyaṇena bhadanta rājñā satyāni dṛṣṭāni/
K10divyav_u:21053: 468.003. bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--katamasya bhikṣo rudrāyaṇo rājā saparivāro vineyo rairukanivāsī ca janakāyah?
K10divyav_u:21055: 468.004. tatra bhgavānāyuṣmantaṃ mahākātyāyanamāmantrayate--samanvāhara kātyāyana rauruke nagare rudrāyaṇaṃ rājānaṃ saparivāraṃ raurukanivāsinaṃ ca janakāyam/
K10divyav_u:21058: 468.007. athāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastasyā eva rātryā atyayātpūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
K10divyav_u:21060: paribhuktaṃ śayanaṃ pratiśāmya samādāya pātracīvaraṃ pañcaśataparivāro yena raurukaṃ
K10divyav_u:21065: 468.012. asya tvayārdhatṛtīyāni yojanāni mārgaśobhā kartavyā nagaraśobhā ca/
K10divyav_u:21074: yena ekajanasahasraparivāreṇa ca svayameva pratyudgamya mahatā satkāreṇa rorukaṃ nagaraṃ praveśitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21079: 468.019. ayuṣmān mahākātyāyanaḥ purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21083: 468.021. tata āyuṣmatā mahākātyāyanena tasyāḥ pariṣada āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10divyav_u:21091: 468.026. yadbhūyasā sā pariṣadbuddhaniṃnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthāpitā//
K10divyav_u:21092: 468.027. rauruke nagare tiṣyaḥ puṣyaśca gṛhapatī vasataḥ/
K10divyav_u:21094: 468.028. upasaṃkramya āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇau/
K10divyav_u:21095: 468.029. tiṣyapuṣyau gṛhapatī āyuṣmantaṃ mahākātyāyanamidamavocatām--labhevahi āryamahākātyāyana svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ
K10divyav_u:21104: 469.004. sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyau mānyavabhivādyau ca saṃvṛttau/
K10divyav_u:21105: 469.004. tau jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtau/
K10divyav_u:21106: 469.006. tayorjñātṛbhiḥ śarīrapūjāṃ kṛrtvā dvau stūpau kāritau--ekastiṣyasya,
K10divyav_u:21108: 469.007. rudrāyaṇo rājā dine dine āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasyāntikād dharmaṃ śrutvā
K10divyav_u:21109: antaḥpurasyārocayati--āryo mahākātyāyano madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati kṣaudramiva
K10divyav_u:21115: 469.010. kathaṃ vayaṃ tatra gatvā dharmaṃ śṛṇumah?
K10divyav_u:21118: 469.011. rudrāyaṇena rājñā āyuṣmān mahākātyāyana uktah--mama ārya sāntaḥpuramicchati śrotum/
K10divyav_u:21127: 469.016. bimbisāro rājā taṃ lekhaṃ vācayitvā yena bhagvāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21128: 469.016. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21129: 469.017. ekāntaniṣaṇṇo rājā bimbisāro bhagavantamidamavocat--rudrāyaṇena bhagavan rājñā lekho 'nupreṣitah--antaḥpuramicchati dharmaṃ śrotum/
K10divyav_u:21132: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--katarasyā bhikṣuṇyā rudrāyaṇasya rājño antaḥpuraparijano vineyo raurukanivāsī ca strījana iti?
K10divyav_u:21134: 469.021. tatra bhagavāñchailāṃ bhikṣuṇīmāmantrayate--samanvāhara śaile rauruke nagare rudrāyaṇasya rājño 'ntaḥpurajanaṃ raurukanivāsinaṃ strījanamiti/
K10divyav_u:21135: 469.022. evaṃ bhadanteti śailā bhikṣuṇī bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntā/
K10divyav_u:21136: 469.024. atha śailā bhikṣuṇī tasyā eva rātrertyayātpūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya
K10divyav_u:21137: rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhakrakṛtyā pañcādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntā yathāparibhuktaṃ
K10divyav_u:21138: śayanāsanaṃ pratisamayya samādāya pātracīvaraṃ pañcaśataparivārā yena raurukaṃ nagaraṃ
K10divyav_u:21140: 469.027. bimbisāreṇa ca rājñā rudrāyaṇasya rājño lekho 'nupreṣitah--priyavayasya,
K10divyav_u:21141: eṣā te mayā mahāśrāvikā śāstrānugatā pañcaśataparivārā preṣitā/
K10divyav_u:21142: 469.028. asyāṃ tvayārdharṛtīyāni yojanāni mārgaśobhā kartavyā nagaraśobhā ca/
K10divyav_u:21144: 469.029. abhyantare ca nagarasya pañca vihāraśatāni kārayitavyāni,
K10divyav_u:21149: 469.032. rudrāyaṇena rājñā lekhaṃ vācayitvā prāmodyajātenārdhatṛtīyāni yojanāni mārgaśobhā kāritā/
K10divyav_u:21150: 470.001. anekajanasahasraparivāreṇa ca svayameva pratyudgamya mahatā satkāreṇa raurukaṃ nagaraṃ praveśitā/
K10divyav_u:21151: 470.002. abhyantare ca nagarasya pañca vihāraśatāni kāritāni,
K10divyav_u:21154: 470.003. śailā bhikṣuṇī rudrāyaṇasya rājño 'ntaḥpuraṃ praviśya dine dinai dharmaṃ deśayati/
K10divyav_u:21157: 470.005. yāvadapareṇa samayena rudrāyaṇo rājā vīṇāṃ vādayati,
K10divyav_u:21166: 470.008. api tu mayā tava nṛtyantyā vināśalakṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭam--saptame divase tava kālatriyā bhavatīti/
K10divyav_u:21167: 470.009. candraprabhā devī pādayor nipatya kathayati--deva yadyevam,
K10divyav_u:21179: 470.013. sā rudrāyaṇena rājñā śailāyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ samarpitā--āryacandraptabhā devī ākāṅkṣati svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikcuṇībhāvam/
K10divyav_u:21186: 470.017. sā saptame divase kālagatā cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannā/
K10divyav_u:21187: 470.018. dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya,
K10divyav_u:21197: 470.021. tasyā etadabhavat--tadapratirūpaṃ syādyadahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāsā bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramitum/
K10divyav_u:21203: 470.026. bhagavatā tasyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10divyav_u:21204: yāṃ śrutvā candraprabhayā devakanyayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃsatkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā śrotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
K10divyav_u:21206: na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā kṛtaṃ na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭair nasvajanabandhuvargair na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇairyadbhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam/
K10divyav_u:21216: 471.007. prāptaṃ ca śāntaṃ padamāryakāntaṃ tīrṇaśca duḥkhārṇavapāramasmi//5//
K10divyav_u:21219: 471.013. avanamya tataḥ pralambahārā caraṇau dvāvabhivandya jāraharṣā/
K10divyav_u:21220: 471.015. parigamya pradakṣiṇaṃ jitāriṃ suralokābhimukhī divaṃ jagāma//7//
K10divyav_u:21225: yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśāmāgatā tayaiva vibhūtyā svarbhavanaṃ saṃprasthitā/
K10divyav_u:21227: 471.020. atha candraprabhā devakanyā yena rājā rudrāyaṇastenopasaṃkrāntā/
K10divyav_u:21228: 471.020. tena khalu samayena rudrāyaṇo rājā ekākī gṛhasyoparitalake śayitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21229: 471.021. sa tayā udārāvabhāsaṃ kṛtvā acchaṭāśabdena pratibodhitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21242: 471.026. tatra te mayā sārdhaṃ samāgamo bhaviṣyati/
K10divyav_u:21244: 471.027. rudrāyaṇo rājā kṛtsnāṃ rātriṃ pravrajyāmanuvicintayan kālyamevotthāya amātyānāmantrayate--paśyata bhavantaḥ,
K10divyav_u:21248: 471.029. rudrāyaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--na mama pratirūpaṃ syādyadahaṃ devatācodito 'ham agāramadhyāvaseyam/
K10divyav_u:21250: 471.031. yannvahaṃ śikhaṇḍinaṃ kumāraṃ rājye 'bhiṣicya keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajeyamiti/
K10divyav_u:21252: yādṛśa eva mama śikhaṇḍī kumāraḥ putraḥ,
K10divyav_u:21254: 472.001. sa eṣa yuvābhyāmahitānnivārayitavyo hite ca saṃniyojayitavyaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21258: yathaiva tvaṃ mama vacanaṃ śrotavyaṃ kartavyaṃ manyase,
K10divyav_u:21259: tathā anayorapi hirubhirukayoragrāmātyayorvacanaṃ śrotavyaṃ kartavyaṃ manyathāḥ/
K10divyav_u:21262: 472.005. tato rudrāyaṇena rājñā rauruke nagare ghaṇṭāvadhoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--śṛṇvantu bhavanto raurukanivāsinaḥ paurā nānādeśābhyāgataśca janakāyaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21263: 472.007. ahaṃ keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajiṣyāmi/
K10divyav_u:21265: tvayā rājyaṃ kārayatā kasyacidaparādhyaṃ na kṣantavyamiti/
K10divyav_u:21267: 472.009. śrutvā sarva eva raurukanivāsī janakāyo 'nyaśca nānādeśābhyāgātaḥ sāśrukaṇṭho vyavasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21268: 472.010. tato rudrāyaṇo rājā śikhaṇḍinaṃ kumāraṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāpya bandhujanaṃ kṣamāpayitvā
K10divyav_u:21269: śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakebhyo dānāni datvā paṇyāni kṛtvā ekena puruṣeṇopasthāyakena
K10divyav_u:21271: 472.012. tataḥ śikhaṇḍī rājā sāntaḥpurāmātyapaurajanapado 'nyaśca nānādeśābhyāgato janakāyaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21282: 472.019. rājā śikhaṇḍī sāntaḥpurakumārāmātyapaurajanapado 'śruparuyākulekṣaṇo muhūrmuhūr nivartya nirīkṣamāṇo raurukaṃ nagaraṃ pratinivṛttaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21283: 472.020. tato rudrāyaṇo rājā anupūrveṇa rājagṛhaṃ nagaramanuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21284: 472.021. tenodyāne sthitvā sa puruṣa uktah--gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa,
K10divyav_u:21285: rājño bimbisārasya gatvā nivedaya--rudrāyaṇo nāma udyāne tiṣṭhatīti/
K10divyav_u:21286: 472.022. tena puruṣeṇa gatvā rājño bimbisārasya niveditam--deva,
K10divyav_u:21294: 472.025. rājā bimbisāraḥ saṃlakṣayati--na mama pratirūpaṃ syādyadahaṃ rāhānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhnāmiṣiktamevameva praveśayeyam/
K10divyav_u:21295: 472.027. mahatā satkāreṇa praveśayāmīti viditvā mārgaśobhāṃ bagaraśobhāṃ ca kārayitvā caturaṅgena balakāyena pratyudgataḥ/
K10divyav_u:21296: 472.028. kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya hastiskandhe āropya rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ praveśitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21300: sphītaṃ rājyamapāsya antaḥpuraṃ kumārānāmātyān paurajanapadān kimihāgamanaprayojanam?
K10divyav_u:21305: 473.001. iti śrutvā rājā bimbisāra āttamanāḥ pūrvakāyamabhyunnamayya dakṣiṇabāhumābhiprasāryodānamudānayati--aho buddhaḥ,
K10divyav_u:21308: yatredānīmevaṃvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ sphītaṃ rājyamapahāya sphītamantaḥpuraṃ vistīrṇasvajanabandhuvargaṃ
K10divyav_u:21309: sphītāni ca kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇyapahāya ākāṅkṣante svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam /
K10divyav_u:21310: 473.005. ityuktvā rājānaṃ rudrāyaṇaṃ samādāya yena bhagavāṃsetnopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21311: 473.006. tena khalu samayena bhagavānanekaśatāyā bhikṣuparṣadaḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ deśayati/
K10divyav_u:21312: 473.007. adrākṣīdbhagavān rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ śreṇyaṃ bimbisāraṃ dūrādeva/
K10divyav_u:21313: 473.007. dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣa bhikṣavo rājā bimbisāraḥ saprābhṛta āgacchati/
K10divyav_u:21316: 473.009. rājā bimbisāro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21317: 473.010. ekāntaniṣaṇṇo rājā biṃvisāro bhagavantamidamavocat--ayaṃ bhadanta rājā rudrāyaṇa ākāṅkṣate svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ
K10divyav_u:21322: 473.013. sa bhagavato vācāvasāne eva muṇḍaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ saṃghāṭīprāvṛtaḥ pātrakaravyagrahasto varṣaśatopasampannasya bhikṣorīryāpathenāvasthitaḥ//
K10divyav_u:21323: 473.015. ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaśca saṃghāṭiparivṛtadehaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21324: 473.017. sadyaḥ praśāntendraya eva tasthau evaṃ sthito buddho manorathena//8//
K10divyav_u:21325: 473.019. āyuṣmān rudrāyaṇaḥ pūrvāhne nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇṭāya prāvikṣat/
K10divyav_u:21327: 473.020. eṣa ca śabdo rājagṛhe nagare samantato visṛtah--rudrāyaṇo rājā bhagavatā pravrajitaḥ,
K10divyav_u:21332: rudrāyaṇo rājā rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭo 'nekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtastiṣṭhatīti/
K10divyav_u:21333: 473.024. śrutvā ca punā rājā bimbisāro yena rudrāyaṇo bhikṣustenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21337: 473.028. bhuktvā śatapale pātre sauvarṇe rājate 'tha vā/
K10divyav_u:21351: 474.011. koṣṭhāgārāṇi kośaṃ ca bahuvittaṃ prahāya vai/
K10divyav_u:21357: 474.017. kiṃ nu tvaṃ durmanā rājan kiṃ dīna iva bhāṣase/
K10divyav_u:21359: 474.019. kiṃ nu tvaṃ durmanā rāhan kiṃ dīna iva bhāṣase/
K10divyav_u:21360: 474.020. dadāmi pravarān bhogān yān kāṃścinmanasecchasi//20// iti/
K10divyav_u:21362: 474.022. na rājan kṛpaṇo loke dharmakāyena saṃspṛśet/
K10divyav_u:21367: 474.026. śṛṇu me tvaṃ mahārāja dharmatā deśayāmyaham/
K10divyav_u:21368: 474.027. śrutvā dharmaṃ tato jñeyo yadi tvaṃ prītimeṣyasi//23//
K10divyav_u:21372: 474.031. trīṭā tatra ratiḥ kā vā putraparadhaneṣu vā//25//
K10divyav_u:21374: 475.002. śaurā dhanaṃ prārthayante rājan mukto 'smi bandhanāt//26//
K10divyav_u:21375: 475.003. na bhaiṣajyāni trāyante na dhanaṃ jñātayo na ca/
K10divyav_u:21376: 475.004. na sarvavidyā na balaṃ na śauryaṃ trāyate 'ntakāt//27/
K10divyav_u:21378: 475.007. āyuḥkṣayānte 'pi tataścyavante mucyeta ko neha śarīrabhedāt//28//
K10divyav_u:21379: 475.009. rājyāni kṛtvāpi mahānubhāvā vṛṣṇyandhakāḥ kuravaśca pāṇḍavāśca/
K10divyav_u:21380: 475.011. saṃpannacittā yaśasā jvalantas te na śaktā maraṇaṃ nopagantum//29//
K10divyav_u:21381: 475.013. na samyamena tapasā na rājan na karmaṇā na rājan na karmaṇā vīryaparākrameṇa vā/
K10divyav_u:21382: 475.015. na vittapūgair na dhanairudāraiḥ śakyaṃ kadācinmaraṇādvimoktam//30//
K10divyav_u:21383: 475.017. naivāntarīkṣe na samudramadhye na parvatānāṃ vivaraṃ praviśya/
K10divyav_u:21384: 475.019. na vidyate sa pṛthivīpradeśo yatra sthitaṃ na prasaheta mṛtyuḥ//31//
K10divyav_u:21385: 475.021. naivāntarīkṣe na samudramadhye na parvatānāṃ vivaraṃ praciśya/
K10divyav_u:21386: 475.023. na vidyate sa pṛthivīpradeśo yatra sthitaṃ na prasaheta karma//32//
K10divyav_u:21390: 475.028. śaṅkhavarṇāni śīrṣāṇi tāni dṛṣṭveha kā ratiḥ//34//
K10divyav_u:21397: 476.005. purā hi tvāṃ vyāghra iva mṛgaṃ nihatya vyādhirjarā karṣati antakaśca/
K10divyav_u:21398: 476.007. na te mitrāṇyapaneṣyanti rogaṃ saṃgamya sodaryagaṇāśca sarve//38//
K10divyav_u:21399: 476.009. yadeva labdhādhikamasya bhavati dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpam/
K10divyav_u:21401: 476.013. sacedṛṇaṃ bhvati piturmṛtasya priyāḥ sutā nāsya vahṇiṃ viśanti mṛtyau na vāpyaśrumukhā rudanti rāhuḥ pitā mama kāryateti(?)//40//
K10divyav_u:21402: 476.017. āyāntu sattvāḥ pitā mameti prakīrṇakeśāśrumukhā rudanti/
K10divyav_u:21403: 476.019. jyotiścāsya purato haranti hyaho batāyamamaro bhavediti//41//
K10divyav_u:21404: 476.021. dūṣyairenaṃ prāvṛtaṃ nirharanti jyotiḥ samādāya {ca tam} dahanti/
K10divyav_u:21405: 476.023. sa dahyate jñātibhī rudyamāna ekena vastreṇa vihāya bhogam//42//
K10divyav_u:21406: 476.025. eko hyayaṃ jāyate jāyamānastathā mriyate mriyamāṇo 'yamekaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21407: 476.027. eko duḥkhānanubhavatīha jantur na vidyate saṃsarataḥ sahāyaḥ//43//
K10divyav_u:21408: 476.029. etacca dṛṣṭveha parivrajanti kulāyakāste na bhavanti santaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21409: 476.031. te sarvasaṃgānabhisamprahāya na garbhaśayyāṃ punarāvasānti//33// iti/
K10divyav_u:21410: 477.001. <477>atha bimbisāro rājā rudrāyaṇena bhikṣuṇā uttarottareṇa pratibhānena nirākṛtastūṣṇīṃ niṣpratibhaḥ prakrāntaḥ//
K10divyav_u:21411: 477.003. atha śikhaṇḍī rājā yāvatkaṃciddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā adharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21417: 477.005. tadyathā deva puṣpavṛkṣāḥ phalavṛkṣāśca kālena kālaṃ samyakparipālyamānā anuparataprayogeṇa yathākālaṃ puṣpāṇi phalāni cānuprayacchanti,
K10divyav_u:21418: evameva janapadāḥ pritipālyamānā anuparataprayogeṇa yathākālaṃ karapratyāyānanuprayacchantīti/
K10divyav_u:21419: 477.007. sa tābhyāṃ nivārito yāvattāvaddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā punarapyadharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitumārabdhaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21423: 477.009. ruṣito 'mātyānāmantrayate--yo bhavanto rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya yāvat trirapyājñāṃ prativahati,
K10divyav_u:21429: 477.013. amātyasya ca duṣṭasya dantasya calitasya ca/
K10divyav_u:21432: 477.016. kośasthaṃ ca balasthaṃ ca yo na hanyātsa ghātyate//43// iti/
K10divyav_u:21436: 477.018. kiṃ tvābhyāṃ mama darśanapathe na sthātavyamiti/
K10divyav_u:21448: 477.025. dharmeṇa vā kārayati svarājyaṃ na cāsya kaścitparatopasargaḥ//47// iti/
K10divyav_u:21450: 477.028. tathyaṃ śikhaṇḍī khalu raurukeṣu sabhṛtyavargo balavānarogaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21451: 477.030. na cāsya kaścitparatopasargo adharmeṇa tu rājyaṃ karoti nityam//48//
K10divyav_u:21462: 478.006. sa vaṇik paṇyaṃ visarjayitvā pratipaṇyamādāya saṃprasthito 'nupūrveṇa raurukamanuprāptaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21468: hite ca saṃniyojayiṣyāmi yathā janapadānna pīḍayatīti/
K10divyav_u:21471: 478.010. evaṃ karṇaparamparayā sa śabdastayorduṣṭāmātyayoḥ karṇaṃ gataḥ/
K10divyav_u:21475: 478.012. tadupāyasaṃvidhānaṃ ca kartavyam yenāsavantarmārga eva praghātyata iti/
K10divyav_u:21482: sa vinā rājyenābhiraṃsyata iti kṛta etat?
K10divyav_u:21489: 478.017. kathaṃ nāma kumārāmātyapaurajanapadairañjalisahasrair namasyamānena rājyaṃ kārayitvā punarapi kumāravāsena vastavyam?
K10divyav_u:21490: varaṃ deśaparityāgo na tu kumāravāsena vāsam/
K10divyav_u:21491: 478.019. tadyathāpi nāma puruṣo hastigrīvāyāṃ gatvā aśvapṛṣṭhena gacchet,
K10divyav_u:21494: evameva rājyaṃ kārayitvā punaḥ kumāravāsena vāsa iti/
K10divyav_u:21501: 478.023. sa evamukte hīnadīnavadano mūhūrtaṃ tūṣṇīṃ sthitvā bāṣpoparudhyamānahṛdayaḥ karuṇadīnavilambitairakṣaraiḥ sa kathayati--bhavantau,
K10divyav_u:21504: 478.026. pitā vā yadi vā bhrātā putro vā svāṅganiḥsṛtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21508: 478.030. ekaśca tatra śatruḥ syāttadarthe tānnimajjayet//50// iti/
K10divyav_u:21511: 478.033. grāmaṃ janapadasyārthe ātmārthe pṛthivīṃ tyajet//51// iti/
K10divyav_u:21516: 479.002. kāmān khalu pratisevamānasya nāsti kiṃcitpāpaṃ karmākaraṇīyamiti tenādhivāsitam--evaṃ kriyatāmiti/
K10divyav_u:21523: 479.006. tābhyāṃ te hiraṇyasuvarṇagrāmapradānādinā protsāhitā na pratipadyante/
K10divyav_u:21525: bhavantah etān puruṣān saputradārān sasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavāṃścārake baddhvā sthāpayateti/
K10divyav_u:21531: 479.010. āyuṣmānapi rudrāyaṇastrayāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayātkṛtacīvaro niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ samādāya pātracīvaram yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21532: 479.011. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantamidamavocat--icchāmyahaṃ bhadanta raurukaṃ nagaraṃ janapadacārikāṃ caritumiti/
K10divyav_u:21535: 479.013. athāyuṣmān rudrāyaṇo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21536: 479.014. āyuṣmān rudrāyaṇastasyā eva rātreratyayāt pūrvāhne nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
K10divyav_u:21537: 479.015. rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātraḥ pratikrānto yathāparibhuktaṃ śayanāsanaṃ pratisāmayya samādāya pātracīvaraṃ
K10divyav_u:21538: 479.018. dūraṃ hi karṣate karma dūrātkarma prakarṣate/
K10divyav_u:21539: 479.019. tatra prakarṣate jantum yatra karma vipacyate//52//
K10divyav_u:21540: 479.020. iti yena raurukaṃ tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21541: 479.020. anupūrveṇa cārikāṃ carannantarmārge 'nyatamaṃ karvaṭakaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21546: 479.022. sa taiḥ puruṣaiḥ sārdhamekasminnevodyāne rātriṃdevā samupagataḥ/
K10divyav_u:21549: 479.026. dharmeṇa vā kārayati svakaṃ rājyaṃ na cāsya kaccitparatopasargaḥ//53// iti/
K10divyav_u:21551: 479.029. deva, tathyaṃ śikhaṇḍī khalu raurukeṣu sabhṛtyavargo bakavānarogaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21552: 479.031. na cāsya kaścitparatopasargah adharmarājyaṃ tu karoti nityam//54//
K10divyav_u:21554: 480.002. tasyāpi tu yatsadṛśaṃ tadadya upalapsyase saubhyeti//55//
K10divyav_u:21563: 480.006. kva yāsyasi tvaṃ naravīra bhūyo na te suto nandati jīvitena/
K10divyav_u:21564: 480.008. vayaṃ hyadhanyā nṛpasamprayuktā ihābhyupetāstava ghātanāya //56// iti//
K10divyav_u:21568: 480.011. sa saṃlakṣayati--yattaduktaṃ bhagavatā karmasvakatā te rudrāyaṇa manasikartavyeti, idaṃ tat/
K10divyav_u:21569: 480.012. sarvathā dhik saṃsārabhaṅguramiti viditvā teṣāṃ kathayati--bhadramukhāḥ,
K10divyav_u:21573: 480.014. te parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kṛtvā kathayanti--deva, evaṃ kuru/
K10divyav_u:21574: 480.014. athāyuṣmān rudrāyaṇo 'nyatamaṃ vṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya suptoragarājabhogaparipiṇḍataṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā śānteneryāpathenāvasthitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21575: 480.015. uktaṃ bhagavatā--pañcānuśaṃsā bāhuśrutye--skandhakuśalo bhavati dhātukuśala āyatanakuśalaḥ pratītyasamutpādakuśalaḥ,
K10divyav_u:21577: 480.017. tena vīryamārabhya idameva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā
K10divyav_u:21582: 480.022. athāyuṣmān rudrāyaṇo 'rhattvaprāpto vimuktiprītisukhapratisaṃvedī tasyā velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
K10divyav_u:21584: 480.025. adyāpyudrāyaṇo bhikṣū rājadharmair na mucyate//57// iti/
K10divyav_u:21589: yadi śikhaṇḍī rājā asmān pṛcchati--kiṃ vṛddharājena maraṇasamaye vyākṛtamiti,
K10divyav_u:21594: 480.031. ahaṃ ca parinirvāsye tvaṃ cāvīciṃ gamiṣyasi//58// iti/
K10divyav_u:21595: 481.001. <481>idaṃ cāparaṃ vaktavyah--dve ānantarye karmaṇī kṛte--yacca pitā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ,
K10divyav_u:21603: tasya dharmavinaṣṭatvād ṛkaro 'pi na pratibhāti prāgeva ṛddhiḥ/
K10divyav_u:21604: 481.005. tatasteṣāmekena puruṣeṇa nirghṛṇahṛdayena tyaktaparalokena kakṣādasiṃ niṣkṛṣya utkṛttamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyāṃ nipātitaḥ//
K10divyav_u:21606: 481.008. dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti,
K10divyav_u:21607: tasmin samaye nīlapītakohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhānniścārya kāścidadhastādgacchanti,
K10divyav_u:21610: tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanamavīcimarbudaṃ
K10divyav_u:21611: nirarbudamaṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvamutpalaṃ padman mahāpadmaṃ narakaṃ gatvā ye uṣṇanarakāsteṣu
K10divyav_u:21615: 481.013. teṣāmevaṃ bhavati--kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ,
K10divyav_u:21618: 481.015. teṣāṃ nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ bhavati--na hyeva vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ,
K10divyav_u:21622: 481.016. te nirmite cittamabhiprasādya taṃ narakanivedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhiṃ gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā
K10divyav_u:21627: sudṛśān sudarśanānakaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyamanātmetyuddhoṣayanti /
K10divyav_u:21633: 481.027. atha tā arciṣastrisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokaghātumanvāhiṇḍya bhagavantameva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti/
K10divyav_u:21647: 482.001. atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ pādatale 'ntarhitāḥ/
K10divyav_u:21654: 482.013. tatkālaṃ svayamadhigamya dhīra buddyā śrotṛrṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām/
K10divyav_u:21657: 482.018. yasyārthe smitamupadarśayanti dhīrāstaṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ//64// iti/
K10divyav_u:21659: 482.020. nāhetvapratyayamānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti/
K10divyav_u:21663: 482.024. rudrāyaṇa ānanda arhattvaṃ prāpto jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21665: 482.025. atha te vadhakapuruṣā āyuṣmato rudrāyaṇasya pātracīvaraṃ khikkhitaṃ cādāya raurukamanuprāptāḥ/
K10divyav_u:21667: 482.026. tau śrutvā prītiprāmodyajātau yena śikhaṇḍī rājā tenopasaṃkrāntau/
K10divyav_u:21684: 482.031. śikhaṇḍī <483>rājā mūrcchitaḥ pṛthivyāṃ nipatito jalapariṣekapratyāgataprāṇaḥ kathayati--bhavantaḥ,
K10divyav_u:21688: 483.004. ahaṃ ca parinirvāsye tvaṃ cāvīciṃ gamiṣyase//66// iti/
K10divyav_u:21689: 483.005. idaṃ cāparaṃ vaktavyah--dve tvayā ānantarye karmaṇī kṛte--yacca pitā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ,
K10divyav_u:21702: 483.011. tābhyāmapi duṣṭāmātyābhyāṃ pracchannaṃ tiṣyapuṣyastūpayordve bale kṛtvā dvau biḍālapotakau sthāpitau/
K10divyav_u:21704: yena satyena satyavacanena yuvābhyāṃ māyayā lokaṃ vañcayitvā śraddhādeyaṃ vinipātya pratyavarāyāṃ biḍālayonāvupapannau,
K10divyav_u:21705: tena satyena satyavacanena māṃsapeśīṃ kṛtvā svakasvakaṃ stūpaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svakasvakaṃ balaṃ praviśatāmiti/
K10divyav_u:21707: tadā tābhyāṃ duṣṭāmātyābhyāṃ rudrāyaṇasya rājño devī uktā--devi,
K10divyav_u:21721: tvamapyevaṃ kathayasi--kasmāttvamutpāḍūtpāṇḍuḥ kṛśāluko durbako mlāno 'prāptakāya iti,
K10divyav_u:21722: kathamahaṃ notpāṇḍūtpāṇḍuko bhavāmi kṛśāluko dubalako mlāno 'prāptakāya iti,
K10divyav_u:21723: yena mayā duṣṭāmātyavigrāhitena dve ānantarye karmaṇī kṛte--yacca pitā jīvitādvyaparopito yaccārhan bhikṣuḥ kṣīṇāśravah?
K10divyav_u:21731: kiṃ tu mayā ṛtusnātayā anyena puruṣeṇa sārthaṃ paricaritam,
K10divyav_u:21741: 483.031. tayā tau duṣṭāmātyau āhūyoktau--mayā asya pitṛvadho vinoditaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21755: sa kathayati--yuvāmapyevaṃ kathayatha--kimarthaṃ śokaḥ kriyate iti,
K10divyav_u:21759: sa kathayati--mayā pratyakṣadṛṣṭau tiṣyapuṣyau arhantau jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau nirvātau/
K10divyav_u:21762: tau kathayatah--vayaṃ devasya pratyakṣīkurmo yathā māyayā lokaṃ vañcayitvā śraddhādeyaṃ vinipātya pratyavarāyāṃ biḍālayonāvupapannau adyatve 'pi stūpe tiṣṭhata iti/
K10divyav_u:21766: 484.011. eṣa ca śabdo rauruke nagare samantato visṛtaḥ/
K10divyav_u:21768: 484.012. tatastau duṣṭāmātyau kathayatah--yathā tiṣyapuṣyau yena satyena satyavacanena
K10divyav_u:21769: yuvāṃ māyayā lokaṃ vañcayitvā śraddhādeyaṃ vinipātya pratyavarāyāṃ biḍālayonāvupapannau
K10divyav_u:21771: 484.014. anena satyena satyavacanena imāṃ māṃsapeśīmādāya svakasvakaṃ stūpaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svakasvakaṃ bilaṃ praviśatāmiti/

K10divyav_u:22278: yadāsau lokapravādamātrayāpi panthānaṃ samavatīrya dhanadavaruṇakuberaśaṃkarajanārdanapitāmahādīn devatāviśeṣān putrārtham yācitumārebhe/
K10divyav_u:22281: 493.029. tattattasya prabalavirasam yāti tīkṣṇāṃśumālaiḥ śoṣaṃ manye raviriva jalaṃ bhāgadheyārkabimbam//5//
K10divyav_u:22282: 494.001. <494>rudraṃ naikakapālaśekharadharaṃ cakrāyudhaṃ vajriṇaṃ sraṣṭāraṃ makaradhvajaṃ girisutāputraṃ mayūrāsanam/
K10divyav_u:22283: 494.003. gaṅgāśaṅkhadalāvadātasalilāṃstāṃstāṃśca devānasau putrārthī śaraṇam yayau bahu punardānaṃ dvijebhyo dadau//6//
K10divyav_u:22286: 494.009. evamanekaprakārakāyacetasorāyāsakāribhirapi vratopavāsamaṅgalairyadā naiva kadācit kāle 'sya putrā jīvino babhūvuḥ,
K10divyav_u:22291: 494.015. na ca te 'dyāpi jīvanti tatra kiṃ parikhidyase//9//
K10divyav_u:22293: 494.018. ye yairvinā nātmabhavaṃ labhante te tairvinā janma kathaṃ bhajeran//10//
K10divyav_u:22295: 494.022. tvaṃ kenāpi viḍambase jaḍamatiḥ putrāśayonmattako yastvaṃ dyāmadhigantumicchasi bṛhatsopānamālāśrayāt//12//
K10divyav_u:22296: 494.024. vidhimaparamahaṃ te bodhayāmi prasiddhyai tvamapi ca kuru tāvat saṃprasiddhyai kadācit/
K10divyav_u:22297: 494.026. yadi bhavati sutaste kanyakānāma tasya sakalajanapade 'smin khyāpayasva prasiddhyā//13//
K10divyav_u:22298: 494.028. atha tasya kālāntare gaganatalamaṃśumālīva svakiraṇanikarairvirājamānaṃ svavaṃśalakṣmīḥ putraṃ janayāmbabhūva/
K10divyav_u:22302: 495.005. mūrtistasya rarāja cāruśikharāddhemam yathā bhūcyutaṃ prodgīrṇasvamayūkhajālajaṭilai ratnāṅkurairveṣṭitam//15//
K10divyav_u:22309: 495.017. atha tasya pitā mitraḥ sārthavāho vaṇigjanaiḥ/
K10divyav_u:22312: 495.021. pitaryatīte jananīṃ jagāda cakāra kiṃ karma pitā mameti//20//
K10divyav_u:22318: 495.028. yāvaccāyaṃ janapadamimaṃ tasya vṛttiṃ na bhūtāṃ pṛcchatyasmai kathayati na vā sarva evaiṣa lokaḥ/
K10divyav_u:22319: 495.030. tāvadyuktaṃ mama sutamimaṃ mṛtyuvaktrāntarālaṃ nānāduḥkhavyasanagahanaṃ vyādhiṣaktaṃ niṣeddhum//23//
K10divyav_u:22320: 496.001. <496>paro 'pi yaḥ sādhujanānujuṣṭaṃ vihāya mārgaṃ śrayate vimārgam/
K10divyav_u:22321: 496.003. nivāraṇīyaḥ sa svamatājjanena prayatnataḥ kiṃ punareva putraḥ//24//
K10divyav_u:22325: 496.008. atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvo māturvacanaṃ kusumamālāmiva śirasā samabhivandya anyasminnahani aukarikāpaṇaṃ prasasāra/
K10divyav_u:22328: 496.012. svagarbhasaṃdhāraṇaduḥkhitāyai dadau sa tasyai mudito jananyai/
K10divyav_u:22330: 496.016. atha ye tasmin puravare ciraṃtanā aukarikāḥ,
K10divyav_u:22335: 496.020. sa tvaṃ tāṃ vṛttimujjhatvā śrayase 'nyāṃ kayā dhiyā//28//
K10divyav_u:22340: 496.024. atha gāndhikāpaṇikāḥ puruṣāḥ sametyāgatya ca taṃ mahāsattvaṃ vicchandayāmāsuh--
K10divyav_u:22341: 496.026. gāndhāpaṇaṃ klībajanābhipannaṃ pitā na vai mādya pure(?) cakāra/
K10divyav_u:22342: 496.028. tatraiva hairaṇyikatāṃ sa kṛtvā dhanāni bhūyāṃsi samāpa sādho//30//
K10divyav_u:22343: 496.030. atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvastāmapi jīvikāmapahāya hairaṇyikāpaṇaṃ cakrāra/
K10divyav_u:22345: 497.001. <497>lebhe dine sa prathame mahārhaḥ kārṣāpaṇān ṣoḍaśa tān dadau ca//31//
K10divyav_u:22348: 497.005. atha hairaṇyikāpaṇikāḥ puruṣā sametyāgatya ca taṃ tasmātkarmaṇo vinivartanārthamāhuh--
K10divyav_u:22352: 497.010. vivartitaṃ ślāghyamatīva puṃsāṃ na tu svavṛtteścyavanaṃ pravṛttam//34//
K10divyav_u:22355: 497.016. yadāśritaṃ karma janānuvarjinā tvayā vidagdhena dhanepsunādhunā/
K10divyav_u:22356: 497.018. kathaṃ na saṃprāpsyasi bhāgyasampadaṃ piturvyatīte 'pi viśālinīṃ śriyam//36//
K10divyav_u:22358: 497.022. tasyā mahendrāmalatulyakīrteḥ sūnuḥ kathaṃ tvaṃ na bibharṣi lajjām//37//
K10divyav_u:22359: 497.024. ye mṛtyuṃ gaṇayanti naiva vipadi grāsaṃ bhajante 'nagha gehe bandhuṣu sūnuṣu vyapagatasnehātmanodyoginaḥ/
K10divyav_u:22360: 497.026. ye nītvā jaladhīnagādhasalilānāvartabhīmān budhāḥ prāpyārthān gajadantabhaṅgasitayāsinvanta kīrtyā jagat//38//
K10divyav_u:22361: 497.028. atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvastebhyo 'pi tathānuguṇinīṃ kathāmavadhārya samudrāvataraṇakṛtavyavasāyo mātaramupasṛtyovāca--amba,
K10divyav_u:22365: 497.030. sā pūrvameva bhartṛmaraṇaduḥkhena vigatajīvitāśā svasya tanayasya tenāsamlakṣitadāruṇena viyogaśokaśastreṇa bhṛśataraṃ pravidāryamāṇahṛdayeva
K10divyav_u:22367: 497.033. jīvitaṃ kasya te 'niṣṭaṃ tvayā krīḍāṃ karoti kaḥ//39//
K10divyav_u:22370: 498.003. na yāvadevaṃ mama duḥkhaśalyaṃ prayāti nāśaṃ pravidārya śokam/
K10divyav_u:22371: 498.005. kathaṃ nu tasyopari me dvitīyaṃ nipātyate pāpamayairamitraiḥ//41//
K10divyav_u:22372: 498.007. yeṣāṃ ceto vividhavirasāyāsaduḥkhāprakampyam yaiḥ saṃtyaktaṃ kṛpaṇahṛdayairjīvitaṃ bhogalubdhaiḥ/
K10divyav_u:22373: 498.009. te saṃtyaktvā nayanagalitāśrupravāhārdravaktrān bandhūnajñā makaranilaye mṛtyave yānti nāśam//42//
K10divyav_u:22375: 498.013. saṃtyajya yātuṃ kathamudyamaste mā sā kathā mā nu vaco madīyam(?)//43//
K10divyav_u:22377: 498.017. saṃpattayo yena vaṇigjanasya tato 'hamevaṃ suta vārayāmi//44//
K10divyav_u:22378: 498.019. sa tasyā hitārthaṃ madhurāṇyapi vacanakusumāni tṛṇamivāvadhūya sapragalbhatayā samavalambitavikatthāśobhaṃ kiṃcidīdṛśaṃ pratyāha--
K10divyav_u:22379: 498.021. varaṃ naiva tu jāyeran ye jātā nirdhanā janāḥ/
K10divyav_u:22380: 498.022. jātasya yadi duḥkhāni varaṃ mṛtyur na jīvitam//45//
K10divyav_u:22382: 498.024. arthino mama pāpasya yānti niḥśvasya durmanāḥ//46//
K10divyav_u:22383: 498.025. ye śaktihīnā vibhavārjanādau te dehino duḥkhaśataṃ sahante/
K10divyav_u:22384: 498.027. lokaṃ punarduḥkhaśatopataptaṃ draṣṭaṃ na śaknomi cirāyamāṇaḥ//47//
K10divyav_u:22385: 498.029. tasmādvilaṅghāmi vacastvadīyam yāsyāmi taṃ tvaṃ prajahīhi śokam/
K10divyav_u:22386: 498.031. tatraiva yāyāṃ nidhanaṃ samudre chinnaṃ mayā vā vyasanaṃ janasya//48//
K10divyav_u:22387: 499.001. <499>atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvo mātaramapramāṇīkṛtya nirgatya gṛhādvārāṇasyāṃ puryāmātmānaṃ sārthavāhamityuddhoṣayāmāsa/
K10divyav_u:22388: 499.003. asyāmeva purā puraṃdarapurīpratispardhipuryāṃ vaṇik mitro nāma babhūva yatsuranaraprakhyātakīrtidhvajaḥ/
K10divyav_u:22389: 499.005. putrastasya mahāsamudramacirādyāsyatyamuṣmindine yātum ye vaṇijaḥ kṛtopakaraṇāste santu sajjā iti//49//
K10divyav_u:22398: 499.014. anartharāgagrahamūḍhabuddhayo narā hi paśyanti na kevalaṃ hitam/
K10divyav_u:22399: 499.016. satāṃ hitādhānavidhānacetasāṃ giro 'pi śṛṇvanti na bhūtavādinām//50//
K10divyav_u:22400: 499.018. maitrakanyako 'pi dharaṇi{tala}niṃnāṃ mātaraṃ śokavaśyāṃ śirasi kupitacittaḥ pādavajreṇa hatvā/
K10divyav_u:22401: 499.021. muhurupacitaśokaḥ karmaṇā preryamāṇas tvaritamatirabhūt saṃprayātuṃ vaṇigbhiḥ//51//
K10divyav_u:22404: 499.026. vyasanaphalamanantaṃ mā tu bhūt karmaṇo 'sya punarapi guruvākyaṃ mātigāḥ svapnato 'pi//52//
K10divyav_u:22430: 501.009. atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvastena mahatā vyasanopanipātenāpyanāpatitabhayaviṣādadainyāyāsamanāḥ samavalambya mahaddhairyaparākramaṃ sasambhramaṃ phalakamādāya prasasāra/
K10divyav_u:22435: 501.016. saṃsmṛtya māturvacanaṃ sa pāṇā vyāsajya mūrdhānamidaṃ jagāda//62//
K10divyav_u:22436: 501.018. śṛṇvanti ye nātmahitaṃ gurūṇāṃ vākyaṃ hitārthodayakāryabhadram/
K10divyav_u:22439: 501.024. prāptaṃ phalaṃ janmataroḥ sudhībhirye mānayantīha giro gurūṇām//64//
K10divyav_u:22440: 501.026. māturhitāyaiva sadodyatāyāḥ prollaṅghya vākyaṃ mama duṣkṛtasya/
K10divyav_u:22441: 501.028. puṣpam yadīdṛgbharapāpadāruṇaṃ prāntaṃ gamiṣyāmi kadā phalasya//65//
K10divyav_u:22443: 501.032. guruśirasi dadhānaḥ pādavajraṃ khalo 'haṃ kathamavanividāryaśvabhrarandhre na lagnaḥ//66//
K10divyav_u:22444: 502.001. <502>ye santo hitavādināṃ sphuṭadhiyāṃ saṃpādayante giriḥ śreyaste samavāpnuvanti niyataṃ kravyādapuryām yathā/
K10divyav_u:22445: 502.003. ye tūtsṛjya mahārthasāradayitāṃ vācaṃ śrayante 'nyathā dustāre vyasanodadhau nipatintāḥ śocanti te 'ham yathā//67//
K10divyav_u:22450: 502.009. ete dāḍimapuṣpalohitamukhāḥ pronmuktakolāhalā hāsādarśitadantapaṅktivirasāḥ śākhāmṛgā nirbhayāḥ/
K10divyav_u:22451: 502.011. sarpān bhīmaviṣānalasphuradurujvālākarālasphuṭān hatvā pāṇitalaiḥ prayānti vivaśāḥ phūtkārabhītā nunaḥ//68//
K10divyav_u:22453: 502.015. vaṃśaistālaravaiḥ sagītamadhuraiḥ pracchedasampādibhiḥ saṃgītāhitacatasaḥ pramuditā gāyantyamī kinnarāḥ//69//
K10divyav_u:22467: 503.005. likhantaṃ karālair nabhaḥ śṛṅgajālaiḥ kṣipantaṃ mayūkhaistamaḥ sāgarāṇām/
K10divyav_u:22477: 503.024. prekṣante madavārilolamadhuliṭprollīḍhagaṇḍasthalaṃ darpāt kesariṇo balena mahatā pronmathyamānā gajam//78//
K10divyav_u:22479: jagat saṃsārapaṅke tribhuvanasvāmīvodayad ramaṇakaṃ nāma nagaraṃ dadarśa /
K10divyav_u:22496: 504.025. adyaiva duḥkhāni śamaṃ gatāni adyaiva no jīvitamāttasāram/
K10divyav_u:22501: 505.003. teṣāṃ phalaṃ vīkṣaṇameva te 'laṃ saṅgastvayā kiṃ punareva dīghyam (rgha?) //87//
K10divyav_u:22502: 505.005. adyaiva mā bandhusuhṛdviyogaśokaṃkathāḥ kasya na santyapāyāḥ/
K10divyav_u:22503: 505.007. dāsyo vayaṃ te 'psarasaścatasrah chāyā na te laṅghayituṃ samarthāḥ//88//
K10divyav_u:22504: 505.009. ratnāni vāsāṃsi samujjvalāni śayyāśrayāścārutarā vayaṃ ca/
K10divyav_u:22510: 505.018. nitye viyoge maraṇāt puraḥsthite śocanti te deśakṛte viyoge/
K10divyav_u:22513: 505.024. haimādriśṛṅgamiva tatpuramāviśantaṃ nemuḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭā bahavo 'pi tatra//92//
K10divyav_u:22516: 505.029. hā kiṃ vinikṣipya kharāgravajro nāthaḥ surāṇāmiti tarkito 'bhūt//93//
K10divyav_u:22523: 506.009. krīḍan sa kālaṃ na viveda yātaṃ sarvātmanā rāgaparītacetāḥ//96//
K10divyav_u:22524: 506.011. pratyahaṃ ca dakṣiṇena gamanaṃ vārayanti sma/
K10divyav_u:22526: tathā tathā tayā diśā gamanāyautsukyamanā babhūva/
K10divyav_u:22529: 506.015. yadi kuryādayaṃ loke suhṛdāṃ vacanaṃ hitam/
K10divyav_u:22530: 506.016. paraiti svargaṃ pātāle śvabhre vā svapnato 'pi na//98//
K10divyav_u:22531: 506.017. atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvastāsāmapsarasāmaparijñātagamanaprayojano dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi padavīmāruhya vrajan sadāmattakaṃ nāma nagaraṃ
K10divyav_u:22532: 506.018. tasmādapi nagarādaṣṭāpsarasaḥ sasambhramaṃ niḥsṛtya taṃ mahāsattvaṃ praveśayāmāsuḥ/
K10divyav_u:22533: 506.019. tatrāpyaticiraṃ ratimanubhūya pratiṣiddhamānagamanakriyastenaiva dakṣiṇena pathā gacchannandanaṃ nāma nagaraṃ dadarśa/
K10divyav_u:22535: 506.021. tatrāpi ciraṃ krīḍāṃ sevitvā tasmādapi brahmottaraṃ nāma nagaraṃ prayayau/
K10divyav_u:22536: 506.021. tatrāpi dvātriṃśatāpsarobhiḥ prabhūtasatkāraṃ viṣayasukhaṃ bhuktvā tāḥ prāha--
K10divyav_u:22537: 506.023. icchāmi gantuṃ tadahaṃ bhavantyo mā matkṛte śokahrade śayīdhvam/
K10divyav_u:22538: 506.025. saṃpātabhadrāṇi hi kasya nāma viśleṣaduḥkhāni na santi loke//99//
K10divyav_u:22539: 506.027. sthitvāpi yenaiva ciraṃ viyogaḥ śatroḥ kṛtāntādbhavitāntakāle/
K10divyav_u:22542: 507.001. <507>viśleṣaduḥkhāya ratiṃ prayānti teṣāṃ paro nāsti vimūḍhacetāḥ//101//
K10divyav_u:22543: 507.003. athāpsarasastāḥ samastāstadgamanaviyogaśokaropitahṛdayāḥ sasambhramāḥ kamalakuvalayakunmalavilāsā nalinya iva śirasi viracitobhayakamalāñjalayaḥ
K10divyav_u:22544: 507.005. asmāsu te kartumaniṣṭamiṣṭaṃ kathaṃ hi bhaktipraṇayārpitāsu/
K10divyav_u:22546: 507.009. gatvā tannagaratrayam yadapi he svāminnihāpyāgataḥ saṃprāptā viṣayopabhogamadhurāḥ saṃpattayaste ciram/
K10divyav_u:22547: 507.011. gantavyaṃ na punastvayā subahunā proktena kim yāsi cet saṃsmartāsi vipatsamudrapatito vākyaṃ hi no duḥkhitaḥ//103//
K10divyav_u:22550: 507.015. kathaṃ teṣu nivāryerannivarteran kathaṃ nu vā//104//
K10divyav_u:22551: 507.016. niyojanīyāḥ suhṛdo 'suhṛdbhir yasmin hite karmaṇi nityakālam/
K10divyav_u:22552: 507.018. nivāraṇaṃ tatra tu ye prakurvate te śatravo mitratayā bhavanti//105//
K10divyav_u:22553: 507.020. divyaṃ prāpya sukhaṃ pure ramaṇake saṃcoditaḥ karmaṇā āyāto 'smi niṣevaṇāya paraṃ saukhyaṃ sadāmattakam/
K10divyav_u:22554: 507.022. saṃprāpto 'smi tataḥ svakarmakuśaleneṣṭaṃ puraṃ nandanaṃ tasmādāgatakasya yūyamadhunā pronmūlitā bhūmayaḥ//106//
K10divyav_u:22555: 507.024. tasmādato me gamanaṃ bhavantyo mā vārayadhvaṃ na hi no 'styapāyaḥ/
K10divyav_u:22558: tiraskṛtya tenaiva dakṣiṇena pathā gacchan dadarśa mahārgalapraghaṭitaprakaṭapuṭacaturdvāradāruṇaṃ
K10divyav_u:22561: 508.001. <508>samprāptamātrasya tu tatkṣaṇena dvāraṃ ca pusphoṭa kapāṭabhāram/
K10divyav_u:22572: 508.019. kṣaṇādabhūttannagaraṃ ca sarvaṃ bhrāntaṃ ca kṛtsnaṃ sa dadarśa bhītaḥ//111//
K10divyav_u:22573: 508.021. tato maitrakanyako bodhisattvaḥ paśyati sma tamatidāruṇākārapramāṇaṃ krūrājvalanamālāliṅgitamudāreṇa
K10divyav_u:22577: 508.025. kiṃ nāgo 'si suro 'si kinnaravaro yakṣo 'si kiṃ mānuṣaḥ kiṃ vidyādharasainikaḥ kimasi vā daityaḥ piśāco 'si vā/
K10divyav_u:22578: 508.027. kiṃ vākāri bhavāntareṣu bhavatā karmātiraudraṃ svayam yāsyāmi vyasanaṃ duruttaramidaṃ bhujyaṃ phalaṃ krandayat//112//
K10divyav_u:22580: 508.030. nāhaṃ nāgo naiva yakṣo na devo daityo nāhaṃ nāpi gandharvarājaḥ/
K10divyav_u:22581: 509.001. <509>rakṣo nāhaṃ nāpi vidyādharo 'pi jātistulyā saṃpratīhi tvayā naḥ//113//
K10divyav_u:22583: 509.004. kiṃ karma bhramatā tvayā kumatinā saṃsāradurge kṛtam yenedaṃ jvalitānalaṃ śirasi cakraṃ bhramatyāyasam/
K10divyav_u:22585: 509.007. nānāduṣkarakārikā bhagavatī saṃsārasaṃdarśikā tatra śreyaḥsukhopapādanaparā matsnehabaddhāśayā//114//
K10divyav_u:22586: 509.009. yāṃ loke pravadanti sādhumatayaḥ kṣetraṃ paraṃ prāṇināṃ daivāveśavaśādakāryagurukastasyā jananyā mahat/
K10divyav_u:22587: 509.011. sādho prāskhalayaṃ śiraḥpraharaṇaṃ pādena pāpāśayas tenedaṃ jvalitānalaṃ śirasi me cakraṃ bhramatyāyasam//115//
K10divyav_u:22588: 509.013. atha bodhisattvastasya puruṣasya pravacanapratodena saṃcoditahṛdayastāṃ parajugupsāmātmanyanupaśyannāha--
K10divyav_u:22590: 509.017. yeṣu svayaṃ doṣaguṇeṣu magnas taireva lokaṃ kathamaṅkayāmi//116//
K10divyav_u:22595: 509.025. kiṃ na paśyati karmāṇi balavanti śarīriṇām/
K10divyav_u:22597: 509.027. ye baddhā viṣayeṇa duḥkhanigaḍenāyāsakarmotkaṭe ye tyaktvā guruvākyamandhamatayaḥ pāpāśrayaṃ kurvate/
K10divyav_u:22598: 509.029. muktāḥ karmabhireva duḥkhanigaḍapracchedaśūraiḥ śubhair mānuṣyam yadavāpya mūḍhamatayo dūre sthitā jarmiṇah (janminah?) //119//
K10divyav_u:22599: 509.031. atha tasya vacanānantarameva karmānilāvegotkṣiptamiva taccakraṃ ciṭiciṭāyamānadahanakaṇacayodgāraraudraṃ
K10divyav_u:22600: tasya mūrdhnaḥ samabhyudgamya maitrakanyakasya bodhisattvasya śiraḥ pravidārayad bhramitumārabdham /
K10divyav_u:22603: 510.003. tataḥ sa puruṣo hā heti mūrdhnā pravidāhajena tīvreṇa duḥkhena samākramyamāṇaśarīrakaṃ maitrakanyakaṃ bodhisattvamāha--
K10divyav_u:22605: 510.007. saṃtyajya karmāda parāṇi tāni prāptastvidaṃ sthānamanantaduḥkham//121//

K10divyav_u:22610: 510.016. saṃtyajya nāgā vyasanaṃ sahante yayā tayecchālatayā gato 'ham//123//
K10divyav_u:22612: 510.020. yuddhe mriyante bahavo narendrā yayā tayecchālatayā gato 'ham//124//
K10divyav_u:22614: 510.024. mahodadhau yānti narāḥ praṇāśam yayā tayecchālatayā gato 'ham//125//
K10divyav_u:22617: 510.030. teṣāṃ munīnāṃ vigatavyathānāṃ deyaṃ kathaṃ pādarajena mūrdhni/
K10divyav_u:22633: 511.018. yo mātaryapakārakartumanasaḥ kṛtvā samāyāsyati tasyedaṃ śirasi bhramiṣyati punarmūrdhnā tava pracyutam//132//
K10divyav_u:22634: 511.020. atha bodhisattvastena mūrdhnā pravidāhajena tīvreṇa duḥkhena samākulahṛdayo 'pi sattveṣvananteṣu samutpāditatīvrakāruṇyāśayastaṃ puruṣamābabhāṣe--
K10divyav_u:22636: 511.024. sphuritakaṭakahārāḥ prajvalanmaulayo ye punaramarasamūhāste 'pi śeṇvantu santaḥ//133//
K10divyav_u:22637: 511.026. kṛtvā duścaritaṃ svamātari jagatkṛtsnam yadi prodvahedetatprajvalitāgnirāgakapilaṃ cakraṃ bṛhanmūrdhani/
K10divyav_u:22638: 511.028. kalpaṃ kalpasamairahobhirayutān voḍhuṃ cirāyotsahe sattvārthaṃ pratipadyamānamasya hi me cittaṃ na saṃkhidyate//134//
K10divyav_u:22639: 511.030. atha tasya sarvasattvapriyasya maitrakanyakasya bodhisattvasya vacanānantarameva

K10divyav_u:22654: 512.023. bhagavati guṇarāśau saṃprasādya svacittaṃ svagṛhamiva sa sādhurdyāmayāttatkṣaṇena//141//
